name: Hotel Central Anzac
description:
Centrally located, Hotel Central Anzac is a 2-minute walk from the train station and a 7-minute walk from Amiens Cathedral. It offers modern accommodation and a continental breakfast.

The ensuite guestrooms are decorated in warm colours giving them a cozy feel. They come with a satellite TV and WiFi access.

Every morning breakfast is served in the dining area and features a selection of fresh, homemade pastries and jams made from seasonal produce. Guests can choose between a continental or full English breakfast. Newspapers are provided at reception.

The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the St Leu district and 15 minutes from the famous canal ways.

name: B&B HOTEL Amiens Centre Cathédrale
description:
Offering a restaurant and free Wi-Fi, B&B HOTEL Amiens Centre Cathédrale is located in the centre of Amiens.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV and a desk. The private bathrooms come with a shower.

At B&B HOTEL Amiens Centre Cathédrale you will find a 24-hour front desk, a bar and a snack bar. Other facilities offered include luggage storage. A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

The hotel is 1.3 km from Zénith d'Amiens, 800 m from Berny's Museum and 1.1 km from Amiens Train Station. Beauvais Tillé Airport is 50 km away. The property offers parking at an extra cost.

name: Holiday Inn Express Amiens, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express offers comfortable guest rooms with free WiFi. It is located in the centre of Amiens just 50 metres from the Train Station and a 10-minute walk from the Cathedral.

Serviced by a lift, all of the rooms include air conditioning and a flat-screen HD TV with satellite channels. There is also a safety deposit box and an espresso machine.

A free buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Holiday Inn Express Amiens. Many restaurants can be found nearby.

This non-smoking hotel also has a bar, a fitness room and laundry and ironing services. Underground, public parking is available nearby for cars up to 1.80 metres high.

name: Moxy Amiens
description:
In the heart of the city and a stone's throw from the train station, our Moxy Amiens hotel is the ideal place for your business or sports trips, for a trip with friends or a discovery stay with your family. Our 3 star hotel, entirely renovated, offers 109 air-conditioned rooms for 1, 2 or 3 people, free wifi and 49 inch connected television.

A dining bar open to all 24 hours a day where you can eat on the go or taste our regional dishes in a warm and modern atmosphere. Our meeting room with its atypical format will meet your
expectations.

Close to all the major assets of the Picardy capital, let our teams guide you to discover the life of Jules Verne, the Hortillonnages and the largest Gothic Cathedral in France. An underground public parking lot is in the immediate vicinity.

name: Hotel Le Prieuré et La Résidence
description:
Located in Amiens city centre, Hotel Le Prieuré et la Résidence are at the foot of the Amiens Cathedral. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and individually-decorated rooms with antique furnishings.

Guest rooms at the Prieuré et la Résidence have a private bathroom with a bath or shower. They are each equipped with a TV and a hairdryer.

A breakfast buffet is served daily in Le Prieuré's breakfast room, which features crystal chandeliers. Guests can relax on the hotel’s terrace and courtyard.

Hotel Le Prieuré et La Résidence is just 900 metres from the Amiens SNCF Train Station. The Amiens-Glisy Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

name: ibis budget Amiens Centre Gare
description:
Ibis budget Amiens Centre Gare is set in Amiens city centre, a 5-minute walk from Amiens Train Station and a 15-minute walk from Notre-Dame of Amiens Cathedral. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

A buffet breakfast can en enjoyed every morning.

The nearest airport is Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport, 50 km from the hotel.

name: Le Vivier
description:
Set in Amiens, 2.4 km from Zénith d'Amiens, Le Vivier offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Located around 3 km from Amiens Train Station, the inn with free WiFi is also 2.9 km away from Berny's Museum. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.

At the inn, every room has a desk. Selected rooms also feature a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a minibar. At Le Vivier the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Amiens, like golfing.

There is an in-house bar and guests can also make use of the business area.

The Floating gardens Park is 3.7 km from Le Vivier, while University of Picardie Jules Verne is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 64 km from the inn.

name: ibis Styles Amiens Centre
description:
Featuring a bar, ibis Styles Amiens Centre is located in Amiens in the Picardy region, 300 metres from Amiens Train Station and 3.9 km from Zénith d'Amiens. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from The Floating gardens Park.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. At ibis Styles Amiens Centre each room has bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Ibis Styles Amiens Centre offers a sun terrace.

With staff speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, guidance is available at the reception.

Berny's Museum is 400 metres from the hotel, while Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens is 400 metres away. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 66 km from ibis Styles Amiens Centre.

name: The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud
description:
Situated in Amiens, 3.6 km from Zénith d'Amiens, The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.8 km from Amiens Train Station.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms come with a seating area. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels.

Berny's Museum is 3.7 km from The Originals Boutique Hôtel Amiens Sud, while The Floating gardens Park is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 61 km from the hotel.

name: Comfort Hotel Amiens Nord
description:
Comfort Hotel Amiens Nord is just 4 km from Amiens city centre and offers accommodation in a hotel with a terrace. Free Wi-Fi, free private parking and meeting rooms are available on site.

The hotel’s rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom features a hairdryer, free toiletries and a bathtub.

Every morning, guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet.

Amiens historical centre and cathedral are just 5 km away, together with Amiens Zoological Garden. Amiens Train Station is 4.5 km away and there is access to A16 Motorway 20 km away.

name: Mercure Amiens Cathédrale
description:
The 4-star Mercure hotel is situated in front of France's biggest medieval cathedral, which is listed as a Unesco World Heritage site.

Each room and suite recently renovated, is spacious: from 25 to 41m2, sound-proofed and air-conditioned during summer months. They come with free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, which includ French and international channels. tea/coffee making facilities, minibar with one free bottle of water.

L' Echanson, the hotel's restaurant, serves a wide range of delicate dishes and regional specialties made with local and regional products.

name: Grand Hotel de L'Univers
description:
This Grand Hotel de L'Univers is located in the heart of Amiens, just 100 metres from the train station. It offers soundproofed rooms equipped with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

The Grand Hotel de L'Univers provides a 24-hour reception. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

Grand Hotel de L'Univers is just a 5-minute walk from Notre Dame Cathedral and the floating gardens. Several sites dedicated to the Great War can be visited in the region.

name: Le Saint Louis
description:
Le Saint Louis is located in Amiens town centre, 300 metres from the train station and the Cathedral. It offers rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Guestrooms at Hotel Le Saint Louis are individually decorated and have private bathrooms.

Le Saint Louis is close to the town’s main tourist attractions such as the Rue des Piétons (pedestrian street) and the house of Jules Verne and the Perret Tower.

Public parking is available near the hotel.

name: Hôtel Spa Marotte
description:
Located in the centre of Amiens, 500 metres from the train station and set in a traditional building from the 19th century, Hôtel Spa Marotte offers a tea room, a champagne and wine bar and elegant accommodations.

All of the accommodations at Hôtel Spa Marotte have a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some also include a balcony and some have a sauna.

A continental breakfast is available every morning. Guests can enjoy a tea on site.

Other facilities are a safety deposit box and a luggage storage. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the property.

Hôtel Spa Marotte has his own and private shuttle service (airports, railway stations, etc.) available on request for an extra fee.

You can enjoy a 1h30 access to the spa for an extra cost of 30 € per person per day. We can offer massages, body or face treatments, alone or in duo (extra cost)

It is 200 metres from the cathedral and 300 metres from Jules Vernes House. Musée de Picardie is 800 metres away and Amiens Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. Valet parking services is available upon request.

name: Au Spatial
description:
Au Spatial is located in the heart of Amiens, a 2-minute walk from Amiens Train Station and a 6-minute walk from Amiens Cathedral. It offers free WiFi access.

Each room includes a flat-screen TV with Canal+ and BBC channels. They also have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at hotel Au Spatial. The buffet includes homemade jams, cereals, pastries, bread, cheese, cold meats and yogurts.

Amiens Zoo is located 3 km from this hotel and private parking is available on site at an extra cost per day and subject to availability.

name: Logis hôtel - La Chambre D'Amiens
description:
Set in Amiens, 900 metres from Zénith d'Amiens, Logis hôtel - La Chambre D'Amiens offers accommodation with a bar, free private parking, a shared lounge and a garden. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation features luggage storage space and free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. At Logis hôtel - La Chambre D'Amiens all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Continental and buffet breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation.

The Floating gardens Park is 3.3 km from Logis hôtel - La Chambre D'Amiens, while Berny's Museum is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport, 61 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Victor Hugo
description:
Hotel Victor Hugo is a hotel offering accommodation in Amiens. The property is located 2.2 km from Zénith d'Amiens and 100 metres from Berny's Museum. The property is a 7-minute walk from The Floating gardens Park and a 3-minute walk from Tribunal de Grande Instance of Amiens.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Hotel Victor Hugo features certain rooms that feature city views, and all rooms include a private bathroom and a wardrobe. The rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

University of Picardie Jules Verne is 3.5 km from Hotel Victor Hugo. Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport is 50 km from the property.

name: Première Classe Amiens
description:
Première Classe Amiens is 3 km from the centre of Amiens and its cathedral. This hotel offers free WiFi access and a garden.

All rooms at Première Classe Amiens feature a wardrobe, a desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They include a bathroom with a shower.

Breakfast is served between 6:30 and 10:00 on weekdays and between 7:00 and 10:00 during weekends. Vending machines for drinks and snacks can be found at the reception area.

This property is 5 km from the A16 motorway and 9 km from Amiens Golf Club. Free WiFi is provided.

name: Hôtel De Normandie
description:
Hôtel De Normandie is located only 100 metres from the train station in the heart of Amiens. It is just a 5-minute walk from Notre-Dame d'Amiens Cathedral, Perret Tower and plenty of shops.

Each room features a flat-screen TV, desk, telephone and free WiFi access. A hairdryer, electric kettle, ironing facilities and adapter can be provided upon request for free.

Each morning breakfast is served in the form of a buffet and it can be enjoyed in the hotel's art-deco breakfast room. A communal lounge is at your disposition to relax in.

The N25 motorway is a 10-minute drive from the Hôtel De Normandie.

name: Hôtel Inn Design Resto Novo Amiens
description:
Located in Dury within a business zone (office), the Inn Design hotel offers you all the necessary comfort for your visit to Amiens.

The rooms are all equipped with a flat-screen television with the Canal+ package, free Wi-Fi, a kettle with tea and coffee, and a private bathroom.

Come and enjoy your breakfast and dinner in our RestoNovo restaurant, and why not continue the experience with lunch before hitting the road again.

Breakfast is available every day:
From Monday to Friday from 6:30 am to 9 am
On Saturdays and Sundays from 7:30 am to 10 am

The restaurant is open from Monday to Friday:
Lunch: from 12 pm to 1:30 pm
Dinner: from 7 pm to 9 pm

The hotel is ideally located:

2 minutes from the Amiens Sud shopping center (Auchan, restaurants, shops)
45 minutes from Beauvais Airport
5 minutes from the A29 motorway exit
12 minutes from Amiens train station and the city center
10 minutes from the Palais des Congrès, Mégacité, and the Zénith
10 minutes from Amiens Sud Hospital and the Polyclinic.

Don't hesitate to visit the Picardie Museum, the cathedral, or the hortillonnages, all within a 15-minute drive or 20-minute bus ride.

name: Campanile Amiens - Glisy
description:
Campanile Amiens – Glisy is conveniently situated just outside Amiens – Glisy airport and the access to the A29 motorway. It features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access and has a restaurant with a terrace.

Each room is equipped with a TV and has a private bathroom with a bathtub. A buffet breakfast is served daily.

Campanile Amiens – Glisy provides a meeting room and there is free private parking available. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Amiens town centre.

name: B&B HOTEL Amiens
description:
B&B HOTEL Amiens is set in Longueau, 12 km from the centre of Amiens. Free WiFi is featured and free private parking is available on site.

The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served every morning at B&B HOTEL Amiens. Vending machines for drinks and snacks are available on site.

Albert is 32 km from B&B HOTEL Amiens, while Abbeville is 46 km away. Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport is 55 km from the property.

name: ibis budget Rouen Centre Rive Gauche
description:
Hotel ibis budget Rouen Centre Rive Gauche Gauche is situated in Rouen, 2.4 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a private bathroom.

There is luggage storage space at the property.

Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 2.5 km from Hotel Ibis Budget, while Rouen University Hospital is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Beauvais Tille Airport, 75 km from Hotel ibis budget Rouen Centre Rive Gauche Gauche.

name: Novotel Amiens Pôle Jules Verne
description:
The hotel is located 7 km from the centre of Amiens, the Cathedral and the Hortillonnage market gardens.

Guestrooms are modern and comfortable and equipped with modern en suite facilities.

Novotel Amiens Pôle Jules Verne offers Novotel Cafe serves modern cuisine. Featuring a swimming pool and private car park the hotel is ideal for a business trip or a holiday in Amiens.

Up to 2 children (16 years and under) stay free when sharing with parents. Exit 51 on the A1 motorway is only a 5-minute drive away.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre
description:
Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre features a restaurant serving high qualtiy local dishes, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Rouen. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi.
At the hotel all rooms come with a wardrobe, a TV and a private bathroom.
Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre offers a continental or buffet breakfast.
The accommodation also provides a business centre and guests can check the newspapers at Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre. Private parking is available for a fee.
Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 700 metres from the hotel. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 68 km from Radisson Blu Hotel, Rouen Centre.

name: Kyriad Prestige Amiens Poulainville - Hotel and Spa
description:
Located in Poulainville, 7.8 km from Amiens Train Station, Kyriad Prestige Amiens Poulainville - Hotel and Spa provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar.

Zénith d'Amiens is 8.9 km from the hotel, while The Floating gardens Park is 7.5 km away. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 75 km from Kyriad Prestige Amiens Poulainville - Hotel and Spa.

name: hotelF1 Amiens Est
description:
hotelF1 Amiens Est 12 rue des indes n0ires 80440 glisy is set in Glisy, 6 km from Amiens and 25 km from Albert.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a shared bathroom. Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

Abbeville is 47 km from hotelF1 Amiens Est 12 rue des indes n0ires 80440 glisy, while Péronne is 41 km from the property. Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport is 49 km away.

name: B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre
description:
B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre is located in the heart of Rouen next to Saint-Sever Shopping Centre and 4 km from Kindarena Stadium. It offers en suite rooms, a restaurant and 24-hour reception desk. Free Wi-Fi is available.

Rooms at B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre are equipped with satellite TV and a telephone. The rooms are accessible by lift.

B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre’s restaurant serves traditional cuisine and guests can relax with a drink in the bar.

B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre is 1.5 km from Rouen Orléans Train Station, which can be accessed in 10 minute using the metro system. Jardin des Plantes de Rouen is 1 km away and public parking is possible in St Sever shopping centre, next to the hotel.

name: Brit Hotel Confort Rouen Centre
description:
This hotel is located in the centre of Rouen next to the University of Rouen Faculty Of Medicine and 4 km from the Kindarena Stadium. It offers en suite rooms, a terrace and free WiFi access.

Rooms at Brit Hotel Confort Rouen Centre are equipped with a desk and flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning. Vending machines are available.

The Medical Training Center is 650 meters from the property. Brit Hotel Confort Rouen Centre is 1.5 km from Rouen Cathedral and an 8-minute drive from Rouen-Rive-Droite Train Station.

name: Hôtel Littéraire Gustave Flaubert, BW Signature Collection
description:
Situated in the historic centre of Rouen, Hôtel Littéraire Gustave Flaubert, BW Signature Collection, offers accommodation with a literary theme in honour of the writer Gustave Flaubert. It is located 3 km from the Kindarena Stadium and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is included in each of the elegant rooms. All rooms have private bathrooms, and some feature iPod docking stations.

Breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms. Guests are invited to relax in the hotel's cocktail lounge. The hotel is situated across the street from a number of French and international restaurants.

Notre Dame Cathedral of Rouen is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the Musée des Beaux Arts de Rouen is 800 metres away.

name: Le Vieux Carré
description:
This hotel is located in central Rouen, in a pedestrian area, just 850 metres from Rouen Rive-Droite Station. It offers en suite rooms and an interior courtyard with flowers and trees.

Le Vieux Carré’s restaurant provides daily continental breakfast and lunch. In the afternoon, it turns into a tea room, serving gourmet pastries. Guests can enjoy their meals outdoors, in the courtyard.

Each room at Le Vieux Carré is equipped with a TV and a telephone. The private bathrooms all feature a bathtub. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the rooms and in the entire hotel.

The common living room features exposed beams and wooden furniture. Guests can relax in the armchairs, by the fireplace.

Le Vieux Carré is 400 metres from Notre-Dame Cathedral and 450 metres from Rouen’s Museum of Fine Arts. Paid public parking can be found nearby.

name: KYRIAD ROUEN SUD - Sotteville les Rouen
description:
Situated in Rouen, 1.6 km from Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen, KYRIAD ROUEN SUD - Sotteville les Rouen features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 2.7 km from KYRIAD ROUEN SUD - Sotteville les Rouen, while Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Beauvais–Tillé Airport, 84 km from the accommodation.

name: Mercure Rouen Centre Cathédrale
description:
This Mercure is located in central Rouen, 160 metres from Notre Dame Cathedral and 3 km from Kindarena Stadium. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms, each with a private bathroom, satellite TV and free WiFi access.

The Mercure Rouen Centre Cathédrale serves a full breakfast, which can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room and an express breakfast option. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The Place du Vieux Marché (the old market) and the Gros Horloge are within easy walking distance of the Mercure Rouen Centre. Rouen Train Station is situated just 1 km away and underground, private parking is available on site.

name: ibis Rouen Centre Champ de Mars
description:
Located just a 10-minute walk from the centre of Rouen, ibis Rouen Champ de Mars offers a sauna, hammam and 24-hour reception. Rouen Cathedral is only a 15-minute walk from the hotel.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, wardrobe, desk and telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Guests can relax with a drink in the on-site bar and restaurants can be found in the city centre.

Additional features include free WiFi access throughout and luggage storage. The train station is 2 km away and the A150 motorway is ideally located a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Novotel Suites Rouen Normandie
description:
Located on the banks of the Seine River and 10 minutes from Rouen downtown, this hotel offers free WiFi access. The Kindarena Stadium is just 2 km away.

The Novotel Suites air conditioned modular suites measure 30m² and feature a living room with a flat-screen TV with English and American channels. They have a kitchenette equipped with a microwave, a mini-fridge and tea and coffee making facilities. They also include a private bathroom fitted with a bath or a shower.

The Novotel Suites Rouen Normandie provides services 24/7 including a Boutique Gourmande offering snacks, bar service, a fitness room with free access, a business corner (equipped with Internet access, a webcam, printer and fax). There is also a secure underground car park.

Do not forget to enjoy the Good Morning breakfast, a balanced way to start the day.

name: ibis Rouen Centre Rive Droite Pasteur
description:
Set within 3.1 km of Voltaire Station, Rouen and 4.2 km of Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen, ibis Rouen Centre Rive Droite Pasteur features rooms in Rouen. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. All rooms in ibis Rouen Centre Rive Droite Pasteur are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or American options.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen, Gare de Rouen Rive Droite and Flaubert bridge. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 85 km from ibis Rouen Centre Rive Droite Pasteur.

name: Les Initiés
description:
Located in the heart of Rouen's historical centre, Les Initiés is just a 10-minute walk from Rouen-Rive-Droite Train Station and 3 km from Kindarena Stadium. Set opposite the Palais de Justice, it offers individually-themed rooms with free Wi-Fi access and en suite facilities.

A continental breakfast is served each morning from Monday to Saturday and is available on Sunday upon reservation. The Inities’s bar and brasserie restaurant offers regional cuisine and a view of the Palais de Justice.

Hôtel Les Inities is just 150 metres from the Gros-Horloge and a 5-minute walk from the Notre-Dame Cathedrale. It is an ideal base to explore the historic capital city of Normandy.

name: Ibis Rouen Centre Rive Gauche Mermoz
description:
Situated in Rouen, 2.4 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall, Ibis Rouen Centre Mermoz Rive Gauche features accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi.

The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel rooms have a wardrobe and a private bathroom.

Guests at Ibis Rouen Centre Mermoz Rive Gauche can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 2.8 km from Ibis Rouen Centre Mermoz Rive Gauche. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 85 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel De Quebec
description:
Located in the heart of Rouen, in a peaceful area only a 5-minute walk from the old town and Rouen Cathedral, this hotel includes free Wi-Fi internet access. The Kindarena Stadium is 3 km away.

Start the day with a buffet breakfast, which can be enjoyed from the comfort of your own room with an extra cost.

Spend the day exploring the narrow streets of the nearby old town, with its antique shops and pretty churches. Guests can relax in the common lounge area.

Rouen Rive Droite Train Station is a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Théâtre des Arts tram stop is 800 metres away.

name: B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite
description:
Located a 20-minute walk from the centre and the cathedral, B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite offers a French restaurant, a bar and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen, cable TV. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

All of the rooms at B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A telephone and a radio are also provided.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Droite is a 16-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts and a 13-minute walk from Rouen Opera.

The hotel is situated 1 km from the train station and 6 km from the A28 motorway. There is a private car park on site, available at a surcharge.

name: B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Gauche
description:
The B&B HOTEL Rouen Centre Rive Gauche is in the St Sever district, 1 km from the Place Jeanne d'Arc and Rouen Cathedral. Its bar is open 24 hours and free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout the hotel.

These modern rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with BeIN SPORTS. Each has a private bathroom that includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

You can enjoy snacks in the on-site bar, Rendez-Vous.

Rouen Rive Droite Train Station is 1 km from the hotel and private parking is possible in the secure, indoor car park.

name: Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Rive Gauche
description:
Set in Rouen, 1.9 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen, Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Rive Gauche offers accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a terrace and a bar. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.7 km from Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen.

At the hotel, every room has a wardrobe. The units in Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Rive Gauche are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

You can play billiards at Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Rive Gauche.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed.

14-juillet Tramway Station, Rouen is 3 km from the hotel, while Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 82 km from Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Rive Gauche.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Rouen Centre - Rive Gauche, an IHG Hotel
description:
3.1 km from Hotel de ville de Soteville Station, Rouen, Holiday Inn Express - Rouen Centre - Rive Gauche, an IHG Hotel is located in Rouen and features free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a shared lounge and to a bar. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.7 km from Voltaire Station, Rouen.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Holiday Inn Express - Rouen Centre - Rive Gauche, an IHG Hotel the rooms include bed linen and towels.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English and French.

Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 84 km from Holiday Inn Express - Rouen Centre - Rive Gauche, an IHG Hotel.

name: Hotel Morand
description:
Hotel Morand is a renovated 17th-century coaching inn that now works as a hotel and is located in the historic centre of Rouen, 400 metres from SNCF Train Station. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.

All guest rooms at Hotel Morand are equipped with tea and coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served each morning. Guests can relax in the lounge with its fireplace and exposed beams.

Le Morand is located opposite the Musée des Beaux Arts and Rouen Cathedral is a 2-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel de Dieppe 1880
description:
Best Western Hôtel de Dieppe is well renowned around Normandy for its speciality called 'Pressed Duckling'. The hotel is located in the heart of Rouen, near the pedestrian area and next to the old town.

The rooms are fully equipped and comfortable.

The hotel boasts a renowned restaurant and a bar. You can also enjoy a cocktail at the bar and organize your conference or seminar in our two conference rooms. Breakfast is served daily at the property and can also be enjoyed in the comfort of the guestroom at an extra cost.

The hotel is located in front of the railway station. Since 1880, the Best Western Hôtel de Dieppe has been managed by the Gueret family.

name: Comfort Hotel Rouen Alba
description:
Located 5 minutes' walk from the historic Old Town of Rouen and 3 km from the Kindarena Stadium, the Comfort Hotel Alba offers accommodation free WiFi. Breakfast is available daily at an extra cost.

Accessed by a staircase, the guest rooms at Comfort Hotel Alba feature a TV. A refrigerator can be added upon request and subject to availability. Some rooms offer a view of Rouen’s Notre-Dame Cathedral. The en-suite bathrooms feature a shower, toilet and hairdryer. Guests can also make use of the complimentary toiletries.

Comfort Hotel Alba is close to Rouen’s historical attractions such as the Gros Horloge monument which is a 7-minute walk away and the Joan of Arc Tower, 13 minutes on foot.

Our property does not have a private car park. You will find a public car park "Parking de la Cathédrale" 10m from the hotel (€16.50 for 24 hours) or parking spaces in the street (€3.80 per ticket for a maximum of 2 hours) and free between 7 p.m. and 9 a.m. (free on Sundays).

Rouen-Orléans Train Station is 3 km away from the property.

Please note that our establishment is not suitable for people with reduced mobility.

name: Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Cathédrale
description:
Featuring free WiFi and a terrace, Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Cathédrale offers pet-friendly accommodation in Rouen, 1.6 km from Rouen Train Station and 3 km from Rouen Kindarena Sports Hall. Public parking is available nearby for an extra fee.

Certain rooms feature views of the river or city and some rooms feature a balcony. Each room has a private bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available.

A buffet breakfast is Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Cathédrale

Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen is 200 metres from Ibis Styles Rouen Centre Cathédrale, while Rouen University Hospital is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Paris Beauvais-Tille Airport, 73 km from the property.

name: Hôtel d'Angleterre Rouen Centre Gare
description:
Well set in Rouen, Hôtel d'Angleterre Rouen Centre Gare provides a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers room service. Some rooms at the property include a balcony with a river view.

At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, certain rooms at Hôtel d'Angleterre Rouen Centre Gare also provide guests with a terrace. At the accommodation every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel d'Angleterre Rouen Centre Gare include Notre-Dame Cathedral of Rouen, Gare de Rouen Rive Droite and Musee des Beaux-Arts de Rouen. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 85 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel De La Cathédrale
description:
Set just 50 metres from the Rouen Cathedral, in the heart of the city's historic centre, this hotel has a timber-framed façade dating from the 17th century and is located 4 km from the Kindarena Stadium. Guests are invited to enjoy afternoon tea in a room leading onto the patio. Secure and paid public parking is available nearby.

All of the individually decorated rooms feature flat-screen TVs and cable channels, and some include a lounge area. The en suite bathrooms at Hotel De La Cathédrale are equipped with hairdryers.

A buffet-style breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the hotel's breakfast room, decorated in a traditional Norman style.

The Rouen-Rive-Droite Train Station is located just 1.6 km from the hotel and the Church of St. Ouen is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel de Bourgtheroulde, Autograph Collection
description:
This boutique hotel is located in Rouen’s historic centre, next to the Gros Horloge and 2 km from Kindarena Stadium. Guests have free access to the indoor pool, fitness and spa centre including sauna, hammam and a range of spa treatments.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel de Bourgtheroulde have free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some have views of the Galerie d’Aumale, the Place de la Pucelle or the Temple of St Eloi.

L'Aumale restaurant serves traditional cuisine using regional produce. It also offers buffet breakfast, and guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the bar or on the terrace.

Guests are invited to visit the town with places to see such as Notre-Dame Cathedral and Place du Vieux Marche. Gare de Rouen-Rive-Droite Train station is 1 km away and on-site private parking is possible upon reservation.

name: Alba hotel
description:
Alba hotel is located in Saint-Malo facing the beach and beside the port. It offers a bar and rooms with sea views.

Bar open daily from 11:15 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.

Each room has simple décor and is equipped with free Wi-Fi, cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room and guests’ are invited to have a drink at the hotel’s bar or on the terrace while enjoying the sea views.

A 24-hour front desk service is available at the Alba hotel.

Gare de Saint-Malo Train station is a 15-minute walk away. Places that guests can visit in the area include Chateaubriand’s tomb on ÎIe de Grand Bé, St Vincent Cathedral and the city’s Castle.

Parking charged at 9 €
Number of places available 4 on request

name: Hotel De La Mer
description:
Located just 150 metres from the beach in Saint-Malo, Hotel De La Mer offers free WiFi access throughout and an on-site bar. The train station is only a 10-minute walk away.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and heating. Each room has a private bathroom that includes a bath and free toiletries.

In July and August, a continental breakfast is available each morning at Hotel De La Mer. From September to June, it is served from Tuesday to Saturday. Restaurants can be reached within walking distance of the hotel.

Saint-Malo Port is 2 km away and Espace Duguay Trouin Convention Centre is 1.1 km from the property. Naye Ferry Terminal is 2.4 km away.

name: Hôtel Bristol Union Intra Muros
description:
Hotel Bristol Union is located in the heart of Saint Malo, within the city walls of the old town and 180 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. Its rooms and suites are en suite with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

A daily breakfast service is available. It is served in the dining area or in the comfort of your guest room. The bar offers a nice place to enjoy a quiet drink or evening aperitif.

The Bristol Union benefits from a convenient location for those wishing to explore and discover Saint-Malo and the picturesque region of Brittany. Mont Saint Michel is just a 45-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Cartier
description:
Situated within the fortified walls of Saint-Malo, the Hotel Cartier is just 280 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and 500 metres from the beach and the English channel. It features a modern décor and air-conditioned guest rooms with free internet access.

Flat-screen TVs are provided in all of the soundproofed rooms. The guest rooms offer en suite bathrooms and carpet flooring. fully renovated.

A buffet-style breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the hotel's breakfast area or in the comfort of your room.

Saint-Malo Cathedral is 120 metres from the hotel. The Saint-Malo Train Station is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Ar Iniz
description:
Providing a direct access to the Sillon Beach, Hôtel Ar Iniz offers a regional restaurant, a bar and a terrace with a view of the sea. The modern-style hotel is situated 1.5 km from the city centre.

The elegant rooms at Hôtel Ar Iniz have a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a safety deposit box. The bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available daily and the restaurant on site serves dishes made with fresh and local products. Additional facilities are available such as free WiFi access and bicycle rental.

The property is located 12 km from Cancale and its beaches and a 45-minute drive from the city of Rennes. The train station is 3 km away and there is a private car park on site, available at an additional cost

name: Hotel De L'univers
description:
Hotel De L'univers is located in the walled city of Saint Malo in Brittany, and is walking distance to the ferry port and train station. The property is 400 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and offers free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are comfortable and equipped with TV, telephone and private bathroom.

Friendly staff are available to offer personalised service and advice on the area.

Hotel De L'univers is located directly in front of the castle, close to the sea, with a view of the main square. From here you can easily explore the historical city on foot.

name: Hotel Ajoncs d'Or
description:
Hotel Ajoncs d'Or is located in the heart of the historic fortified city walls of Saint Malo, 350 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers individually decorated rooms, which feature original artwork and free Wi-Fi access.

Each soundproofed room has a private bathroom and satellite TV. Rooms are accessible by a lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the spacious bright dining room. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Ajoncs d'Or hotel bar.

The hotel is conveniently placed to make the most of St Malo's many famous restaurants. In the summer, Saint Malo is a lively seaside resort featuring numerous outdoor and beach activities. Gare de Saint-Malo Train station is 1.8 km away. Private parking is available for an additional fee and must be reserved in advance.

name: Hôtel France et Chateaubriand
description:
The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand is located in the heart of the historic city of Saint Malo, 210 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers breathtaking views over the sea and le sillon.

The Hotel de France and Chateaubriand offer comfortable rooms with a refined decoration.

The restaurant serves many traditional seafood and regional specialties.

Its unique façade to Saint Malo, and the presence of the birthplace of Chateaubriand make the building to be classified a historical monument.

name: Hôtel Oré, Saint-Malo
description:
Hôtel Oré, Saint-Malo (Inter-Hotel) is located at the entrance to Saint-Malo, near the aquarium. The hotel offers family rooms with baths or showers, flat-screen TVs and free WiFi access.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and guests are invited to relax with a drink in Hôtel Oré's bar. There is also a terrace and a floral garden.

Free private parking is available on site and Hôtel Oré is easily accessible by the N137. Cancale, Mont Saint Michel, Dinard and Dinan are nearby.

name: Hôtel La Porte Saint Pierre-Logis Hôtel Intra Muros
description:
Situated inside the historic walls of Saint-Malo’s old town, this hotel is just 10 metres from the beach.

The guest rooms at La Porte Saint Pierre are decorated in a contemporary style and have a flat-screen TV and an electric kettle. Optical fiber access and a private bathroom, and some also have panoramic sea views.

In the mornings, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

A meeting room for up to 20 people is available on site.

Saint-Malo Train Station is 2 km from La Porte Saint Pierre. Numerous ferry connections to the Channel Islands and the UK are possible from Saint-Malo port, 1.5 km away.

name: Les Charmettes
description:
Les Charmettes, on the seafront in the Brittany town of Saint-Malo, offers direct beach access and a guests can sample a drink at the beach bar. Each guest room has a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

All seaside room feature a balcony, while other rooms look onto the courtyard. All rooms come with a nautical theme.

The hotel Les Charmettes serves a continental breakfast, which can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of your room. The on-site restaurant serves traditional meals including seafood platters. Guests can also relax on the hotel terrace, overlooking the sea.

The Sillon beach is situated directly in front of the hotel and the Saint Malo Train Station is 2 km away. Guests can reach Saint-Malo city centre within 30 minutes by walk.

name: Escale Oceania Saint Malo
description:
Escale Oceania Saint-Malo is located on the seafront, facing the Sillon Beach and a 14-minute walk from Saint-Malo Train Station. It offers modern rooms, a sunny outdoor terrace and 24 hour-a-day food service.

Guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV and some of them offer a sea view. Free Wi-Fi internet access is provided.

Free of charge guests have at their disposal a PC with internet access and a printer. Bikes can be rented on site.

Breakfast is served every morning, and evening meals can be enjoyed at the hotel. Snacks are available throughout the day and packed lunches for picnics are also available.

name: Logis Maison Vauban - Hotel St Malo
description:
Hotel Maison Vauban is located next to the Saint-Vincent Cathedral in Saint-Malo. Just 200 metres from the beach and 450 metres from Saint-Malo Marina, it offers comfortable accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

Guest rooms at the Palais are brightly decorated and equipped with a telephone, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning. It can be enjoyed in the hotel's breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms.

name: Apparts'hôtel l'Europe - centre gare-
description:
Apparts'hôtel l'Europe - centre gare- is situated in Saint Malo, 1.8 km from Grand Bé and 2.6 km from Solidor Tower. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Palais du Grand Large, Casino Barrière Saint-Malo, and National Fort. Free WiFi and room service are offered.

At the hotel, all rooms include a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, while some rooms also feature a kitchenette fitted with a microwave. At Apparts'hôtel l'Europe - centre gare- rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Saint Malo, like windsurfing and fishing.

Popular points of interest near Apparts'hôtel l'Europe - centre gare- include Sillon Beach, Eventail Beach and Bas-Sablons Beach. The nearest airport is Dinard–Pleurtuit–Saint-Malo Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: ibis Styles Saint Malo Port
description:
Offering a snack bar and free WiFi, ibis Styles Saint Malo Port is located in Saint Malo, less than a 10-minute walk from the sandy beaches and 1 km from Saint-Malo Train Station. Emerald Coast is located 2 km from the property.

Each of the contemporary rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a wardrobe. They all have a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

At ibis Styles Saint Malo Port you will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and a private parking with a supplement.

The hotel is only 1 km from the Ferry Terminal du Naye and close to the pier, providing access to the Channel Islands. It is also a 5-minute walk from the Olympic swimming pool of Saint Malo. Rennes Airport is 67 km away and the famous Mont Saint-Michel is less than an hour away by car. Dinard is 10 km away.

name: Hôtel de la Cité
description:
The Hôtel de la Cité is located in the heart of Saint-Malo, just 350 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and rooms with sea views.

The traditional guest rooms all have safes, and are all served by a lift. Each has a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer.

The Hôtel de la Cité is in close proximity to many restaurants and popular tourist sites, such as the City of Corsaires. You can also choose to dine at the restaurant in a nearby partner hotel, which offers a panoramic view.

name: La Marinière Hôtel Restaurant Crêperie
description:
Set 1 km from Sillon Beach, La Marinière Hôtel Restaurant Crêperie offers 2-star accommodation in Saint Malo and has a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. Located around 1.4 km from Eventail Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.8 km away from Bas-Sablons Beach. The accommodation offers room service and a concierge service for guests.

A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast is available every morning at the property.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Palais du Grand Large, Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort. The nearest airport is Jersey Airport, 72 km from La Marinière Hôtel Restaurant Crêperie.

name: Les Chiens du Guet
description:
Les Chiens du Guet is located in the heart of Saint Malo, just 50 metres from the beach and 550 metres from Saint-Malo Marina. You can relax on the terrace with a drink from the bar and dine at the on-site restaurant. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The simply decorated rooms feature carpet flooring, a desk and a private bathroom with shower. A hairdryer is also available at reception upon request.

Breakfast is available each morning, with an additional cost. The hotel’s restaurant serves à la carte dining prepared with local produce.

Dinard is 11 km from the hotel. Cancale is 17 km away.

name: Domaine de la Barbinais
description:
Set in a 7000 m², landscaped park, Domaine de la Barbinais is a hotel located in the countryside of Saint Malo. WiFi access is available throughout.

Each individually decorated room features a flat-screen TV and a desk. Each also includes a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room with an additional cost.

Other facilities offered at the property include physical reception is from 5:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. a telephone reception is provided 24 hours a day.. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling. The property offers free private parking on site and it is located a 5-minute drive from the beach.

name: Hotel Eden
description:
The charming Hotel Eden is located 100 meters from the beach, with direct access to the old town and the congress centre. It offers comfortable rooms.

Start the day with a delicious breakfast in the Hotel Eden’s spacious breakfast room. In the summertime you can dine on the pretty outdoor terrace.

Hotel Eden makes a great base for exploring the sites of Brittany and Normandy. The hotel is located on the road to the Mont Saint-Michel.

After a busy day sightseeing you can enjoy a drink and a snack back at the Hotel Eden’s cosy lounge bar.

The hotel is only 2,3 kilometres from Saint-Malo's TGV train station and 3 kilometres from the ferry terminal to Jersey and Guernsey.

name: Hotel Le Croiseur Intra Muros
description:
Located in Saint Malo, 400 metres from Saint-Malo Casino, Hotel Le Croiseur Intra Muros has a number of amenities including a terrace, a shared lounge, a bar and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 400 metres from Cale de Dinan Ferry, 600 metres from Espace Duguay Trouin and 600 metres from Palais du Grand Large.

At the hotel, every room has a desk. Rooms include a private bathroom, and certain rooms at Hotel Le Croiseur Intra Muros have a balcony. All rooms include a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Near the hotel you will find numerous restaurants and shops as well as a Thalassotherapy centre.

Ferry Terminal du Naye is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Petit-Bé Fort is a 14-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Dinard Bretagne Airport, 8 km from Hotel Le Croiseur Intra Muros.

name: Hôtel de la Gare
description:
Hôtel de la Gare features accommodation in Saint Malo near Casino Barrière Saint-Malo and National Fort. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1 km from Sillon Beach.

At the hotel, the rooms include a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel de la Gare include Eventail Beach, Bas-Sablons Beach and Palais du Grand Large. The nearest airport is Jersey Airport, 72 km from the accommodation.

name: Kyriad Prestige Saint-Malo
description:
The Kyriad Prestige hotel is located 4km from the historic Intramuros center and the beaches.

It has free and secure parking for your vehicle.

The establishment also has a spa with heated indoor swimming pool, accessible from 3 years old, with a whirlpool bath area, water slides for the back, a sauna, a hammam, and a fitness room with 3 equipment.

Our continental breakfast is served daily in the dining room as a buffet. You can also take advantage of the coworking spaces during the day, as WIFI is available throughout the hotel.

The bar is open every day until 10:30 p.m., and a snack service is available 24 hours a day.

Our modern and refined rooms are all equipped with safes, showers in the bathrooms, and air conditioning.

name: Ambassadeurs Logis Hotel
description:
Located on the seafront in Saint-Malo, the Ambassadeurs Logis Hotel is 1.5 km from the town centre and the TGV train station. It offers direct access to the beach and a 100 m² rooftop bar terrace with a panoramic sea view.

All rooms are serviced by a lift and equipped with a TV and a private bathroom. Some guest rooms also have a private balcony that overlooks the sea.

Ambassadeurs Logis Hotel has a bar and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. There is also an on-site crêperie, which serves a variety of home-made dishes.

Guests can discover Brittany’s Emerald Coast and the Ambassadeurs is just a 10-minute walk from the Thermes Marins Spa. Free public parking is possible nearby and private parking is available, upon reservation when booking.

name: Hôtel Le Nautilus
description:
Hôtel Le Nautilus is set in a renovated 17th-century building and is located in the walled city of Saint-Malo. This hotel offers a bar, luggage storage and a shared lounge. The property is a 2-minute walk from Saint-Vincent Cathedral and 50 metres from the beach. The property offers 4 Dutch bikes for free according to availability.

All the rooms feature soundproofing, a desk and satellite TV. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The bed linen has been upgraded for a 5 stars sleep quality.

Hôtel Le Nautilus is 300 metres from Saint-Malo Marina and 50 metres from several restaurants. Rennes Airport is 80 km away and free WiFi is included.

name: Mercure Mont Saint Michel
description:
This Mercure is situated in parkland just 2 km from the abbey of Mont Saint Michel. It offers spacious en suite rooms, a restaurant and bar and plenty of free on-site parking.

The air-conditioned rooms at Mercure Mont Saint Michel are equipped with facilities for making hot drinks. A flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels is also provided.

The restaurant, Le Pré Salé, is famous in the area and serves delicious seafood and regional specialities. The bar, Le Normandy, offers a relaxed setting for a drink amongst friends.

Mercure Mont Saint Michel is 6.5 km from Pontorson and 52 km from Saint-Malo.

name: Les Terrasses Poulard
description:
Composed of 2 different buildings, Les Terrasses Poulard is a historical property in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel and offers views of the bay, the village and the street.

Accessed by stairs, each room has a modern décor. Some rooms include large windows with bay views. They are equipped with TV and a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served at La Confiance restaurant, a 2-minute walk away, and the restaurant specialises in French and regional cuisine and is also open for lunch and dinner. Alternatively, guests can enjoy a meal at the onsite La Confiance restaurant and offers meals, drinks and snacks.

Guests can enjoy a drink in the Les Terrasses Poulard’s bar. It offers a 24-hour front desk service and guests can leave their luggage at the reception.

Activities in the area include cycling, fishing and hiking and explore the island.

name: Le Mouton Blanc
description:
At the foot of the abbey, the Mouton Blanc Hotel, welcomes you in its historic 14th century location. Le Mouton Blanc provides comfortable rooms with a simple yet cosy decoration.

The rooms are divided in 3 buildings: one of them offers views of the Mont Saint-Michel, and the other one features medieval-style rooms.

The Mouton Blanc restaurant offers local traditional cuisine, served in the dining room or the terrace. Breakfast is served daily.

Personalised services for visits, recreation and other activities are available upon request.

Please note that the reception of the hotel Le Mouton blanc is currently closed. Please note that arrival arrangements are made at the reception of the hotel Les Terrasses Poulard.

name: La Mère Poulard
description:
Housed in a historical building, this hotel is ideally located in the heart of Mont Saint-Michel. The classic-style rooms overlook the bay, the abbey or the medieval city.

All rooms at the La Mère Poulard are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub.

Guests are invited to sample La Mère Poulard’s recipes, including the worldwide-famous omelette, in the prestigious restaurant. A drink can be enjoyed in the piano bar, overlooking the Bay of the Mont Saint Michel.

The hotel has a shop selling regional gourmet products. The front desk is open 24 hours a day.

Activities include cycling and hiking and visiting the Mont Saint-Michel. Avranches is a 23-minute drive away. Saint-Malo is 45 minutes from La Mère Poulard.

name: Hôtel Vert
description:
Hotel Vert offers pastel-coloured rooms with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi access. It is located 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel tidal island on the Normandy Coast.

Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Vert’s restaurant, La salicorne. The hotel’s bar, L’Equinoxe, opens onto a private terrace.

The Vert Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and private parking. There is also an on site supermarket and souvenir shop.

name: Le Relais Du Roy
description:
Le Relais Du Roy is a 3-star hotel situated next to the River Couesnon, just 1.5 km from the Mont Saint-Michel and 50 metres from the free shuttle bus.

Featuring flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, a telephone and a welcome tray, each guest room at Le Relais Du Roy is decorated in a classic style. They also have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms feature a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

A grocery store can be found within a 3-minute walk from the hotel. The town of Pontorson is 7 km away. Private parking is available with an extra cost.

name: Le Relais Saint Michel
description:
Le Relais Saint Michel is an hotel facing the bay of Mont Saint-Michel. All guest rooms ( except Twin Room Saint-Michel with interior view) offer a private terrace and some have panoramic views of Mont Saint-Michel.

The soundproofed rooms are comfortable and spacious. They are fully equipped with modern comforts including a minibar and free Wi-Fi access. Each room has en suite facilities.

The hotel’s restaurant offers traditional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink or a meal on the terrace, which offers views of the Mont St Michel.

A free shuttle service that stops in front of the hotel will take you to the famous landmark Mont St Michel in just 10 minutes. Safety jackets are provided for guests wishing to take a walk at night. For guests arriving by car, secured parking is available with an extra cost.

name: Le Saint Aubert
description:
Set amid lush greenery, just 2 km from the Mont Saint-Michel, the hotel welcomes you in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

Hôtel Saint-Aubert features comfortable and very quiet rooms, surrounded by gardens full of flowers.

After a day spent exploring the Mont Saint-Michel, enjoy a delicious regional cuisine in the picturesque setting of a former farmhouse.

The helpful staff will be happy to provide you with information about the visits and the many attractions in the surrounding area.

name: La Vieille Auberge
description:
La Vieille Auberge is located in the medieval village of Le Mont Saint Michel, just a short walk from the famous Mont Saint-Michel Abbey. It offers free WiFi access, a restaurant and a terrace with views of the Mont Saint-Michel Bay.

Rooms are located in 2 annex buildings with many stairs to climb. One building offers standard rooms on the main street and the other building, located at the top of the village, offers rooms with a sea view. They feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

There is also a bar at the hotel, and the restaurant serves traditional French cuisine.

This property is 24 km from Avranches and 49 km from Cancale. Dol-de-Bretagne is 30 km away.

name: Hôtel la Croix Blanche
description:
Situated in the heart of Mont Saint Michel medieval Village, Hôtel La Croix Blanche offers a terrace and a bar.

The rooms at Hôtel La Croix Blanche have a flat-screen, satellite TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

In addition to the visit of Mont-Saint-Michel and its abbey, guests can go to Saint-Malo, 50 km from the hotel. Dol-de-Bretagne Train Station is 30 km away.

name: Hotel Gabriel
description:
Hotel Gabriel is located 1.6 Km from Mont Saint-Michel. It offers free Wi-Fi access and en suite rooms just a 25-minute walk from the walls of the old city.

Accessed by stairs, the hotel's spacious rooms include satellite TV. Each room has its own bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning.

Hotel Gabriel is a 6-minute drive from the E401 motorway. Pontorson TGV Train Station has connections to Paris and is 7.3 km away.

La Salicorne offers you authentic, vegetable, colorful, festive and eco responsible world cuisine. Le Pré Salé offers you Pré Salé lamb and semi gastronomic french cuisine and L'Hippocampe offers you vegetarian and local cuisine.

name: Auberge Saint Pierre
description:
Auberge Saint Pierre is a 14th-century half-timbered house located on Mont St Michel tidal island. It combines the period charm of exposed beams with modern comforts including TV and free Wi-Fi access.

The guest rooms at Auberge Saint Pierre have a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Some rooms have views of the sea.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily. Traditional Normandy cuisine and fish dishes are served in the authentic restaurant and guests may choose to dine on site.

Ideally situated for visiting Mont St Michel, this hotel is set on the main street that leads to the Mont Saint Michel abbey. Certain rooms are located in 2 separate buildings which are accessible by many stairs.

name: Manoir de la Roche Torin, The Originals Relais (Relais du Silence)
description:
Located in Courtils, Manoir de la Roche Torin, The Originals Relais is 10 km from the Mont-Saint-Michel. It offers free WiFi access, a garden and views of the Mont-Saint-Michel Abbey. The hotel’s restaurant is set in a conservatory.

All rooms feature a TV, a wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower. Some offer views of the Mont-Saint-Michel and are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining room and you can choose to order room service for breakfast. French cuisine can be enjoyed in the hotel’s restaurant.

This property is 14 km from the centre of Pontorson and 17 km from Avranches. The sea is 800 metres away and free private parking is available on site. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Auberge de la Baie
description:
This hotel is situated in the countryside of Normandy and offers free Wi-Fi

Flat-screen TVs with satellite channels are provided in all of the modern guest rooms at Auberge de la Baie. They are all equipped with en suite bathrooms and hairdryers.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning.

Free parking is available on site and the city of Avranches is 23 km away. The hotel is a 45-minute drive from the beaches of Saint-Malo and Rennes is reached by car in 1 hour.

name: Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie
description:
Set in Roz-sur-Couesnon, within 11 km of Mont Saint Michel Abbey and 11 km of Mont Saint-Michel, Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 28 km from Port of Houle, 31 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel and 33 km from The Pointe du Grouin. The hotel has a sun terrace and an indoor pool.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie all rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie offers a children's playground. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Roz-sur-Couesnon, like hiking.

Palais du Grand Large is 43 km from Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie, while Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 43 km away. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 88 km from the accommodation.

name: Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel
description:
Situated in Beauvoir, 5.4 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel provides some rooms that have a balcony, and all rooms are equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. At Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel you will find a restaurant serving French, Seafood and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Beauvoir, like cycling.

Mont Saint-Michel is 5.4 km from Ermitage - Mont-Saint-Michel, while Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 88 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Rose
description:
Composed of thoughtfully designed independent bungalows and guestrooms in the annex house of a 19th-century building, Hotel Rose offers comfortable accommodation and a peaceful atmosphere.

The residence is set in a verdant park full of trees and flowers. Some of the accommodation opens out onto the river that leads to the famous Mont Saint Michel and offer a tranquil, relaxing living space. All of the bungalows are independently ecological and can accommodate 4 people (or 5 on request).

Enjoy a tasty breakfast, a casual drink or a relaxing moment on the manor's veranda or under the shade of the trees.

Hotel Rose also features a shared living area with a piano, free Wi-Fi access, games and plenty of reading material. Nearby you can take quiet walks or bike rides and enjoy traditional and regional cuisine in one of the local restaurants.

name: Hôtel Le Lithana
description:
Located in the town centre of Pontorson, this hotel is just 10 km south of the famous Mont St-Michel. It offers a restaurant with a terrace and an interior courtyard. A private parking is at guests' disposal.

Guest rooms in this traditional Norman building have a simple décor and feature a balcony. Each heated guest room is equipped with a TV. Some rooms have access to a shared bathroom and some rooms have a private bathroom.

The restaurant at Le Lithana is open from Monday to Friday, and also features a bar. Breakfast including artisanal bread and pastries, is served every morning in the restaurant.

The hotel Le Lithana is 500 metres from Pontorson Train Station, shops and tourist office. It is accessible via the N176 motorway.

name: Best Western Hôtel Montgomery
description:
A 5 minutes' drive from Mont-Saint-Michel, the hotel is a 16th century old manor located in Pontorson. The Best Western Hôtel Montgomery features a garden as well as a private parking for an extra fee. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Rooms are decorated in a classic style and feature a bathroom with a bath or shower, and an LCD TV.

Guests can enjoy a breakfast served every morning at an extra cost. An array of restaurants can be found nearby the hotel, as well as a free public parking.

Cancale is 38 km away while Saint Malo train station is 44 km away from Best Western Hôtel Montgomery.

name: Vacancéole - Le Domaine du Mont - Mont St Michel
description:
Located just 18 km from Mont Saint Michel in Roz-Sur-Couesnon, Vacancéole Le Domaine du Mont offers a shaded outdoor terrace. Some of the rooms are air conditioned.

A flat-screen TV and free wired internet access are provided in all accommodations. Each room has its own bathroom with bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and a bakery delivery service is available. Drinks can be bought at the reception and you can have lunch or dinner in the nearby restaurants.

Vacancéole Le Domaine du Mont also has a children’s playground for younger guests. A heated indoor pool and a sauna are also featured at the residence.

Saint-Malo is 40 km from Vacancéole Le Domaine du Mont. Free WiFi access is available in the reception, while wired internet is provided in the rooms. Rennes Airport is 75 km from the property, while Pontorson Train Station is 8.6 km away.

name: L'Etape du Mont, Family Hostel
description:
L'Etape du Mont, Family Hostel features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Pontorson. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 10 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey.

A continental breakfast is available daily at the hotel.

You can play billiards and darts at L'Etape du Mont, Family Hostel, and the area is popular for cycling.

Mont Saint-Michel is 10 km from the accommodation, while Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 84 km from L'Etape du Mont, Family Hostel.

name: Hotel De France
description:
Just 100 metres from Pontorson Train Station, Hotel De France is just 10 km from the historic abbey on Mont Saint Michel. It offers guest rooms with a TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available in Hotel de France’s sister hotel, 30 metres away. Traditional, regional cuisine is also served there in the evenings.

With free public parking possible, guests can explore the seaside town of Granville, 48 km away. Saint-Malo is 45 km from Hotel de France.

name: ibis Pontorson Baie Du Mont Saint Michel
description:
Situated in Saint-Georges-de-Gréhaigne, 10 km from Mont Saint Michel, ibis Pontorson Baie Du Mont Saint Michel features a terrace, bar, and restaurant. This property also provides guests with free WiFi.

At the hotel, all rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a wardrobe. The rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

Guests at ibis Pontorson can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast, including sweet and savoury products. Gluten-free items are also available.

Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the accommodation.

Cancale is 39 km from ibis Pontorson Baie Du Mont Saint Michel, while the beaches of Saint-Malo are a 35-minute drive away. The nearest airport is Dinard Brittany Airport, 48 km from the hotel.

The hotel also has a free, secure car park, equipped with charging points for electric vehicles and Tesla superchargers.

name: Hôtel Ariane & SPA
description:
This charming hotel sits at the border of Brittany and Normandy, just a 5-minute drive from the Mont-Saint-Michel. Set in a garden, it has an outdoor terrace and spacious rooms.

Each bedroom has a contemporary design, a TV and a telephone. The private bathrooms feature a bathtub and a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire Hotel Ariane.

The hotel has a wellness area for a fee. The sessions can be privatized.

A full buffet breakfast is provided every morning in the cosy dining room with plants and stone walls.

Shuttles between Pontorson and Saint Malo are available for a small charge and leave from in front of the hotel. Hotel Ariane is 80 km from Rennes and 47 km from Saint Malo. Private parking is possible on site, at a surcharge.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud (Inter-Hotel)
description:
The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud is located just a 10-minute drive from Le Mont Saint Michel and a 35-minute drive from Saint Malo.

Each guest room at The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud is soundproofed and has satellite TV and a private bathroom.

The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud has a restaurant, which serves regional and traditional cuisine and seafood specialities, using fresh local produce.

The hotel provides a shuttle service between the hotel and Dol de Bretagne TGV station, Saint Malo TGV station, Dinard and Rennes Saint Jacques Airport. Free on-site parking is also available.

name: Hôtel De Brunville & Spa
description:
Just 400 metres from Bayeux Cathedral, this hotel offers an outdoor heated pool, a jacuzzi and a sauna which are accessible all year round. It is ideally located in the centre of Bayeux, near the Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry, and few kilometers away from the D-Day's beaches.

Rooms at the Hôtel de Brunville & Spa are comfortable and well-equipped with modern amenities.
A continental buffet breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel De Brunville & Spa. Fresh, regional products are served in the hotel’s restaurant and guests can enjoy drinks in the bar, or by the pool.

The Spa du Grand Luxembourg, located in an indoor 200 m² space, is the result of our quest for the very best in well-being treatments and equipment.

Come and discover our new offer, unique in Bayeux: jacuzzi, sauna, hammam, 4-season sensory shower, ice fountain, salt cave with infrared deckchairs and PHYTOMER treatments.
The indoor wellness area and treatments are available on reservation.

A limited number of paid parking spaces are available

Bayeux Tapestry Museum is 650 metres from Hôtel De Brunville & Spa. Bayeux Train Station is 1.3 km away.

name: Hotel Reine Mathilde
description:
Hotel Reine Mathilde is situated in the medieval district, just 300 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum. It offers free Wi-Fi access and modern guest rooms with private bathrooms.

The guest rooms are decorated in warm, neutral colours. Each has a TV and a work desk. The private bathroom provides a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily. The restaurant, Le Garde Manger, offers continuous service throughout the day. Guests can enjoy a varied selection of traditional dishes in the dining room or on the south-facing terrace.

Omaha Beach Memorial Museum is 24 km from Hotel Reine Mathilde. The American Museum is 19 km away.

name: Hotel Le Lion D'Or et Restaurant La Table Du Lion
description:
This former 18th-century post office is now a charming hotel located in one of Bayeux’s oldest quarters. It offers 24-hour reception and is just 400 metres from the Bayeux Tapestry Museum.

Free Wi-Fi access is provided in each soundproofed room. All rooms are light and spacious and have their own bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning. The hotel’s restaurant serves creative French cuisine. After dinner, guests can relax with a drink of Calvados and listen to some music by the fireplace in the lounge bar.

The staff at Le Lion D’or can help arrange local excursions through their concierge service. Massage treatments can be arranged near the property upon request.

name: Château de Bellefontaine - Teritoria
description:
Located 800 metres from central Bayeux and its cathedral, this 18th-century mansion offers guest rooms and a traditional restaurant open for dinner upon reservation. The park has a tennis court and a pond, and is planted with 200-year-old trees.

Each room is individually decorated and feature a minibar, free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms include a hairdryer, free toiletries and a bath or a shower. Some rooms have a seating area.

Enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning at the Château de Bellefontaine - Teritoria. A continental breakfast can also be delivered to your room at a reduced rate. After breakfast, you can use the computer with internet access in the lounge, which also features a fireplace.

Bayeux Train Station is 1 km from the hotel and free public parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel Le Saint Patrice
description:
Featuring 2-star accommodation, Hôtel Le Saint Patrice is situated in Bayeux, 800 metres from Baron Gerard Museum and 1.2 km from Museum of the Bayeux Tapestry. The property is around 8.5 km from German Battery of D-Day, 11 km from D-Day Museum and 12 km from Arromanches 360. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Cathedrale Notre Dame de Bayeux.

At the hotel, every room includes a desk.
