Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan, Le Havre Centre Gare also provide guests with a city view. All guest rooms feature a desk.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Le Volcan, Saint-Michel's Church and Perret Model Appartment. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 37 km from The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Le Marignan, Le Havre Centre Gare.

name: Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse
description:
Just 150 metres from Le Havre's beaches, Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse is located in a residential neighbourhood in Sainte-Adresse. It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Each room has a courtesy tray with tea and coffee and some rooms overlook the sea.

Guests can relax on the hotel’s terrace or in the courtyard.

Hotel de Charme La Bonne Adresse is a 2-minute drive from the centre of Le Havre. The hotel is a 35-minute drive from Deauville and 20 minutes from Honfleur and Etretat.

Hotel completely renovated in 2021 keeping the family house style. Come and discover the new decoration.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage
description:
This hotel is located in the town centre of Le Havre, just 100 metres from the sea and next to the Malraux museum. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

Each guest room at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served every morning.

Parking is available in front of the hotel, which is free during the night and on Sundays and public holidays.

The The Originals Boutique, Hôtel d'Angleterre, Le Havre, centre, plage is a 30-minute drive from both Honfleur and Etretat. Deauville and Trouville are 40 km away.

name: Best Western Plus Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
Located in central Le Havre, Best Western Plus Le Havre Centre Gare is a 4 star design hotel offering free WiFi just 10 minutes' drive from the beach.

The en-suite rooms all feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower and all rooms feature a hairdryer.

Best Western at Le Havre Centre Gare serves a daily buffet breakfast. Additional facilities include a bar.

Honfleur is just a 20-minute drive from Best Western at Le Havre Centre Gare and the seaside towns of Trouville and Deauville are a 45-minute drive away. Le Havre Train Station is opposite the property and gives direct access to Paris.

A catering offer signed" Boco "is available at any time of the day: balanced and varied dishes prepared by starred chefs to be savored in our bar area or in your room.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre
description:
Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre is located on the beachfront in Le Havre, 350 metres from Le Havre Beach and 300 metres from Eglise St-Joseph. Popular points of interest nearby include Musee des Beaux Arts Andre Malraux, Normandy Business School and Museum Maison de l'Armateur. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests.

All units will provide guests with a small fridge.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet and a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Hilton Garden Inn Le Havre Centre include Le Volcan, Perret Model Appartment and Eglise St-Joseph. The nearest airport is Deauville - Normandie Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Le Havre Centre
description:
Our hotel, located in Le Havre downtown and at 600 meters from the SNCF train station, welcomes you for a professional and leisure stay. Our location is ideal to quickly reach the city center or the beach by the streetcar, accessible in front of the hotel. You will appreciate the quality of amenities: Wi-Fi, snacking, buffet style breakfast and the lounge bar. In order to facilitate your arrival by car, you can enjoy our private parking
. Book one of our large cosy rooms and enjoy your stay!

name: JOST Hôtel Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
Set in Le Havre and with Le Havre Beach reachable within 2.3 km, JOST Hôtel Le Havre Centre Gare offers express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 2.3 km from Eglise St-Joseph, 23 km from Norman Museum of Ethnography and Popular Arts and 23 km from Honfleur's Old Harbour. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Chinese, French and Indian cuisine. Vegetarian and halal options can also be requested.

You can play billiards and darts at the 3-star hotel.

Speaking German, English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Popular points of interest near JOST Hôtel Le Havre Centre Gare include Le Volcan, Saint-Michel's Church and Perret Model Appartment. The nearest airport is Le Havre Octeville Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Premiere Classe Le Havre Centre-LES DOCKS
description:
Magnificent Première Classe Le Havre Centre-Les Docks; ideally located near the Océane stadium and the docks.

We offer a personalized reception 24/24 with a private paying and secure parking.

Come and discover our 86 modern rooms with private bathroom and shower, flat screen TV and free wifi.

Treat yourself to a buffet breakfast served daily in our dedicated room or on our terrace on a sunny day.

Take advantage of your stopover to discover the historical and cultural heritage: the church of Saint Joseph, the shipowner’s house, the museum MUMA, etc...

A 15 min walk from the station, you will also have easy access to the various transports to radiate on Normandy: Etretat, Honfleur, Deauville.

Also enjoy your stay in Le Havre, to put your towel on our beach.

name: Best Western ARThotel
description:
The Best Western Art Hotel is located in the heart of Perret in Le Havre, just a 10-minute walk from the beach. The main destinations in Normandy are located within driving distance, such as Honfleur, 20 minutes away, Etretat, 30 minutes away and Deauville, which is 40 minutes away.

Decorated in a contemporary style by various artists, all rooms feature free Wi-Fi access, a flat-screen TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the guest rooms or in the dining room. Guests can also relax in the Art Hotel's bar.

A buffet breakfast is served only daily in the dining room.

name: ibis Le Havre Centre
description:
The ibis hotel is located in the centre of Le Havre, close to the SNCF railway station, ferry ports and International Trade Centre. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

Ibis Le Havre Centre provides guest rooms equipped with private bathroom, satellite TV and ironing facilities.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Ibis Le Havre Centre is within easy access of the A29 and A131 motorways. Deauville is 40 km from the property, while Honfleur is 22.8 km from ibis Le Havre Centre. Parking is possible on site for guests arriving by car and there is also a meeting room.

name: Hôtel Carmin
description:
Hôtel Carmin is located in Le Havre town centre, 700m from the HAVRE beach It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Carmin are equipped with a telephone and a flat-screen TV. Each guest room also has a private bathroom with bath or shower.

A breakfast is served at this hotel at an extra charge and upon prior reservation.

A number of Le Havre’s sites are near Carmin Hotel including St Joseph Cathedral and City Hall. There are also a number of restaurants within walking distance.

name: Nomad Hotel le Havre
description:
Nomad Hotel le Havre is located in Le Havre and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access and a modern-style decor. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Dock Océane shopping centre is 900 metres from this hotel and the city centre and its city hall are a 5-minute drive away.

All of the rooms at Nomad Hotel le Havre feature a tablet and a video projector. They all include a bathroom with free toiletries and a shower.

A breakfast is served everyday. Restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surroundings.

Le Havre Train Station is a 2-minute walk from the hotel and André Malraux Modern Art Museum is 2 km away.

name: Birgit Hôtel Le Havre Centre
description:
Welcome to Birgit!

When visiting Le Havre, there is nothing better than to stay in this 86-room hotel, completely renovated in 2022. Enjoy the friendly atmosphere surrounded by antique objects and travel souvenirs.

Located close to the city centre, the train station and public transport, you can reach the beach and the esplanade of Le Havre in 10 minutes.

Stay in the cosy and designer rooms, suitable for couples, families, friends and business travellers.
Enjoy our breakfast made with love by our team from healthy and local products. Take time to enjoy one of our local drinks in our bar.

The B!rgit Le Havre hotel is the ideal base for your travels with family or friends and will be perfect for a break during a business trip.

name: Hotel Spa Le Pasino
description:
Located at the heart of Le Havre, Hotel Spa le Pasino features an indoor swimming pool, a spa with sauna and a casino on site. It offers guest rooms with a flat-screen TV.

Each air-conditioned guest room features a queen-size bed and some offer views over the harbour. All private bathrooms include a hairdryer and bathrobes.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room.

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Hotel Spa le Pasino. Guests can work out in the fitness centre or relax in the spa bath at the hotel's spa.

Le Havre Train Station is a 6-minute drive from the hotel and free private parking is available on site. Malraux Museum is 1 km away.

name: Ibis Budget Le Havre Les Docks
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Ibis Budget Le Havre Les Docks is located in Le Havre, 4.4 km from Volcano. Free private parking and free WiFi are available on site.

The air-conditioned rooms features a TV, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a separate toilet.

Buffet breakfast is served daily at the property. Restaurants can also be found in the surroundings.

Perret Model Appartment is 4.4 km from Ibis Budget Le Havre Les Docks, while Saint-Michel's Church is 5 km from the property. Honfleur is a 20-minute drive away while Étretat is a 30-minute drive from the property.

name: Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin Du Commerce
description:
Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin du Commerce is located in Le Havre’s city centre, opposite the Bassin du Commerce and near ferry-port. It offers air-conditioned guestrooms with LCD satellite TV and WiFi.

Guests of the Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin du Commerce can relax with a drink and a snack at the bar and enjoy modern and local food in the hotel’s restaurant, Happy Dock.

The Mercure Le Havre Centre Bassin du Commerce is located in the historic town, 800 metres from the the National History Museum and Le Havre Cathedral. Honfleur is 24 km away and Deauville is 42 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Spa Vent d'Ouest
description:
Located just 550 metres from the beach in Le Havre, this hotel is a 5-minute drive from the ferry terminal. It offers free Wi-Fi access, and the 200-m² Nuxe spa includes a hammam, 3 massage rooms and 2 lounges.

Each guest room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, a safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning at Hôtel Spa Vent d'Ouest and can be taken in the guestrooms for a fee. Guests can enjoy bistronomic cuisine at Les Enfants Sages, located a 10-minute walk away or relax with a drink in the hotel bar and tea room.

Le Havre Train Station is 2 km from the hotel and private parking is available nearby.

name: Hôtel Les Gens De Mer Le Havre by Popinns
description:
Les Gens De Mer is situated in the heart of Le Havre, opposite the central covered market and close to the Bassin de Commerce. It offers free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Guest rooms are equipped with a private bathroom, a TV and are serviced by a lift.

The hotel restaurant serves regional specialities, including seafood, and offers a range of set menus. Guests can enjoy an after-dinner drink in the sailor’s bar, the Seamen’s Club.

Les Gens De Mer provides a 24-hour front desk and has an on-site private parking. The resort of Deaville is 40 km away.

name: Oscar Hôtel Le Havre Centre
description:
Oscar Hotel is located in Le Havre's Perret quarter, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It offers free Wi-Fi and views of The Volcan concert venue and the Bassin du Commerce.

Rooms at Oscar Hotel have wood floors and are decorated with a mix of modern and traditional furnishings. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and private bathroom.

Hotel Oscar is a 5-minute walk from Hotel de Ville and Le Havre’s casino. There are a number of restaurants nearby.

The Oscar is 1.5 km from the train station and a 30-minute drive from Honfleur. Deauville, Pont de Normandie and Etretat are also a short drive away.

name: Hôtel Le Green
description:
Located in the centre of Le Havre, this hotel is just 300 metres from the train station. It features a terrace and free Wi-Fi access is provided in the non-smoking guest rooms.

An LCD TV and safe are provided in the individually decorated rooms, which feature patterned fabrics and wooden furnishings. A minibar is available upon request. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer.

Enjoy a continental breakfast while reading the newspapers provided in the breakfast room at Hôtel Le Green.

Low-cost public parking is possible nearby and Hôtel Le Green is located just 2 km from the beach. Malraux Museum is 2 km away and Octeville Airport is a 13-minute drive from the hotel.

name: LOGIS HOTEL - La Petite Rade
description:
Located in Le Havre, this hotel is just a few steps from the coast and offers panoramic sea views. It provides direct beach access and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at LOGIS HOTEL - La Petite Rade is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. A free welcome tray with tea, coffee and snacks is also offered.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast in the dining room or in the privacy of the guest rooms. Guests can also benefit from discounted prices in nearby restaurants and a bar is located in the hotel's building.

Le Front de Mer is a 20-minute drive from both Honfleur and Etretat. Trouville and Deauville are a 40-minute drive away.

name: Novotel Le Havre Centre Gare
description:
The Novotel Le Havre is located on the waterfront at the Vauban Docks, near the centre of Le Havre and offers modern and comfortable accommodation. It is a 30-minute drive from Honfleur and Etretat, and Deauville is 40 km away.

This modern hotel features contemporary guest rooms equipped with modern en suite facilities, satellite TV and a Wi-Fi internet connection.

Enjoy simple, tasty, healthy and balanced cuisine at the Novotel Café. The restaurant is air-conditioned and has a terrace. Room service is also available 7 days a week.

Guests also have access to two public car parks and a fitness centre making it well suited for a business trip or a holiday in Le Havre with your partner or family.

name: Eklo Hotels Le Havre
description:
Eklo Hotels Le Havre is a modern-style hotel located in Le Havre. You will find a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and dining room. Guests can enjoy a terrace at the property.

The small soundproofed rooms at Eklo Hotels Le Havre have a walk-in shower, a toilet and a mirror. They feature a flat-screen TV.

A self-service continental breakfast is available daily at an extra cost. Private parking is available on site and other services (toiletries and late check-out) are available at the hotel for an extra fee.

André Malraux Modern Art Museum is located 5 km away and the Docks Oceane Shopping Centre is 4 km from the hotel and Le Grand Cap Shopping Centre is a 2-minute walk away. Deauville is 46 km from the hotel and Honfleur is 28 km away. A Tramway Metro Station can be found in front of the hotel and leads directly to the Train Station or to the beach.

name: Novotel Dijon Sud
description:
The Novotel Dijon Sud is situated on the Burgundy wine route, 10 minutes from Dijon and in the area of the Marsannay-La-Côte vineyards. It features an outdoor swimming pool and free parking is available.

Rooms at the the Novotel Dijon Sud are spacious, air-conditioned and feature a Satellite TV and a mini bar.

Guests can enjoy a drink and sample traditional French cuisine in the Novotel Restaurant. In the summertime, meals are also served on the outdoor terrace. A children’s menu is available upon request.

name: Hôtel Le Petit Vatel - Centre ville & Plage
description:
Hôtel Le Petit Vatel - Centre ville & Plage is located in l’espace Perret, 500 metres from the city hall in La Havre and 1 km from its train station and ferry harbour. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

All of the rooms at Hôtel Le Petit Vatel - Centre ville & Plage have a private bath or shower and a TV with cable and satellite channels.

The buffet breakfast offers a range of French pastries, fruit, and hot and cold drinks. Tray-meals can be provided upon request.

Le Havre is 2 hours from Paris by train or by car and is in the heart of the Côte Normande. Its city centre has been rebuilt by Auguste Perret following the bombings in September 1944 and is now part of the UNESCO world heritage. It is 24 km from Honfleur and 44 km from Deauville.

name: ibis Styles Le Havre Centre
description:
The ibis Styles Marly Le Havre Centre is located in the heart of the district rebuilt by Auguste Perret, which is classified as a UNESCO World Heritage site. It is a 35-minute drive from Deauville and a 20-minute drive from Honfleur.

All of the en suite rooms have free Wi-Fi internet access and a TV with cable and international channels. The bathrooms are fitted with a shower or bath and they include a hairdryer.

The hotel is conveniently located near shops and restaurants, casino, theatres and city hall. It is only a 5-minute drive from the beach, train station and ferry port.

name: Holiday Inn Dijon Toison D'or, an IHG Hotel
description:
Offering a spa with sauna, hammam and fitness centre, the Holiday Inn is located just outside Dijon’s historic city centre, in the heart of the Toison d’Or Technological Park. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi access.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in each spacious room. The rooms have a contemporary décor with colour accents. Private bathrooms feature Starck bathroom fixtures.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and the restaurant, Gallery 412, serves traditional and modern French cuisine. The on-site bar, Light Bar, serves a large selection of wines.

Holiday Inn Dijon is a 15-minute tramway ride from the Dijon Train Station and a 5-minute walk from Zenith de Dijon. Free parking is available on site and the hotel is a 2-minute drive from the highway. With 180 shops, The Centre La Toison d'Or shopping centre is a 1-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel des Ducs
description:
This hotel is located in historic centre of Dijon, listed as a World Heritage site by Unesco, 50 metres from The Palace of the Dukes. The Hotel Des Ducs have the main buiding (Hotel des Ducs) and 2 annexes (Maison des Ducs 150 m from the Hotel and Residence des Ducs 300 m from the hotel).

It offers a bar and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Des Ducs serves a buffet breakfast each morning and guests can relax with a drink on the terrace.

Rooms at Hotel Des Ducs are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with bath or shower. The rooms are accessible by lift and some are air-conditioned.

Hotel Des Ducs is less than 50 metres from the Museum of Fine Arts, the city's opera house and the city's shopping area. The Burgundy Wine Route begins just a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel des Halles
description:
Located in Dijon historical city center, 50 metres from the pedestrian area, Hôtel des Halles features a free WiFi access. The Halles centrales Covered Market is located 300m walk away. The road of vintage wines of Bourgogne starts a 10-minute drive from the property.

All rooms provide air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower. Rooms are accessible by lift.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at Hôtel des Halles.

Godrans Tramway Stop is 30 metres away and provides direct access to Dijon Zenith and Dijon University. Paid public parking is located 250 metres away.

name: Hôtel République
description:
This 18th-century coaching hotel is located in a peaceful street in the historical centre of Dijon. It offers a modern and elegant setting and free Wi-Fi access.

Hotel République features rooms decorated with warm colours to offer a cosy atmosphere. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

Guests can relax on the terrace at the République Hotel. A buffet breakfast is served daily.

Dijon-Ville Train Station is less than a 15-minute walk away, or a 5-minute tram ride from République Tram Stop. Hotel République is 900 metres from Musee de Beaux-Arts de Dijon and an 8-minute walk from Dijon Cathedral.

name: Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel
description:
Located in Dijon, 5.2 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station, Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy French dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar.

At the hotel, each room has a desk. Guest rooms at Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel are equipped with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property.

The accommodation offers a sauna.

Staff speak English, Spanish, French and Italian at the reception.

Dijon - Bourgogne Airport Tramway Station is 5.4 km from Holiday Inn Dijon Sud - Longvic, an IHG Hotel, while Universite Tramway Station is 6.8 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from the hotel.

name: Holiday Inn Express Dijon, an IHG Hotel
description:
Offering an outdoor pool, Holiday Inn Express Dijon is located in Saint-Apollinaire. The air-conditioned hotel offers 24-hour reception, a sun terrace and a bar. Luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access are available.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and cable channels. Featuring a walk-in shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

There is also an electric kettle in every room. A buffet breakfast is available daily and vending machines with snacks are provided on site.

The hotel is situated 3 km from Dijon centre and 4.6 km from the train station. The property offers free, secured parking.

name: Kyriad Hotel Dijon Gare
description:
The Kyriad Hotel Dijon Gare is 120 metres from Dijon Train Station and offers an indoor swimming pool and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

Each air-conditioned bedroom has a tea and coffee maker and satellite TV. All the rooms have a private bathroom.

Extras include a fitness centre and a sauna upon reservation.

The hotel reception is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. There are 2 TV lounges on the ground floor and a computer with internet access is available for guests' use.

The hotel has a bar and large groups can be catered for on request, 24 hours a day. A hot buffet breakfast is available daily.

The hotel is 7 km from Dijon Bourgogne Airport. A close garage parking is available at an additional cost. The Palais des Congrès is a 7-minute tram ride away and both the university campus and the Toison d'Or shopping centre are less than 20 minutes from the property.

name: Hotel Victor Hugo
description:
Located within a walking distance from the historic centre of Dijon and 650 metres from the train station, Hotel Victor Hugo offers a garden and rooms with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

Some of the heated rooms at Hotel Victor Hugo have a view of the garden. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available every morning. It can be served in the dining room which features wooden furniture or in the comfort of your room.

The hotel is 500 metres from Darcy Square and 800 metres from the cathedral. There is a private car park on site, available at an additional cost.

name: Oceania Le Jura Dijon
description:
The Hôtel Le Jura is located in the city centre, 200 metres from the train station and a 10-minute tram ride from the Palais de Congrès. The hotel offers rooms with a garden view and free WiFi internet access.

Most of the spacious guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable and are soundproofed.

The Hôtel Le Jura serves a buffet breakfast, which can be taken in the guest rooms. You can also enjoy a drink from the bar and there are vending machines available.

Guests can enjoy an indoor heated swimming pool, a hammam and a fitness room.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Kyriad Direct DIJON NORD - Zenith - Toison d'Or
description:
Located a 12-minute drive from Dijon city centre, Hôtel Hôtel Restaurant Kyriad Direct DIJON NORD - Zenith - Toison d'Or has features air-conditioned room with free WiFi, meeting rooms and a restaurant. Free private parking is available on site.

With a simple decor, the soundproofed rooms at Hôtel Hôtel Restaurant Kyriad Direct DIJON NORD - Zenith - Toison d'Or include a private bathroom and an LCD TV with Canal+. Provided with free WiFi, rooms are all accessible by lift and some are suitable for families or groups of friends.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. Guests can have a drink at the hotel’s bar and eat at the restaurant, which proposes à la carte menus including Burgundian specialties, grills, salads and pizzas.

Dijon’s Train Station is 6 km away and Dijon-Bourgogne Airport is 20 minutes by car. The Palais des Sports is a 9-minute drive and the Musée des Beaux-Arts is 5 km away.

name: Hôtel le Thurot
description:
Featuring free WiFi, The Hotel Thurot is conveniently located 300 metres from Dijon city centre and the train station.

This 2-star hotel offers comfortable air-conditioned rooms fully equipped with a private bathroom, a telephone and a flat-screen TV.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and a bar invites guests to relax with a drink at the end of the day. During summer, the staff can organise visits to a nearby wine cellar, where you will enjoy a wine-tasting session at an extra cost.

Hotel Thurot is close to shops and restaurants, and is just a short walk from Dijon Musée des Beux Arts and the city hall. Secure parking is available onsite, subject to availability as there are limited spaces.

name: Maison Philippe Le Bon
description:
Set in the heart of the historic centre of Dijon, Maison Philippe Le Bon is 300 metres from Palais des Ducs de Bourgogne. Free WiFi in all rooms and all public areas of the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Maison Philippe Le Bon have a private bathroom and flat screen TV. Rooms offer views over the city of Dijon, the interior garden or Gothic courtyard or over rue Sainte Anne.

Restaurant La Closerie serves inventive, seasonal gourmet cuisine, complemented by an excellent wine list featuring many local wines. La Closerie offers elegant dining in a setting dating back to the 17th century, with original floortiles, exposed beams and rustic stonework, yet infused with contemporary touches.

In the summertime, lunch and dinner can be served in the hotel's private garden. A full buffet breakfast is served daily.

Guests at Maison Philippe Le Bon can explore the historical centre, its quaint streets and squares, while visiting Les Halles market, a wide variety of museums and original boutiques and shops.

Gare de Dijon-Ville train station is a 5-minute drive or a 15-minute walk away from Maison Philippe Le Bon.

name: Campanile Dijon Congrès Clemenceau
description:
Located in Dijon, Campanile Dijon Congrès Clémenceau offers air-conditioned guest rooms and free Wi-Fi access throughout. You can relax with a drink from the 24-hour lounge bar and the Palais des Congrès of Dijon is 200 metres away.

All of the contemporary rooms at Campanile Dijon Congrès Clémenceau have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, heating, and a private bathroom with hairdryer and shower.

A private, secured parking is available upon prior reservation and with an additional cost. Dijon city centre is located 1 km from the property and Poincarré tram stop can be found in front of the hotel.

name: Mercure Dijon Centre Clemenceau
description:
Mercure Dijon Centre Clémenceau is a 4-star non-smoking hotel in the city centre of Dijon, opposite the Auditorium and the Convention Centre.

Guestrooms are spacious and practical and equipped with modern en suite facilities, air-conditioning and satellite TV.

Mercure Dijon Centre Clémenceau offers a restaurant, Le Château Bourgogne, serving traditional and regional gourmet cuisine for lunch and dinner. In the summer months, guests can dine on the peaceful poolside terrace.

The hotel offers secure parking on site.

name: Mama Shelter Dijon
description:
Located in Dijon, 200 metres from Saint-Philibert Church, Mama Shelter Dijon provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The accommodation features nightclub and a 24-hour front desk.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. All units in Mama Shelter Dijon are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Mama Shelter Dijon include Dijon Train Station, Foch-Gare Tramway Station and Dijon Congrexpo. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 51 km from the hotel.

name: ibis Dijon Gare
description:
Located opposite Dijon Train Station, the ibis Dijon Gare Hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the historic city centre. It offers air-conditioned rooms equipped with a radio and free WiFi.

The ibis Dijon Gare's restaurant, Le Klub, serves regional cuisine and a large wine selection. During the summer, guests can enjoy their meal on the floral terrace.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

name: ibis Dijon Sud
description:
Located 6 km from central Dijon, the Ibis Dijon Sud offers a 24-hour front desk and a restaurant and bar with terrace. Free WiFi access.

All of the 78 air-conditioned rooms have a private bathroom with bath or shower and free toiletries. They also feature a desk and a flat-screen TV. Rooms for guests with limited mobility are also available.

The ibis Dijon Sud has a bar and a restaurant. A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

izivia electric charging stations for all vehicles are available

A tennis court and a golf course can be found less than 8 km away. With Dijon Airport 13 km away, the hotel offers free on-site parking with no prior reservation.

name: Logis Hotel Darcy Dijon Centre
description:
Located a 5-minute walk from the Dijon train station, the Logis Hotel Darcy Dijon Centre is across from the Place Darcy underground public parking lot, which is monitored 24 hours a day and is accessible via Rue du Dr Chaussier.

Regional specialties are served at the onsite gourmet restaurant. Wine tasting and a bistro-style cuisine are proposed at the hotel’s wine bar.

name: Vertigo Hotel, Dijon, a Member of Design Hotels
description:
Offering an indoor pool, a spa Nuxe and wellness centre, Vertigo Hotel is a design hotel located in Dijon. Free WiFi access is available throughout and you will be able to enjoy the sauna and hammam free of charge.

The individually decorated rooms feature suspended beds, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning. A coffee machine is also provided and you can enjoy city and garden views from your room. Each room includes a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and bathrobes.

Breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge or in the comfort of your room, with an additional cost. The hotel also offers a bar serving drinks and light meals.

Free bikes are at your disposal to discover Dijon and the surrounding area. Vertigo Hotel is 400 metres from Saint-Philibert Church and 500 metres from Dijon Train Station.

name: Hotel ibis Dijon Centre Clemenceau
description:
This hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers air-conditioned guest rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. It is located just a 15-minute walk from the centre of Dijon.

The soundproofed guest rooms include a telephone and a work desk. Each room has a private bathroom. All of the rooms are serviced by a lift.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. Light snacks are served in the contemporary bar.

Gare Porte Neuve Train Station is just 1 km from Hotel ibis Dijon Centre Clemenceau. The Exhibition Centre is 350 metres away and public parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel Montchapet Dijon Centre
description:
The Hôtel Montchapet is located in the heart of Dijon, just a 10-minute walk to Gare de Dijon-Ville. It offers soundproofed accommodation and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at the Montchapet Hotel has a modern decor and a private bathroom.

Guests at the Montchapet can relax with a drink in the bar after a day of sightseeing. The hotel is less than a 10-minute walk from the Dijon Cathedral.

name: Hôtel Victoria
description:
Ideally set in the centre of Grenoble, Hôtel Victoria offers free WiFi throughout the property and free private parking for guests who drive. The property is situated 1.2 km from WTC Grenoble, 5.2 km from AlpExpo and 1.8 km from Alps Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Grenoble Train Station.

At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and free toiletries. At Hôtel Victoria the rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

The Bastille Grenoble is 4.7 km from the accommodation, while Summum is 5.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from Hôtel Victoria.

name: Hôtel Le Chambellan
description:
Hotel Le Chambellan is housed in a 17th-century building in Dijon city centre. Its location is ideal for visiting churches and museums, of which there are 7 within a 15-minute walk.

The heated guest rooms at Le Chambellan are all equipped with a flat-screen TV and Satellite channels and free Wi-Fi connection. All rooms are soundproofed, and some rooms have a view of the private courtyard.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room, where guests can read the daily newspapers provided.

The tour desk at Le Chambellan will provide information about Dijon’s main attractions including La Porte Guillaume archway, just a 10-minute walk away. With public parking nearby, this hotel is just 900 m from Dijon Train Station and 7 km from Dijon-Bourgogne Airport.

name: La Bonbonniere - Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western
description:
Situated in an enchanting setting, on the hills of a 13th century village, the hotel overlooks Lake Kir and the town of Dijon.

Surrounded by a delightful park planted with flowers and trees, Hôtel La Bonbonnière features 20 fully-equipped and quiet rooms accessible by lift.

Unwind in a comfortable and extremely peaceful environment only a few minutes away from Dijon’s city centre. Free private parking is possible on site, subject to availability.

name: Maison Barbillon Grenoble
description:
Maison Barbillon Grenoble is located in Grenoble, just 100 metres from the train station. It offers comfortable guest rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi Internet access.

Guest rooms at the Maison Barbillon Grenoble have an authentic and elegant décor and feature a private bathroom including a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Maison Barbillon is accessible via the A480 motorway. The hotel is located beside Grenoble World Trade Centre and Saint-André Cathedral is just a 13-minute walk away.

name: B&B HOTEL Dijon Marsannay
description:
Located within 5.5 km of Saint-Philibert Church and 5.9 km of Dijon Train Station, B&B HOTEL Dijon Marsannay features rooms in Dijon. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.9 km from Chenove Centre Tramway Station.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. At B&B HOTEL Dijon Marsannay the rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

Foch-Gare Tramway Station is 6 km from the accommodation, while Dijon Congrexpo is 7.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 52 km from B&B HOTEL Dijon Marsannay.

name: RockyPop Grenoble Hotel
description:
Situated in Grenoble, 1.6 km from Grenoble Train Station, RockyPop Grenoble Hotel features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The property is 1.9 km from WTC Grenoble, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire is available.

Speaking English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

AlpExpo is 4.8 km from RockyPop Grenoble Hotel, while Alps Stadium is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 48 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre
description:
Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre is located in the heart of Grenoble and is the oldest hotel in the city. It is set in a 17th-century building. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They come with a flat-screen TV with Bein Sports, Canal+ and Eurosport satellite channels. Some rooms also feature a balcony with views of the city.

Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre offers a daily continental breakfast, which can also be served in the guest room upon request.

Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre is 350 metres from the cable car that goes up to the Bastille. Grenoble train station is 1 km away, or a 5-minute journey by tram. Public parking is available nearby.

name: B&B HOTEL Grenoble Centre Alpexpo
description:
This B&B hotel is located in Grenoble, just 800 metres from Alpexpo. With a 24-hour reception, it offers a free Wi-Fi connection and soundproofed accommodation. It is 200 metres from Grand Place Tram Station.

All of the rooms at B&B Grenoble Centre Alpexpo are serviced by a lift and are decorated in a contemporary style. Each room features a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge.

Luggage storage is provided at B&B Grenoble Centre Alpexpo. There are limited parking places available free of charge, and the Bastille is 7 km away. There is access to A480 motorway, 5 km away.

name: Hotel Europole
description:
Hotel Europole is located in the centre of Grenoble, less than 100 metres from the SNCF Train Station and a 3-minute walk from the Palais de Justice.

The modern guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and WiFi internet access. They also have lift access.

In addition to a 24-hour reception from Monday to Friday, the hotel offers a laundry and dry cleaning service.

Hotel Europole is 45 km from Grenoble-Saint-Geoirs Airport. On-site public parking is available for guests arriving by car.

name: Le Grand Hôtel Grenoble, BW Premier Collection by Best Western
description:
In the heart of the historic city centre of the Capital of the Alps, the Grand Hôtel de Grenoble **** BW Premier Collection is waiting to welcome you to an unforgettable experience.

Whether you are on a business trip or a sporting getaway, our attentive and dedicated team is here to offer you a quality of service that lives up to your expectations and up-to-date facilities.

Relax in our newly refurbished rooms and suites. Enjoy a breakfast of fresh, local and seasonal produce. Bring your best projects to life in our coworking space.
At the Grand Hôtel de Grenoble **** BW Premier Collection, every detail is carefully orchestrated to make your stay an unforgettable experience. We look forward to welcoming you and offering you an exceptional stay in Grenoble.

Our hotel is located in the heart of a pedestrianised street, and can be reached by public transport or by car by parking in the Saint-Claire Les Halles private car park, formerly the Lafayette car park (preferential rate).

name: Okko Hotels Grenoble Jardin Hoche
description:
Featuring a sauna and a fitness centre, Okko Hotels Grenoble Jardin Hoche is located in Grenoble, right next to the Hoche Gardens. This design hotel offers a terrace with views over Hoche Park, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi access.

Each room is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a desk and a coffee machine. The private bathroom has a shower and comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge, and in the evening guests are offered a small plate of antipasti, delicious dips and seasonal products.

Okko Hotels Grenoble Jardin Hoche features the Le Club lounge and a library. The hotel is 500 metres from Paul Mistral Park, 50 metres from La Caserne de Bonne shopping mall and 1.5 km from Grenoble Train Station.

name: Kyriad Grenoble Centre
description:
Located 200 metres from Stade Lesdiguières, Kyriad Grenoble Centre offers 3-star accommodation with 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Alpexpo convention centre is 3 km away from the property. A private car park under video surveillance is available for guests and is free of charge.

All rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, including Canal+. The private bathrooms come with a bath and free toiletries. Tea and coffee making facilities are provided.

Room service and bar access are available 24/7 and the hotel serves a buffet breakfast every day.

La Bastille Grenoble cable-car is 4 km from the accommodation, while Grenoble train station is 3 km away and accessible in 10 minutes with the tramway. Grenoble - Isère Airport is 46 km away.

name: Novotel Grenoble Centre
description:
The Novotel is set at the heart of Grenoble's business district, only a few steps from the TGV train station. A tram stop is conveniently situated just outside the hotel. Many large companies are located close to the Novotel Grenoble Centre, and the historical centre is only a 10-minute drive away.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a desk, a safety deposit box and a minibar. Some rooms feature a Nespresso coffee machine. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

Guests at the Novotel benefit from access to the hotel fitness centre. The hotel also features a restaurant, a bar, conference rooms, facilities for the disabled, and private parking at an additional cost. Up to 2 children (16 years and under) stay free when sharing with parents.

This hotel is also just a few kilometres from the Belledonne Massif and the Vercors Mountains.

name: 1924 Hôtel
description:
Located in the heart of Grenoble on a quiet street, only 450 metres from the SNCF train station and offers free WiFi, service clean, comfortable rooms with modern facilities and a friendly, relaxed atmosphere.

All the cosy guest rooms are equipped with all modern amneties, en suite facilities, soundproofing and satellite TV. All rooms are served by a small lift. Some allow you to see the mountain Vercors.

The helpful staff at this delightful hotel will help you to make the most of your visit. Local and Bio breakfast is served every morning. Guests can find restaurants nearby.

Explore Grenoble on foot, with our bikes available, or using the excellent public transport links. Guests will appreciate the tramwa stop just a stone's throw from the hotel, providing easy access to the city's business districts and famous sites

name: Hôtel Terminus
description:
Located in Grenoble, the Hôtel Terminus is opposite the bus and SNCF train stations. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

The Hôtel Terminus Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and a currency exchange service.

The Terminus is 5 minutes from the World Trade Centre and 1 kilometre from the A48 motorway, which provides easy access to Lyon and Geneva.

Guests can use the hotel’s bicycle and car rental services to explore Grenoble and the Rhone-Alpes region.

name: Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Centre
description:
Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Centre is set in the heart of Grenoble, opposite the gardens of Place Victor Hugo. It is just a 1-minute walk to the Victor Hugo tram stop and offers free WiFi and an onsite bar .

All the rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They feature a desk, a LCD satellite TV and a DVD player. The private bathrooms come with free toiletries. Some rooms also have a hydro-massage bathtub and a private balcony with views over the Vercors mountain range.

A buffet breakfast is available every day and includes hot, cold, sweet and savoury options. An other continental breakfast option consisting of a hot drink, a juice, a pasty, bread, butter and jam is also available.

An underground car park is available nearby at an extra charge. The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Gloria
description:
The Hôtel Gloria is located in central Grenoble, 200 metres from the A48 motorway and 300 metres from Grenoble's School of Management.

Each air-conditioned guest room has a private bathroom, satellite TV and free WiFi access.

Guests of the Gloria can enjoy a continental breakfast in the hotel dining room.

The hotel is just 200 metres from the nearest tramway stop offering connections throughout the city, 1 km from Grenoble cathedral and 800 metres from the Musée Dauphinois. Grenoble SNCF Train Station is just 200 metres away.

name: Hotel Lux
description:
Centrally located in Grenoble, only 50 metres from restaurants and bars, Hotel Lux Grenoble offers rooms with free WiFi. Grenoble Train Station is only a 3-minute walk away. A 24-hour front desk is available.

A flat-screen TV and a desk are included in all rooms at the Hotel Lux. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Trams can be reached within 300 metres. The hotel is 1 km from Minatec. Ski lifts are within 15 km.

Guests have access to a kettle and ironing facilities upon request. Public parking is available nearby at an extra cost.

name: Mercure Grenoble Centre Alpotel
description:
The Mercure Grenoble Centre Alpotel is located in the centre of Grenoble, just 2 kilometres from Minatec. The hotel offers a restaurant which serves contemporary regional cuisine.

The comfortable guestrooms at this 4-star hotel are air-conditioned and soundproofed, and have Wi-Fi internet access.

A daily buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Every evening, guests will be able to sample regional meals in Café Pourpre, the hotel’s restaurant.

The Mercure Grenoble Centre Alpotel is in close proximity to the TGV station and the Alpexpo and WTC convention centres are easily accessible by tramway.

name: Hotel Mercure Grenoble Centre Président
description:
Hôtel Mercure Grenoble Président is located 10 minutes from Grenoble’s city centre and accessible by tram and other public transport services. The hotel offers free access to its fitness centre, swimming pool, sauna and hot tub.

The air-conditioned guest rooms have a contemporary style and feature a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a coffee maker. All rooms feature a private bathroom.

The President restaurant serves traditional French cuisine with regional dishes. Meals can be complemented by the extensive Grands Vins Mercure wine list from Monday to Friday evening.

Guests of the hotel can enjoy a glass of wine or a cocktail in the hotel’s bar, Le Sirius. This bar has an African décor and features musical entertainment, themed nights and a terrace. Guests are also offered a free massage on Tuesdays.

Private parking is available on site for an extra charge.

name: greet hotel Grenoble Centre Gare
description:
Located in Grenoble, Hôtel des Alpes is 220 metres from the Grenoble Train Station and 120 metres from Gares Tramway Stop. The hotel offers free WiFi access, a 24-hour front desk and a reception with vending machines for drinks.

All rooms are serviced by a lift and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels. The private bathroom has a bath or shower and a hairdryer is available upon request.

A continental breakfast can be served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of the guests’ rooms. Breakfast includes hot drinks, juices, bread, pastries, butter and jam.

Hôtel des Alpes is an 11-minute walk from the Grenoble-Bastille cable car. Free parking is available for bicycles. Cars can be parked at an extra cost.

name: Brit Hotel Suisse et Bordeaux - Centre Gare
description:
Brit Hotel Suisse et Bordeaux - Centre Gare is located near a pedestrian and commercial street in Grenoble city centre. It features en suite rooms with free WiFi and meeting rooms equipped with paperboard and projector. The Train Station is 100 metres away.

With double glazing, each room at Suisse et Bordeaux includes an LCD TV with SMART TV and international channels and a private bathroom. A hairdryer is available at the reception, which is open 24 hours per day.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the air-conditioned breakfast room. Guests are invited to visit the Musée de Grenoble, which is 1.6 km away, and the Cathedral, which is a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

The Grenoble-Bastille cable car is 1 km away and the Palais des Sports is 2.5 km away. The Tramway stop is 40 metres away and Grenoble Airport is a 35-minute away. A private garage is available on site.

name: ibis Grenoble Gare
description:
Set just 200 metres from Grenoble Train Station, ibis Grenoble Gare offers air-conditioned rooms with mountain views and free Wi-Fi. It has a 24-hour reception and you can enjoy a drink from the bar. It is a 5-minute walk from the city centre.

Decorated in a modern style, the guest rooms all include an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each is soundproofed and has a telephone, desk and a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. Snacks and drinks can be ordered at any time from the 24-hour reception.

Private parking is available on site, at an extra cost. Grenoble Museum is only 1 km away and the Fort de la Bastille is 2 km from the hotel. Traditional French restaurants can be found within 400 metres.The property is 1.5 km from A480 highway.

name: ibis Grenoble Centre Bastille
description:
Located in the centre of Grenoble, ibis Grenoble Centre offers a 24-hour reception bar and free Wi-Fi access throughout. Victor Hugo Tramway is situated outside the hotel and the Bastille Cable Car is 500 metres away.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a wardrobe, a desk and a telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Additional features include luggage storage, daily newspapers and an elevator. Victor Hugo Square is 100 metres away and private parking is possible on site.

name: Park Hôtel Grenoble - MGallery
description:
Park Hôtel Grenoble - MGallery is located in central Grenoble, on the edge of Paul Mistral Park and 2 minutes' walk from a tram stop. It offers contemporary accommodation with free WiFi access. Guest can enjoy a wellness room consisting of a steam bath, experience shower and fitness machines.

Accessed by a lift, the spacious air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with satellite TV and a free minibar. Each room has a private bathroom stocked with free Clarins toiletries.

The hotel offers meals in its lounge bar or in the comfort of guest rooms, at certain times of the day.

Park Hôtel Grenoble - MGallery is a 5-minute walk from the Palais des Sports and a 10-minute tram ride from the Grenoble World Trade Centre.

A one-night parking space with discount rate is available just 150 metres away. Ski slopes and mountain hiking trails are just a 30-minute drive away.

name: B&B HOTEL Grenoble Centre Verlaine
description:
B&B Grenoble Centre Verlaine is just 3 km from the centre of Grenoble and the SAEM Alpexpo Events Centre. A buffet breakfast is prepared daily and free WiFi is provided in the air-conditioned rooms.

A flat-screen TV is provided in the soundproofed guest rooms, which have a modern décor. The suite also offers a terrace, a DVD player and a bath.

Meal trays can be served for dinner, from 18:00 to 20:30.

This hotel also has luggage storage and private parking on site. The Modern Art Gallery is just 3 km away and the hotel is accessible via the A480 motorway, 1.3 km away. Free public parking is available nearby and paid secured parking is available at the hotel.

name: ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare
description:
This ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare is ideally located, just 300 metres from Grenoble Station and 400 metres from the historic city centre. It offers contemporary accommodation with air conditioning and flat-screen TV.

In the morning, ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare serves a full buffet breakfast. Guests can have a drink at the design bar, open every day. Newspapers are provided.

Guests of the hotel ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare can choose from rooms and suites. They all feature duvets and anti stress pillows. The private bathrooms are equipped with a large shower and a hairdryer.

Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire ibis Styles Grenoble Centre Gare and front desk is open 24 hours.

name: Comfort Hotel Grenoble Meylan
description:
Comfort Hotel Grenoble Meylan enjoys a very convenient location 4 kilometres east of Grenoble and 45 kilometres from the airport.

Enjoy the comfort of a 3-star hotel with all the necessary amenities for work and leisure: free wireless internet, meeting rooms, free private parking and terrace.

A fast food menu can be enjoyed at an extra cost on request at the Front Desk. No Restaurant available at the property. The staff at Comfort Hotel Grenoble Meylan is looking forward to welcoming you all-year round.

name: Hôtel du Château
description:
Hotel du Chateau is a hotel situated at the foot of Annecy Castle. It has views over the old town. The reception offers free WiFi.

Guest rooms at the Hotel du Chateau are simply decorated. They are equipped with a private bathroom, a telephone and a TV.

Continental breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy a drink or a packed lunch on the hotel’s panoramic terrace, where a microwave and kitchenware are made available.

Hotel du Chateau is just a 5-minute walk from Lake Annecy. The train station is only a 10-minute walk away.

name: ibis Annecy Centre Vieille Ville
description:
Located just 700 metres from Lake Annecy, ibis Annecy Centre Vieille Ville features a 24-hour front desk, a luggage storage room and free WiFi. Public parking is available nearby at a surcharge, depending on availability.

The guest rooms are equipped with a desk, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:30.. Guests can also relax with a drink at the ibis Annecy Centre Vieille Ville’s bar.

Annecy Train Station is just 500 metres away from the hotel.

name: Hôtel des Alpes
description:
The Hôtel des Alpes offers 2-star accommodation a 10-minute walk from Lake Annecy and 100 meters away from the train station. The old city, shops and restaurants are within walking distance.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a desk. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has no lift but hotel staff is happy to help guests with their luggage if needed.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel des Alpes. Guests can enjoy the onsite bar.

The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 48 km from the property. Public parking is available nearby. It is free from 19:00 to 08:00 and at extra charge during the rest of the day.

name: Hotel Les Terrasses
description:
Located in the centre of Annecy, Hotel Les Terrasses is just a 5-minute walk from the Annecy's SNCF Train Station. It is set in a large landscaped garden and offers free WiFi.

The guest rooms at the Hotel Les Terrasses are all soundproofed and feature a desk and flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms have a bath or shower and air conditioning.

Breakfast is available for an additional charge at the property and can be enjoyed in the guest's room or on the terrace, weather permitting

The lake can be found a 15-minute walk away. The hotel is just a 30-minute drive from Geneva and the Swiss border, and free private parking is provided on site.

name: Campanile Annecy Centre - Gare
description:
Campanile Annecy Centre - Gare offers pet-friendly accommodation in Annecy. The property is 300 metres from Annecy Train Station, and a 5-minute walk from the old town and the lake. Free WiFi is provided throughout.

The rooms are air-conditioned, have a flat-screen TV, a desk and include a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property, and guests can enjoy their breakfast in the breakfast room or on the terrace.

Palais de l’île is 500 metres from Campanile Annecy Centre - Gare, while Chateau d'Annecy is 600 metres from the property. Lyon Saint Exupery Airport is 120 km away.

name: Atipik Hôtel
description:
Situated 200 metres from the shores of Lake Annecy, Atipik Hôtel is at the entrance of the medieval old town and pedestrian shopping streets. It offers en suite rooms with free WiFi.

A flat-screen TV with international and TNT channels is provided in all rooms. Each has a private bathroom with a shower.

Enjoy a breakfast buffet as a way to start your day before heading out to visit the surrounding area.

Annecy TGV Train Station is 250 metres from Atipik Hôte.

name: ibis Styles Annecy Centre Gare
description:
ibis Styles Annecy Centre Gare is a 5-minute walk from Annecy Train Station and a 15-minute riverside walk from the old city and Lake Annecy. It offers free WiFi access and a 24-hour reception with bicycle storage.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning feature in all of the rooms at ibis Style Annecy Centre Gare. Some of the rooms offer a private balcony.

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning. Guests can relax at the bar with an aperitif before heading to the several restaurants, just a 2-minute walk from the hotel.

A private car park is available for an additional charge, upon reservation. Limited spots are available. The A41 motorway is 3 km away.

name: Allobroges Park Hôtel
description:
Set in Annecy City Centre, this 3-star hotel is located a 10-minute walk from Annecy Chateau. It has a 24-hour reception and offers free WiFi access.

All guest room are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They offer work desk and an LCD TV. Some rooms feature exposed beams. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The onsite bar is open 24/7 and there is a terrace open during summer.

Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk from Allobroges Hotel. Private Parking is available upon prior reservation only and subject to availability. Annecy Train Station is 260 metres away.

name: Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle
description:
This hotel is located in the heart of Annency, a few steps from the castle. It offers individually-decorated rooms with views of the canals, the medieval castle or the town.

Each air-conditioned guest-room in the 18th-century building has satellite TV, WiFi internet access and a private bathroom.

The Palais de l’Isle serves a daily buffet breakfast and guests are invited to relax with a drink in the bar. Guests are also able to purchase snack jars.

The Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle is just a few minutes’ walk from Lake Annecy and the cathedral. The property offers discount in the 3 nearby public car parks.

name: Hôtel Les Muses
description:
Located in Annecy Le Vieux in the French Alps, Hôtel Les Muses is composed of 2 buildings with rooms that overlook Lake Annecy or Mont Veyrier.

Each room at Hôtel Les Muses is equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Some rooms feature a terrace and air conditioning.

A breakfast buffet is served daily. Activities in the surroundings include hiking and water-skiing. The Lake of Annecy is 50 metres away, and the lake's beach is 250 metres from the property.

Free private parking is available on site. Hôtel Les Muses's multilingual staff can provide local tourist information.

name: Icône Hôtel - Annecy
description:
Located in Annecy city centre, Icône Hôtel- Annecy offers a shared lounge, luggage storage and free WiFi. It is a 10-minunte walk from Lake Annecy and La Clusaz Ski Station is 33 km away.

The rooms feature a city view, a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a bath or shower. They also offer a desk, a wardrobe and free toiletries. Breakfast in room is available at an extra cost.

Restaurants and shops can be found within 1 km. Annecy train station is 650 metres away. Geneva International Airport is a 40-minute drive from the property.

name: Ace Hotel Annecy
description:
Offering a 24-hour front desk, Ace Hotel Annecy is located in Seynod. Free WiFi access is available in public areas and the rooms. The property is within 5 km from Lake Annecy and Annecy’s city centre.

Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and satellite channels. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk and a wardrobe.

At Ace Hotel Annecy you will find vending machines and a dining room where a breakfast is served each morning. The hotel is in a shopping area and a variety of restaurants can be found within 300 metres.

Facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing, golfing and cycling. Lac d’Annecy Golf Course is a 25-minute drive from the hotel.

Free parking is available on site. Annecy Train Station is 3.4 km away. Public transit to the city centre of Annecy is just 100 metres away, and operates Mon-Sat.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Carlton Annecy
description:
Best Western Carlton Annecy is located in central Annecy at the medieval town's gates. Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk away.

All guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a coffee machine. Every room has a private bathroom while some rooms offer a mountain view.

Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel bar during the evenings. The hotel’s buffet breakfast can be served in the comfort of your room or in the dining room.

A private garage is available upon prior reservation and for an additional fee. The Best Western Carlton Annecy is situated 200 metres from the train station, bus stop and taxi rank.

name: Le Pélican
description:
Situated in Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo, Le Pélican features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and gluten-free options.

Bourget Lake is 38 km from Le Pélican, while Stade de Genève is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel des Marquisats
description:
Just 200 metres from Lake Annecy, Hotel des Marquisats features spectacular views of the lake and the Alps. It is a 20-minute walk from the centre of Annecy and offers a continental breakfast. Free parking is available and free WiFi access is provided in the entire property.

Each room at the Hotel des Marquisats is individually decorated. They are equipped with satellite channels on a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by lift.

Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel’s lounge bar, which features a wall carved into the natural rock face and large bay windows facing the lake. There is also a sauna and hammam, available at an extra cost.

The property is 2 km from Annecy Train Station and a 45-minute drive to Geneva International Airport.

name: Le Splendid Hotel Lac D'Annecy - Handwritten Collection
description:
The property is facing the lake of Annecy and located in the centre of the old town of Annecy, a couple of paces of the shopping streets. We are also close to the cinemas, theatre and the best restaurants.

The rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You will find us on the banks of the Vassé canal, facing the lawn of Champ de Mars, next to the Pier for the lake tour in boat and beach at 200 metres. A fitness room is available.

name: Les Trésoms Lake and Spa Resort
description:
Hotel Les Tresoms is located next to Lake Annecy and a 5-minute walk from the beach. It features an outdoor pool and an on-site spa and wellness centre with views over the lake.

Les Tresoms Annecy offers rooms with flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, a minibar and Wi-Fi access. All of the rooms have a view of the lake or the forest some offer a balcony or terrace.

The hotel’s spa includes a sauna, hammam and 8 beauty treatments' rooms. Access to the SPA is purposed at 20 euros par person per hour upon reservation.

The hotel has 2 restaurants: La Rotonde serves gastronomic cuisine, prepared with fresh seasonal produce and offers a view over Lake Annecy; L'atelier offers an original cuisine.

Hotel Les Tresoms is a 15-minute walk from Annecy's historical city centre and Annecy's chateau. Geneva airport is 51 km away while Annecy train station is 2.6 km away from the property. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

Fee-based parking.

The SPA offers access to common areas (Sauna, Hammam and balneotherapy pool) at the rate of 20 euros per person per hour

name: Le Bel Abri
description:
Le Bel Abri is a hotel set in a former family house. It is located a 1-minute walk from Annecy Lake and a 6-minute drive from the city centre of Annecy. A sun terrace and free WiFi are available.

All accessed by a staircase, the rooms include a flat-screen TV, floor heating, air conditioning, soundproofing and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. Some rooms have a balcony and views of the lake or the mountains. There is a room on the ground floor adapted to people with reduced mobility.

The restaurant's cuisine is inspired by international flavours. A bar is also available on site.

The property is 46 km from Geneva International Airport. Free public parking is available.

name: Best Western Hôtel International
description:
Featuring a fitness centre, Best Western Hôtel International is situated at the entrance of Annecy, 2 km from Annecy Lake and city centre. It offers a 24-hour front desk service, an onsite restaurant and a bar. It is 500 metres from the train station and a 4-minute drive to motorway A41.

Each soundproofed room at the Best Western Hôtel International is air-conditioned. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities, free WiFi access and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available in the hotel dining room.

Guests can explore the town, which is only a few minutes' walk from the Old Town, Annecy Cathedral and Château d'Annecy.

Featuring a fitness centre and a wellness area with sauna and steam room,

GChevêne car park is available 200 metres from the hotel and indoor car park of 9 places is available upon reservation.

name: Premiere Classe Annecy Cran-Gevrier
description:
Premiere Classe Annecy Sud is located in Annecy and features a garden. This 1-star hotel offers free WiFi and is a 15-minute walk from Chateau d'Annecy.

All rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the property.

Lake Annecy and Annecy town centre with its shops, restaurants and market are located within 3 km from the hotel. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 47 km away.

name: Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy
description:
Featuring 4-star accommodation, Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy is set in Annecy, 2.1 km from Palais de l Ile and 2.2 km from Chateau d'Annecy. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 1.7 km from Bridge of Love and around 1.8 km from Bonlieu Performing Arts Centre. The property is close to popular attractions like Annecy School of Art, Annecy Town Hall and Annecy Court House.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a restaurant open for lunch and diner with a terrace facing the Lake of Annecy.

The property boasts an indoor swimming pool, with sauna, hammam, hot tub and fitness room with free access. Spa massages and yoga session are available at an extra cost.

Guests can find 2 private parking on site (indoor and outdoor) available at an extra cost.

Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French.

Annecy Court House is 2 km from Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy, while Church of St. Francis is 2.1 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 37 km away.

name: Novotel Annecy Centre Atria
description:
Novotel Annecy Centre Atria is located in central Annecy, a 5-minute walk from the old town, the lake and the Château d'Annecy. It offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.

All guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels including beIN Sports and Canal +. They offer a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. They feature a seating area and the private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Novotel Annecy Centre Atria offers a buffet breakfast. Various dining options including European and French dishes are available at The Craic, the in-house restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a drink and light snacks in the hotel bar.

Novotel Annecy Centre Atria also has an indoor play area and a library for children. Bike rental is available.

Annecy TGV Train Station is just 50 metres from the hotel and Lake Annecy is 1 km away. A private garage is available on site for an extra charge.

name: Auberge du Lyonnais
description:
Attractively located in the centre of Annecy, Auberge du Lyonnais features air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. Well situated in the Old Town district, this hotel provides a bar. The accommodation offers room service and a concierge service for guests.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, some rooms at Auberge du Lyonnais also boast a city view. The rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Guests at Auberge du Lyonnais can enjoy an à la carte or a continental breakfast.

Rochexpo is 35 km from the hotel, while Bourget Lake is 36 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 41 km from Auberge du Lyonnais.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Annecy
description:
Sure Hotel by Best Western Annecy is located just 3.5 km from Annecy Lake and a 4-minute drive from Annecy city centre. It offers rooms with free WiFi access.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and has a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served daily. The restaurant serves traditional French dishes and offers a terrace.

There is also a bar and lounge area with a pool table, a pinball machine and table football, and a playground for children. Ironing facilities and a selection of board games are available at the reception upon request.

Guests can enjoy private access for 1 or 2 people to the sensory relaxation area upon reservation and at an additional cost. The space includes a balneo hot tub with massage jets and light therapy, a sauna, a video wall and a starry sky.

The region has many activities to offer, such as paragliding and rock-climbing. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel du Nord
description:
Hotel du Nord, is located in the centre of Annecy and offers 2-star accommodation a few minutes from the lake, shops, bars, restaurants and train station. It offers 24/7 reception and free WiFi.

Guest rooms at the Hotel du Nord are all non-smoking and air-conditioned. They come with en suite facilities.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel du Nord.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.

There is free overnight parking nearby. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 35 km from the property.

name: Colmar Hotel
description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom. Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

name: PAUL & PIA - Welcome Home Hotel
description:
This hotel is located 500 metres from Colmar Train Station and the Old Town. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 700 meters away.

All rooms have a satellite flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a private bathroom.

There is also a bar and a 24-hour reception.

Guests can easily explore the medieval villages in the Alsace wine region and the Musée d'Unterlinden is 750 meters away. The Colmar-Houssen Airport is just 5 km from the Hotel Kyriad.

name: Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel
description:
Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel is situated in a verdant setting just 1 km from the city centre of Colmar and its historical sites and attractions.

All of the standard guest rooms feature modern en suite facilities, TV and free optic fibre WiFi internet access. There are also connecting rooms.

This hotel is a great starting point for discovering La Route des Vins, the local picturesque villages and leisure parks. Not to mention the regional cuisine and local wine.

The hotel also offers a free private car park, a garage for bicycles, an outdoor terrace, and veranda where guests can enjoy breakfast or a moment of quiet.

name: Hôtel Turenne
description:
Hotel Turenne is located at the entrance to Colmar’s old quarter, 750 metres from the Saint Martin Church. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning, and there are many typical Alsatian restaurants in the surrounding area. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the hotel bar.

The Hotel Turenne’s reception is open 24 hours a day. Private parking for cars, bicycles and motorbikes is also available at an extra cost and is subject to availability (reservation is needed).

The hotel is close to the famous Unterlinden and Bartholdi museums and the town’s pedestrian and commercial districts. Gare de Colmar Train station is 1.3 km away, the German border is 20 km from the Hotel Turenne.

name: Hôtel Quatorze
description:
