Hotel Quatorze is in a design hotel in the centre of Colmar. It offers free WiFi access and guests will have free and private spa access for 1 hour to the sauna and hammam.

Some rooms have a spa bath.

Bar Quatorze offers a large selection of regional wines and champagnes. Guests are invited to participate in wine tastings.

Quatorze is 650 metres from Unterlinden Museum, which is housed in a 13th century Dominican convent and home to the Isenheim Altarpiece by Matthias Grünewald.

name: Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar
description:
Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is 4 km from the centre of Colmar and 2 km from the A35 motorway. This hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a free private parking and a bar. (2 charging station for electric vehicles)

Serviced by a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a flat-screen TV, free wifi and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower.

Breakfast is served every morning at Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar. There is also a bar with terrace on site where guests can enjoy snacks.

Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is a 10-minute drive from the Wine Route of Alsace and right at the opposite of Colmar Expo Exhibition Centre.

name: ibis Colmar Est - Hotel Restaurant en Alsace
description:
The ibis Colmar East is located 5 km from the Alsace Wine Trail and 10 km from Kaysersberg, Riquewihr and Eguisheim. Wi-Fi is free of charge in the entire property.

The 86 rooms are comfortable and all have en suite facilities with a bath tub. The hotel also features an Alsatian brasserie, WinStub, a terrace, a free car park and secure car spaces.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. The property is a boutique hotel.

Ironing facilities and hairdryers are available upon request.

The property is a 5 minute drive from the old city centre of Colmar, wander through the Petite Venise area, visit the toy museum or admire the Isenheim Altarpiece at the Unterlinden Museum.

name: ibis Budget Colmar Centre Gare
description:
Ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville is set in the Colmar Centre Ville district in Colmar, 300 metres from House of the Heads and 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The rooms have a TV with satellite channels.

Colmar Expo is 2.5 km from ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville, while Theater Colmar is 200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 55 km from the property.

name: Kyriad Colmar Centre Unterlinden
description:
Situated 650 metres from the centre of Colmar in the heart of Alsace, this hotel offers free WiFi access and a lounge area. The Exhibition Park is just 1 km away.

With flat-screen TVs, satellite channels, all spacious rooms at Kyriad Colmar Centre Unterlinden feature a modern decor and a welcome tray. All en suite bathrooms are equipped with hairdryers.

Every morning a buffet-style breakfast is served and meal trays can be requested.

On-site parking is free of charge subject to availability and the Colmar Train Station is 2 km away. Strasbourg is a 1-hour drive away and the Colmar Airport is 3 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Restaurant Le Maréchal - Les Collectionneurs
description:
Constructed in 1565 on the city’s original fortified walls, this 4-star hotel is located in the picturesque quarter of Colmar known as Little Venice. Hostellerie Le Maréchal is set on the canal and is 700 meters from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains.

Guestrooms and suites are air-conditioned and decorated with brocades and antique furniture. Most rooms overlook the canal, and all are en suite with free WiFi internet access.

The restaurant, A l’Echevin, serves traditional and regional gourmet cuisine using regional produce. In the summer months, guests are invited to eat on the terrace by the river.

The reception desk at Hostellerie Le Maréchal is open 24 hours a day and free newspapers are available in the lobby area.

The hotel is located 1.4 km from Colmar Train Station and public parking can be found in the surrounding area.

name: Hotel Saint-Martin
description:
Located in the heart of Colmar’s Old Town, close to the Petite Venise district and the famous Rue des Marchands, Saint-Martin offers rooms decorated in traditional Alsatian style.

All rooms have a flat-screen TV and a safe. They also include a private bathroom with a hairdryer, a bath or a shower.

You can enjoy relaxing in the hotel’s lounge and reading room. There is also a tourist information and free WiFi access.

Colmar Train Station is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Colmar Airport, 5 km from Saint-Martin.

name: Greet Hotel Colmar
description:
Greet Hotel Colmar is located at the entrance of Colmar, just 1.3 km from to the historic quarter known as Little Venice. It offers free WiFi access.

Each room at the Greet Hotel Colmar is equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Also available are rooms suitable for guests who have limited mobility.

In the evening, dine in the hotel’s air-conditioned restaurant or on the terrace where guests can experience a meal with the various flavours and traditional Alsace cuisine. Everything served is made with the finest local and regional products.

Colmar Train Station is 2.3 km from the property. Bicycle storage and a free private parking are available on site.
Please not that this property doesn't accept roup reservations

name: ibis Colmar Centre
description:
Located in Colmar, ibis Colmar Centre is 550 metres from Colmar Tourism Office and is 1.7 km from Colmar Train Station. This hotel offers free WiFi access.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a flat-screen TV and a fan. The bathroom is fitted with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. An on-site restaurant is also available.

This property is 500 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church and 600 metres from House of the Heads. The reception is open 24 hours a day. Colmar Christmas Market is 350 meters away.

name: Grand Hôtel Bristol
description:
Grand Hôtel Bristol is located in Colmar, facing the historical TGV train station. It offers a fitness and spa centre with sauna, hammam and massage treatments. The property is 1.1 km from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains.

The air-conditioned rooms with traditional or contemporary decor are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, free WiFi, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift.

L'Auberge Brasserie serves traditional Alsace dishes with regional wines. A buffet breakfast is prepared daily. Guests have a choice of a buffet breakfast served in the lounge or a continental breakfast served in their room

Grand Hôtel Bristol has a limited private underground parking at an extra cost and subject to reservation. Other public parking lots can be found at a few minutes' walk.

name: Ibis Styles Colmar Centre
description:
The Ibis Styles Colmar Centre hotel is set an 18th-century brewery in the historic centre, just 200 metres from the Gothic St Martin's Church. It has a 24-hour reception.

The guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access, and are decorated in a modern style. Each room has a private bathroom that is fitted with a shower.

Breakfast is prepared every morning, and the hotel also has a bar on site.

The hotel is situated just 600 metres from the Unterlinden museum, a 10-minute walk from the train station and 4 km from the Exhibition Centre. You can also travel to the surrounding vineyards of the Alsace region.

name: Hotel Le Colombier
description:
Hotel Hotel Le Colombier is located in the Little Venice district of Colmar town centre. The Musée d'Histoire Naturelle of Colmar is 50 meters away and Unterlinden Museum is 1.1 km from the property. Free WiFi access is provided.

All rooms and suites have air conditioning, a minibar and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathrooms come with a shower, free toiletries, slippers and bathrobes.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, and the Colombier Hotel provides a 24-hour reception. Guests can relax in the bar or in the garden.

Colmar Train Station is 1 km from Hotel Le Colombier. The nearest airport is Strasbourg Airport, 72 km away.

name: Mercure Colmar Centre Unterlinden
description:
This Mercure offers air-conditioned, soundproofed guest rooms and suites with satellite TV and free WiFi, in central Colmar, a 2-minute walk from the Unterlinden and a 13-minute walk from Petite Venise.

The Mercure Colmar Centre Unterlinden serves a full buffet breakfast every morning, that can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room. The bar, Les Cepages offers a large selection of Alsatian wines and snacks.

You can relax on the outdoor terrace, and read the daily newspapers provided by the hotel Mercure Colmar. The reception is open 24-hour, and laundry facilities are available.

A fitness centre, a sauna and a sensory shower are available at Mercure Colmar Centre Unterlinden.

Colmar TGV train station is situated 2km from the hotel. The Alsace wineries and picturesque villages are in the surrounding areas from the Mercure. A private covered parking accessible by an elevator.

name: Logis Hôtel Beauséjour Colmar
description:
Just a short walk from the historic centre of Colmar sits the charming family-run Hotel Logis Hôtel Beauséjour Colmar. It features personalised guestrooms and a restaurant with a view of the summer garden.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and they are serviced by a lift. The Charm Rooms offer Provençal furniture and the Privilege Rooms are decorated with blue and red furniture. Each room has a private bathroom.

Enjoy traditional and regional cuisine in the candlelit dining room or in the garden during the warmer months. The hotel also serves a daily breakfast.

The Keller-family spirit has ensured quality accommodation since 1913. From this privileged location, you can be in the town centre in just 8 minutes by foot to discover the areas rich cultural history.

Also, near the Hotel Logis Hôtel Beauséjour Colmar are the areas famous Christmas markets where you can discover the tastes and spirit of this famous region.

name: B&B HOTEL Colmar Lumière
description:
This hotel is located in the North of Colmar, 5 km from the city centre. It offers air conditioning, free WiFi access and an all-you-can-eat buffet breakfast.

Each soundproofed room at the B&B HOTEL Colmar Lumière offers modern facilities including cable on a flat-screen TV. It also has private bathroom.

Soleil Colmar features a garden that guests can enjoy.

Free parking is provided at the Hôtel Roi Soleil, making it easy to explore Colmar and the surrounding Alsatian vineyards by car.

name: James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre
description:
James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre offers accommodation in Colmar, on the Alsation Wine Route. This Boutique Hotel offers a contemporary and modern decoration style. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Private parking is available on site.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom. James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre features free WiFi throughout the property.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The James Boutique Hôtel Colmar centre is located within a 5-minute walk of Colmar's Christmas markets. Strasbourg Airport is a 1-hour drive from the hotel.

name: Hotel Primo Colmar Centre
description:
Hotel Primo Colmar Centre is located at the centre of Colmar, just 300 metres from the Unterlinden Museum and the Christmas market, and 5 minutes' drive from Colmar Expo and the Bartholdi's Statue of Liberty. It offers free WiFi access.

The contemporary rooms feature a private bathroom and a TV.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the Hotel Primo Colmar Centre. The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception.

Public parking is available in front of the Hotel Primo Colmar Centre at an extra cost. It is just 1.7 km from Colmar Train Station. You can also travel the 15-minute drive to the famous vineyards on the Alsace Wine Route.

name: Hotel L'Europe
description:
Welcome to the Hotel & Restaurant l'Europe, located just 3 km from the pretty town of Colmar and its Petite Venise district, the Hotel Europe is your dream pied-à-terre. Each room is unique and will seduce you, according to your tastes. Everything is designed to allow you to choose according to your wishes or events.

L'Europe Hotel & Restaurant enjoys a quiet location, with ample free parking. The Hotel L'Europe Colmar will appeal to all your business and leisure travel needs. Its recently renovated Privilège rooms, restaurant and bar will add to the appeal of your next stay.

Its 1,600 m² of modular lounges with free Wi-Fi are a must in the region for seminars, receptions, banquets, weddings, etc.

The "Le Comptoir d'Henri" restaurant offers traditional French and Alsatian cuisine prepared with fresh market produce. The restaurant serves seasonal and traditional dishes.
Open Tuesday to Thursday from 6:45pm to 9pm, and until 9:30pm on Friday and Saturday.

You can visit Alsace's vineyards and wine cellars. The region is also popular with cyclists and hikers.

name: Campanile Colmar - Parc des Expositions
description:
Located in front of the airport, this Campanile Colmar offers rooms with free WiFi and a restaurant. Colmar city centre is 4 km away.

With a garden view, each room at Campanile Colmar has a private bathroom with hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities and an LCD TV. Guests can enjoy Canal+ and beIN SPORTS channels, both in the room and in the hotel lounge.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and can also be taken on the hotel's terrace. A regional cuisine is proposed at the restaurant, which also features children's menus; breakfast price for children from 5 years old to 12 years is EUR 5.95 and Children from 13 years old to 17 years old is EUR 10.90.

With a 24-hour reception, Campanile Colmar also offers an equipped meeting room. For your convenience, free private parking is available on site.

name: The Originals City, Hôtel Colmar Gare
description:
The Originals Access, Hôtel Colmar Gare is situated between the town centre of Colmar and the railway station in the beautiful Alsace region of France.

All guest rooms are comfortable, soundproofed and equipped with standard amenities including telephone and a TV with satellite channels. Swiss and German TV channels are also available.

The Originals Access, Hôtel Colmar Gare also has a pleasant dining area where a delicious breakfast is served. Also, there is a 24-hour reception hosted by a multilingual staff (French, English and German).

In the surrounding area guests can enjoy the many alpine ski trails and the beauty of Vosges that are located less than an hour from the hotel.

name: B&B HOTEL Colmar Expo
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, B&B HOTEL Colmar Expo offers accommodation in Colmar, 10 km from Kaysersberg. Free private parking is available on site.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Colmar Expo is opposite the B&B HOTEL Colmar Expo, while House of the Heads is 3 km away. EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg is 61 km from the property. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: James Vignoble Hôtel, Eguisheim
description:
James Vignoble Hôtel Eguisheim is located among the vineyards of Eguisheim. It offers a spectacular view of the Black Forest.

The establishment is equipped with two pools, one outdoor heated to 29°C (Closed in winter, open according to weather conditions and seasons). Our relaxing area is open and has one indoor swimming pool which is heated to 29°C, it also has a Jacuzzi and a panoramic sauna at an extra cost. Bath robes, towels and flip flops are proposed to our guests at the Front Desk, with a supplementary price.

There are 31 furnished rooms with a private bathroom. Each room at the James Vignoble Hôtel Eguisheim is equipped with a TV, telephone, air-conditioning and minibar.

A breakfast buffet with sweet and savoury options is available daily. Breakfast must be reserved upon arrival. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Parking is in extra at 8€ per day on site. You will find a choice of restaurants within a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Eguisheim Christmas Market is 500 meters away.

The wellness area is open from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. This private space has an additional cost of €11 for ages 13 and over and €4 for ages 7 to 12. To make this moment relaxing, we provide you with bathrobes, towels and flip-flops.

name: L'Hostellerie du Château
description:
Set at the heart of the medieval village of Eguisheim, the Hostellerie du Château is located on the Alsace wine route. It offers individually decorated guest rooms with free fibre-optic WiFi access.

Each guest room is equipped with satellite TV and a minibar. The tiled private bathrooms feature a bathtub.

At L'Hostellerie du Château, a continental buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room.

L'Hostellerie du Château is located 6 km from Colmar City Centre and Strasbourg Airport is 87 km away. Guests can visit the 3 castles in the village, just a short walk away.

name: Hôtel L'Auberge Alsacienne
description:
Located in the village of Eguisheim in the Alsace region, this hotel features modern rooms with private bathroom and a traditional restaurant. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel.

The soundproofed rooms at Hôtel L'Auberge Alsacienne include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Hairdryer and free bathroom toiletries are also provided.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. The hotel’s restaurant offers typical Alsatian food with à la carte menus.

Eguisheim centre is only 300 metres away and Colmar SNCF Train Station is 6 km from the property. German frontier is very close and Freiburg is 1 hour’s drive.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim
description:
The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim is located at the gate of a charming village, in the heart of vineyards and a gourmet region. The hotel is situated 8 km from Colmar.

Rooms at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim feature traditional decor and are equipped with modern amenities such as free WiFi access.

The The Originals Boutique, Hôtel La Ferme du Pape, Eguisheim offers a shaded terrace where you can savour local specialities accompanied with wines from the region.

The hotel features a lift, free private parking and facilities for the disabled. The golf course and the tennis courts are 5 km from the hotel and the town swimming pool is 6 km away.

name: Auberge du Rempart
description:
Offering views of the city, Auberge du Rempart is a family-run inn situated in the historic centre of Eguisheim in the Alsace Region.The property is 100 metres from Eguisheim Christmas Market.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer and a shower or a bath.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at an extra cost. Guests can also enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant or on the terrace during nice weather.

Basel Airport is 52 km from the property.

name: Auberge des Trois Châteaux
description:
Auberge des Trois Châteaux is in the heart of Eguisheim, surrounded by vineyards of Alsace along the Alsatian wine route. Its traditional Winstub serves local, traditional specialties and local wines.

En suite with bath or shower and a hairdryer, the rooms offer flat-screen TV with satellite channels, telephone and an alarm clock. Free Wi-Fi is provided in the entire property.

This 17th-century house, typical of the region is just 8 km from Colmar and 5 km from the Colmar Train Station. The 3 castles in the region – le Wahlenbourg, le Weckmund and Hohlandsbourg castle are all within 12 km of Auberge des Trois Châteaux.

name: Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim
description:
This hotel is located 200 metres from the city centre of Eguisheim, a 10-minute drive from Colmar. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access and free private parking.

The rooms at the Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim are also equipped with TVs and some have private balconies.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast.

The Alsace wine route and the Vosges Mountains are easily accessible from Hotel Colmar Vignes Eguisheim.

name: B&B HOTEL Colmar Vignobles Ouest
description:
Featuring free, high-speed WiFi throughout the property, B&B Hôtel Colmar offers pet-friendly accommodation in Wintzenheim, 5 minutes' drive from Colmar. Free private parking is available on site.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite and beIN sport channels. Rooms are fitted with a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

A continental breakfast with fresh bread with Nutella or jam is served every morning at a surcharge. Guests can also sample eggs and bacon on site.

Freiburg im Breisgau is 41 km from B&B Hôtel Colmar, while Gérardmer is 32 km away. Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport is 56 km from the property.

name: Greet Hotel Colmar
description:
Greet Hotel Colmar is located at the entrance of Colmar, just 1.3 km from to the historic quarter known as Little Venice. It offers free WiFi access.

Each room at the Greet Hotel Colmar is equipped with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Also available are rooms suitable for guests who have limited mobility.

In the evening, dine in the hotel’s air-conditioned restaurant or on the terrace where guests can experience a meal with the various flavours and traditional Alsace cuisine. Everything served is made with the finest local and regional products.

Colmar Train Station is 2.3 km from the property. Bicycle storage and a free private parking are available on site.
Please not that this property doesn't accept roup reservations

name: Colmar Hotel
description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom. Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

name: Grand Hôtel Bristol
description:
Grand Hôtel Bristol is located in Colmar, facing the historical TGV train station. It offers a fitness and spa centre with sauna, hammam and massage treatments. The property is 1.1 km from Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains.

The air-conditioned rooms with traditional or contemporary decor are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, free WiFi, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift.

L'Auberge Brasserie serves traditional Alsace dishes with regional wines. A buffet breakfast is prepared daily. Guests have a choice of a buffet breakfast served in the lounge or a continental breakfast served in their room

Grand Hôtel Bristol has a limited private underground parking at an extra cost and subject to reservation. Other public parking lots can be found at a few minutes' walk.

name: Hotel Restaurant Cristal
description:
Set in the middle of the Alsatian vineyards, Hotel Restaurant Cristal offers accommodation in Wintzenheim, 5 km from Colmar. Guests can enjoy the on-site, traditional-style restaurant and relax using free Wi-Fi access.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Every room has a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

There is room service at the property.Free private parking is available on site.

Freiburg im Breisgau is 43 km from Hotel Restaurant Cristal, while Gérardmer is 30 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 56 km from the property.

name: Hotel SPA Husseren Collections - Proche Colmar - Eguisheim
description:
The hotel, with terraces southerly oriented, is located between vineyards and forest, at the foothills of the ruins of the three castles in the heart of Alsace, on the wine-road, 6 km from Colmar, 70 km from Strasbourg.

The establishment boasts a bistronomic restaurant, "Bain de Forêt", with a terrace featuring forest views. Guests can also enjoy an indoor swimming pool, a sauna, and bright seminar rooms with professional material and Wi-Fi access.

Staff at the Hotel Restaurant & Spa Husseren Collections speak English, German, Danish and Italian. Nine charging stations (including 3 tesla) for electric cars are available at this property.

Parking is available and for free.

name: Les Portes de la Vallee
description:
Located along the Alsace Wine Route, a 10-minute walk from the centre of Turckheim, this hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an on-site restaurant and bar.

The guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a work desk. Each room offers an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and complimentary toiletries.

Breakfast is served each morning at the hotel and can be taken in guests’ rooms upon request. The restaurant offers traditional Alsatian cuisine and wines.

With free private parking on site the hotel is located 1.4 km from Wintzenheim and 3.2 km from Ingersheim. Colmar is a 15-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Relais Du Vignoble
description:
The Relais Du Vignoble is situated on an Alsation wine estate, outside the village of Gueberschwihr. It offers spacious en-suite guest rooms with TVs and free wired internet.

Guests of the Relais Du Vignoble can sample local and estate wines, at the free wine tasting sessions in the 13th century cellar. The hotel restaurant serves regional, traditional cuisine and a full buffet breakfast.

The Relais du Vignoble offers a panoramic view onto the Vosges Mountains, Alsace Plain and the Black Forest. Guests can enjoy hiking and cycling in the surrounding countryside.

name: Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar
description:
Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is 4 km from the centre of Colmar and 2 km from the A35 motorway. This hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a free private parking and a bar. (2 charging station for electric vehicles)

Serviced by a lift, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature a desk, a flat-screen TV, free wifi and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower.

Breakfast is served every morning at Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar. There is also a bar with terrace on site where guests can enjoy snacks.

Comfort Hotel Expo Colmar is a 10-minute drive from the Wine Route of Alsace and right at the opposite of Colmar Expo Exhibition Centre.

name: ibis Colmar Est - Hotel Restaurant en Alsace
description:
The ibis Colmar East is located 5 km from the Alsace Wine Trail and 10 km from Kaysersberg, Riquewihr and Eguisheim. Wi-Fi is free of charge in the entire property.

The 86 rooms are comfortable and all have en suite facilities with a bath tub. The hotel also features an Alsatian brasserie, WinStub, a terrace, a free car park and secure car spaces.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. The property is a boutique hotel.

Ironing facilities and hairdryers are available upon request.

The property is a 5 minute drive from the old city centre of Colmar, wander through the Petite Venise area, visit the toy museum or admire the Isenheim Altarpiece at the Unterlinden Museum.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Logis La Palette
description:
This hotel is located in Alsace region a 10-minute drive from Colmar and from the centre of Eguisheim. It offers a goumet-style restaurant that serves seasonal dishes and en suite rooms with a telephone and TV. Free Wi-Fi is available.

La Palette’s restaurant serves traditional French food that guests can enjoy on the terrace during nice weather. There is also a bar that serves a variety of drinks.

Additional facilities and services include a children’s game room located in the restaurant, as well as an on site gift shop and bicycle rental.

It is 30 km from Haut-Kœnigsbourg Castle and an 11-minute drive from the Unterlinden Museum. Free private parking is available.

name: Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel
description:
Hotel Arc-En-Ciel Colmar Contact Hotel is situated in a verdant setting just 1 km from the city centre of Colmar and its historical sites and attractions.

All of the standard guest rooms feature modern en suite facilities, TV and free optic fibre WiFi internet access. There are also connecting rooms.

This hotel is a great starting point for discovering La Route des Vins, the local picturesque villages and leisure parks. Not to mention the regional cuisine and local wine.

The hotel also offers a free private car park, a garage for bicycles, an outdoor terrace, and veranda where guests can enjoy breakfast or a moment of quiet.

name: Hôtel de l'Ange
description:
Set in a former farmhouse built in a typical Alsatian style, Hôtel de l'Ange is located 8 km from Colmar Train Station.

With an LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access, the guest rooms are decorated in a traditional style with wooden furnishings. Some of the rooms offer a courtyard view and the private bathrooms include free toiletries.

You can enjoy wine tasting in the hotel’s wine cellar. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning.

Unterlinden Museum is located 7 km from this hotel and the medieval town of Riquewihr is 12 km away. Free private parking is available nearby and Strasbourg Airport is 74 km away.

name: Hotel L'Europe
description:
Welcome to the Hotel & Restaurant l'Europe, located just 3 km from the pretty town of Colmar and its Petite Venise district, the Hotel Europe is your dream pied-à-terre. Each room is unique and will seduce you, according to your tastes. Everything is designed to allow you to choose according to your wishes or events.

L'Europe Hotel & Restaurant enjoys a quiet location, with ample free parking. The Hotel L'Europe Colmar will appeal to all your business and leisure travel needs. Its recently renovated Privilège rooms, restaurant and bar will add to the appeal of your next stay.

Its 1,600 m² of modular lounges with free Wi-Fi are a must in the region for seminars, receptions, banquets, weddings, etc.

The "Le Comptoir d'Henri" restaurant offers traditional French and Alsatian cuisine prepared with fresh market produce. The restaurant serves seasonal and traditional dishes.
Open Tuesday to Thursday from 6:45pm to 9pm, and until 9:30pm on Friday and Saturday.

You can visit Alsace's vineyards and wine cellars. The region is also popular with cyclists and hikers.

name: PAUL & PIA - Welcome Home Hotel
description:
This hotel is located 500 metres from Colmar Train Station and the Old Town. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 700 meters away.

All rooms have a satellite flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a private bathroom.

There is also a bar and a 24-hour reception.

Guests can easily explore the medieval villages in the Alsace wine region and the Musée d'Unterlinden is 750 meters away. The Colmar-Houssen Airport is just 5 km from the Hotel Kyriad.

name: Hôtel Berceau Du Vigneron
description:
The Berceau Du Vigneron is located in the heart of the Alsace vineyard 7 kilometres west of Colmar. Guests can relax in the hotel’s bar with a free newspaper. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel.

All rooms at the property are decorated with wooden furniture and feature a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

From May to October, guests can participate in nighttime tours of the city.

The Berceau du Vigneron is located near several vineyards on the Alsatian Wine Route, where guests can sample the regional produce. The hotel is just 15 minutes from Colmar town centre and Colmar-Houssen Airport.

name: B&B HOTEL Colmar Lumière
description:
This hotel is located in the North of Colmar, 5 km from the city centre. It offers air conditioning, free WiFi access and an all-you-can-eat buffet breakfast.

Each soundproofed room at the B&B HOTEL Colmar Lumière offers modern facilities including cable on a flat-screen TV. It also has private bathroom.

Soleil Colmar features a garden that guests can enjoy.

Free parking is provided at the Hôtel Roi Soleil, making it easy to explore Colmar and the surrounding Alsatian vineyards by car.

name: Hôtel des Deux Clefs
description:
Located in the centre of Turckheim in Alsace at the door of the Munster Valley, Hôtel des Deux Clefs is a charming hotel that dates back to the 15th century and offers free WiFi throughout.

Guestrooms combine comfort and charm to provide a warm, rustic atmosphere perfect for a romantic getaway or a cultural visit. All are equipped with full bathrooms, direct line telephone and TV.

The mediaeval town of Turckheim is situated in Alsatian wine country and is surrounded by verdant forests, a river and rolling vineyards. It is also a town with a rich cultural heritage that extends to classic and modern art, music and gastronomy.

name: Hôtel De La Couronne
description:
Hotel De La Courronne is located in Riquewihr town centre, 14km north of Colmar. This family-run hotel offers spacious accommodation with en-suite facilities and free Wi-Fi internet access.

Accessible by stairs, all rooms feature original oak beams and medieval furnishings. Each room has a TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served daily at the hotel's breakfast room at an extra cost. Guests can also relax in the café bar and on the terrace.

A large private carpark is available on site and Hotel De La Couronne provides an express check-in service and a multilingual staff. The picturesque town of Ribeauvillé is just 5km away. Two recharge stations for electric cars are available for a fee.

name: Hotel am Park
description:
This hotel is located directly opposite the entrance of Europa-Park in Rust. There are snacks and drinks available in the hotel shop. On-site parking is free.

The bright and spacious rooms at Hotel am Park feature wooden interiors. All rooms include a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A traditional German breakfast is available each morning.

Tickets for Europa-Park can be reserved at the Hotel am Park in Rust. All children are welcome at the Hotel.

Hotel am Park is 4 km from the A5 motorway. It is a 30-minute drive from both Freiburg and Strasbourg.

name: Gasthof - Hotel Kopf
description:
Set 18 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, Gasthof - Hotel Kopf offers 2-star accommodation in Riegel and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. The property is situated 19 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre, 23 km from Freiburg Cathedral and 25 km from Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station. The hotel has a sauna, an ATM and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units feature a wardrobe.

Colmar Expo is 37 km from Gasthof - Hotel Kopf, while Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 39 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 66 km from the accommodation.

name: Colmar Hotel
description:
Colmar Hotel is located in Colmar, 1 km from House of the Heads. Colmar Christmas Market - Place des Dominicains is 1.2 km away. It features free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a bar and a free private parking in front of the hotel.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a private bathroom. Free toiletries and a hair dryer are available in all of the rooms.

Free parking and paid secured parking are available on site. Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 1.1 km from Colmar Hotel, while Colmar Expo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Euro Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg Airport, 54 km from the property.

name: B&B Hotel Rust-Ettenheim
description:
Situated in Ettenheim, 9.3 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, B&B Hotel Rust-Ettenheim features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is set 34 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre, 37 km from Freiburg Cathedral and 38 km from Rohrschollen Nature Reserve. The property is non-smoking and is located 33 km from Würth Museum.

At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

B&B Hotel Rust-Ettenheim offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station is 39 km from the accommodation, while Jardin botanique de l'Université de Strasbourg is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 49 km from B&B Hotel Rust-Ettenheim.

name: Highway Hotel
description:
The Highway Hotel is easily accessible off highway A 5, halfway between the city of Offenburg and Freiburg.

Whether you would like to relax or plan business meetings, our hotel offers the suitable ambiance for each occasion.

name: Holiday Inn Express - Ringsheim, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express - Ringsheim in Ringsheim provides accommodation with a shared lounge. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and a business centre.

All rooms boast a seating area, kettle, a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom.

The daily breakfast consists of a continental breakfast buffet .

Strasbourg is 37 km from the accommodation, while Colmar is 36 km away. Baden Airpark Airport is 63 km from the property.

name: Moxy Rust
description:
Located in Rust, 1.8 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, Moxy Rust provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 33 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Moxy Rust each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and gluten-free options.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rust, like cycling.

A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Moxy Rust. Speaking Bulgarian, German, Greek and English at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

Freiburg Cathedral is 36 km from the hotel, while Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station is 38 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 57 km from Moxy Rust.

name: Oneloft Hotel
description:
Set in Obernai, 15 km from Würth Museum, Oneloft Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 29 km from Strasbourg History Museum.

At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. At Oneloft Hotel all rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Staff speak German, English and French at the 24-hour front desk.

Zénith de Strasbourg is 29 km from Oneloft Hotel, while St. Paul's Church is 30 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Babylon am Europa-Park
description:
Opened in May 2017, Hotel Babylon offer accommodation in Ringsheim, 5 km from Rust. The Europa-Park amusement park is only a 5-minute drive away. Free private parking is available on site.

A flat-screen TV is featured. Free WiFi is available throughout the property

Strasbourg is 37 km from Hotel Babylon, while Colmar is 36 km from the property. The nearest airport is Baden Airpark Airport, 63 km from Hotel Babylon.

name: Hôtel De La Tour
description:
Hotel De La Tour is in a former winery in Ribeauvillé’s medieval centre. Guests have free access to the sauna, hammam, hot tub. Free WiFi and bike rental are also available.

Rooms at Hotel De La Tour are individually decorated and equipped with a telephone, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower or a bath. Some rooms feature details of the original Alsatian building.

De La Tour Hotel is near several restaurants that serve traditional Alsatian dishes including sauerkraut, baeckaoffa and tartes flambées. The hotel has a bar and lounge where guests can relax with an aperitif.

There is also a tennis court and guests receive preferential rates at the nearby Ammerschwihr and Alsace Golf Clubs. The Tour des Bouchers is opposite this hotel. Ribeauvillé Train Station is a 4.3 km from the hotel and Colmar is 16 km away.

name: Hôtel-Restaurant Mont Sainte-Odile
description:
Situated in Ottrott, 26 km from Würth Museum, Hôtel-Restaurant Mont Sainte-Odile features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 2-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. The rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Guests at Hôtel-Restaurant Mont Sainte-Odile will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ottrott, like hiking, skiing and cycling.

Strasbourg History Museum is 40 km from the accommodation, while Zénith de Strasbourg is 41 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 28 km from Hôtel-Restaurant Mont Sainte-Odile.

name: Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica
description:
Situated in Ringsheim, 6 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. The property is set 34 km from Freiburg Cathedral, 36 km from Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station and 36 km from Würth Museum. The property is allergy-free and is located 31 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre.

At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms include a balcony. At Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica all rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Guests at Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ringsheim, like hiking and cycling.

Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 42 km from the hotel, while Colmar Expo is 50 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 52 km from Hotel Sleep & Dream Nähe Europa Park und Rulantica.

name: Logis Hotel Le Parc & Spa
description:
Logis Hotel Le Parc is located in the historic, Alsatian village of Saint-Hippolyte. The hotel has a covered swimming pool and you will also have access to the sauna, hammam and fitness centre.

A minibar, TV and facilities for making tea and coffee are provided in the elegant guest rooms. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer.

The restaurant serves regionally inspired dishes and a wide selection of local wines. In the evening guests can relax with a drink and enjoy live music in the hotel bar.

The Parc is situated 6.5 km from Château du Haut-Kœnigsbourg. Guests can enjoy hiking and cycling in the surrounding Vosges Mountains.

name: Euro-Hotel
description:
The Euro-Hotel in Kappel-Grafenhausen is just off the A5 motorway and a 10-minute drive from Europa Park Rust. It offers rooms with satellite TV.

The rooms at the Euro-Hotel were renovated in March 2010 and have new carpets. All rooms have Wi-Fi access and a hairdryer. Rooms are located either in the main building or in the guest house next door.

A breakfast buffet is available each morning at the Euro-Hotel. Many restaurants can be found within walking distance.

Freiburg is just a 20-minute drive away. The hotel is also a good base for day trips to Strasbourg and the Black Forest.

name: Best Western Hotel & SPA Le Schoenenbourg
description:
Surrounded by vineyards, the Best Western Hotel Le Schoenenbourg is opposite the ramparts of the medieval village of Riquewihr. This eco-friendly hotel features a complimentary spa area with an indoor pool, saunas and hammam as well as a seasonal outdoor pool. Riquewihr Christmas Market is 170 meters away.

Each room is decorated in neutral colours. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Please note that the restaurant is open.

Additional facilities at the Best Western include a bar. Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast in the dining area or on the outdoor terrace overlooking the garden.

Hotel Le Schoenenbourg is 13 km from Colmar, 28 km from the border of Germany and 53 minutes from Strasbourg. Guests can go hiking in the Réserve Naturelle du Massif du Ventron.

name: ibis Budget Colmar Centre Gare
description:
Ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville is set in the Colmar Centre Ville district in Colmar, 300 metres from House of the Heads and 600 metres from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church.

The rooms have a TV with satellite channels.

Colmar Expo is 2.5 km from ibis budget Colmar Centre Ville, while Theater Colmar is 200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Basel Airport, 55 km from the property.

name: Hotel Le Mandelberg
description:
The Hotel Le Mandelberg is located at the foot of a hill in the village of Mittelwihr, in the heart of the Alsace region. It offers a sauna and a solarium, and massage treatments are available upon request.

Each room at the Mandelberg is individually decorated with a private bathroom, a minibar and a flat-screen TV. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

The Mandelberg serves a daily buffet breakfast, and guests are invited to relax with a drink in the bar or on the terrace.

The hotel is in close proximity to many vineyards and free on-site parking is available.

name: FourSide Hotel Ringsheim
description:
Situated in Ringsheim, 5.7 km from Europa-Park Main Entrance, FourSide Hotel Ringsheim features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a bar. Located around 34 km from Freiburg Cathedral, the hotel with free WiFi is also 36 km away from Freiburg (Breisgau) Central Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 30 km from Freiburg’s Exhibition and Conference Centre.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms are fitted with a kitchenette with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. All rooms have a safety deposit box.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at FourSide Hotel Ringsheim.

The accommodation offers a children's playground.

Speaking German, English, French and Italian, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

Würth Museum is 36 km from FourSide Hotel Ringsheim, while Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 42 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 52 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Elisabeth
description:
Hotel Elisabeth is located in La Vancelle, just 3 km from Château de Frankenbourg and 14 km from the Volerie des Aigles and the Montagne des Singes. It offers free Wi-Fi access, a garden and a terrace.

The guest rooms at Hotel Elisabeth are simply decorated and include a flat-screen TV. They each have a private bathroom with a shower.

Breakfast is prepared every morning at Hotel Elisabeth, and traditional French cuisine can be enjoyed in the on-site restaurant.

Free private parking is available on site and Sélestat Train Station is 12 km away. The property is 13 km from Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg, 24 km from Ribeauvillé and 28 km from Riquewhir.

name: Hôtel Berceau Du Vigneron
description:
The Berceau Du Vigneron is located in the heart of the Alsace vineyard 7 kilometres west of Colmar. Guests can relax in the hotel’s bar with a free newspaper. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel.

All rooms at the property are decorated with wooden furniture and feature a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

From May to October, guests can participate in nighttime tours of the city.

The Berceau du Vigneron is located near several vineyards on the Alsatian Wine Route, where guests can sample the regional produce. The hotel is just 15 minutes from Colmar town centre and Colmar-Houssen Airport.

name: L'Abbaye d'Alspach
description:
Located in the heart of the medieval town of Kientzheim, the original architecture at this former convent has been successfully preserved to create a cosy hotel.

The smart rooms at the L'Abbaye d'Alspach have been carefully designed by the owner to ensure a calm and comfortable night's sleep. They include modern amenities such as free Wi-Fi internet access.

To guarantee your wellbeing L'Abbaye d'Alspach has a shady garden, a sauna and a fitness room.

The team provide excellent advice concerning tourist highlights. Free private parking is provided, making it easy to explore the Alsace region by car. The hotel is an ideal base for discovering this wine-producing area, famous for the Tokay d'Alsace.

name: La Cour du Bailli Suites & Spa
description:
Located an hour's drive south of Strasbourg, La Cour du Bailli offers a spa centre with an indoor pool and hot tub. It features a medieval decor and a terraced courtyard.

Each studio and apartment at the Cour du Bailli is equipped with a kitchenette and TV. They have a private bathroom.

The Restaurant La Cave du Bailli serves regional cuisine and a variety of wines. During the summer, guests can enjoy meals on the terrace.

Guests have access to the hotel's free internet terminal and can book and massage treatment, at a surcharge.

name: Auberge des Salles
description:
Situated in Les Salles-sur-Verdon, Auberge des Salles features a terrace with panoramic views of Lake de Sainte-Croix and the surrounding Verdon Natural Park. Hiking, fishing, and swimming are within 10 minutes' walk of the property.

Rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and private bathrooms with either a bath or shower and a toilet. Some rooms have balconies with lake views and other rooms overlook the village and surrounding hills. A kettle is available upon request subject to availability.

The restaurant has a panoramic terrace on the lake of Sainte-Croix serving dinner everyday.

A buffet breakfast with hot drinks, orange juice, croissants, fresh bread with jams, honey and butter is served daily for a supplement. There is a bar on site.

The entrance to the Verdon Gorge is 6 km away and the village of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie is a 20-minute drive away. Les Arcs-Draguignan Train Station is 55 km away and the Hyeres Airport is 115 km away. Free private parking and free WiFi are available at the property.

name: Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers
description:
This Provencal-style hotel has a floral terrace and is only 500 metres from the village of Moustiers Sainte Marie. Surrounded by nature, Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers offers panoramic views.

Guest rooms are decorated in warm colours with floor-to-ceiling windows allowing plenty of natural light. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV and feature a private bathroom.

Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers serves a daily buffet breakfast which can be enjoyed on the terrace. In the evenings guests can relax with a drink at the bar.

The hotel is only 5 km from the Sainte-Croix Lake, where there are opportunities for canoeing, sailing and swimming. The Gorges du Verdon are 5 km away and free private parking is available on site.

name: Ibis Budget Sélestat
description:
Set on the Alsace Wine Route, the Ibis Budget Sélestat is located in Sélestat. Free WiFi access is available. You can relax on the furnished terrace.

The air-conditioned rooms are provided with a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge with an additional cost.

Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine. The property offers free private parking on site and Colmar is 17 km away. The hotel is just 17 km from the German border and the A35 Highway Exit is 1.9 km away.

We offer a small restaurant at the reception.

Reception is open 24/7.

name: Ma Petite Auberge
description:
Set in the Verdon Regional Nature Park, a 1-minute walk from the Verdon River and 5 km from Castillon Lake, Ma petite Auberge offers a traditional restaurant, a garden and a terrace. A public swimming pool is located 100 metres from the property.

The heated rooms offer a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom is fitted with a bath or a shower and includes free toiletries. Some offer a view of the terrace and the village’s place.

A continental breakfast is available every morning, and you can enjoy lunch and dinner in the park beside the 100-year-old Tilia Tree. Grocers can be found within 1 km.

It is 40 km from Dignes Train Station. Grasse is located 65 km from Ma Petite Auberge, while Cannes is 82 km away. A free, private car park is available on site.

name: B&B HOTEL Sélestat Centre-Alsace
description:
Set within 19 km of Colmar Expo and 22 km of House of the Heads, B&B HOTEL Sélestat Centre-Alsace provides rooms in Sélestat. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 12 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At B&B HOTEL Sélestat Centre-Alsace each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 22 km from the accommodation, while Colmar Train Station is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 41 km from B&B HOTEL Sélestat Centre-Alsace.

name: Hôtel La Bonne Auberge
description:
Set in the Verdon Regional Park, this hotel features a swimming pool and a shaded terrace in the garden. Regional dishes are served in the hotel’s restaurant.

The soundproofed guest rooms have a flat-screen TV and they offer a view. Each room is individually decorated and the private bathrooms include free toiletries. A hairdryer is available upon request.

A buffet breakfast is prepared daily at the Hôtel La Bonne Auberge.

The Gorges du Verdon is located 5 km away and private parking is available in the on-site garage.

name: Hôtel le Panoramic - Votre Hôtel au cœur des Gorges du Verdon
description:
Set in a 4-hectare estate in the heart of Verdon Regional Natural Park, Hôtel le Panoramic - Votre Hôtel au cœur des Gorges du Verdon offers guestrooms 700 metres from Palud sur Verdon. The hotel features a heated outdoor pool, several terraces, a children's playground and a lounge with billiards, table tennis and table football. Free WiFi is available.

The rooms come with a flat screen TV, a private bathroom with a bath or shower, a toilet and free toiletries. Some rooms offer garden views and pool, while others have mountain views.

The children's playground features football goals, volleyball court and badminton set. Guests can have a drink at the on-site bar

In the surroundings you can explore the Verdon Gorge on a pedalo, electric boat or kayak, as well as the Lake Sainte-Croix, which is 15 km away. Hiking, climbing, bungee jumping, tree climbing, rafting and canyoning can be enjoyed in the area.

Free parking is available on site. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 124 km from Hôtel le Panoramic - Votre Hôtel au cœur des Gorges du Verdon.

name: Clos des Iris
description:
Clos des Iris is set in a 19th-century house, just 400 metres from the centre of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie in the Gorges Du Verdon region. It offers traditional-style rooms featuring a private terrace and views of the flowered garden.

Free WiFi access and a desk are provided in the rooms at Clos des Iris. There is also an en suite bathroom in each one, which is complete with a hairdryer and a shower. The rooms do not have a TV.

Breakfast is served every morning either in the dining room or on the shared terrace. After breakfast, you can relax on the sun loungers in the garden while reading a newspaper.

Other local attractions include Sainte-Croix Lake, which is just 4 km from this 2-star hotel, and guests can enjoy water sports such as pedalo boats and canoeing. Plateau de Valensole, known for its lavender fields, is 28 km away. The area is also popular for hiking and paragliding. Free private parking is available on site and luggage storage is provided at reception.

name: Nouvel Hôtel du Commerce
description:
The Nouvel Hôtel du Commerce is located in Castellane, in the Verdon region. It offers a heated swimming pool from mid-May to September, comfortable rooms in 2 buildings and free, closed private parking.

Some rooms offer views of the pool, of the mountain or of the city. They are all complete with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and there is also access to a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer.

Every morning, a breakfast buffet featuring a range of local and homemade products is served. It can be enjoyed by the pool or in the common dining room.

For your comfort, the hotel provides free Wi-Fi in all the rooms. The area offers many activities such museums and excursions.

The hotel provides a free storage for bikes.

name: Château de Trigance
description:
This medieval castle is set in the Provencal village of Trigance. Guests can enjoy a drink or a simple meal of regional produce in the onsite wine bar, which is situated in one of the oldest weapon rooms in the castle. Free WiFi access is available in all rooms.

The rooms and suites at Château de Trigance feature a four-poster bed, antique furniture and wall tapestries. An LCD TV, views of the village and an en suite bathroom are also provided in each one.

You can enjoy the continental breakfast on the hotel’s panoramic terrace. There is also the possibility to have an afternoon tea or an aperitif while admiring the views.

Free private parking is possible on site and the Verdon Caves are a 20-minute drive away. Other local activities include walking in the countryside or bungee jumping off Artuby Bridge, 12 km away.

name: Hotel le Belvédère
description:
Hotel le Belvédère is located near Musée de la Fayence, in the heart of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, known for its pottery and famous hanging star. It offers air-conditioned rooms with mountain or village views.

Each room also has a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Continental breakfast is served daily and you can enjoy regional dishes at the hotel’s restaurant, which has a terrace that looks out onto the mountains.

Hotel le Belvédère provides free private parking. It is a 15-minute drive from the beaches of the Lake of Sainte-Croix. Hiking, mountain biking and kayaking are popular activities in the region.

name: La Bastide du Paradou
description:
Housed in a 16th-century building, La Bastide du Paradou is a hotel located a 5-minute walk from the centre of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie. Enjoy access to gardens and private tennis courts.

The elegant rooms at La Bastide du Paradou have been individually decorated with care.

Breakfast is available for guests and is served individually. Further restaurants are closeby in Moustiers-Sainte-Marie.

Nearby attractions include the Verdon Gorges and the Lake Sainte Croix. Free private parking is provided at La Bastide du Paradou.

name: Hotel du Levant
description:
Located in Castellane, in the Verdon Regional Nature Park, Hotel du Levant features a restaurant and terrasse and free WiFi access in public areas. A secured garage is also available for guest at an extra cost.

All rooms at Hotel du Levant features a flat-screen TV, a desk and a wardrobe and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Daily cleaning is made at the property and towels and toiletries are provided for free.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the restaurant. The hotel’s restaurant serves French cuisine.

Hotel du Levant is 6.2 km from Lac de Castillon, 65 km from Grasse and 82 km from Cannes.

name: Logis Grand Hotel Bain
description:
Logis Grand Hotel Bain is a family-run hotel since 1737 and is located in Comps-sur-Artuby, near the Gorges of Verdon. It offers en suite rooms with free WiFi and a TV.

The hotel provides a daily buffet breakfast and the restaurant offers a range of set menus serving local Provençal food. Guests can sample regional wines in the hotel bar, or relax in the garden.

In the surroundings, guests can practice outdoor activities including hiking, kayaking and rafting. For bungee jumping, guests can go to Artuby bridge, a 20-minute drive away.

Logis Grand Hotel Bain is 30 km from Draguignan and Castellane. Free on-site private parking is available for guests exploring the Provence region by car.

name: Hôtel du Roc
description:
Located in the centre of the Castellane Village, this hotel is 100 meters from the Verdon River and Gorges. Canoeing, rafting and hiking are some of the activities that can be done in the surrounding area.

With a village or mountains view, each room at Hôtel du Roc is equipped with an LCD TV and a bathroom with shower, toilet and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is served daily and a traditional restaurant is also at your disposal on site.

Saint Andrée les Alpes Train Station is 25 km away and Moustiers Sainte Marie is 45 km away.

name: Villa Castellane
description:
Located in Gréoux-les-Bains, 22 km from Golf du Luberon, Villa Castellane provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a kitchenette with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Villa Castellane every room has bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Villa Castellane offers a terrace. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Gréoux-les-Bains, like hiking and cycling.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 90 km from Villa Castellane.

name: Hôtel Les Deux Lions
description:
Situated in Riez, 8 km from Lake of Sainte-Croix, Hôtel Les Deux Lions offers rooms overlooking the village or the hill. Free WiFi is provided.

Each room features floor to ceiling sliding doors, a balcony and a TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom has a bathtub and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available every morning if reserved the night before. It is served on the terrace or in the lounge.

The area is popular for water sports such as canoeing but also climbing, hiking or biking. A centre for hot air balloon flights is located 10 km away and lavender fields 3 km from the property.

Moustiers-Sainte-Marie and Les Gorges du Verdon are both located 15 km from Hôtel Les Deux Lions.​ Free private parking is available on site.

name: La Bastide du Calalou; BW Signature Collection
description:
Bastide Du Calalou is located a 30-minute drive from the Gorges du Verdon and a 20-minute drive from the Sainte-Croix Lake. It features a heated, outdoor swimming pool, a tennis court and elegant guestrooms that overlook the Aups Valley.

Rooms at Bastide Du Calalou are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have a DVD and video player.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily and Bastide’s restaurant serves regional cuisine, prepared with local produce. Guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in the restaurant or on the terrace.

Bastide Du Calalou is close to the village of Tourtour and the black truffle market, which is the third largest in France and open from December to April.

name: Hotel Les Cavalets
description:
Offering an outdoor pool and panoramic views of Sainte-Croix Lake, Les Cavalets is located in Bauduen. Free WiFi access is available in public areas.

Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace and offer lake views. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower.

At Les Cavalets you will find a garden and a bar. Guests can enjoy traditional Provençal meals from the hotel’s restaurant. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities and a shared lounge.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and canoeing. The property offers free parking.

The hotel is 2 km from Sainte Croix Lake. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 126 km away.

name: Le Relais Notre Dame
description:
Located at the entrance to Quinson village, next to the prehistoric museum, Le Relais Notre Dame is 300 metres from the Verdon River and a 20-minute drive from Sainte-Croix Lake. The property features an outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant with a terrace.

Combining a modern and Mediterranean décor, all rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi. The private bathrooms have either a bathtub or shower and offer complimentary toiletries upon arrival.

Breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or in guests’ rooms. The hotel’s restaurant offers a seasonal menu with fresh, local produce, accompanied by a range of wines from the bar.

During their stay guests are invited to relax on the sunloungers by the swimming pool, or enjoy the colourful gardens. Additional facilities at this hotel include free private parking available on site.

name: Le Mas de La Crémaillère
description:
Only 1 km from central Gréoux-les-Bains, this hotel is 300 metres from a spa centre offering massage, thermal and mud treatments. A swimming pool, a restaurant and a bar with garden terrace feature on site.

Decorated in pastel tones, the air-conditioned rooms at Le Mas de La Crémaillère have balconies. Some open onto a private garden with outside furniture. Additional facilities include a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and a fridge.

A breakfast is available daily at an additional cost. The hotel’s restaurant serves southern Provençal dishes made from seasonal, locally grown produce. A bar offering a wide range of drinks can be found on site.

Only 15 km both from Manosque and Lac d’Esparron, Le Mas de La Crémaillère provides free shuttle to the town centre. Free, private parking and Wi-Fi access via hotspot are available on site.

name: Hotel Le Moulin du Château
description:
Le Moulin Du Château is a former olive oil mill, located in Saint-Laurent-du-Verdon, Provence. It offers rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The hotel also has a lounge, terrace and a garden surrounded by the Verdon Nature Park. The original mill room is now used as a games room with pool table and library.

The hotel's restaurant serves organic seasonal cuisine.

Guests have free access to the nearby tennis court and there are canoeing and hiking facilities nearby.

Le Moulin Du Château is close to the Grand Canyon and the Lake of Ste-Croix. Aix-en-Provence is an hour’s drive away.

name: Lou Paradou
description:
The Lou Paradou hotel is located in Greoux-les-Bains, by the Verdon River, next to the lavender fields in the heart of the Provence. It is set within a large park and offers a heated, seasonal and heated outdoor pool.

The Lou Paradou offers air-conditioned studios equipped with a kitchenette, free Wi-Fi access in the rooms and a private balcony or terrace. Some studios have a view of the park and air conditioning.

A breakfast serving jams and fruit syrups both homemade is offered. The hotel is just 400 metres from Greoux village pedestrian centre and there is free on-site parking.

Guests can visit the Verdon Gorge, the largest canyon in Europe, the Luberon villages and Haute-Provence hilltop villages. Local leisure activities around Gréoux include hiking, mountain-bike, white-water sports, gliding and rock climbing.

Marseille Provence Airport is situated 80 km from the Hotel and Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station is 70 km away.

name: Auberge du Point Sublime
description:
Set in Rougon, 36 km from Château de Taulane Golf Course, Auberge du Point Sublime offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel has a restaurant and a bar. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room comes with a safety deposit box and some rooms also feature mountain views. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

Guests at Auberge du Point Sublime will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rougon, like hiking and cycling.

The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 105 km from the accommodation.

name: LE COMPTOIR
description:
Set in Sainte-Croix-de-Verdon, LE COMPTOIR has a terrace, restaurant, bar, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 45 km from Digne Golf Course.

At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe. At LE COMPTOIR the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an à la carte breakfast.

The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 118 km from LE COMPTOIR.

name: B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin
description:
Set in Besançon, 6.5 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a bar. Located around 7.7 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 10 km away from Micropolis. The property is non-smoking and is situated 6.6 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the hotel.

Besançon Vesoul University is 6.3 km from B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin, while Time museum of Besançon is 8.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 59 km from the accommodation.

name: Les Canyons du Verdon
description:
Located in Verdon Regional Park, Les Canyons du Verdon features an outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds, a garden and pétanque facilities. Castillon Lake is just 4.5 km away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Decorated in fresh colours, all rooms feature a private entrance, while some include a balcony, pool views or garden view and a TV. They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A breakfast buffet is offered at the hotel. Castellane village is conveniently located 250 metres away, allowing easy access to restaurants, bars and shops.

A conference room is available on request. It can accommodate up to 20 people.

Notre-Dame du Roc Chapel is only a 15-minute walk away and Saint-André-les-Alpes is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. Free Wi-Fi access is available in reception and free private parking is possible on site. Free storage for motorbikes is available on site.

name: Gabrielle hôtel
description:
Located in the heart of Verdon National Park, Gabrielle hôtel is situated in the village of Aiguines. It overlooks Sainte Croix Lake, where you can go canoeing or rent pedal boats.

All rooms have an en-suite bathroom with a hairdryer, TV and electric blinds.

A continental breakfast is served every morning.

Gabrielle hôtel is surrounded by many hiking trails and guests can enjoy cycling, windsurfing or visit the vineyards of Provence.

name: ibis Styles Besançon
description:
Conveniently located in a park, ibis Styles Besançon is a 15-minute walk from the TGV Train Station and the centre of Besançon. It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and contemporary in style. They include an LCD TV and free Wi-Fi access.

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning at this hotel. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or have dinner at the hotel's restaurant. A children's playground and meeting rooms are also available on site.

Providing free private parking, the property has a 24-hour reception. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from the Parc des Expositions Micropolis and just 3.7 km away from Citadel of Besançonet, which is one of the UNESCO World Heritage Sites.

name: Hôtel de Paris
description:
Located in the centre of Besançon, Hôtel de Paris offers contemporary décor, a 24-hour reception and terrace. The Besançon Citadelle is just a 15-minute walk away. Vesoul is 48 km from the property.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk, wardrobe and telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hôtel de Paris. A traditional restaurants can be found within walking distance.

The fine arts museum is just a 5-minute walk away and Besançon Franche-Comté TGV Train Station is 12 km from the hotel. Additional features include luggage storage, daily newspapers and free wired internet.

name: ibis Besançon Centre la City
description:
Located on the banks of the Doubs River within the business complex known as La City, this ibis hotel is a 10-minute walk from Besançon city centre and its museums and a 35-minute walk from Citadelle.

The ibis Besançon La City offers air-conditioned rooms, 4 of which are equipped for people with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. The Bistro Régent restaurant offers a bistro menu based on fresh produce.

With a 24-hour front desk, this hotel offers secure underground parking at an extra fee.

name: Hôtel AKENA BESANCON
description:
Situated in Besançon, 10 km from Micropolis, Hôtel AKENA BESANCON features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 16 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms at Hôtel AKENA BESANCON have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Besançon-Mouillère train station is 17 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 48 km from Hôtel AKENA BESANCON.

name: All Suites Besançon
description:
Situated in Besançon, 3.3 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, All Suites Besançon features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers room service and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is set 4.4 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also boast free WiFi. At All Suites Besançon rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV.

Micropolis is 5.7 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 61 km from All Suites Besançon.

name: Best Western Citadelle
description:
The Best Western Citadelle is located in the historic city center of Besançon, a 5-minute walk from the Doubs River and the Citadelle. Free Wi-Fi is available in the rooms.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a television with Canal+ channels. The private bathroom is equipped with solar-heated water. Additionally, the establishment offers rooms adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

The hotel serves breakfast every morning for an additional fee. You can enjoy it in your room or as a buffet in the dining room. Room service is also available.

The small parking area, which includes 10 spaces, is only accessible by reservation for a supplementary fee of 15 EUR per space. An electric charging station is available on request and subject to availability at a rate of €25.

Please note that our parking area is only suitable for standard-sized vehicles (a small courtyard in the city center).

The establishment is 5 km from the Micropolis convention center. Public parking is available on-site for an extra charge. Please contact the establishment directly if you wish to reserve a parking space.

If you are traveling with pets, please contact the establishment directly to inquire about the pet policies. It is essential to contact the establishment.

You will be accommodated in one of our 41 rooms situated across various buildings as follows:

• The Main Building with elevator access, where we have 21 rooms.
• The Annex, also in the main building, without elevator access.
• The Hotel Pavilion, where we have 9 rooms, without an elevator.
• The Workshop, with 2 spacious rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

If you have a preference, feel free to let us know during your reservation. While we cannot guarantee, we promise to always do our best to accommodate the various requests of our guests.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage
description:
Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage, formerly the Clarisses Monestary, is located in the historic district of Besançon, 500 metres from the citadel's ancient walls. It offers views of the tree-lined park, the medieval walls, the city and the Doubs Valley.

All of the rooms feature parquet flooring and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. They also have a flat-screen TV, telephone and a desk. Some rooms offer a view on the garden and on the city.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining area, on the terrace or can be brought to your guest room upon request. You can also relax on the west-facing terrace with a drink from the bar. Guest can access the spa upon reservation and for an additional fee.

Hôtel Restaurant Spa Le Sauvage is a 10-minute walk from the Musée du Temps and just 2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station. Shops and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. Private parking is available at a surcharge and free WiFi internet access is provided.

name: ibis Besançon Centre Ville
description:
Located in the old town of Besançon, ibis Besançon Centre Ville is 500 metres from Viotte Train Station and both the Vauban Citadel and the Museum of Fine Arts can be found within a 20-minute walk. It offers free Wi-Fi access, a 24-hour front desk and a 24-hour snack bar.

All the air-conditioned rooms at ibis Besançon Centre Ville feature wooden floors, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. The private bathroom includes a shower and heated towel rail.
