A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

This property is 18 km from the A36 motorway and private parking is available on site, at an extra cost and subject to availability.

name: Hotel Du Nord
description:
This hotel is set in the heart of Besançon, just 700 metres from the banks of the Doubs River. Guests have free Wi-Fi internet access and are invited to relax in the hotel's lounge bar.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided in each of the simply decorated guest rooms. The rooms are serviced by a lift and include en suite bathrooms.

Every morning a buffet-style breakfast, including fresh orange juice and regional specialities, can be enjoyed in Hotel du Nord's breakfast area.

The Church of Sainte-Madeleine is a 10-minute walk away and the Besançon-Viotte Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. The Besançon Museum of Fine Arts and Archeology is just 450 metres away.

A bike box is available on site, free of charge for bikes, charges may apply for motorbikes.

name: Hôtel Siatel Besançon Chateaufarine
description:
This hotel is located 7.5 km from the centre of Besançon in the Franche-Comté region and offers free Wi-Fi. Guests are invited to relax on the terrace or use the billiards table in the on-site bar. Air conditioning is provided in public areas.

Each soundproofed room includes a flat-screen TV and a telephone. All rooms at Hôtel Siatel Besançon Chateaufarine include work desks and en suite bathrooms with hairdryers. Some rooms have high-speed WiFi and air conditioning.

Free private parking is provided on site and Besançon-Viotte Train Station 7.7 km away. The hotel is 8.2 km from the Museum of Fine Arts and Archeology and 6.5 km from the A36 motorway.

name: Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa
description:
Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa offers accommodation 50 metres from Viotte train station and just 15 minutes' walking distance from the historic city centre of Besançon. Many rooms open onto an inner garden.

All the rooms come with ensuite facilities, satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access.

To get off to a good start you can enjoy your breakfast before heading out to experience the capital of the Franche-Comté region.

Several adjustable equipped meeting rooms are available onsite and can accommodate groups of up to 45 people.

Other onsite services available to guests aged 12 and above include a fitness room, a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, 2 hot tubs, a hammam, a sensorial shower and a relaxation room . Massages using Equatoria products.

Secure private parking is featured onsite.

name: Hotel Restaurant Vesontio
description:
Located 5 km from the centre of Besançon and the Musée des Beaux-Arts, Hotel restaurant Vesontio offers an air-conditioned restaurant and a meeting room. Free WiFi is available throughout. Besançon Tennis Club is 3.1 km away from the property.

Decorated in bright colours, rooms are equipped with satellite TV, a desk and a wardrobe. Each room has a private bathroom complete with hairdryer,

A buffet breakfast made with local produce is served every morning at this hotel, which you can also enjoy on the terrace. For lunch and dinner, homemade dishes are served.

Free private parking is possible on site and a garage is also available upon request. Easily accessible via the RN57 road and the A36 motorway, the hotel is 3 km from the Viotte Train Station and 10 minutes from the Besançon Franche-Comté Train Station.

name: ibis budget Besançon Centre Gare
description:
Located in Besançon, just 100 metres from Gare de la Viotte Train Station, ibis budget Besançon Centre Gare offers simple rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour access.

Each room is air-conditioned and includes a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily.

The palace Granvelle is 2 km from the hotel, and the UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Citadel Vaubon is 2.5 km away. Besançon town centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Mercure Besancon Parc Micaud - Hotel & Bar
description:
This Hotel Mercure is situated in the city centre of Besancon in the casino garden on the Doubs River and opposite the Micaud Park.

There are 91 air-conditioned guestrooms, 78 which are non-smoking, equipped with clean, private bathrooms and flat screen satellite TV.

The hotel restaurant, Le Vesontio, serves traditional cuisine and offers a splendid view of the casino gardens. L’Instant, the hotel bar, is open until 23:00.

There is a casino, a fitness centre and a karaoke bar within 3 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Régina
description:
Hotel Régina is situated conveniently in Besançon, and features a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is set 4.8 km from Micropolis, 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station and 500 metres from Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have garden views. The units feature a wardrobe.

The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel Régina.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Time museum of Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 60 km from Hotel Régina.

name: Premiere Classe Besancon Ecole Valentin
description:
Close to Alsace and Jura, this hotel is easily accessible from the A36 motorway. It is situated in the village of Ecole-Valentin, a 5 minute drive from Besançon. Free WiFi is provided.

The Premiere Classe Besancon Ecole Valentin offers air-conditioned guest rooms. Each is equipped with a TV with satellite, Canal + and beIN Sports channels. The private bathroom includes a shower and towels.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning in the stylish breakfast room. Free private parking for cars and buses is provided on site.

The Première Classe Besançon is located in the Franche-Comté region. In the surrounding area guests can visit Besançon’s miroctechnics pole.

name: B&B HOTEL Besançon Chateaufarine
description:
Featuring free WiFi, B&B HOTEL Besançon Chateaufarine offers pet-friendly accommodation 2 km from the centre of Besançon, 10 km from Besançon Citadelle. Free private parking is available on site.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Cable channels are also provided. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Micropolis is 2.3 km from B&B HOTEL Besançon Chateaufarine, while Besançon Hospital is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 53 km from the property.

name: Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge
description:
Set in Besançon, 3.2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3.6 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station.

All guest rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Besançon, like hiking.

Micropolis is 7.9 km from Brit Hotel Besancon l'Horloge, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from the hotel.

name: Contact Hôtel Foch
description:
Situated a few steps from the Besançon train station and just 5 minutes from the city centre, the Hotel Foch offers quality comfort at an affordable price.

This charming hotel provides a panoramic view of downtown from its well-equipped guestrooms. Rooms feature shower or bath, TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

The Hotel Foch also provides 24-hour reception, a car park just 20 metres from the hotel, a bar area and a buffet breakfast.

Besançon is located close to the Swiss border and is the capital of the Doubs department in the region of Franche-Comté.

name: Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville
description:
Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville is set in Besançon, 6.6 km from Micropolis and 13 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Besancon Viotte Train Station and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Hôtel Fontaine Argent - Centre Ville.

name: Hotel Vauban
description:
Located in Besançon, Hotel Vauban a 2-minute walk from the Museum of Fine Arts and an 18-minute walk from the Citadel of Besançon. It offers free internet access, a 24-hour front desk and a terrace.

Serviced by a lift, all the soundproofed rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a telephone. The bathroom is complete with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower.

Both a continental and a buffet breakfast are served every morning at Hotel Vauban. The property has 2 restaurants: an Italian and traditional meals are served.

Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. The hotel is a 5-minute drive from Besançon Train Station and a 15-minute walk from the Madeleine Church.

name: Doubs Hotel - Besançon Ecole Valentin
description:
Doubs Hotel - Besançon Ecole Valentin is a 3-star hotel with a terrace located in Besançon. The hotel features a shared lounge and free WiFi. Ecole-Valentin train station is 400 metres from the property.

The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The rooms include a private bathroom and a bath. All rooms have a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Besançon Viotte train station is 4.3 km away and Franche-Comté TGV train station is 8.7 km away. Micropolis is 8 km from Doubs Hotel - Besançon Ecole Valentin. The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 61 km from the hotel.

name: Campanile Besançon-Ouest Châteaufarine
description:
Part of the Campanile group, this hotel is situated 7 km west of the centre of Besancon. It offers a bar and a terrace. The hotel offers secure on-site parking, free high-speed WiFi access and a 24-hour reception.

The rooms feature satellite TV, free newspapers and a private bathroom. There is also a welcome tray in each room.

You will be able to dine in the on-site restaurant, which is open every day. A breakfast buffet including fresh fruit and pastries is served each morning and regional cuisine with a starter and dessert buffet is available for lunch and dinner.

Vesoul is 52 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 53 km from the property.

name: ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin
description:
The ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin is located just off the A36 motorway and 6 km from the centre of Besançon. It is 1 km from École-Valentin Train Station. The hotel offers free WiFi access throughout the property, free parking and newspapers in its lobby.

The rooms at ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin are decorated in a contemporary style and feature a flat-screen TV. Each one also has an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning in the breakfast room. After breakfast you may choose to drive along the A36 motorway to Dijon or Montbéliard, both less than 50 minutes away.

Several restaurants and supermarkets can be found nearby and a wellness sports club is less than a 10-minutes' walk away from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Paradis
description:
Hôtel Paradis is set in a building built in 1920 and has a luxuriant garden and offers a panoramic view over the sea and the old village of Bormes.

Several rooms have a balcony with a view over the sea, others overlook the village. They also have free Wi-Fi internet access and TV.

Also, a continental breakfast is served daily and can be served buffet-style according to the number of guests. Parking is available for bikes, motorcycles and cars.

Bormes les Mimosas is located between St. Tropez and Hyeres and has stunning views over the Island Port Cros and Porquerolles.

name: Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP
description:
Set in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 500 metres from Faviere, Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can make use of a bar.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and snorkelling.

Popular points of interest near Hôtel de la Plage - HDLP include Pointe de Gouron Beach, Plage de l'Anglade and La Favière. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel La Voile
description:
Hotel La Voile is ideally situated just 400 metres from the beaches and Bormes harbour in a quiet, peaceful environment near the village of La Favière. There is an outdoor heated pool and a lounge bar.

Some of the guestrooms offer a view of the sea or garden. Choose from single or double rooms, some of which can accommodate up to 4 people.

A buffet breakfast is available in the dining area every morning for an extra charge. The hotel can also recommend a range of restaurants in the local area.

Hotel La Voile is located near the charming medieval village of Bormes Les Mimosas and less than 100 metres from the local shops and restaurants. The surrounding area offers a variety of nautical and outdoor activities. Private parking is available upon request with a supplement.

name: Le Mirage
description:
The Mirage hotel is nestled in the heart of a restful place, a perfect balance between sea and nature, to offer you an unforgettable experience throughout your stay.
For a night or a stay, whether you are with family or friends, take full advantage of our hotel, a cosy nest nestled in Bormes-les-Mimosas, to relax and enjoy an ideal wellness experience.

Spend your days strolling through the village, discovering its history, or heading to the beach to bask in the sun. You can also choose to stay by our outdoor swimming pool, to make room for serenity, to enjoy our cocktails on our terrace with its unbeatable view.

After a delicious healthy meal in our restaurant, enjoy your evening and relax in the calm of your room with its panoramic view of the sea and the village of Bormes-les-Mimosas.

name: Hostellerie du Cigalou - Teritoria
description:
Set in the medieval village of Bornes-les-Mimosas, this 3-star hotel is just a 25-minute drive from Toulon. It offers an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by mimosas and individually decorated guest rooms.

The rooms and suites at Hostellerie du Cigalou also include an LCD TV and an en suite bathroom. Each one is air-conditioned and a minibar can be added to the accommodation upon request.

The buffet breakfast can be served in the dining room or on the communal terrace. The hotel also has an on-site bar and restaurant, which offer Provencal specialities and cocktails.

Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and free public parking is possible near the hotel. Other local attractions include the towns of Hyères and Saint-Tropez, both less than 30 km away.

name: Eden Rose Grand Hotel BW Premier Collection
description:
Set in Bormes-les-Mimosas, 29 km from Chateau de Grimaud, Eden Rose Grand Hotel BW Premier Collection offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

The units will provide guests with a minibar.

With staff speaking German, English, Spanish and French, information is available at the reception.

Le Pont des Fées is 29 km from the hotel, while Toulon Train Station is 40 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 22 km from Eden Rose Grand Hotel BW Premier Collection.

name: Hôtel Les Palmiers
description:
Located in the heart of a well-preserved nature area, in an old fishing village facing the island of Porquerolles, the Hotel Les Palmiers is just 300 metres from the sea. The property features an outdoor pool and free WiFi.

It features comfortable guest rooms fitted with a private bathroom and satellite TV. Some rooms have a terrace with views of the swimming pool and others look onto the garden.

You will find at the Hotel Les Palmiers all the charm of the Provence area with the cicadas and the scent of pine trees, while discovering white sand beaches, wild rocky beaches and unique sunsets.

Lavandou's Port is 8 km away, where ferry diversions can be taken to the Ile de Porquerolles, and Hyères-Toulon Airport is 20 km away.

name: Hotel Restaurant Bellevue
description:
Located in downtown Bormes-les-Mimosas, Hotel Restaurant Bellevue features a restaurant serving fresh and local products, a bar and a sitting area in front of the property. Rooms for disabled guests are available.

All rooms are non-smoking, air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free Wi-Fi access. The private bathroom is complete with shower, toilet and hairdryer.

A breakfast buffet, including traditional pastries, fruits, eggs and juices, is served every morning at an additional cost. Guests can also enjoy the on-site restaurant and bar.

Hotel Restaurant Bellevue is 200 metres from Dom Forest, 4 km from the beach and 35 km from Saint-Tropez. Toulon Airport and Hyères Train Station are 22 km away.

name: Hôtel Les Mimosas
description:
Hôtel Les Mimosas is surrounded by green fields and just 5 km from the village of Bormes-les-Mimosas. The hotel offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool.

The guest rooms have reverse-cycle air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. All rooms are en suite with a bathtub or shower and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available daily and children can enjoy it at a reduced rate. A small breakfast can also be served in the comfort of your room at a reduced rate.
Cycling and hiking trails run past the hotel.

The seaside town of Le Lavandou is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. One parking space is available per room, studio or apartment.

name: Hotel Les Jardins de Bormes
description:
Located 4 km from Bormes-les-Mimosas and 3 km from L’Estagnol Beaches, this design-style hotel with a terrace offers an outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub. Guests are invited to the poolside beds and the sun loungers. Free onsite private parking is available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Les Jardins de Bormes have a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast with homemade jams is provided every morning.

The property is located 35 km from the city of Saint-Tropez and 16 km from Hyères. There is a free, private car park on site.

- Infrared sauna upon reservation
- Massages by reservation

name: Hôtel La Petite Bohème
description:
Just 200 metres from the beach, La Petite Bohème is situated on the Mediterranean coast, in the village of Le Lavandou. It offers air-conditioned rooms, some with sea views.

The bright guest rooms at the La Petite Bohème are equipped with free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. Each has a private bathroom with bath or shower.

The breakfast is served all year round at the property.

La Petite Bohème is set in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region, between Saint-Tropez and Toulon. Toulon-Hyères Airport is 18.6 km away.

name: Village Club L'Oustal Del Mar
description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and green spaces, Village Vacances Oustal Del Mar is located in Le Lavandou. It has a bar and buffet restaurant. The beach of Saint-Clair is 1.9 km away. Private parking is available on site for EUR 8 per night per car.

Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower. The towels are also provided.

The Oustal Del Mar also has a children's club for a fee.

The nearest airport, Toulon-Hyères, is 18 km away.

name: Hotel L'Orangeraie
description:
Hotel L'Orangeraie is located just 200 metres from the beaches of Saint-Clair. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden and free public parking. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

Rooms at Hotel L'Orangeraie are equipped with a telephone, TV and private bathroom. Some rooms also have a private balcony, some with views of the Mediterranean Sea.

L'Orangeraie serves a continental breakfast that guests can have in the breakfast room or in the comfort of their room.

Hotel L'Orangeraie is a 40-minute drive from Toulon and a 45-minute drive from Saint-Tropez.

name: Anglade Hotel
description:
The Hotel Anglade is located in the heart of the village of Le Lavandou, on the Mediterranean coast in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, just 50 meters from the beach.

The Hôtel Anglade has 24 air-conditioned rooms: 16 sea-facing rooms with partial sea views and balconies equipped with table and chairs, and 8 village-facing rooms.
Each room is equipped with en-suite bathroom and toilet, flat-screen TV with connectivity, minibar, safety deposit box, double-glazed windows and WiFi.
A full sweet and savory buffet breakfast is served in the dining room or on the hotel's outdoor terrace.
Private parking spaces can be reserved nearby.

Located in the center of the village, the hotel is close to shops, restaurants, a pharmacy and the port (200 m), from which boats depart for the Golden Isles (Porquerolles, Port Cros and Le Levant).

A mini-train from the port serves all the beaches of Le Lavandou. A protected bike path leads from the hotel to Hyères or Le Rayol-Canadel.

Toulon-Hyères airport is a 25-minute drive away, and Saint-Tropez 40 minutes. The bus station, 200 meters from the hotel, serves Toulon train station and all coastal towns as far as Saint-Tropez.

name: Hôtel Baptistin
description:
Hotel Baptistin is set facing the Golden Islands, in the Provençal fishing town of Le Lavandou. The guest rooms offer a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The modern guest rooms include free Wi-Fi internet access, a private bathroom and air conditioning. Some of the rooms have a sea view and a private terrace with garden furniture.

Hotel Baptistin serves a daily continental breakfast, which can also be enjoyed on the terrace overlooking the sea. There is also a bar where guests can enjoy a pre-dinner drink.

The Baptistin is within easy access of 12 fine sandy beaches, bars and restaurants and the ferry port for Port Cros and Porquerolles. Private parking is available nearby.

name: Hôtel Beau Rivage
description:
Hôtel Beau Rivage is set in the centre of Le Lavandou, just 15 metres from the beach and the Mediterranean Sea. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi internet access, a garden and a terrace with sunbeds. Outdoor showers are available for use after being on the beach.

The air-conditioned guest rooms at Hôtel Beau Rivage include a TV and a private bathroom with a shower or bath. Some rooms have a private terrace or a balcony with a view of the sea or the garden.

Breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the guest room or in the breakfast room, which offers views of the sea. Drinks are served in the on-site bar. Guests can also have picnics in the garden and borrow cutlery from reception.

Nearby activities include jet skiing, sailing and kayaking, and restaurants are found in the surrounding area. The property is 23 km from Toulon-Hyeres Airport and 40 km from Saint-Tropez.

name: Les Alcyons
description:
Located beside the sandy beach of Layet, this hotel is 4 km from Le Lavandou City Centre. It offers stylish guest rooms with a furnished terrace, some overlooking the sea. There is a swimming pool on a roof top, the property has a lift.

The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Les Alcyons features a restaurant called Beau Soleil, which serves local specialities. There is also a lounge bar where guests can use the free Wi-Fi access. A continental breakfast is served every morning, and can be delivered to the guest room.

With free private parking on site, the Alcyons hotel is located 30 km from Hyères Airport.

Guests can also enjoy free Wi-Fi in the lounge bar.

name: Le Rabelais
description:
Situated in the heart of Le Lavandou, opposite the port and just 250 metres from the beach, Le Rabelais is a 3-star hotel offering cosy accommodation and views of the port and of the Golden Islands.

The rooms are elegant, decorated in ochre or sky blue colours. All rooms are en suite and some offer spectacular views of the sea.

In the summertime, you can enjoy breakfast on the lovely terrace whilst admiring the sea.

You might be interested to explore the Domaniale Des Maures Forest, situated close by, or catch a ferry from the port (200 metres away) to go to the Porquerolles Islands, Port Cros or Le Levant.

St Tropez is 40 km away, and Hyères-Toulon Airport is 25 km away.

name: Villa TerraMera Hôtel
description:
Located in the city centre, 200 metres from the sandy beach, Villa TerraMera Hôtel offers a patio and rooms with LCD TV. Free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout the hotel.

The rooms at Villa TerraMera Hôtel have a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some have a spa bath. Air conditioning is available in all rooms, free of charge.

Restaurants and bars can be found within a walking distance.

The hotel is situated 100 metres from the nearest bus station, 20 km from the city of Hyères and 40 km from Toulon Train Station. Free public parking is available nearby.

name: Hôtel California
description:
Situated in the village of Le Lavandou, Hôtel California offers air-conditioned accommodation, 400 metres from the beach. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace with sea views, and some rooms overlook the hills. Free on-site private parking is provided without reservation.

All of the rooms are decorated in a retro style, include free WiFi access, and have a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Guests of the Hôtel California can enjoy a continental breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace.

The hotel is just 100 metres from a pedestrian street with lots of restaurants and bars. It is also a 5-minute walk from the ferry terminal. Guests can enjoy water skiing and diving at the Lavandou Beach.

name: Roc Hotel - Hôtel 4 étoiles les pieds dans l'eau
description:
Offering a private beach area, with direct access onto the rocks and the beach, Roc Hotel - Hôtel 4 étoiles les pieds dans l'eau is located in Le Lavandou. Free WiFi access is available.

Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning, a refrigerator and a terrace. Private bathrooms come with a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

At Roc Hotel - Hôtel 4 étoiles les pieds dans l'eau you will find a bar and a sun terrace.

The hotel is 1.4 km from La Fossette and 1.8 km from Aiguebelle. Côte d'Azur Airport is 88 km away and Saint Tropez is 30 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel L'Escapade
description:
Set in the heart of Le Lavandou, Hotel L'Escapade is a 3-minute walk from the beach and the port. Boat excursions for the Îles d’Hyères depart just 300 metres away.

L’Escapade features air-conditioned and soundproofed guest rooms which were renovated in 2019. All rooms have satellite TVs and WiFi access.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning and is served on the terrace with a view of the hills. Guests can relax and enjoy a drink in the flowered garden.

Many shops and restaurants can be found nearby in the pedestrianised town centre.

The hotel is 23 km from Toulon-Hyères Airport. Saint-Tropez is a 40-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Astria
description:
Hôtel Astria is situated in Le Lavandou, 40 metres from Saint-Clair Beach. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free private parking is available on site.

All rooms have a flat-screen TV. Every room has a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Hôtel Astria features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a shared lounge at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire.

Hôtel Astria is 500 metres from the harbour and city centre, while Aiguebelle is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 20 km from Hôtel Astria.

name: Hotel Le Grand Pavois
description:
Located 20 metres from a private beach in Le Lavandou, Hotel Le Grand Pavois offers a terrace, garden and air-conditioning throughout. Saint-Tropez is a 40-minute drive away. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

All rooms feature a minibar, a flat-screen TV and safety deposit box. The en suite bathroom include free toiletries and a hairdryer is available at reception. Some rooms also offer a terrace and sea views.

Guests can have breakfast in their room at no extra cost and French restaurants can be found in the village, a 5-minute drive away. The hotel also boasts a bar on site.

Hiking and cycling trails are available outside the hotel and Toulon is 44 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot
description:
Situated in Lyon, 200 metres from Musée de la Resistance, MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot features accommodation with a bar, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Fourvière is 3.1 km away.

All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom.

The hotel offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and a ticket service for guests.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 2.9 km from MEININGER Hotel Lyon Centre Berthelot, while Musée des Confluences is 2.4km from the property. Perrache Train Station is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Boscolo Lyon Hotel & Spa
description:
Boscolo Lyon Hotel & Spa is a hotel set in a historic building on the Presqu'île of Lyon, on the banks of the Rhône river, 850 metres from Lyon National Opera House. The hotel has a bar and a 24-hour reception.

At the hotel, all rooms measure at least 30 metres² and feature luxurious decorations. Rooms come complete with a private bathroom equipped with a walk-in shower, bidet and free toiletries, while certain units at Boscolo Lyon Hotel & Spa also offer a seating area. Certain rooms offer a river view.

The daily breakfast offers continental and buffet options. Guests can enjoy a meal at the in-house restaurant, which serves Italian cuisine.

Boscolo Lyon Hotel & Spa offers spa and fitness center.

Place Bellecour is 500 metres away and the Old Town of Lyon is less than 1 km away. The nearest airport, Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, is 30 km from the hotel and is accessible from the property via the A metro line and then the Rhonexpress.

name: Ibis Budget Lyon Centre - Gare Part Dieu
description: Set in the 3rd district in central Lyon, this non-smoking hotel offers soundproofed guest rooms with a flat-screen TV. Part-Dieu Train Station is a 2-minute walk from the hotel. Stade des Lumieres Stadium is 13 km away.

name: Hotel Les Flots Bleus
description:
Situated on the seafront beside Saint Clair sandy beach, this hotel is 1.5 km from Lavandou harbour and the town centre. It offers a restaurant and terrace with a sea view.

The air-conditioned guest rooms have a typical provençal décor and feature a private bathroom. Each room is equipped with a TV, minibar and free Wi-Fi access.

Les Flots Bleus hotel features a bar and restaurant on site. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room.

The hotel features a hair salon, available upon reservation. A washing machine and microwave are available at the reception for guests’ use.

With free private parking on site, Les Flots Bleus is 25 km from Toulon Airport.

name: B&B HOTEL Lyon Centre Part-dieu Gambetta
description:
Located in Lyon, a 2-minute walk from Garibaldi metro station, B&B Hôtel LYON Centre Gambetta is a pet-friendly hotel featuring free WiFi. Private parking is available onsite upon reservation, for an extra charge.

The air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast including both sweet and savoury options is served everyday. Guests have access to a vending machine and a communal microwave.

Bellecour square is 2 km away, while Part Dieu train station is 1.4 km from the property. Tête d'Or park is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Lyon
description:
Located 300 metres from Part-Dieu Train Station, the hotel features an on-site bar & restaurant with panoramic views of Lyon from the 32nd floor of the iconic Part Dieu Tower. It offers a fitness centre and free WiFi is available throughout the property. Private parking is available on site for an extra charge.

All rooms are air conditioned and provide panoramic views of Lyon. Equipped with a flat-screen TV, they feature a seating area, a private bathroom and a laptop safe.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Celest Bar & Restaurant. Guests can have lunch or dinner onsite and enjoy the restaurant international and creative cuisine. Guests can also access the restaurant's food shop throughout the day.

Part-Dieu shopping centre is 100 metres away and metro station is 200 metres away. A6, A7, A42 and A43 motorways are all within a 20-minute drive from the hotel. The nearest airport is Lyon – Saint Exupery Airport, 27 km form Radisson Blu Hotel Lyon.

Private parking is available on site for an extra charge and under availability.

name: B&B HOTEL LYON Centre Perrache Berthelot
description:
Opened in December 2017, B&B HOTEL LYON Centre Perrache Berthelot is situated a 9-minute walk from the nearest public transport station and offers accommodation with free WiFi. Trams, buses and metros make it easy for guests to access Lyon city centre and the Part Dieu station and district. Private covered parking is available onsite for an extra charge.

At the hotel, all the air-conditioned rooms include a desk, a wardrobe, a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Speaking English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Confluence Museum is a 5-stop tram ride away, while Place Bellecour is within a 20-minute walk. Halle Tony Garnier conference and concert hall is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 30 km from the property.

name: Centre Jean Bosco
description:
Centre Jean Bosco is located in Lyon. This hotel is part of Jean Bosco Catholic Institute. Free WiFi access is available. It is a 10-minute walk from Vieux Lyon Metro Station.

Each room has a wardrobe, desk and heating. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries.

At Centre Jean Bosco you will find a garden. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a shared lounge and luggage storage.

The hotel is 2.4 km from Lyon Perrache Train Station and 1.6 km from the Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 30 km away.

name: Pullman Lyon
description:
Situated in Lyon and with Part-Dieu Train Station reachable within 200 metres, Pullman Lyon features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar.

At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room comes with a safety deposit box, while some rooms include a balcony. The rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available each morning at the property.

The Museum of Fine Arts of Lyon is 3.8 km from Pullman Lyon, while Musée Miniature et Cinéma is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport, 32 km from the accommodation.

name: Première Classe Lyon Centre Gare Part Dieu
description:
Première Classe Lyon Centre Gare Part Dieu offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, 500 metres from the Lyon Part-Dieu Train, metro and bus station.

Rooms at this Premiere Classe hotel include a TV, work desk and en suite facilities with a shower, washbasin and toilet. All rooms are accessible by lift and can accommodate a children's cot.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning.

Première Classe Lyon Centre Gare Part Dieu is an 8-minute walk to Part Dieu shopping mall. It is a 10-minute metro or bus ride from Vieux Lyon and 26 km from Lyon Saint-Exupéry Airport.

name: Hôtel du Helder
description:
Set in central Lyon, Hôtel du Helder offers 2-star accommodation, a 15-minute walk away from Place Bellecour. It has a 24-hour reception and provide free WiFi. Parking is available onsite at an extra charge, upon reservation.

All of the rooms include a telephone, a TV and have a simple décor. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Breakfast is served every morning and newspapers are provided. Breakfast items include pancakes with maple syrup, pastries, Nutella, jams, cereals, cold meat and cheese.

Guillotière Metro and Tram Station and the Rhone banks are less than a 5-minute walk away from the hotel. The nearest airport is Lyon Airport, 26 km away.

name: ibis Lyon Part Dieu Les Halles
description:
Located in Lyon’s 3rd arrondissement, ibis Lyon Part Dieu Les Halles is accross the street from the Halles de Lyon - Paul Bocuse indoor food market.

With free WiFi, all guest rooms are non-smoking and feature a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom with free toiletries, hairdryer and shower. Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. The hotel offers a restaurant serving traditional cuisine and a bar, where guests can relax with a drink.

ibis Lyon Part Dieu Les Halles is within a 5-minute walk to metro and tram stations providing easy access to Lyon's tourist sites including Fourvière Basilica, Old Lyon and the St. Jean Quarter. Lyon Part-Dieu Train Station is just a 10-minute walk away. Lyon Saint-Exupéry Airport is a 30-minute travel away by public transport. The hotel provides parking for bikes at an extra cost.

name: B&B HOTEL Lyon Centre Monplaisir
description:
Featuring free WiFi, B&B HOTEL Lyon Centre Monplaisir is a pet-friendly hotel located in Lyon. Monplaisir - Lumière Metro Station is a 4-minute walk away and offers direct access to Place Bellecour in 12 minutes. Private parking is available on site for an extra charge.

All rooms are air conditioned and include a desk and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. There is a private bathroom equipped with a shower.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast which includes fresh bread, egg and bacon. Guests have ccess to a communal microwave and vending machines selling snacks and drinks are available on site.

Part-Dieu Train Station is 2.6 km from B&B HOTEL Lyon Centre Monplaisir, while Halle Tony Garnier is 4.4 km away. Eurexpo is a 20-minute drive away. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 25 km from the property.

name: ibis budget Lyon Centre Confluence
description:
ibis budget Lyon Confluence is located in Lyon, a 2-minute walk from Sainte-Blandine Tram Stop, a 20-minute walk from Centre Presqu'île, and 700 metres from Lyon Perrache Train Station. Lyon’s Old Town is 1 km from the hotel. Free WiFi access is available.

Each non-smoking soundproofed room features a flat-screen TV, a desk and air conditioning. The private bathroom has a shower and free toiletries.

Breakfast is available at the hotel, and further snacks and drinks can be purchased from the vending machines.

Facilities available at the hotel include a 24-hour front desk, and pets are accepted upon request.

The hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Confluences Museum and a 10-minute walk from Perrache Train Station. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport can be found 30.5 km from ibis budget Lyon Confluence. The A6/7 Motorway is just 50 metres from the property. Private parking is available on site for a surcharge.

name: Campanile Lyon Centre Part-Dieu
description:
Renovation in progress.
Please, take note of the potential presence of noise during your visit to our establishment.

Located opposite Lyon’s Part-Dieu Train Station, Campanile Lyon Centre Part-Dieu offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. A buffet restaurant and bar are available for meals and drinks.

Guest rooms at the Campanile Lyon Centre Part-Dieu are modern and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. They each offer a courtesy tray with tea and coffee making facilities and biscuits.

Campanile Lyon Centre serves a continental breakfast. The restaurant offers traditional French and regional cuisine for lunch and dinner.

Reception is open 24 hours a day. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in Centre Part-Dieu’s reading room with free newspapers.

Lyon Centre Part-Dieu is conveniently located just 800 metres from the Gare Part-Dieu-Vivier Merle Metro Station. Old Lyon is 3.5 km away. Rhône-Express airport shuttle stops close to the hotel.

name: ibis Lyon Centre Perrache
description:
Located on Lyon Presqu'ile, in the city centre, ibis Lyon Centre Perrache is a hotel set in an art-deco style building. It is located a 5-minute walk from Place Bellecour and boasts an onsite bar. Free WiFi access is provided.

The rooms at ibis Lyon Centre Perrache are air-conditioned and include an LCD TV with satellite channels.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

The bar is available 24 hours a day and offers take-away meals to be eaten in the comfort of your room.

The 24-hour reception hotel includes other facilities such as a safety deposit box. Perrache train station, bus and tram stops are located a 2-minute walk away. Public parking is available 300 metres away.

name: Hôtel Lyon Métropole
description:
Located on the banks of the Saone River, Hôtel Lyon Métropole offers accommodation with 24-hour reception and free WiFi. On-site free parking is also available.

All rooms offer air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV and an en-suite bathroom with a separate toilet. Some units have a seating and dining area, kitchenette, refrigerator, stovetop and a microwave.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel, as well as a bar.

The wellness centre includes a swimming pool, spa, sauna, hot tub and a fitness centre. Guests can also rent bikes nearby.

Lyon City Centre is 3 km from the hotel. Cuire Metro Station is a 20-minute walk away.

name: ibis budget Lyon Gerland
description:
Offering free in-room Wi-Fi and a buffet breakfast, ibis budget Lyon Gerland is a 10-minute walk from Stade de Gerland metro station and just 3.2 km from the A7 Motorway, which offers easy access to Chambéry, Grenoble, and the south of France. The hotel has access to a free closed car park, with places subject to availability.

Simple and colourful, rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a small desk. Each includes a heater and has wood flooring. Rooms are not air-conditioned.

The Lyon Gerland ibis budget is a completely non-smoking hotel. Vending machines selling food and drinks are available on site, and the front desk is open 24 hours.

The Stade de Gerland is 1 km from the hotel, while the city centre of Lyon is 5 km away. Golf de Salvagny is 18 km away.

name: Greet Hotel Lyon Confluence
description:
Featuring a terrace, a restaurant and a bar, Greet Hotel Lyon Confluence offers accommodation with free WiFi on Lyon Presqu’île district, an 18-minute walk from Place Bellecour. It has a 24-hour reception, a paid public parking and library.

All rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A welcome tray is provided. The private bathroom has a shower and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily at the property. The buffet is composed of homemade (cakes, jam and compote) and local products (bread, brioche, honey and spread).

The Basilica of Notre Dame de Fourvière and Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts are both available within an 11-minute drive. The hotel is 24 minutes from Eurexpo by car. Lyon-Perrache Train Station is 230 metres from the property, while Lyon-Saint Exupéry Airport is 31 km away.

name: Ibis Styles Lyon Centre - Gare Part Dieu
description:
Set in the 3rd district in central Lyon, this non-smoking hotel offers soundproofed guest rooms with a flat-screen TV. Part-Dieu Train Station is a 2-minute walk from the hotel. Stade des Lumieres Stadium is 13 km away.

Free Wi-Fi access is standard in each air-conditioned room and suite. Each has a modern décor and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

Enjoy a continental breakfast every morning.

A computer with free internet access and a printer is provided at the 24-hour reception. There is also a children's play area.

Tête d'Or Park is 3 km from the hotel and Place Bellecour in the old town is 2.7 km away. Public parking is available on site.

name: Mercure Lyon Centre Beaux-Arts
description:
Located in central Lyon, in a 19th century building, this Mercure hotel is a 8-minute walk from Lyon old town and a 5-minute walk from Bellecour Square. The hotel offers air-conditioned, art deco style rooms with free WiFi.

Guest rooms at the Mercure Lyon Beaux-Arts are equipped with a satellite flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each room has an en suite bathroom with a bathtub or walk-in shower, and all rooms are serviced by a lift.

Breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room or in guests’ rooms upon request. There is also an express breakfast consisting of a hot drink, fresh juice, bread, a pastry and jam available at the bar.

The reception desk at the Mercure Lyon Beaux-Arts is staffed 24 hours a day. Additional facilities available at the hotel include free newspapers, luggage storage and meeting rooms. Many shops and restaurants are located nearby.

Bellecour Metro Station is located 300 metres from the hotel. Public parking is available 200 metres away for an extra charge.

name: Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture
description:
Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture is located in central Lyon, a 5-minute walk from the Lyon Perrache TGV and Metro stations. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access.

Each room at the Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture is equipped with satellite TV and en suite facilities. Some rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast buffet is available daily and the Hôtel Charlemagne by Happyculture’s restaurant, La Bibliothèque, serves regional cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Le Mélèze bar, which features an outdoor floral terrace.

Place Bellecour is a 20-minute walk from the hotel, and the Notre Dame de Fourvière Basilica is 2 km away. The Suchet tram stop is just 120 metres from the hotel.

name: Hôtel des Facultés
description:
Hotel des Facultés is located in central Lyon, 400 metres from the Jean Macé Metro Station and a 15-minute walk from Place Bellecour. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

Guest rooms are equipped with heating and a TV, and some rooms have a private bathroom.

Facultés hotel is 1.5km from the Lyon-Perrache TGV Train Station. The Rue de l’Université tram stop is just 300 metres from the hotel and Lyon Saint-Exupery Airport is 20km away.

name: Hotel des Savoies Lyon Perrache
description:
Situated in Lyon’s Presqu’île district, a 7-minute walk from Lyon-Perrache Train Station, Hotel des Savoies Lyon Perrache provides accommodation with free WiFi throughout.

All rooms have air conditioning, an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom. Hairdryers are available upon request.

Breakfast is available daily at a supplement as a takeaway or in the guest's room. It includes hot drinks, juice, pastries, bread, cheese and cold meats. Reception is open 24 hours a day.

Lyon’s Museum of Fine Arts is a 13-minute drive from the property, while Vieux Lyon is a 17-minute walk away. Lyon-Saint Exupéry Airport is 31 km from Hotel des Savoies Lyon Perrache.

name: Mercure Lyon Centre Saxe Lafayette
description:
Located in central Lyon, Mercure Lyon Centre Saxe Lafayette is 15 minutes' walk from Part-Dieu TGV Train Station. It offers free high-speed WiFi access and a fitness room with an indoor swimming pool.

The air-conditioned guest rooms at Mercure Lyon Saxe Lafayette feature feature a fridge and satellite TV including beIN sport and Canal+ channels. They are decorated in a contemporary style.

A full breakfast is served daily in Le Garage restaurant, which also serves a range of regional dishes made with local and fresh produce, for lunch and dinner. The bar serves aperitifs and cocktails, where guests can relax in one of the armchairs. The restaurant and the bar are both open seven days a week. Room service is also available at the property.

Mercure Lyon Centre Saxe Lafayette hotel is a 15-minute ride on public transport from Place Bellecour. The hotel is accessible from the A6-A7 highways (10 minutes away) and paid private parking with car service is available on site.

name: Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club
description:
Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club is located on Lyon’s Presqu’île, a 6-minute walk from Perrache train and metro station. It has an on-site restaurant, as well as a shaded terrace and garden. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All the guest rooms at the Hôtel Chromatics & Restaurant Hill Club Perrache are air conditioned and have a private bathroom, and flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A Buffet Breakfast is available daily. Guests can relax with a drink during the evenings in the hotel bar or on the terrace.

Set in the heart of the city, the hotel is 800 metres from Place Carnot and the E15/A6 motorway. The old town and Saint Jean Cathedral are 2.5 km away. The tramway stop Suchet is 200 metres from the property. The property offers a preferential rate at the public parking, available a 4-minute walk away.

name: Logis Hotel Restaurant la Ferme
description:
The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and 22 air-conditioned and fully equipped rooms on Barthelasse Island. Based 4 km from the centre of Avignon, it is located a 15-minute drive from Avignon Wall and the Palais des Papes.

A TV and free WiFi access are provided in the guest rooms, which are decorated in a Provencal style. The en suite bathrooms include free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The restaurant opens onto a shaded terrace planted with 100 year-old trees and an impressive wisteria.

Free secure parking is available on site and you can rent bikes from the hotel. Villeneuve-lès-Avignon is 5 km away and Pont du Gard is 30 km from the hotel. Avignon Train Station is ideally located a 10-minute drive away and the exhibition centre is 16 km away.

name: Avignon Grand Hotel
description:
Avignon Grand Hotel is ideally located just outside the city’s Middle Age walls, just 70 metres from Avignon Central Station. It is a 15-minute walk from Palais des Papes and offers a small rooftop pool. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The non-smoking rooms and suites come with a seating area, a safe, a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathroom facilities include a bath, a shower and free toiletries. Some suites feature a balcony or a terrace and offer views of the property building, the Mediterranean garden or the fortified city of Avignon.

Breakfast is available on a morning, which can be enjoyed on the private garden patio, weather permitting, or in the breakfast room which features large windows. It can also be served in the guest room for an additional charge. In the evening, In the evening, guests can dine in Le Saint Louis restaurant, which is 300 metres away.

Additional facilities at Avignon Grand Hotel include a 24-hour front desk and a bar.

Pont d'Avignon is 1.4 km away. A public underground car park is available for an additional charge and can be accessed directly from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Le Bristol
description:
Ideally located inside the ramparts in the centre of Avignon, Hôtel Le Bristol offers air-conditioned rooms, a bar, free WiFi and a shared lounge. There is also a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service.

Just a 15-minute walk to the Palais des Papes, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at Hôtel Le Bristol can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 9 km from Hôtel Le Bristol.

name: Régina Boutique Hotel
description:
Régina is a hotel located on the main street in Avignon and just a 5-minute walk from the Palais des Papes.

The rooms are decorated in warm tones and also come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels including Canal+, and a telephone. Free WiFi access is available and some rooms have a balcony. The private bathroom features a bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning in the dining room.

Guests can also buy local produce on site, including jams, olive oil and biscuits.

Additional facilities at this hotel include a 24-hour reception and a lift, which serves most of the rooms. The property is a 10-minute walk from Avignon Train Station.

name: Hôtel Les Corps Saints
description:
Hôtel Les Corps Saints boasts a location facing Agricol Perdiguier Square in Avignon's historic city centre, 5 minutes' walk from the train station. The rooms include free WiFi. Corps Saints Square is 80 metres from the hotel.

Only accessible by stairs, the rooms come with a TV and have a private bathroom with a shower.

For an additional fee, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast with cheese, pastries, cold meat, jams, yogurt, boiled and hard boiled eggs. Another breakfast option called 'Bistrot' is available and includes fruit juices, unlimited hot drinks, croissants, fresh bread, jams and homemade butter. Restaurants can be found less than 100 metres away.

Papal Palace is a 10 minutes' walk away. Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge. Avignon TGV train station is 15 km away.

name: Best Western Plus Le Lavarin
description:
Best Western Hôtel du Lavarin is situated in Avignon and is 2.5 km from the ramparts, the Palais des Papes and the Pont d’Avignon. A fitness room, and an indoor pool are also available on site.

The Best Western Hôtel du Lavarin offers comfortable and air conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Breakfast and other meals are served with the taste of Provence, in the restaurant, patio or garden. The restaurant is open from Monday to Friday evening. Please also note that there is no catering possible outside the opening days and times of the restaurant.

The hotel’s garden has olive and plane trees, and a private outdoor swimming pool. There is secure, closed parking on site with 2 Tesla charging points.

The hotel is a 5-minute bus ride from the TGV Train Station (bus n°30) and a 15-minute bus ride from the city centre of Avignon. The bus stop is opposite the hotel. Gardon gorges, the Pont du Gard and Le Mont Ventoux are all a 30-minute drive away. Friendly staff can also arrange a local tour operator for you.

name: Hôtel Central
description:
Located in the heart of the Old Town of Avignon, Hôtel Central offers comfortable guest rooms with free WiFi internet access. A garden and a bar are available on site.

All of the guest rooms are air-conditioned and have a TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower.

A continental breakfast with fresh fruit, French pastries and hot or cold beverages is available. It can be enjoyed on the flowered terrace in the summer months.

The Central Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Palais des Papes and the Pont d'Avignon. Avignon Central Station is 500 metres from the property.

name: ibis Avignon Sud
description:
The 3-star ibis Avignon Sud is ideally located 3 km from the city centre, a few minutes from the Pont d’Avignon and Avignon Convention Centre. It features an outdoor swimming pool with a sun terrace and a garden.

The 93 air-conditioned rooms include free WiFi access and satellite TV and Canal + Channel. The modern rooms all have a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub or shower.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Meals and snacks are available from the hotel’s restaurant, and the bar with its terrace is open 24/7.

The hotel is situated in the heart of Provence and the Châteauneuf du Pape vineyards. Avignon Centre Train Station is 5 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Campanile Avignon Sud - Montfavet la Cristole
description:
Ideally located in Montfavet, 4 km from Avignon's Old Town, the Montfavet la Cristole offers cosy accommodation, free WiFi and a warm welcome.

Famous for its lovingly preserved natural surroundings, splendid sunny climate and history-laden stones, the Vaucluse department is the true heart of the Provence region.

Guestrooms at the Campanile Avignon Sud - Montfavet la Cristole are directly accessible from the outside. They are contemporary in style and provide you with a comfortable living space. They are all equipped with modern en suite facilities, air conditioning and a TV.

The Cristole boasts an ideal location to discover this fascinating city and take in the unique atmosphere of the region. The hotel's managers and staff are dedicated to making your stay both enjoyable and memorable.

name: Hôtel Cloitre Saint Louis Avignon
description:
Set in central Avignon, a 15-minute walk from Palais des Papes and Pont d'Avignon, this 16th-century hotel offers an outdoor rooftop pool with a large sun terrace. Some of the stylish rooms are located in the historic building featuring archways and vaulted ceilings. Free WiFi is available.

Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are non-smoking and have a contemporary bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms feature a balcony with views of the courtyard.

Restaurant Le Saint Louis serves traditional French cuisine at Hôtel Cloitre Saint Louis. Guests can dine on the terrace in summer and enjoy drinks in the lounge bar. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning. An in-room breakfast can be enjoyed at extra cost.

Calvet Museum and Avignon Train Station are a 5-minute walk from the hotel and Avignon Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Private parking is available.

name: Hotel d'Angleterre
description:
Situated in Avignon’s city centre, Hotel d'Angleterre features free WiFi access. There is a 24-hour reception. Avignon Centre Train Station is 10 minutes' walk away.

The air-conditioned guestrooms at d'Angleterre come with a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom. They are decorated in a contemporary style.

A continental breakfast is served daily in the lounge area. Newspapers and refreshments are also provided throughout the day.

Pont d'Avignon is 1.2 km from Hotel d'Angleterre. The nearest airport is Avignon Caumont Airport, 10 km from Hotel d'Angleterre.

name: Hôtel de l'Horloge
description:
This hotel is set in a 19th-century building overlooking the picturesque Place de L'Horloge, in the centre of Avignon. It offers stylish rooms with free WiFi access. The hotel is a 2-minute walk from the Papal Palace.

The Hôtel de l'Horloge's rooms are decorated with antique furnishings. They are soundproofed and feature air conditioning, and some also come with private terraces. Three rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. Some of the hotel's rooms feature panoramic views of the Palais des Papes.

The Luberon Regional Natural Park is a 30-minute drive away and the Alpilles mountains are a 55-minute drive away. Avignon - Caumont Airport is 10 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Médiéval Palais des Papes
description:
Le Médiéval is set in a former cardinal's palace in Avignon historic centre. This 17th-century building is a 5-minute walk from the Popes Palace and offers a floral patio with a fountain.

Accessed via a staircase, each air-conditioned room has a satellite TV and some feature a bathtub. They are also equipped with a direct dial phone, a work desk and free WiFi is available in the entire hotel Le Medieval.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and the hotel is close to many shops and restaurants.

The hotel includes a TV room and a library.

Le Medieval is 5 km from Avignon TGV train Station and 10 km from Avignon Airport. Public parking is available nearby at a discounted rate.

name: Hotel Boquier
description:
Hotel Boquier is set in the Avignon City Centre district in Avignon, 800 metres from Papal Palace.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Hotel Boquier features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is luggage storage space at the property.

Pont d'Avignon is 1 km from Hotel Boquier. The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 9 km from Hotel Boquier.

name: Au Saint Roch - Hôtel et Jardin
description:
Offering a sun terrace and a courtyard garden with a fountain, Au Saint Roch - Hôtel et Jardin is located in Avignon in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, a 15-minute walk from the Papal Palace and a 10-minute walk from the train station. Private parking is available onsite, upon request and for an extra charge, and free public parking can also be found nearby.

All rooms are air-conditioned and come with a flat-screen satellite TV and a fan. Each room features a terrace and garden views. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Saint Roch Hotel Jardin features free WiFi throughout the property.

A buffet breakfast is available for an extra charge.

Pont d'Avignon is 3.3 km from Au Saint Roch - Hôtel et Jardin. The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 10 km from Au Saint Roch - Hôtel et Jardin.

name: ibis Avignon Centre Gare
description:
In the heart of Avignon, Ibis Avignon Centre Gare is just 50 metres from the Avignon Train Station. It offers a 24-hour front desk, a bar, free WiFi and newspapers. Parking is available at the paid public parking area of the train station, located at the foot of the hotel.

The air-conditioned hotels rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a wardrobe. They all offer an en suite bathroom with a shower. Ironing facilities are also available.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

There is an à-la-carte restaurant on site and guests can also relax with a drink at the hotel’s bar.

Famous touristic sights like the Palais des Papes or the Pont d’Avignon Saint-Bénezet are within 1 km. Guests can drive 30 km to The Pont du Gard. Avignon TGV Train Station is 3 km away.

name: Garlande Hôtel Avignon Centre
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Garlande Hôtel Avignon Centre offers accommodation set on a pedestrian street in Avignon, 500 metres from Papal Palace and 900 metres from Pont d'Avignon.

Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and a bath or shower. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax.

Breakfast is available at the property for an additional charge. Evening meals can be served from Monday to Thursday if you reserve 24 hours in advance.

The property is a 10-minute walk from Avignon Central Station and Avignon - Caumont Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: hotelF1 Avignon Centre Courtine gare TGV
description:
hotelf1 Avignon Centre Courtine Gare Tgv is located in Avignon, 2.9 km from Papal Palace and 3 km from Pont d'Avignon.

Each room includes a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with a shared bathroom.Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

Courtine Parc d'Activités Business Park Avignon is 800 metres from Hotelf1 Avignon Centre Courtine, while Avignon ESAA Superior Art School is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 9 km from hotelf1 Avignon Centre Courtine Gare Tgv.

name: Hotel d'Europe
description:
Hotel d’Europe is set in a 16th-century building in the heart of Avignon, just a 5-minute walk from both the Palais des Papes and Avignon Bridge. It provides elegant guest rooms with free Wi-Fi access and an on-site gastronomic restaurant.

Each air-conditioned room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel offers a valet service, beauty treatments and massages at an extra charge.

Both a continental and English breakfast is served daily in the form of a hot and cold buffet. The on-site Michelin 1-star restaurant, La Vieille Fontaine, is open from Tuesday to Saturday and serves contemporary regional cuisine.

name: Kyriad Avignon - Palais des Papes
description:
Set at the Place de l'Horloge, Kyriad Avignon-Palais des Papes is located in the pedestrian zone of the historical centre of Avignon. It offers air-conditioned rooms equipped with a TV with Canal+, courtesy tray and free Wi-Fi access.

Kyriad Avignon-Palais des Papes is opposite the Avignon Opera and is 75 metres from The Palais des Papes. Other nearby attractions include Musée du Petit Palais and Pont d'Avignon.

In the heart of Provence, Kyriad Avignon-Palais des Papes is 20 km from Saint-Rémy-de-Provence and 40 km from Arles. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Altera Roma Hôtel
description:
Set in an 18th-century building, next to Avignon Train Station, this 3-star family hotel is a 20-minute walk from Avignon Papal Palace and Pont d'Avignon. Altera Roma Hôtel provides free WiFi and paid private parking.

Altera Roma Hôtel features guest rooms overlooking a garden, as well as apartments and studios in an annex building for longer stays.

Free buffet breakfast is offered to all guests.

Altera Roma Hôtel boasts also a private taxi service, offering you all the essentials to discover fully the city of Avignon. Avignon-Provence Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Premiere Classe Avignon Courtine Gare TGV
description:
Set 1 km from Avignon Train Station, this hotel is 6 km from the city centre. It offers contemporary en suite rooms featuring an LCD TV with satellite channels.

Premiere Classe Avignon Courtine Gare TGV - Courtine Gare serves a buffet breakfast in the colourful breakfast room. Additional facilities at this hotel include free Wi-Fi access and free private parking.

The hotel is a 20-minute drive from both exit 24 on the A7 motorway and Avignon-Caumont Airport. Just 50 metres from the property, you will also find a bus stop with direct links to the city centre.

name: ibis Styles Avignon Sud
description:
ibis Styles Avignon Sud is situated 4 km from the city walls of Avignon, in the heart of Provence and the Luberon Mountains. It features an outdoor swimming pool and has free private parking. Free WiFi is provided throughout.

It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with satellite TV and a private bathroom.

At ibis Styles Avignon Sud you will find a pool table, a table football and a games room for children with game consoles.

You can enjoy traditional meals in the hotel’s restaurant and order a drink from the bar. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning.

Avignon - Caumont Airport is 5 km from the property while Avignon TGV Train Station is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Hermès
description:
Hôtel Hermès is just 35 metres from the Vieux Port in central Marseilles. It offers a roof-top terrace with panoramic views of the harbour and the city, and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at the Hermès has a partial view of the Vieux Port. They are soundproofed and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and private bathrooms.

The hotel staff are available to assist you 24 hours a day. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning, served in the dining room.

The Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from the Hermès hotel. The Saint Charles SNCF Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

name: ibis budget Avignon Centre
description:
ibis budget Avignon Centre is located in Avignon, a 30-minute drive from Orange and Pont du Gard. Free WiFi access is available. The Papal Palace is 1.3 km away.

Each air-conditioned room features a TV with cable and satellite channels. Offering a bath or shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. You can enjoy a city view and garden view from the room.

At ibis budget Avignon Centre you will find a 24-hour front desk, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and a vending machine.

The hotel is 600 metres from Avignon Central Station and 4 km from Avignon TGV Train Station. Marseille Provence Airport is 83 km away. A paid public parking is available 100 metres away while a free public parking is located 200 metres from the hotel

name: Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port is set in an 18th-century stone building opposite the Vieux Port in Marseille's city centre. Recently renovated It offers panoramic harbour views and rooms with free WiFi. The property features a lift that runs from the first floor and staircase access to reception and the first floor.

Each guest room at Life is soundproofed, air conditioned and has a view of the harbour or the courtyard. There is a flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms are equipped with a bath or a shower and eco-friendly toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast, served in the lobby. The staff at Life are available to assist you 24 hours a day.

The lobby is also a place where you can meet other guests staying at the hotel.

Life Hotel is 100 metres from the Vieux-Port Metro Station and Marseille's main road, La Canebière. The Saint Charles SNCF Station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Le Magnan
description:
Located in a verdant setting within the ancient city walls, Le Magnan offers free WiFi. It is a 10-minute walk from the Papal Palace.

Most of the comfortable guestrooms have a view of the garden and all rooms have an ensuite bathroom with bath or shower, direct-dial telephone, satellite TV and free WiFi internet access.

Le Magnan serves breakfast and in the summer months it can be enjoyed on the garden patio. A light breakfast including a hot drink, a French pastry and fruit juice can also be enjoyed at a reduced rate.

Just 5 minutes from the hotel, guests will find restaurants that feature traditional and regional French cuisine. They are able to accommodate groups and large parties.

The property is 700 metres from Avignon Centre Train Station, and 1 km from Avignon University.

name: Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles
description:
Set in Marseille, just a 5-minute walk from Marseille Saint Charles Train Station, Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles features a garden and free WiFi. The hotel is easily accessible from A7 highway. Secured parking is provided but parking spots are limited and cannot be booked in advance.

The air-conditioned guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a bath.

Speaking English and French, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Marseille's Old Port is 1.1 km from the accommodation and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 20 minutes' walk away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from Toyoko INN Marseille Saint Charles.

name: NH Collection Marseille
description:
Featuring a cocktail bar, garden and a fitness centre on the 6th floor, NH Collection Marseille is located in the new business and leisure district of Marseille, La Joliette. Located between the port and the city centre, the building was inaugurated by Napoleon III in 1864 and preserves its original style.

Rooms at NH Collection Marseille feature elegant décor and offer an electric kettle, coffee machine and private bathroom.

Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, which serves local and international dishes with a variety of local cheeses and wines.Guests can also find a cocktail bar located close to the hotel reception, as well as a garden in the centre of the hotel.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property as well as 4 meeting rooms.

Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 900 metres from NH Collection Marseille, while Palais du Pharo is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 19 km from NH Collection Marseille.

name: Kyriad Marseille Palais Des Congrès – Vélodrome
description:
Located in 1 km from the Orange Velodrome in South Marseille, the Kyriad Marseille Palais Des Congrès – Vélodrome has air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, Canal+ and satellite TV.

The restaurant on site serves a buffet breakfast and traditional French cuisine for lunch and dinner. Guests can relax in the evenings in the hotel’s spacious bar.

The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and meeting facilities.

Kyriad Marseille Palais Des Congrès – Vélodrome is 3 km from Marsaille's Vieux Port and 2km from the nearest beach. A car park is available at the hotel.

name: New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port
description:
New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port is located in central Marseille, overlooking the Old Port and La Canebière shopping street. This hotel offers soundproofed rooms with air-conditioning and satellite TV. Free WiFi access is available.

Entirely renovated in 2018 and 2019, the New Hotel is decorated in a colonial style and the rooms have a desk and a private bathroom. They also have a a courtesy tray with a kettle. A bottle of water is offered upon arrival.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room or in guest rooms. The multilingual staff can also provide information on the local area at the 24-hour reception.

Famous landmarks close to the hotel include Notre Dame de la Garde, the Vieille Charité cultural centre, MUCEM museum, Pharo Palace and Saint Victor's Abbey.

New Hotel Le Quai - Vieux Port is situated opposite the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station and 300 metres from the Belsunce Alcazar Tramway. Chanot Exhibition Centre can be reached in 10 minutes on the metro. The Panier district is just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Carré Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Carré Vieux Port is located in central Marseille, 30 metres from the Vieux Port where boats leave for the Frioul Archipelago and the Château d'If. It offers guest rooms with air conditioning, a smart TV with satellite channels and free WiFi access.

Each of the Carré Vieux Port’s guest rooms is also soundproofed and features tea and coffee making facilities. They all feature a bathroom with bathtub or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of your room. It includes homemade pastries and homemade bread and it is free for children aged 10 years old or younger.

The hotel's reception and bar are open 24 hours.

The Carré Vieux Port is 25 metres from La Canebière and 200 metres from Marseille’s Opera. The Pharo Palace is 700 metres away. The Tourist Information Office is within walking distance and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is just 1.5 km away. Public parking is possible nearby, at an extra cost.

name: Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port
description:
Well located in the centre of Marseille, Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port provides air-conditioned rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the hotel, each room comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Guests at Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the reception.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Vieux Port Metro station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Castellane Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from Mercure Marseille Canebière Vieux-Port.

name: La Residence Du Vieux Port
description:
La Résidence Du Vieux Port is set right on the banks of the Old Port in central Marseille. It offers modern rooms and suites with panoramic views of the city. Free WiFi access is available.

The stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. There is a kettle in all rooms with tea and coffee provided. Some have wide bay windows and a terrace offering views of the Old Port.

Le Relais 50, the adjoining restaurant, serves Mediterranean specialities and guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar.

La Résidence Du Vieux Port is just 200 metres from La Canebière and the Vieux Port Metro Station, which can take guests to Saint-Charles Train Station. Public parking is available on site at an additional fee.

name: nhow Marseille
description:
situdated in Prado Bay, nhow Marseille at Palm Beach is 4 km from Marseille centre. The property offers an outdoor swimming pool, a spa centre, sea and mountain views. Free WiFi is available at the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a satellite TV and some rooms have a balcony.

Guests of nhow Marseille at Palm Beach can enjoy breakfast on the terrace. There is a restaurant and bars on-site.

Additional facilities at the hotel include a fitness centre. There is 24-hour reception at the hotel.
