La Canebiere and Vieux Port are 4 km away and the Orange Velodrome Stadium is 3 km away.

name: Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed
description:
Situated just 500 metres from Les Terrasses du Port shopping centre in Marseille, Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed boasts sea views as well as free access to a fitness area, indoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or a meal in the La Table restaurant. Free WiFi is provided.

Rooms feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. The suites have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Access to the upper floors and rooms is secure and by magnetic access card only.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also boasts a food truck, a body care bar and tandem bicycles.

Velodrome Stadium is 5 km from Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed. Gare Maritime is 1 km from the property while the nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km away. Public parking is available nearby and guests can buy a parking package at the reception.

name: ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles
description:
Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles is located opposite St-Charles SNCF Train Station and is an 8-minute walk from the Old Port. Palais des Congrès, Marseille Exhibition Centre and the Vélodrome Stadium are an 8-minute metro ride away and the hotel offers free WiFi access.

Rooms at Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles are decorated in a contemporary style and feature an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each one is accessed by a lift, air-conditioned and has an en suite bathroom with a shower. Some rooms are available for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast of fresh croissants and fruit juice is offered every morning at Hôtel ibis Styles Marseille Gare Saint-Charles and is served in the dining room or on the terrace. The hotel also has a bar where guests can enjoy an aperitif before dining in the nearby restaurants.

Additional hotel facilities include luggage storage at reception. There is a paid car park at the St-Charles SNCF Train Station. Notre Dame de la Garde is 2.5 km away.

name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port
description:
Overlooking the Old Port, Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port is located in the heart of Marseille. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi.

The soundproofed rooms at Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have port and sea views.

Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - Marseille Vieux Port is just a few steps from the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station. Boulevard La Canebière is 400 metres away, where public transport is available to all of Marseille's famous sites.

name: Hotel Belle-Vue Vieux-Port
description:
Located on Marseille Vieux Port, Hotel Belle-Vue Vieux-Port is an eco-friendly hotel offering views of the Notre-Dame de la Garde, Saint Jean Fort and Pharo Garden. Set in a typical Marseillaise building, it has a cocktail bar and an wrought-iron central staircase dating from 1900. Free WiFi access is available.

Each room at the Hotel Belle-Vue is also equipped with air-conditioning and a flat-screen satellite TV, and most have large windows with views of the port. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer and either a shower or a bathtub. Ironing facilities are available.

A continental breakfast is provided daily and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms. The hotel’s restaurant serves traditional cuisine from the south of France. La Caravelle cocktail bar has a balcony where guests can enjoy a drink.

The 24-hour reception offers local tourist information and newspapers are available every morning.

Hotel Belle-Vue Vieux-Port is just 250 metres from the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro station, which provides direct access to the Saint Charles Train Station.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Marseille Vieux Port
description:
Located in Marseille overlooking the Vieux Port, Radisson Blu Hotel Marseille Vieux Port is a 4-star hotel. It offers an outdoor swimming pool overlooking Fort Saint-Nicholas and a fitness room with a panoramic view of the main monuments of the city. Free WiFi access is available.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature either a Provencal or an African décor. Some rooms have a view of the port and a Nespresso coffee machine. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Bathrobes and slippers are provided in the suites.

The Quai du 7eme restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and proposes buffet breakfast every morning and guests can also enjoy cocktails and tapas in the Bar, with a view over the port.

A boules pitch can be enjoyed on the interior courtyard. With a 24-hour reception, Radisson Blu Hotel Marseille Vieux Port is also partnered with the 5 Mondes Spa just 40 metres away, where beauty treatments are possible at a discounted rate.

Indigo La Criée Car Park is just 80 metres away, available for an additional charge.

name: Villages Clubs du Soleil - MARSEILLE
description:
Offering a seasonal outdoor pool, a restaurant and a children's playground, Villages Clubs du Soleil - MARSEILLE is located in Marseille, 1.8 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Free WiFi is provided. Free private parking is available on site.

The guest rooms feature a desk and a private bathroom with a shower.

There is a free shuttle service at the property to Palais Longchamps. Guests can play table tennis and darts on site.

Palais du Pharo is 4.7 km from Villages Clubs du Soleil - MARSEILLE, while Velodrome Stadium is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 30 minutes' drive away.

name: Hotel Terminus Saint-Charles
description:
The Hotel Terminus is located opposite the Saint-Charles Train Station in central Marseille. Just a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port, it offers en-suite accommodation with free WiFi.

Each room at the Hotel Terminus Saint-Charles is equipped with a flat-screen TV, satellite channels and air conditioning.

A continental breakfast buffet is served daily. Local newspapers are at guests's disposal. Staff can offer are local tourist information at the 24-hour reception. Luggage storage is available.

The Hotel Terminus is a 5-minute walk from the World Trade Centre and the Canebiere Garibaldi Tram stop. It is easily accessible by the A7 motorway and an airport shuttle service is available at the train station.

name: New Hotel of Marseille - Vieux Port
description:
New Hotel of Marseille - Vieux Port is a design hotel located opposite Pharo Congress Centre, just a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port. It offers a gourmet restaurant and an outdoor pool with a furnished terrace.

The air-conditioned rooms and suites are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A bottle of water is offered upon arrival. Superior rooms and suites have a balcony overlooking the city and also boast a Nespresso coffee machine free of charge.

New Hotel of Marseille’s restaurant, serves Provencal cuisine and buffet breakfast that guests can enjoy on the terrace. Guests can enjoy a variety of wines and cocktails in the bar. Room service is available from 12:00 to 23:00 daily.

Saint-Charles Train Station is 2.5 km from New Hotel of Marseille - Vieux Port and Marseille Provence Airport is 25 km away. Guests receive preferential rates at a nearby car park.

name: Le Rhul
description:
Directly overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, Le Rhul is located on the Corniche in Marseilles. It features a panoramic terrace and spacious air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms.

Each of the guest rooms at the hotel Le Rhul is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Most rooms also have sea views.

At the hotel restaurant, guests can enjoy local specialities for lunch and dinner. Breakfast is served in the breakfast room.

Free WiFi access is available in the hotel’s public areas and hotel staff are available to assist you 24 hours a day.

The Vieux Port (old port) and the Pharo are just a 20-minute walk from Le Rhul hotel, and the beaches are a short walk away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles, an IHG Hotel
description:
Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles is opposite the train station and a 10-minute walk from the Vieux Port in Marseille’s city centre. It offers en suite rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Holiday Inn Express Marseille Saint Charles are soundproofed and feature a modern décor. Each is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

A complimentary breakfast is offered and Le Mistral bar serves light meals. Guests can relax on the outdoor terrace. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception desk and a laundry service for an additional charge.

Saint-Charles Metro (lines 1 and 2), provide direct access to Parc Chanot and the city centre. Accessible from the A7, the hotel also offers private parking for an additional fee.

name: Crowne Plaza - Marseille Le Dôme
description:
Situated in Marseille, 2.8 km from La Timone Metro Station, Crowne Plaza - Marseille Le Dôme features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

The units at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. All rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and American options.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Italian.

Vieux Port Metro station is 4.1 km from Crowne Plaza - Marseille Le Dôme, while Castellane Metro Station is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: B&B HOTEL Marseille Centre Vieux Port
description:
Just 500 metres from the Old Port, B&B HOTEL Marseille Centre Vieux Port offers modern accommodation in the heart of Marseille. It features a 24-hour reception, a shared lounge with Canal+ on the TV, and free WiFi available throughout.

The hotel’s rooms are all equipped with a flat-screen TV .They have a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

Breakfast is served Monday to Friday from 6:30 am. to 10 am, and weekends from 7:30 a.m. to 10:30 a.m.

After a day of sightseeing, guests can relax at the hotel’s bar. Books and board games are provided on site. A public transportation tickets can be purchased at the reception upon request.

Notre-Dame de la Garde Sight is just 2.2 km away and the Palais du Faro Exhibition Centre is 2 km away. Marseille Saint-Charles is a 15-minute walk away while Marseille-Marignane Airport is 25 km away.

name: InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, an IHG Hotel
description:
InterContinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu is set in a superb 18th century building in the historic quarter of Marseille, 350 metres from the Old Port. WiFi access is available.

With 194 rooms and suites, some with landmark views and private terraces, the hotel features contemporary, elegant decor, complementing its historical features.

La Brasserie Les Fenêtres. Le Capain Bar offers an array of cocktails prepared by specialists.

The hotel’s own relaxation area features a Clarins spa with saunas, hammams, sunbeds, a gym and an indoor pool. The spa is available to hotel guests for an extra charge.

This is an ideal base for exploring the heart of Marseille, with theatres, department stores and museums on your doorstep.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Marseille Prado Vélodrome
description:
Set in the Prado Area next to the park in Marseille's Chanot - Stade Velodrome district, AC Hotel Marseille Prado Velodrome features a 24-hour front desk, a restaurant and a bar. The Velodrome Stadium is 270 metres away.

Each of the rooms are soundproof and air-conditioned. They come with a flat-screen TV, a safe, a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. All have a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer.

The hotel is ideally located less than a 5-minute walk from the Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station. Palais du Pharo is 5 km from AC Hotel Marseille Prado Velodrome, while the Vieux Port is 4 km away.

Marseille Provence Airport is 28 km from AC Hotel Marseille Prado Velodrome.

Mucem museum is located 7 km away.

name: The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman
description:
Situated in Aix-en-Provence, 30 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman rooms come with bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, vegetarian or gluten-free options.

Joliette Metro Station is 30 km from the accommodation, while Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 26 km from The Originals Résidence Aix Schuman.

name: Hôtel des Augustins
description:
Located just of the famous Cours Mirabeau in the heart of the old town of Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Les Augustins is set within the walls of a 12th-century convent.

Hotel Les Augustins boasts a subtle blend of historic and modern architecture and a magnificent lobby.

The hotel features spacious rooms combining traditional architecture and modern facilities. Each room provides air conditioning, a TV and a minibar.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of guest rooms. There is also free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel and a 24-hour reception,

name: Golden Tulip Villa Massalia
description:
A 7-minute walk from the beach, Golden Tulip Villa Massalia is 3.5 km from Velodrome Stadium and 6 km from Les Goudes. It offers luxury accommodation with an outdoor pool open in the season and free WiFi.

The air-conditioned rooms offer a flat-screen TV and a safe. Deluxe rooms feature a balcony or terrace with panoramic sea views. The bathrooms have a hairdryer, toiletries, bath robes and slippers. A bottle of water is offered upon arrival.

Golden Tulip Villa Massalia's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. During fine weather guests can dine on the terrace overlooking the racecourse. The hotel bar is open every day and serves cocktails and snacks.

Marseilles city centre is 5 km away. Villa Massalia can be accessed from the airport, a 35-minute drive away or Gare Saint Charles, a 20-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Hotel Cardinal
description:
Situated in Aix-en-Provence, within 800 metres of Cours Mirabeau and Saint-Sauveur Cathedral, Hotel Cardinal features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Attractions in the area include Aix-en-Provence Congress Centre, a 3-minute walk away.

The individually decorated rooms and suites in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine and desk. Some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop.

Languages spoken at the reception include English and French.

Marseille Provence Airport is 21 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Le Mozart
description:
Located 500 metres from the Granet Museum, Hôtel Le Mozart offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. It is easily accessed from Motorway A8, a 3-minute drive away.

Additional facilities in the rooms include an LCD TV with satellite channels. The rooms also provide a telephone and an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a bath or shower.

You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the dining room or on the terrace.

Free private parking is available onsite. Alternatively, guests can keep their vehicle in the secure garage for a supplementary cost and upon reservation. Newspapers are also available at the 24-hour reception.

name: Hôtel Paul
description:
Centrally located in Aix-en-Provence, Hotel Paul is only 150 metres from the Spa, the Palais des Festivals and the historical part of the city. It features a garden with a terrace area. Free WiFi is available in all the rooms.

Accessed via stairs, the guestrooms at Hotel Paul feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a fan. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower.

During the summer months, guests can relax in Paul Hotel's garden, which features tables and chairs with sun shades. There is also a TV room.

Every morning a continental breakfast is served for an extra charge. For lunch and dinner, guests can choose from a range of cafes and restaurants found within 400 metres of the property.

Aix-en-Provence train station is 1.5 km from the hotel and Marseille Marignane airport is 30 km away. Marseille is 35.5 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hôtel Cézanne Boutique-Hôtel
description:
This boutique design hotel is located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence and offers 55 rooms. If features a terrace and a lounge.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access. All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town.

At Hôtel Cézanne there is a terrace with an outdoor bar, where guests can enjoy an aperitif. There is also a meeting room.

Breakfast can be taken until 10:30 and offers fresh juice bar, home-made savoury dishers, pastries, pancakes, brioche, artisanal charcuterie boards, jam from Hautes-Alpes and a gluten-free selection. It can be enjoyed in the outdoor bar in fine weather.

The property is 200 metres from the Cours Mirabeau and 300 metres from a bus station, with connections to the airport and the TGV train station. Aix-en-Provence TGV train station is 12 km from the hotel.

The rooms at the Boutique Hotel Cézanne have free WiFi access and air-conditioned during hot season. All rooms include satellite TV with more than 50 channels and some have views over the town.

Private secured parking is available on site for an additional fee.

name: Domaine Gaogaia
description:
Located 2 km from the village of Les Milles and 8 km from the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Domaine Gaogaia offers hotel accommodation with an outdoor pool, a garden and a terrace. Guests also have access to free WiFi and free on-site parking.

All rooms are air conditioned and feature a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer. Deluxe rooms have a bath, a shower and a separate toilet. Additional facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a shared lounge and ironing services.

Guests can enjoy a meal made with fresh and seasonal ingredients in the on-site restaurant opened from Monday to Saturday and Sundays for lunch only. Beforehand reservations for the restaurant are strongly advised.

Activities in the local area include golf and hiking. Les Milles, Domaine Gaogaia is a 10-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence city centre where a number of shops, bars, restaurants and cafes can be found. The nearest beaches are a 35-minute drive from the hotel.

Marseille Provence Airport is 20 km away and Aix-en-Provence Train Station is situated 10 km from the property.

name: Le Concorde
description:
Le Concorde is ideally located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, only a 5-minute walk from the famous Cour Mirabeau and near the Granet Museum. It offers a flowered garden.

The guest rooms all feature a TV, air-conditioning and Wi-Fi access.

You can start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room or in the courtyard.

For guests arriving by car, the hotel has a large private garage in the basement available for an additional charge, allowing you to explore the city without any parking worries.

name: Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture
description:
Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture is located a 10-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence, next to an 18-hole golf course. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and has free WiFi throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or private terrace.

The hotel restaurant is open from Sunday evening to Friday midday. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar from 10am to 10pm . Buffet Breakfast is available.

There are 3 meeting rooms available to organise meetings, workshops or cocktails. Guests have access to the garden and terrace.

Hôtel Birdy by Happyculture is just 17.4 km from Marseille Provence Airport and 6.7 km away from Marseille TGV Train Station. Free parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel Escaletto
description:
This 3-star hotel is located in the centre of Aix-en-Provence, a 1-minute walk from Thermes Sextius thermal baths and 550 metres from Cours Mirabeau. Free WiFi is available.

Rooms are contemporary and offer a terrace with a panoramic view over the city and the Mont Sainte-Victoire Mountain.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning, and free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel.

With a 24-hour reception, the Hotel escaletto offers easy access to all the main tourist attractions of
Aix-en-Provence.

name: Les Quatre Dauphins
description:
Les Quatre Dauphins is a hotel set in a former private mansion in the heart of Aix-en-Provence, just 50 metres away from Quatre Dauphins Square and 350 metres from Cours Mirabeau. The property is a 5-minute drive from Aix-en-Provence Train Station. Free WiFi is included.

An elegant stairwell leads to the guest rooms in this 3-storey hotel. Decorated in a Provençal style, each room comes with private bathroom and satellite TV. The rooms of the top floor have exposed wooden beams.

The central location of the Quatre Dauphins hotel allows you to visit the old part of Aix-en-Provence. Paid public parking is available 300 metres from the property.

name: Aquabella Hôtel & Spa
description:
Surrounded by a beautiful garden, Aquabella offers Provencal-style rooms and guests have free access to the spa. It is located in central Aix-en-Provence, a short walk from the old town.

The guest rooms at the Aquabella are all air-conditioned and equipped with free Wi-Fi access and mini-bars. Bathrobes are also provided.

Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine in the hotel restaurant, L’Orangerie. During the summertime La Terrasse de la Tour is the hotel’s outdoor grill, serving grilled dishes and salads by the outdoor swimming pool.

Guests can relax at the Aquabella’s Sensoriel Spa. Guests have access to the sauna, hammam, and hot bath. There is also a Kneipp shower and ice fountain.

Guests will find public parking just 50 metres away from the property, available at an extra cost.

name: Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel
description:
Located within a 10-minute walk of the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Renaissance Aix-en-Provence Hotel boasts free access to a spa with a heated indoor pool, steam room, fitness room, and 2 treatment cabins are also available. It offers a 24-hour front desk, free WiFi and newspapers.

The spacious guest rooms all feature garden or city views. They come with a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

Various breakfast options such as American, continental and a breakfast buffet are available for guests. The hotel also offers a bistro and a bar.

Guests can go golfing 3 km away, bowling 1 km away or horse riding 1.9 km away. The Grand Theatre is 200 metres away. Marseille-Marignane Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes
description:
Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes is situated a 5-minute walk from the cafes and fountains that line the Cours Mirabeau. It offers guest rooms and self-catering accommodation with 24-hour reception and an outdoor swimming pool during summer.

Free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, including BeIN Sport, are provided in the accommodation, which also has seating area. All of the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Odalys City Aix en Provence Les Floridianes have a private bathroom.

The fully equipped kitchenette in the apartment includes a dishwasher, microwave and a small dining area. Les Floridianes also serves a buffet breakfast in the dining room which opens onto the terrace surrounding the pool.

Gare d’Aix-en-Provence Train Station and Jourdan Park are both 500 metres from the residence. The A8 Motorway is 1.6 km away. Undercover parking is available on site with a supplement.

name: Campanile Aix-en-Provence Sud - Pont de l'Arc
description:
Located in Aix-en-Provence, 3 km from the historical centre and Cours Mirabeau, Campanile Aix-en-Provence Sud - Pont de l'Arc offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

Each of the guest rooms is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Tea and coffee making facilities are available in each room.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. The hotel's restaurant serves contemporary French cuisine that can be enjoyed on the terrace during the summer months. Campanile Aix-en-Provence also offers hot and cold buffet.

The hotel is serviced by a lift and free private parking is available on site. A bus stop can be found opposite the hotel, where direct bus access is available to the city centre.

The property is 13 km from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station and 8 km away from Aix en Provence Arena stadium and concert hall. Marseille Provence Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

Nearby facilties and locations : Sismic ( Concert and Entertenaiment), L'Arena ( Concert and Entertenaiment), Grand Theatre de Provence, Private Hospital

Attractions : Pavillon Vendome, Provencal Market (3km)

name: HOTEL RESTAURANT OLYMPE
description:
Located in Aix-en-Provence, 27 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, HOTEL RESTAURANT OLYMPE provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With a restaurant, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 27 km from Joliette Metro Station.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk. Each room is equipped with a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while some rooms are equipped with a patio and some have garden views. At HOTEL RESTAURANT OLYMPE rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 28 km from the accommodation, while Vieux Port Metro station is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km from HOTEL RESTAURANT OLYMPE.

name: Hôtel Rotonde
description:
Hôtel Rotonde is located in central Aix-en-Provence, 5 minutes' walk from the SNCF train station. Free WiFi is provided, together with free on-site parking subject to availability.

It offers soundproofed rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar. Each has a bathroom with hairdryer.

Hôtel Rotonde serves a continental buffet breakfast. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar or on the shaded terrace.

The hotel is 300 metres from Cours Mirabeau and 30 km from Marseille Provence Airport.

name: Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Centre - MGallery
description:
Located just a 5-minute walk from Cours Mirabeau and the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix en Provence Centre - MGallery is a 4-star hotel featuring a heated seasonal outdoor pool open from April to the end of september. It also boasts a terrace, a fitness centre and free WiFi access.
Each air-conditioned guest room has been decorated in a contemporary style and includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a safe. The private bathroom comes with either a bath or shower, bathrobes, a hairdryer, slippers and free Occitane toiletries. All rooms have a Nespresso coffee machine.
Traditional French cuisine is served in the hotel's restaurant, La Table du Roi. Guests can enjoy a drink in L'intemporel bar.
Grand Hôtel Roi René - MGallery Collection is 400 metres from the train station. Private parking is available upon request and for an additional fee.

name: Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville
description:
Located a 10-minute walk from the centre of Aix-en-Provence, Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville features a seasonal outdoor pool and a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a desk, a kettle and a minibar. The private bathrooms have a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

The hotel has business facilities, including fully equipped meeting rooms open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. There is also a 24-hour reception.

Best Western Le Galice Centre Ville is 25 km from Marseille Provence Airport and 15 km from Aix-en-Provence TGV Train Station. A secured underground car park is available for an extra fee.

name: Golden Tulip Aix en Provence
description:
Golden Tulip Aix en Provence is situated on the exit of the A8 and A51 motorways, just 10 minutes' drive from the centre of Aix-en-Provence and Paul Cézanne’s house. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. The hotel was completely renovated in April 2019.

All the rooms at Golden Tulip Aix en Provence come with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with Canal+ and satellite channels. They are decorated in a contemporary style.

The "Tulipe" restaurant is open daily and offers traditional, gourmet and local cuisine.

Guests can relax on the terrace with deckchairs and a barbecue. There is also a fitness room and an air-conditioned relaxation area with a dry sauna and shower which can be privatized.

There are theatres, a golf course and a cinema all within close proximity of the hotel. Situated on the western outskirts of town, the hotel is 2 km from Cours Mirabeau. An underground garage is available for parking for an extra charge.

name: La Caravelle
description:
In the heart of Aix-en-Provence, the La Caravelle hotel welcomes you less than an 8-minute walk from the Cours Mirabeau, the Granet Museum and the Palais des Congrès.

All rooms have a fan or air conditioning, a desk and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at La Caravelle. A continental breakfast is also available at a reduced rate, which can be enjoyed in your room and includes a hot drink, a croissant and a glass of orange juice.

The hotel includes video surveillance and free computer access in public areas. Public parking is nearby

Establishment undergoing renovation but remains open to the public.
Model photos of the establishment from 2024

This hotel has been entirely renewed.

name: Hôtel de France
description:
Located in the heart of Aix-en-Provence, Hôtel de France is situated in a street parallel to Cours Mirabeau only 50 metres from the famous Fontaine de la Rotonde, and offers air conditioned rooms with free WiFi access.

Decorated with white and beige shades, all rooms at Hôtel de France feature a TV with satellite channels, a desk and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathtub or a shower and Nuxe products.

Breakfast is served daily and can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the guest room. The property is located near numerous restaurants, bars and markets.

Other facilities available at Hôtel de France include a 24 hour front desk and a shared lounge. The property's location makes it an excellent base to discover Aix-en-Provence, which train station is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Particulier le 28 by Teritoria
description:
Featuring a private garden with 2 terraces and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Particulier le 28 by Teritoria is located in Aix-en-Provence. Private parking is available on site.

The air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a bath. Hotel Particulier le 28 by Teritoria features free WiFi.

Breakfast with local products is available. Guests can dine in the garden. There is also a babysitting service offered at the property.

Cours Mirabeau is 200 metres from Hotel Particulier le 28 by Teritoria, while Saint-Sauveur Cathedral is 800 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from Hotel Particulier le 28 by Teritoria.

name: thecamp Hôtel & Lodges - Aix en Provence
description:
Situated in Aix-en-Provence, 25 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, thecamp Hôtel & Lodges - Aix en Provence features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Some units at the property have a balcony with a mountain view.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk. Some rooms also boast a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. All rooms in thecamp Hôtel & Lodges - Aix en Provence are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Guests at thecamp Hôtel & Lodges - Aix en Provence will be able to enjoy activities in and around Aix-en-Provence, like hiking and cycling.

Joliette Metro Station is 25 km from the hotel, while Vieux Port Metro station is 26 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 19 km from thecamp Hôtel & Lodges - Aix en Provence.

name: Hôtel Vendôme
description:
Located just a few steps from Aix-en-Provence historic centre and the beautiful Pavillon Vendôme, this hotel offers soundproofed rooms opening onto a courtyard, with air-conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV.

All of the guest rooms at the Vendôme are equipped with en suite facilities and bathrobes are provided. They feature a desk, a telephone, and free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire Hotel Vendôme.

A continental breakfast is served every morning, and can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room. Front desk is open 24-hour, and daily newspapers are at your disposal.

The Hotel Vendôme is just 800 metres from the shuttle service, leading to Aix-en-Provence TGV Railway Station.

name: Logis Hotel Restaurant Uzès Pont du Gard
description:
Logis Hotel Restaurant Uzès Pont du Gard offers comfortable and well-equipped rooms, just a 10-minute walk from the centre. Enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool, 2 tennis courts and an excellent restaurant.

All rooms at the Logis Hotel Restaurant Uzès Pont du Gard feature satellite TV and en suite bathroom facilities. Stay in touch using the free, unlimited Wi-Fi.

The hotel restaurant serves traditional French cuisine and offers a view over the swimming pool. In the summertime you can dine on the shady outdoor terrace.

Logis Hotel Restaurant Uzès Pont du Gard is ideally placed for sightseeing in Uzès. The Place aux Herbes and the Tour Fenestrelle are both nearby.

name: La Taverne
description:
La Taverne is located in Uzès, on a pedestrian street just a 2-minute walk from the Duché Castle. The tourist office is 100 metres from the property and Haribo Museum is 3 km away.

The rooms at La Taverne are decorated in a contemporary style and include free WiFi access. Each one also features an LCD TV, air conditioning and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries.

Breakfast is available every morning in the breakfast room. Additional facilities at the hotel include luggage storage and newspapers at reception.

Other local activities include driving the 14 km to Pond du Gard or visiting Nimes, which is a 30-minute drive away. The hotel is situated next to Uzès Tourist Office and the Town Hall.

The bedrooms are either located on an upper floor and accessible by stairs or on the ground floor in the annex.

The reception opens from 4 p.m. to 7 p.m. each day. The hotel haven't the night receptionist.

name: Hostellerie Provençale
description:
Situated in the centre of Uzès, you will enjoy the charms of this typical Provence region style hotel. The Hostellerie Provençale and its staff are pleased to welcome you.

The Hostellerie Provençale is an 300 year old house with both the charms of an old house and the modernism of the 21st century.

From the terrace where you can enjoy your breakfast, you can see Uzès and its surroundings. The restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes and dishes made with fresh ingredients from the market.

A regional market takes place at the Place aux Herbes, beside the hotel. You can visit the Pont du Gard, the Maison Carrée in Nîmes and the Palais des Papes in Avignon.

A public car park is located a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Le Saint-Geniès
description:
This family-run hotel sits in a garden, in a quiet residential area, 1.5 km from Uzès historical centre. It has an outdoor pool and offers nice views over the countryside.

Hotel Le Saint-Geniès provides cosy soundproofed rooms with air conditioning and flat-screen cable TV. The private bathrooms feature hairdryers and showers.

A full buffet breakfast is available to order every morning and can be enjoyed on the terrace. Guests can also relax on the sun terrace by the pool.

The Saint-Geniès provides free Wi-Fi access in its guest rooms. It is 30 km from Nîmes, 16 km from the Pont du Gard and a 30-minute drive from Avignon. Free public parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Restaurant Le Clos De Pradines
description:
The Clos de Pradines is located in Saint Quentin la Poterie, close to Nîmes, Alès and Avignon. The property offers a terrace with a panoramic view of the Uzès Valley and the outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is available in public areas.

The air-conditioned guest rooms come with a marble en-suite bathroom and a TV. Some rooms have a terrace or balcony and a view.

The Clos de Pradines also features a restaurant 'La Table du Clos'. This restaurant has been featured in the Michelin Guide and serves regional gastronomic cuisine.

A hot tub and a sauna are available at an extra charge and upon reservation.

name: Boutique Hôtel Entraigues
description:
Set in Uzès in the Languedoc-Roussillon Region, 32 km from Avignon, Boutique Hôtel Entraigues features an outdoor pool. The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the city. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site for an extra charge, subject to availability.

The rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day, a terrace or a patio.

A variety of other restaurants are available within a 2-minute walk.

An array of activities are offered in the area, such as golfing and cycling. Nîmes is 20 km from Hôtel Entraigues, while Arles is 41 km away. Avignon-Provence Airport is 40 km from the property.

name: Château de Collias
description:
Situated in Collias, 23 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, Château de Collias features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Château de Collias provides some rooms with city views, and rooms are equipped with a coffee machine. At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels.

An American, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available each morning at the property.

You can play billiards at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling.

Avignon Central Station is 32 km from Château de Collias, while Papal Palace is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 27 km from the hotel.

name: Château d'Arpaillargues - TERITORIA
description:
With an outdoor swimming pool and a hot tub, this 18th-century château is located 4 km from the medieval city of Uzes and a 25-minute drive from the Pont de Gard. The château is surrounded by gardens and a tennis court is available on site. Free WiFi is available.

The elegant, air-conditioned guestrooms offer a view of the gardens and are equipped with a flat-screen TV and minibar. Each room has an en suite bathroom with a bathrobe and complimentary toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed on the terrace during the summer months. For evening meals, guests are invited to sample regional cuisine in the hotel’s historical dining room.

Relaxation activities available at the hotel include table tennis and an area for playing boules. Free private parking is available on site.

name: La Maison d'Uzès Relais & Châteaux
description:
Located in the centre of Uzès’ Old Town, La Maison d'Uzès Relais & Châteaux is set in a listed building. The hotel features a hammam and Roman bath facilities free for 30 minutes when booking a treatment. Spa treatments from L'Occitane en Provence are also available at an additional cost.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and an iPad. The private bathrooms offer a bath or shower and free toiletries.

The hotel’s on-site restaurant serves modern French cuisine and local specialties. Additional restaurants and bars can be found within 200 metres.

La Maison d'Uzès Relais & Châteaux is situated 25 km from Nîmes Train Station. Avignon Airport can be reached in 1 hour by car.

name: Hotel Restaurant Le Gardon - Pont du Gard
description:
Situated in Collias, close to the Duchy of Uzès and the magnificent Pont du Gard, Hotel Restaurant Le Gardon offers modern and comfortable bedrooms, an outdoor swimming pool with sun lounges, a paddling pool and a terrace. Free WiFi and free private parking are provided on site.

Serviced by a lift, all of the air-conditioned rooms feature an LCD TV with satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some of them are also suitable for guests with reduced mobility. Family rooms/suites and adjoined rooms are available.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room or on the terrace which opens onto the garden. The onsite restaurant is open from Monday to Saturday evening (reservation required in mid-season: October until May) and offers local cuisine.

Hotel Restaurant Le Gardon is accessible via the A9 motorway or Nimes Airport.
guests with dogs +15 kg have to book a suite or a big room .
sanitary pass or test -72h is mendatory ( pass sanitaire ou test -72h obligatoire )

name: Domaine de Privadière
description:
Set in Garrigues-et-Sainte-Eulalie, 34 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, Domaine de Privadière offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. With a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service and luggage storage space for guests.

The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Domaine de Privadière every room includes bed linen and towels.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Avignon Central Station is 48 km from the accommodation, while Papal Palace is 50 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes, 33 km from Domaine de Privadière, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: La Bégude Saint-Pierre
description:
Located in Vers-Pont-du-Gard, La Bégude Saint-Pierre sits in a 17th-century building with a 14-hectare domain with olive trees. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a lounge bar and a restaurant.

The air-conditioned guest rooms offer a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Some rooms have a private terrace with views of the pool. The bathroom features a bathtub or shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries from Durance.

A range of pastries and hot drinks is served for breakfast as a buffet or to be enjoyed in the comfort of guest rooms. Guests can enjoy the inventive cuisine served at the restaurant offering views of the pool and the garden.

Pont du Gard is 2 km away, Uzès is 10 km away and Nîmes is 22 km from the property.Avignon Train Station is a 30-minute drive away. There is access to A9 Motorway, just a 5-minute drive away.

name: L'Enclos des Lauriers Roses
description:
Situated in Cabrières, 15 km from Parc Expo Nîmes, L'Enclos des Lauriers Roses features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 32 km from Avignon Central Station.

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. At L'Enclos des Lauriers Roses the rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Cabrières, like hiking, fishing and cycling.

Papal Palace is 33 km from L'Enclos des Lauriers Roses, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 34 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Le Castellas Hôtel & Spa - Teritoria
description:
Hostellerie Le Castellas Les Collectionneurs is a 17th-century residence located in the heart of Collias. Its enclosed courtyard is full of trees and flowers and has an outdoor heated swimming pool with a counter-current swimming option.

Guest rooms are individually decorated in a Baroque, modern or a chic style. Free WiFi access and a flat-screen TV are both provided.

On the terrace, you can enjoy lunch under the wisteria in the garden. You can also savour regional cuisine for dinner or enjoy wine-tasting on site.

Hostellerie le Castellas has an outdoor hot tub, a Wellness Center and a hammam. The full list of treatments offered can be seen on the hotel's website.

The hotel is located between Nimes and Avignon in the Gorges du Gardon, and between Le Pont du Gard and Uzes, near the river.

name: Domaine de Panery
description:
Set in Pouzilhac, 27 km from Avignon Central Station, Domaine de Panery offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and room service, along with free WiFi. The hotel has a terrace and a hammam.

Certain rooms also offer a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the hotel.

The area is popular for hiking, and bike hire is available at Domaine de Panery.

Papal Palace is 29 km from the accommodation, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 29 km from the property. The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 36 km from Domaine de Panery.

name: Soko Hotels-Pont du Gard
description:
Located in Remoulins, 23 km from Avignon Central Station, Soko Hotels-Pont du Gard provides accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. The accommodation features a shared kitchen and a concierge service for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms include a balcony.

At Soko Hotels-Pont du Gard you will find a restaurant serving French cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Remoulins, like cycling.

Papal Palace is 25 km from Soko Hotels-Pont du Gard, while Avignon TGV Train Station is 26 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 28 km from the hotel.

name: Le Vieux Castillon
description:
Le Vieux Castillon is located in the heart the small medieval village of Castillon-du-Gard, a 35-minute drive from Nîmes and Avignon. The famous Pont du Gard is 3.5 km away. The hotel offers an heated outdoor pool with a view of the nearby area and a spa.

This property has 34 rooms, split across 2 buildings. The rooms were renovated between 2015 and 2017. All the rooms are fitted with all the modern comfort including air conditioning, satellite television a coffee machine. A minibar with alcohol and soft drinks is available for an extra charge.

The restaurant is decorated with imposing wooden beams and offers refined cuisine with regional accents.

There are many patios and terraces for guests to enjoy.

The property is a 50-minute drive from Avignon-Provence Airport and a 35-minute drive from both Avignon TGV Train Station and Nîmes Train Station.

name: Les Glycines
description:
Set in Remoulins, Les Glycines has a terrace, bar and free WiFi. The property is situated 3.7 km from Pont du Gard. Guests can enjoy a selection of French cuisine in the in-house restaurant. Free bicycle storage is available.

At the hotel, each room is fitted with a wardrobe. Each room has a private bathroom. At Les Glycines, rooms include air conditioning and a TV.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the property.

Cycling and hiking are among the activities that guests of the accommodation can find nearby.

The nearest airport is Avignon-Provence Airport, 31 km from Les Glycines.

Please note that sheets and towels are not provided for the appartment. Guests can bring their own or rent them from the property for the following additional fees:

Bed linen: 15€/bed/stay

Towels: 10€/person/stay

Cleaning (excluding dishes): 50€/end of stay

name: Domaine Des Escaunes
description:
The "Domaine des Escaunes" is located in the middle of the triangle Avignon-Nîmes- Uzes. This ancient Post relay is situated at the exit of the village "Sernhac" surrounded by 7 hectares of vineyards and olive trees.

The traditionally decorated rooms have a private bathroom with bath or shower and private toilet. Some of the rooms offer air conditioning and views of vineyards or the Provençal countryside.

A beautiful, elegant ancient post relay tastefully renovated. 3 differents wings between the 16th and the 19th century, surface of 2000 m². The property boasts a walled garden, swimming pool (8mX18m), pool house, terraces and secured parking with a code.

name: Hotel Cote Patio
description:
Located 900 metres from Nîmes city centre, Hotel Cote Patio is a 5-minute walk from the Arena of Nîmes and a 10-minute walk from the train station. It offers free WiFi access and a patio with outdoor furniture.

Set all around the patio, the heated rooms provide a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels. They are all decorated following different styles with warm southern colours, Art Deco or classical atmospheres.

In the summertime, a Continental breakfast including homemade jam and a variety of other breakfast foods is served on the patio. The hotel staff are happy to be of assistance to help you book a table in one of the numerous restaurants in the area.

Hôtel Cote Patio is a 5-minute walk from the airport shuttle and a 23 km from Uzès. The Cévennes National Park is just 43.5 km away. The A9 motorway is a 9-minute drive away. Arles is 33 km away.

name: Best Western Marquis de la Baume
description:
Located in the centre of the historic town of Nîmes, Hôtel Marquis de la Baume is a 17th-century town house just 3.7 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 650 metres from Nîmes Arena. Free WiFi is provided.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a satellite flat-screen TV, a minibar and an electric kettle. There is a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served everyday in the comfort of guest rooms or in the interior patio, weather permitting.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

The hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the Colosseum and the Magne Tower. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Royal Hôtel
description:
Set in the heart of Nîmes, Royal Hôtel features an on-site restaurant, La Bodéguita, which opens onto Assas Square. The hotel is within 3 minutes' walk of the Maison Carrée Temple and Carré d'Art Modern Art Gallery. Free WiFi access is available.

The property accepts dogs less than 10 kg .

Accessed via a staircase, every room includes air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a view over the internal patio or Assas Square. Some units feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served daily, made with a selection of fresh organic produce. You can sample Spanish cuisine and fish à la plancha in the restaurant. Tapas can be enjoyed on the bar’s outdoor terrace.

Tango evenings are organised on Assas Square during July and August. There are also regular art viewings and exhibitions held on the square.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 2.7 km from Royal Hôtel. Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport is 53 km from the property.

name: Central Hotel
description:
Central Hotel is set in a renovated, 18th-century building, in the historical centre of Nimes, right behind the ancient roman site, the Porte d’Auguste. It offers soundproofed rooms with private bathrooms.

The guest rooms’ doors are decorated by a local artist. Each room is equipped with a TV and a shower.
Some rooms feature views of Nimes’ rooftops and the Magna Tower.

The Central Hotel has a private bar, and a traditional French breakfast is served every morning. Room service is also available.

Free WiFi access is provided in the Central’s common areas, and guests also have access to a luggage room. There is also 1 room suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

Central Hotel is 100 metres from a shuttle stop for Nimes Airport, and less than a 10-minute walk from the Gare de Nimes TGV Train Station. The Notre-Dame-et-Saint-Castor Cathedral is just 280 metres away.

name: Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes
description:
Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes is a 5-minute walk to the fortified city, on the banks of the canal, visible from its panoramic terrace and swimming pool. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Free parking is available and garage parking is possible for an extra charge, or free of charge for motorbikes.

All of the rooms in the 3-star Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes are soundproofed and have a flat-screen TV with French and foreign channels.

In the warmer months the buffet breakfast can be eaten on the outdoor terrace. In the summer, guests can also enjoy snacks or light meals by the canal.

Bicycle rental is available onsite and there is also a seminar room for meetings.

Hotel Canal Aigues Mortes is a 10-minute drive from Grau-du-Roi beach and a 20-minute drive from Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport. Aigues-Mortes train station is a 4-minute walk away. Montpellier, Arles and Nîmes can all be reached within 45 minutes by car.

name: Maison des Croisades
description:
Maison des Croisades in Aigues-Mortes offers bike rental and a garden. The hotel features free WiFi and a terrace. Guests can enjoy Canal & Garden Views. Le Grau-du-Roi beach is a 10-minute drive away.

All rooms in Maison des Croisades are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Guests at Maison des Croisades can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Montpellier is 33 km from Maison des Croisades, while Nîmes is 44 km from the property. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 24 km away.

name: Empire Hôtel
description:
Empire Hôtel is located in the heart of Nimes, opposite Nimes Cathedral and 800 metres from the Roman Arènes de Nîmes. Free WiFi access is available.

Each guest room at Empire Hôtel also has a TV, a desk and a private bathroom.

Nimes TGV Train Station is just 1km from the Empire. Carré d'Art Museum is 800 metres away.

name: Chez Rosette de Lussan
description:
Chez Rosette de Lussan is set in a 16th-century building in the medieval village of Lussan, 28 km from Alès. Mediterranean cuisine is served in the restaurant, which has a shaded terrace overlooking the main square.

Each stylish guest room offers a view of the countryside, and the suite also features a 35 m² private terrace. The en suite bathrooms are fitted with a walk-in shower.

Breakfast can be taken on the terrace and a variety of drinks are available from the bar. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the public areas.

The medieval village of Uzès is 18 km from this hotel and Avignon is 60 km away. Free public parking is possible nearby.

name: Hôtel Le Médiéval
description:
Le Médiéval is located on the banks of the canal in Aigues-Mortes, 30 km from Montpellier. It offers en suite rooms, free parking and an outdoor swimming pool.

Hotel Le Médiéval provides a daily buffet continental-style breakfast that can be taken on the terrace in fine weather. The hotel also provides free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

Free private parking is possible on site and the medieval ramparts are a 2-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Saint Louis
description:
Set in the historical heart of Aigues-Mortes, 200 yards from the Tour de Constance, Hôtel Saint Louis is an air-conditioned hotel with a wellness center and restaurant. Free WiFi access is available on site and public city parking spots are available for free.

All rooms feature a contemporary décor inspired by the region and are fitted a flat-screen TV, a mini-bar and a telephone. Each room has a private bathroom. In the summer, guests can enjoy a drink on the patio or sun terrace. The onsite restaurant features a baroque-style décor and offers modern Camargue cuisine made with local produce and outdoor seating.

Nîmes is 43 km from Hôtel Saint Louis, while Arles is 49 km from the property. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 26 km away.

There is a wellness center with a sauna and massages are also available on request.

name: Noemys Aigues-Mortes - Hotel avec piscine
description:
Featuring free WiFi and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel is located in Aigues-Mortes, a 15-minute drive from the Carmague Natural Regional Park. The nearest beach is a 15-minute drive away. Free parking is available on site.

Certain rooms include views of the pool or garden. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms also feature a private terrace.

A buffet breakfast is available for an extra charge.

Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel also provides meeting facilities.

Nîmes is 40 km from Noemys Aigues-Mortes - ex Mona Lisa Royal Hôtel, while Arles is 45 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Boutique Hôtel des Remparts & Spa
description:
Located in a former military station dating from the 18th-century, inside the medieval ramparts of Aigues-Mortes, this refined hotel offers a bar and a terrace with sun loungers. There is also a spa with an indoor heated pool. This boutique hotel is located opposite the Tower of Constance and The Centre for National Monuments.

The guest rooms with ceiling heights between 3.30 and 4 metres feature stone walls, a minibar, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. All rooms come with a bathroom with a free standing bathtub, a walk-in shower, bathrobes and slippers. There is no separation between the sleeping area and the bathroom. They all feature views of the ramparts.

A continental breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed in the lounges or on the terrace, weather permitting.

Guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the hotel’s lounge bar, which features contemporary furniture and panoramic views of the ramparts.

Aigues-Mortes Train Station is a 5-minute walk from the hotel while Montpellier Méditerranée Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Golf de la Grande Motte is 12 km from the hotel.

name: Le Mas Des Sables
description:
Le Mas des Sables welcomes you in a park of 7 hectares of greenery 2km from the ramparts of the medieval city of Aigues-Mortes. Guests are invited to relax in the garden or take a swim in the outdoor pool. Free WiFi and free parking are available. Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer is 28 km away.

Rooms at Le Mas des Sables are air-conditioned and decorated in a Mediterranean style. They are equipped with a telephone, satellite TV and private bathroom. Most of the rooms overlook the garden. Rooms on the ground floor distributed in 4-bedroom pavilions.

The Mas des Sables serves regional specialities in the dining room decorated in Camargue style or on the flowered terrace.

Le Mas des Sables has direct access to the Via Rhôna, a cycling route linking Lake Geneva to the Mediterranean, between stages 20 and 21 of the Avignon to Sète section.

The property is a 20-minute drive from Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport.

name: Hôtel-Restaurant "Chez Carrière"
description:
Hôtel-Restaurant "Chez Carrière" is located in Aigues-Mortes. This hotel features free WiFi and a terrace. The property is situated in the Aigues-Mortes Medieval City district.

At the hotel, the air conditioned rooms are fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast area.

Montpellier is 26 km from Hôtel-Restaurant "Chez Carrière". The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 19 km from the accommodation. Free public parking card is offered upon arrival.

name: Hotel Des 4 Vents
description:
Hotel Des 4 vents is located in Aigues-Mortes, on the Mediterranean coast, 40 km from Nimes and 35 km from Montpellier. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi , defibrillator and an outdoor swimming pool. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the medieval town. The surrounding lakes can be found less than a 10-minute drive away.

Each room at the 4 Vents is equipped with a TV and a private bathroom. Rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast is served daily and the Hotel des 4 Vents has a garden terrace. Guests can relax in the bar.

Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Les Templiers
description:
Housed in an 18th-century merchant's house, Hotel Les Templiers is located inside the Aigues-Mortes fortifications, in southern France. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with en-suite facilities and TVs.

Guests of the Hotel Les Templiers can enjoy a continental breakfast every morning. There is also a bar and a garden. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the hotel’s 24-hour reception.

Guests of the Templiers Hotel can visit there nearby ponds of Ville and Merette. La Grande Motte Golf Course is just 7 km away. Paid public parking can be found nearby.

name: Hotel L'Escale
description:
Set in Aigues-Mortes, within 23 km of Montpellier Arena and 23 km of Parc des Expositions de Montpellier, Hotel L'Escale offers accommodation with a restaurant and a bar, and free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Zenith Sud Montpellier is 27 km from the hotel and Odysseum Shopping Centre is 28 km away.

Montpellier Town Hall is 28 km from the hotel, while The Corum is 32 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 29 km from Hotel L'Escale.

name: La Villa Mazarin
description:
Set in a building dating from the 15th century, La Villa Mazarin is located in the fortified city of Aigues-Mortes. It offers a terrace and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The guest rooms have air conditioning, heating, satellite TV, a telephone and a fridge. All rooms are furnished in 17th-century Provençale style.

In the hotel's restaurant, Salon Mazarin, you can enjoy French culinary specialities or choose from a selection of light meals and snacks. The salon opens onto the courtyard and sun terrace.

Montpellier is 26 km from La Villa Mazarin, while Nîmes is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Mediterranee Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Les Corallines – Thalasso & Spa
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, free access to Spa facilities and cardio training equipment, Hotel & Spa Les Corallines is located on the sea front a 1-minute walk from the beach in La Grande Motte. Free private parking and free WiFi are available onsite.

All the rooms at Les Corallines Hotel boast a sophisticated décor and soothing atmosphere. Floor-to-ceiling bay windows fill them with natural light and open onto a private terrace offering views on the swimming-pool and the sea. Each has a coffee machine, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The rooms offer a direct access to the restaurant and the spa, which you can reach wearing a soft bathrobe.

Guests have free access to the spa facilities including a salt-water indoor pool heated at 32 degrees, a multi-purpose wellness pool, a sauna and a hammam. Massages, treatments and fitness classes are available for an extra charge.
The establishment offers two restaurants, to meet your needs in an ideal setting.

Les Corallines :
In the dining room or on the terrace bordering the swimming pool, the restaurant Les Corallines welcomes you in an elegant atmosphere.
Open from Monday to Saturday from 12.00 to 14.00 > from 19.00 to 21.00
Sunday from 19.00 to 21.00
Le Tamaris :
In a natural and cosy setting, the Tamaris welcomes you indoors or on the terrace with a panoramic view of the Grande Bleue.
Open from 12:00 to 15:00 (Monday to Saturday): Tamaris Dish Dessert Formula at 25 €
> Sunday for brunch from 12.00 to 14.30
The onsite restaurant offers balanced menus, inspired by the Mediterranean cuisine.

For the Restaurant Les Corallines:
3-course menu of the day (starter, main course, dessert excluding drinks) at €38, available only for lunch from Monday to Saturday

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport.

name: GOLF HOTEL
description:
Set in La Grande-Motte, 2 km from Point-Zero Beach, GOLF HOTEL offers accommodation with a fitness centre, a bar and a garden. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel features two hot tubs and a 24-hour front desk.

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning from 7:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. at the GOLF HOTEL.

The hotel offers a snacking service, which includes pizza, fresh fruits or catering jar dishes.
The hotel can also offer advise on restaurants and takeaways that deliver in the area.

Guests at GOLF HOTEL will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Grande-Motte,like cycling, water sports or golf.

The hotel features two hot tubs at 38° and an heated swimming pool available from April to November

The city's Casino, the Pasino, is less than 2km away from the hotel. is 1.8 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 12 km from GOLF HOTEL.

name: Hotel Europe
description:
The hotel is located in the center of La Grande Motte, 10 minutes walk from the beach and 5 minutes walk from the marina. It is also only 150 meters from the Palais des Congrès and the Casino. Montpellier Méditerranée airport is a 20-minute drive from the hotel.

The Hotel Europe was built with the launch of the resort in the 1970's. The preservation of its original architecture makes it charming and attractive.

The 37 rooms are equipped with modern amenities such as flat-screen cable TV, mini-fridge, hospitality tray and air conditioning, as well as a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Some rooms have a terrace or balcony.

The property features free WI-Fi, an outdoor pool and a terrace.

There is a supervised private parking lot, subject to reservation and availability and for an additional fee.

name: Hotel Le Quetzal
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, Hotel Le Quetzal is located in the heart of La Grande Motte, 300 metres from the Mediterranean Sea and its sandy beaches, and 5 minutes' walk from the city centre and Port.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, and a safety deposit box. Free WiFi access is available.

Le Quetzal Hotel features a French boules court. Activities in the area include golf, tennis and horse riding.

Private secured parking is provided for an additional fee, subject to availability. The hotel is situated a 20-minute drive from Montpellier and only a 10-minute drive from Montpellier Airport.

Any guest will have to show a valid credit card upon check-in as per the property's rules

name: Hôtel Café Miramar
description:
Hôtel Café Le Miramar faces the sea in Le Grau-du-Roi, just 600 metres from the Seaquarium. From April to the end of summer, guests can enjoy a private beach with sun loungers for an extra charge.

All the rooms offer reversible air conditioning, soundproofing and a private bathroom with shower or bathtub. A flat-screen TV and free WiFi are provided. Some rooms have sea views. One room can accommodate guests with reduced mobility.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant and you can sample a homemade cocktail throughout the day, while admiring the sea views. The restaurant serves local produce.

Other on-site facilities include newspapers and luggage storage at reception.

The A9 motorway is a 30-minute drive from the property. You may also choose to visit La Grande-Motte or Aigues-Mortes, which are 10 km away.

name: Hôtel boutique Quai d'Azur
description:
In the heart of Le Grau-du-Roi, originally a Mediterranean fishing village that has become a beach resort, this hotel is 65 metres from the canal, and just 300 metres from the beach. It features a shady interior courtyard decorated with plants and vines.

Each room has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

Guests can enjoy a breakfast served in the patio. You can also make use of the shared kitchen, which is equipped with kitchenware, a refrigerator and a microwave.

Hôtel Quai d’Azur is a 5-minute walk from Le Grau-du-Roi Train Station, and 2.5 km from Port Camargue Marina. Montpellier Méditerranée Airport is a 25-minute drive away. A public parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

name: Hôtel Belle Vue d'Angleterre
description:
Offering a terrace and views of the sea, Hôtel Belle Vue d'Angleterre is located in Le Grau-du-Roi in the Languedoc-Roussillon Region, 22 km from Montpellier.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV.

There is luggage storage space at the property.

A free WiFi connection is available on the ground floor of the hotel. Nîmes is 38 km from Hôtel Belle Vue d'Angleterre, while Arles is 43 km from the property. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 15 km away.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Splendid Camargue
description:
Located on the seafront in the historic town centre of Le Grau-du-Roi, the Splendid Hotel Camargue offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The beach is just 5 metres away and some rooms offer balconies with sea views.

Guest rooms at Splendid Hotel have a colourful decor and are soundproofed. They each feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and modern en suite bathrooms with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

Traditional cuisine made with seasonal produce from the local area is served in the restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room or in guests’ rooms upon request.

Additional services offered at the Splendid Hotel Camargue include free newspapers in the lobby area and luggage storage. Public parking is located near the hotel.

The hotel is 800 metres from Le Grau-du-Roi Train Station. There is an aquarium located a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Saint-Clair, côté Plage
description:
The Hôtel Saint-Clair, côté Plage is located in La Grande-Motte. Guests can enjoy a drink in the on-site bar and relax in the garden. Private parking is available on site.

Each air-conditioned room has a private terrace and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room includes a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Hôtel Saint-Clair, côté Plage features free WiFi throughout the property.

A continental breakfast is available every morning and is served in a room with a view of the garden.

Palais des Congrès is 1.2 km away from Hôtel Saint-Clair, côté Plage and the La Grande-Motte Thalasso spa centre is 550 metres away from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport, 16 km away.

name: Hôtel La Plage 5 étoiles La Grande Motte
description:
Located on the seafront, Hôtel La Plage 5 étoiles La Grande Motte offers guests accommodations just a 10-minute walk from the centre of La Grande Motte. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Guests can enjoy dinner at the panoramic restaurant, located on the first floor.

The rooms feature sea views and a private balcony, while the ground floor rooms offer a 35 m² private garden and a terrace. Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a coffee machine and a minibar. The private bathrooms are stocked with bathrobes and free toiletries.

The property features a wellbeing centre "Le Cocon " proposing different types of massages and other treatments.

Private parking is provided at Hôtel La Plage 5 étoiles La Grande Motte for an additional charge, making it easy to explore the Languedoc-Roussillon region by car.

name: Mercure Port La Grande Motte
description:
Located in the seaside resort of La Grande-Motte, this Mercure hotel is next to the marina and a 5-minute walk from the beach. It has a seasonal outdoor pool. Aigues-Mortes is a 20-minute drive away.

The Mercure Port La Grande Motte offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi access and satellite TV. Guest rooms have a private balcony that overlooks the harbour.

In the morning guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast which includes pastries, bread, eggs, bacon, sausages, yoghurts and fresh fruit juice. Regional cuisine is served daily at the Mercure Port’s restaurant and guests are invited to enjoy the bar and terrace.

The Mercure is conveniently placed for accessing various tourist attractions. Local leisure activities include windsurfing and diving.

The hotel is a 17-minute drive from Montpellier Méditerranée Airport.

name: Le Prose Hôtel
description:
Offering an outdoor pool and terrace, Le Prose Hôtel is situated in La Grande-Motte in the Languedoc-Roussillon Region. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi and free private parking are available.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and a restaurant that serves Mediterranean specialities. A brunch with seasonal products is served on Sundays.

Evening entertainment such as DJ sets can be enjoyed on Saturday night until 01:00. Seminar rooms are available at the property. On Saturdays and Sundays in July and August, various activities including brunches, themed evenings and pool parties are hosted onsite.

Montpellier is 25 km from Le Prose Hôtel, while Nîmes is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 15 km from Le Prose Hôtel.

name: Novotel La Grande Motte Golf
description:
Set in La Grande-Motte, opposite an 18-hole golf course, Novotel La Grande Motte Golf boasts a restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can relax on the sun terrace by the seasonal outdoor pool. Montpellier is 26 km away. Private parking is available on site.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and certain rooms have a minibar. The private bathrooms have a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Every room has a private balcony or terrace.

The Ô'Balata restaurant is open all year round and serves Mediterranean cuisine and the terrace overlooks the pool and golf course. Guests can enjoy a drink in the Novotel Café.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a children's playground at the property.

Bike hire is available on site. Nîmes is 36 km from Novotel La Grande Motte Golf, while Arles is 57 km away. Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 17 km from the property.

name: Hotel Le Golfe
description:
Situated on the fishing port of Cassis, Hotel Le Golfe is just 400 metres from the sandy beach. It features an ice-cream parlour and a shaded terrace overlooking the harbour.

A flat-screen TV is provided in each air-conditioned guest room. Some rooms feature a balcony with sea views. All of the rooms have a simple décor and a private bathroom with amenities.

Provencal cuisine, including seafood and salads, is served in the restaurant at Le Golfe hotel. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning.

There is a Provencal market in the village every Wednesday and Friday morning. Cassis Train Station is 3 km from the hotel and Marseille is 28 km away.

name: Best Western Hotel & SPA Coeur De Cassis
description:
Located in the center of Cassis, Best Western Hotel & SPA Coeur de Cassis welcomes you 200 meters from the port and 300 meters from the beach. It offers accommodation with a view of the garden, the town and its castle, and the mythical Cap Canaille. After a great day of visiting the Calanques National Park, enjoy the calm of our hotel and relax in our SPA consisting of a hammam, sauna, experience shower and a herbal tea room with its salt wall . You can also relax on our rooftop!
With an elevator, the hotel is fully equipped to accommodate people with reduced mobility. All rooms at the Best Western Hotel & SPA Coeur De Cassis are air-conditioned and have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a minibar. They have a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. The suites and superior rooms have a Nespresso coffee machine
The buffet breakfast is served every morning in our breakfast room or on its terrace.
Our reception staff will be happy to provide you with all the useful information during your stay to make it as pleasant as possible

name: Best Western Plus Hôtel la Rade
description:
Best Western Plus Hôtel la Rade is located 14 metres from the Cassis fishing port and the Bestouan beach. It has an all year round heated swimming pool, a hot tub and terrace that overlooks the Mediterranean Sea.

All rooms at the Hôtel La Rade are soundproofed and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each room has air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The suites have a private bathroom with a view of the Cap Canaille.

Breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room with panoramic sea views. The Best Western Plus Hôtel la Rade also provides a bar and a 24-hour reception.

Nearby leisure activities include water sports at the beach, tennis and hiking expeditions through the Calanques rock valley. Cassis town centre is just a 5-minute walk away.

Circuit Paul Ricard is 40 minutes' drive away.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Cassitel, Cassis
description:
