The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Cassitel, Cassis is located opposite the Cassis fishing harbour, just a 2-minute walk from the beach and 40 minutes' drive from Circuit Paul Ricard. This hotel offers free WiFi access.

All rooms are air-conditioned and come with a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

A breakfast buffet is served daily at the The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Cassitel, Cassis and there is also a lounge area. The reception is open 24-hours a day and guests can ask for information regarding their stay in Cassis.

It is a 10-minute drive from the A50 motorway and 25 km from Marseille city centre.

name: HPC Suites
description:
Offering a shared outdoor pool with a terrace and views of the sea, HPC Suites is situated in a 4000 metres² park in the centre of Cassis. Marseille is 16 km away and the nearest beach is a 10-minute walk away. Free private parking is available on site.

The property was entirely renovated in 2019. Featuring a terrace, all units include a dining area and a seating area with a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven and microwave. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine. HPC Suites features free WiFi throughout the property. Towels and bed linen are offered.

Free private secure parking is available.

The port is an 8-minute walk away and many restaurants and a traditional Provençal market can be found in the neighbourhood.

You can play table tennis at the property, and the area is popular for diving and cycling. Aix-en-Provence is 35 km from HPC Suites. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 36 km from the property.

name: HOTEL DES CALANQUES
description:
HOTEL DES CALANQUES is located in Cassis. No elevators available.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a balcony. At HOTEL DES CALANQUES all rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the property.

Marseille is 16 km from the accommodation, while Aix-en-Provence is 36 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 36 km from HOTEL DES CALANQUES.

The Private parking is located at 600m away from the property.

name: Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany
description:
With views of the highest cliff in Europe and over the Mediterranean Sea, Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany is set on the beachfront in Cassis. located 30 metres away. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

The contemporary air-conditioned rooms at Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany are equipped a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private terrace with a sea view.

During the high season, Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany has a restaurant open in summer time for dinner only and serving tapas and traditional meals. There is a lounge bar and a sun deck facing the sea. A continental breakfast is available for an extra charge and includes pastries, fruit, meat, cheese.

Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany is just a 5-minute walk from the Port of Cassis and Marseille is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Marignane, 54.5 km away. Circuit Paul Ricard is 40 minutes' drive away and Train station Gare St Charles is 32 km from the hotel. A private car park is available at a surcharge and upon availability.

name: Royal Cottage
description:
Located 5 minutes from the beach and Cassis port, Royal Cottage is surrounded by a tropical garden with an outdoor pool. Its rooms feature a furnished terrace.

Each air-conditioned rooms has modern décor and is equipped with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private bathroom. The duplex rooms have a sea view.

The front desk is open 24 hours a day and free private parking is available on site.

Casino Barrière de Cassis is only 300 metres from the hotel. Marseille is a 22-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Eden Cassis
description:
This hotel is situated in Cassis in the heart of Provence, just 450 metres from the harbour and the Mediterranean Sea. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi internet access.

A flat-screen TV is provided in each of the guest rooms at Hôtel Eden Cassis. They all have a private bathroom and a telephone, and some rooms include a minibar and a terrace.

breakfast is continental buffet.

Private parking is available with extra charge and guided boat rides for the Cassis calanques depart 700 metres away. The hotel is 32 km from central Marseille and Marseille-Saint-Charles Train Station.

name: HôTEL LES VOLETS ROUGES - CASSIS
description:
Offering a sun terrace and views of the garden, HôTEL LES VOLETS ROUGES - CASSIS is an eco-friendly hotel set in Cassis. Free WiFi is provided and free private parking is available on site.

The guest rooms feature a garden view, a wardrobe and a shower.

Cassis centre is 3 km from HôTEL LES VOLETS ROUGES - CASSIS, while Marseille is 13 km and Vélodrome Stadium is 15 km away. Aix-en-Provence is 33 km away and Marseille Provence Airport is 33 km from the property.

name: Les Jardins de Cassis
description:
Set in a Mediterranean-style garden with an outdoor heated swimming pool, and featuring a relaxation area with a hot tub and sauna, this hotel is a 10-minute walk from the centre of Cassis and La Grande Mer Beach. It is located 30 minutes from Marseille and offers free WiFi and 2 free secure car parks.

The air-conditioned guest rooms at Les Jardins de Cassis are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer and some feature a balcony or a terrace.

A continental buffet breakfast is served each morning in the breakfast room or on the terrace by the pool. Les Jardins de Cassis also features a 24-hour bar, which is situated by the pool and offers a terrace.

During their stay, guests are invited to play sports on the multipurpose sports field.

Cassis Train Station is located 1.9 km from the hotel. Circuit Paul Ricard is 35 minutes' drive away.

name: Hôtel Les Roches Blanches Cassis
description:
Providing free WiFi, Hôtel Les Roches Blanches Cassis is situated 1 km from the centre of Cassis. This 5-star hotel offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant. Cap Canaille is 6 km away.

The rooms and suites feature a coffee machine and kettle, while some also have a terrace. The private bathroom has a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hôtel Les Roches Blanches Cassis.

With staff speaking English and French, advice is available at the reception. Marseille Provence Airport is 48 km away.

name: Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine
description:
Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine is located in La Penne-sur-Huveaune, between Marseille and Aubagne. It is easily accessible by the A50 motorway. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi access.

Guest rooms at Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine are equipped with a private bathroom and cable TV.

A full breakfast buffet of pastries and cold meat is served daily. You can also try the contemporary French cuisine of the starter and dessert buffet in the restaurant.

The Kyriad Direct Marseille Est La Valentine provides free private parking. Marseille city centre is just a 15-minute drive away while Circuit Paul Ricard is a 40-minute drive from the property.

name: Moxy La Ciotat
description:
Moxy La Ciotat has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, bar, a shared lounge and terrace in La Ciotat. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the hotel.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Hebrew, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Marseille is 21 km from Moxy La Ciotat, while Cassis is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

name: Le Jardin d'Emile
description:
This typical Provence-style house is a 5-minute walk from Cassis's port. It offers en suite accommodations with either views of the Bestouan beach or the garden with old pine trees. Free WiFi is included.

Le Jardin d’Emile offers individually decorated rooms, each with a different colour and atmosphere. They are all air conditioned and feature a private bathroom and a TV. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire hotel.

Every morning, a continental breakfast is served. At lunchtime, the bar Pastis welcomes you on its outdoor terrace overlooking Cape Canaille.

Le Jardin d’Emile hotel also provides luggage storage, daily newspapers and 24-hour reception.

You can follow the hiking tracks, right next to the hotel, and discover Cassis amazing landscapes. Le Jardin d’Emile is just a 30-minute drive from Marseille and 44 km from Toulon. Free private parking is available on site.

name: B&B HOTEL Marseille La Valentine Porte d'Aubagne
description:
Situated 18 km from Les Calanques de Cassis and from the harbour, B&B HOTEL Marseille La Valentine Porte d'Aubagne offers a grill restaurant ( open from monday to friday), a bar and a terrace. The air-conditioned rooms include an LCD TV with satellite channels.

The heated accommodations at B&B HOTEL Marseille La Valentine Porte d'Aubagne have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

The 24-hour reception hotel includes other facilities such as available newspapers and a safety deposit box. Activities in the surroundings include playing tennis and golf.

The hotel is 10 km from Saint-Charles Train Station and 30 km from Aéroport de Marseille-Marignane. There is a free, private car park on site.

name: Best Western Gemenos en Provence
description:
This modern hotel is located between the heathland and the Mediterranean, just 5 minutes from Aubagne.

Full of light and decorated in a Provençal style, the hotel is new and fully air conditioned.

Here, you are only a quarter of an hour away from the sea and the vibrant city of Marseille, the Castellet circuit and Cassis, with its mesmerising rocky inlets. Close to the hotel you can play tennis and go riding, fishing, climbing and even diving.

name: Hôtel La Croix de Malte
description:
Set in a quiet location in Ciotat town centre, this 2-star hotel is opposite the port and 300 metres from the beach. Guests can relax on the shaded terrace, which leads onto the garden.

Free Wi-Fi access and an LCD TV are featured in the rooms at Hôtel La Croix de Malte. Some rooms have a balcony, views of the sea or garden, or air conditioning.

The buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the restaurant or on the shaded terrace. Guests can also have an aperitif in the bar before sampling La Croix de Malte‘s French cuisine in the restaurant.

Private parking is available upon prior reservation for an additional charge and Marseille Airport is 60 km from the hotel. Ciotat’s main shopping street is 50 metres away and guests can also get information from the tourist office, 300 metres away.

name: B&B HOTEL Marseille La Valentine St Menet
description:
Situated in Marseille, 12 km from Castellane Metro Station, B&B HOTEL Marseille La Valentine St Menet features views of the mountain. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 11 km from La Timone Metro Station.

At the hotel, all rooms include a wardrobe. At B&B HOTEL Marseille La Valentine St Menet all rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace.

Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 12 km from B&B HOTEL Marseille La Valentine St Menet, while Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 35 km from the hotel.

name: Hostellerie de la Crémaillère
description:
Situated in a renovated 18th-century Provençal country house, this hotel is 7 km from the sea and features a bar, a restaurant and a shaded terrace where you can enjoy the breakfast during warmer months.

Provided with an LCD TV and free toiletries, each room at Hostellerie de la Crémaillère includes a telephone, a wardrobe and a desk.

Fresh fruit, cereal, pastries, hot drinks and orange juices are served for breakfast. Traditional dishes prepared with seasonal products are proposed for lunch and dinners, and sometimes jazz music nights are organised.

Several restaurants and supermarkets are 500 metres away and many shops and museums can be found in Aubagne, which is a 10-minute drive away. The Bus Station is 200 metres away and Cassis is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Appart' Hotel La Girafe Marseille Est - Porte d'Aubagne
description:
Apparthotel La Girafe Marseille Est is set in La Penne-sur-Huveaune, 11 km from Marseille and 15 km from the Calanques National Park. The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the garden, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and free secure private parking is available on site.

Each room at this hotel is individually decorated and features air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. All rooms include a private bathroom.

You will find a laundry room at the property.

Cassis is 8 km from Apparthotel La Girafe Marseille Est, while Toulon is 38 km away. Marseille Sallette Golf club is a 3 km drive away. The Villasospa Spa is located 350m away . Marseille Provence Airport is 29 km from the property.

name: Hotel Restaurant Miramar L'orchidée
description:
This family-run hotel is ideally located on the sea side and faces the main sandy beach of La Ciotat. It offers a terrace. Some rooms at the Hotel Miramar offer sea views.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a private bathroom and a TV. Free WiFi access is available.

The Orchidée restaurant serves fine fish specialties and other traditional dishes with regional wine. The meal can be enjoyed in the dining room with panoramic view of the Baie de la Ciotat. Guests then can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar.

Free private parking is provided. It is a 30-minute drive to Marseille and a 1-hour drive from its airport. It also has a close access to Corniche des Crêtes.

name: Hotel SPA Plage St Jean
description:
Hotel Plage St Jean is located in the heart of Saint Jean, 50 metres from the beach. The rooms were fully renovated in January 2019 and have a private shower room, air-conditioning, satellite TV and free WiFi.

Plage St Jean serves drinks in its cosy bar. For afternoon and evening meals, it is located near a variety of restaurants.

The property features a covered and heated relaxation area that includes a swimming pool, sauna and hot tub.

Guests of the Hotel Plage St Jean can enjoy water sports and tennis nearby.

name: Best Western Premier Hôtel du Vieux-Port
description:
Best Western Premier Vieux-Port is located on the old fishing port of La Ciotat. It offers a rooftop swimming pool overlooking the bay and a hot tub.

Decorated in a contemporary style, each of the 5 floors at this hotel has an individual colour scheme. All rooms are equipped with an LCD TV, a minibar and a modern bathroom.

Breakfast is served every day at Best Western Premier Vieux-Port. In the evening, guests can relax with a cocktail in the bar.

Opening directly onto the bay, the hotel is ideally located for exploring the area. Additional facilities include a sauna and Turkish bath. Private parking is available on site and free Wi-Fi access is provided. Circuit Paul Ricard is 35 minutes' drive away.

name: B&B HOTEL Aubagne Gémenos
description:
B&B HOTEL Aubagne Gémenos is located 4 km from Aubagne and 12 km from the Castellet racing circuit. Its rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed with free WiFi internet access.

All of the rooms also have a private shower and a TV with TNT channels. They are decorated in a traditional style.

The reception is open 24 hours a day and you will also find a cold drinks machine in the lobby.

Cassis is a 25-minute drive away and the A50 motorway is just 2.5 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: Royal Hôtel
description:
Set in the heart of Nîmes, Royal Hôtel features an on-site restaurant, La Bodéguita, which opens onto Assas Square. The hotel is within 3 minutes' walk of the Maison Carrée Temple and Carré d'Art Modern Art Gallery. Free WiFi access is available.

The property accepts dogs less than 10 kg .

Accessed via a staircase, every room includes air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a view over the internal patio or Assas Square. Some units feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Breakfast is served daily, made with a selection of fresh organic produce. You can sample Spanish cuisine and fish à la plancha in the restaurant. Tapas can be enjoyed on the bar’s outdoor terrace.

Tango evenings are organised on Assas Square during July and August. There are also regular art viewings and exhibitions held on the square.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 2.7 km from Royal Hôtel. Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport is 53 km from the property.

name: Hôtel De L'Amphithéâtre
description:
Located in the pedestrian area of Nîmes historical city centre, Hôtel De L'Amphithéâtre consists of 2 mansions dating from the 17th and 18th centuries. It is just steps from the Roman Amphitheatre and the temple Maison Carrée.

The rooms are individually and elegantly decorated and all offer a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms offer a view of the Place du Marché, with a fountain representing the town's symbols of a palm-tree and a crocodile.

Guests can find restaurants, cafés and shops within walking distance of the hotel. Nîmes Train Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: SQUARE HOTEL
description:
Situated in Nîmes and with Parc Expo Nîmes reachable within 13 km, SQUARE HOTEL features a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. Some rooms at the property have a balcony with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms feature a wardrobe.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at SQUARE HOTEL.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish and French.

Arles Amphitheatre is 34 km from the accommodation, while Avignon Central Station is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 9 km from SQUARE HOTEL.

name: Hotel Majestic
description:
Renovated in 2019, Hotel Majestic is located in Nîmes, just 320 metres from the Arenas of Nîmes and the town centre. The property is 600 metres from La Romanité Museum, 1 km from Maison Carrée and 30 km from Pont du Gard. Free WiFi is offered throughout.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy hot or cold drinks on the hotel's patio all year round. Breakfast is served daily. The staff will be happy to offer advice on visiting the area.

The hotel is just 300 metres from the Nîme TGV train station. Montpellier-Méditerranée Airport is 52 km from the property.

name: Hotel Cote Patio
description:
Located 900 metres from Nîmes city centre, Hotel Cote Patio is a 5-minute walk from the Arena of Nîmes and a 10-minute walk from the train station. It offers free WiFi access and a patio with outdoor furniture.

Set all around the patio, the heated rooms provide a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite and cable channels. They are all decorated following different styles with warm southern colours, Art Deco or classical atmospheres.

In the summertime, a Continental breakfast including homemade jam and a variety of other breakfast foods is served on the patio. The hotel staff are happy to be of assistance to help you book a table in one of the numerous restaurants in the area.

Hôtel Cote Patio is a 5-minute walk from the airport shuttle and a 23 km from Uzès. The Cévennes National Park is just 43.5 km away. The A9 motorway is a 9-minute drive away. Arles is 33 km away.

name: Kyriad Nîmes Ouest A9
description:
Located a 10-minute drive from the centre of Nîmes, this 3-star hotel is ideally located 2 km from the exit 25 of the A9 motorway. You can browse the free 20 mbps WiFi or relax in the outdoor living areas.

Each room at Kyriad Nîmes Ouest A9 has tea and coffee-making facilities and a flat-screen TV with international channels, including Canal. Decorated in Mediterranean tones, the rooms also have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room or in the garden. You can also relax in the lounge bar with an aperitif before dining in the nearby restaurants.

Free private parking is available on site and Nîmes Airport is a 15-minute drive away. You may also choose to play golf at Vacquerolles or Golf Nîmes Campagne, both a 20-minute drive from the hotel. This Kyriad hotel also has a 24-hour reception.

name: Logis NIMOTEL Hôtel Cosy
description:
Nimotel is located 1 km from the A9 motorway and a 10-minute drive from central Nimes. It has 24-hour reception, a secure outdoor pool and free WiFi access.

The air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also feature coffee and tea making facilities.

Nimotel’s restaurant, Partage, serves a range of traditional dishes and Provencal specialities. There is also a bar and a poolside terrace where guests can relax. A buffet breakfast is available daily.

Free on-site parking is available for guests exploring the Languedoc-Roussillon region by car.

name: ibis budget Nimes Centre Gare
description:
Located just 50 metres from Nîmes Train Station, ibis budget Nimes Centre Gare offers a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access in the entire hotel. The city centre is a 5-minute walk away.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and soundproofing. They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is offered daily at the hotel. Quick drinks and snacks are also available from the on-site vending machines.

Montpellier and Le Grau-du-Roi are a 45-minute drive away. Nîmes-Alès-Carmague Airport is ideally located a 10-minute drive away and private parking is possible nearby.

name: Best Western Marquis de la Baume
description:
Located in the centre of the historic town of Nîmes, Hôtel Marquis de la Baume is a 17th-century town house just 3.7 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 650 metres from Nîmes Arena. Free WiFi is provided.

The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a satellite flat-screen TV, a minibar and an electric kettle. There is a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served everyday in the comfort of guest rooms or in the interior patio, weather permitting.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

The hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the Colosseum and the Magne Tower. Public parking is available nearby.

name: hotelF1 Nîmes Ouest
description:
Hotelf1 Nîmes Ouest is situated in Nîmes, 44 km from Montpellier and 40 km from Avignon.

Every room has a shared bathroom.Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Nîmes is 2.8 km from Hotelf1 Nîmes Ouest, while Arles is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 41 km from the property.

name: Central Hotel
description:
Central Hotel is set in a renovated, 18th-century building, in the historical centre of Nimes, right behind the ancient roman site, the Porte d’Auguste. It offers soundproofed rooms with private bathrooms.

The guest rooms’ doors are decorated by a local artist. Each room is equipped with a TV and a shower.
Some rooms feature views of Nimes’ rooftops and the Magna Tower.

The Central Hotel has a private bar, and a traditional French breakfast is served every morning. Room service is also available.

Free WiFi access is provided in the Central’s common areas, and guests also have access to a luggage room. There is also 1 room suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

Central Hotel is 100 metres from a shuttle stop for Nimes Airport, and less than a 10-minute walk from the Gare de Nimes TGV Train Station. The Notre-Dame-et-Saint-Castor Cathedral is just 280 metres away.

name: Hotel Des Tuileries
description:
The Hotel des Tuileries is close to the center of Nîmes, near the famous Nîmes Arena and a 5-minute walk from the Court of First Instance. It offers comfortable 3-star accommodation with free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and nicely decorated. They all feature cable TV, a refrigerator and storage space. Each private bathroom includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is prepared each morning and can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or delivered to your room.

The Old Nîmes Museum and the cathedral are a 10-minute walk from this hotel. The Musée de la Romanité is 550 meters from the hotel, and the Nîmes train station is only 350 meters away. Private parking is available nearby.

name: ibis Styles Nimes Gare Centre
description:
Located opposite the train station in Nimes, this hotel offers low-cost rooms with free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. A buffet breakfast is prepared every morning and reception is open 24 hours a day.

Decorated in a contemporary style, the air-conditioned guest rooms have a flat-screen TV and radio. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

You can enjoy a drink from the bar, which is open all day, at the ibis Styles Nimes Centre Gare. Additional facilities include newspapers and luggage storage.

The Arena of Nîmes, its historical centre and Nimes Cathedral are situated a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Concorde
description:
Located on a pedestrian street in the centre of Nîmes, Hotel Concorde offers simple guest rooms equipped with free Wi-Fi access. The ancient Roman Arena of Nîmes is 200 metres away.

Only accessed via a steep staircase, guest rooms at Hotel Concorde include a TV and a wardrobe. Some rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and toilet. Guests can borrow from a selection of books and comics from the hotel during their stay.

Restaurants, bars and grocery shops are located 50 metres from the property. Nîmes Contemporary Art Museum is 650 metres away and the Jardins de la Fontaine, a classic 17th century garden, is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Concorde.

Guests can also visit Pont Du Gard which is 30 km from the hotel. Nîmes Train Station is an 8-minute walk away and Montpellier Airport is 53 km away. Public parking is located nearby.

name: Hôtel Le Pré Galoffre
description:
Le Pré Galoffre enjoys a quiet, rural setting, a 10-minute drive from central Nimes. It has an outdoor pool and sun terrace and offers free WiFi.

The guest rooms are located in a traditional Provençal stone building. Each features air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Hotel Galoffre provides a wide range of breakfast options daily and guests can dine by the pool in fine weather.

Le Pré Galoffre can provide a bicycle or car rental service as well as packed lunches. Hiking and horse riding are both available nearby.

Free parking is available on site for guests arriving by car. The A9 and A54 motorways are both 4 km away. Nîmes–Alès–Camargue–Cévennes Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

When booking more than 4 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

name: Best Western L'Orangerie
description:
Hôtel Best Western l’Orangerie situé à Nîmes vous propose un cadre de détente et de découverte avec une localisation à 1km du centre historique de Nîmes.

L’établissement possède une piscine extérieure et certaines chambres possèdent des espaces extérieurs privatifs.
Toutes les chambres ont une salle de bain avec douche, un bureau, une armoire, une télévision écran LCD, un accès Wifi gratuit et un plateau de courtoisie en guise de bienvenue.

Un parking privé est mis à disposition gracieusement.

Vous pourrez également profiter du petit déjeuner sous forme de buffet.

À proximité de l'hôtel, vous pourrez découvrir les arènes, la maison carrée et le musée de la Romanité. Vous pourrez visiter le Pont du Gard à 24 km, Uzès à 27 km et la Camargue (à 40 km) avec les belles plages de notre région (Le Grau du Roi et les Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer).

Notre établissement accepte également votre animal de compagnie !
Pour une réservation avec un animal nous vous prions de nous contacter au 04.66.84.50.57 pour vérifier la disponibilité de nos chambres adaptées.

name: Kyriad Nimes Centre
description:
Kyriad Nîmes Centre hotel is in the heart of Nîmes, integrated in the oldest district of the city close to the Roman arena, the Maison Carrée, museums and shopping streets. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

Air conditioning and double glazing feature in all rooms equipped with private bathroom with hairdryer. They also have a flat-screen TV and a welcome tray with tea and coffee making facilities and biscuits.

Breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and on-site, secure parking is available, upon reservation and subject to availability.

name: Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur
description:
Conveniently set in Nîmes, Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Among the various facilities are a garden, a terrace, as well as a bar. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur features certain rooms with city views, and all rooms come with a coffee machine. All units include a safety deposit box.

At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving French cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always at hand to help.

Parc Expo Nîmes is 14 km from Margaret - Hôtel Chouleur, while Arles Amphitheatre is 33 km away. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes, 9 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Empire Hôtel
description:
Empire Hôtel is located in the heart of Nimes, opposite Nimes Cathedral and 800 metres from the Roman Arènes de Nîmes. Free WiFi access is available.

Each guest room at Empire Hôtel also has a TV, a desk and a private bathroom.

Nimes TGV Train Station is just 1km from the Empire. Carré d'Art Museum is 800 metres away.

name: ibis Nîmes Ouest - A9
description:
Located right next to the exit 25 of the A9 motorway, ibis Nîmes Ouest is located 4 km from the centre of Nîmes and 12 km from Nîmes Airport. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi.

Rooms at ibis Nîmes Ouest are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, radio and desk. The private bathroom has a shower or bath and all rooms can be accessed by an elevator.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away.

Please note that our restaurant is open from Monday to Friday under request
On Saturdays and Sundays, our restaurant is closed but different restaurants can welcome you around the hotel.
Snacks are available Saturdays and Sundays, there is also a bar with a terrace.

There is a 24-hour reception and daily newspapers are at the disposal of guests.

Vacquerolles Golf Course is 7 km from the hotel. The Pont du Gard Roman bridge is 25 km away and the historic town of Uzès is a 40-minute drive from the hotel. Free, secured parking is available on site.

name: B&B HOTEL Nîmes Centre Arènes
description:
Hôtel B&B Nimes Centre Arènes is located in Nîmes. Free WiFi access is available. It is 950 metres from the Arena of Nîmes.

Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Private bathroom has a shower. You can enjoy city view from the room. Extras include bed linen and ironing facilities.

Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine.

The property is just a 2-minute walk from the Dhuoda Tram Stop which will take you to the Arena and the historical city centre.

The hotel is 50 km from Montpellier Méditerranée Airport. Limited private parking is available.

name: HÔTEL C SUITES chambres spacieuses
description:
Offering an outdoor pool, C Suites is a urban resort located in Nîmes just 3 km from the Arenas. This fully renovated hotel is set in a 1-hectare tree-filled park, a tennis court, and a boules court.

C Suites rooms all offer free WiFi access, a flat-screen TV with international channels as well as a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

Guests can enjoy the C Unik wine and tapas bar, situated close to the swimming pool. A large selection of wines and cigars are available.

At C Suites you will find a 24-hour front desk and free parking. Conveniently located 1.5 km from the Motorway exit, the hotel is 1.5 km from Parc Expo Nîmes and 5.7 km from Nimes Vacquerolles Golf Course. Within 40 km, guests can also visit, Pont du Gard, Avignon, Arles and Aigues-Mortes.

name: Hotel Mas De Galoffre
description:
Located a 5-minute drive from the centre of Nîmes and Camargues, Hotel Mas de Galoffre, set in a Provençal estate, is an ideal starting point to discover the region and many activities. Free on-site parking is available.

The hotel offers standard and superior rooms with bathrooms and a flat screen TV. Free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout the hotel.

For your comfort, Hotel Mas de Galoffre provides a swimming pool, tennis courts, horseback-riding and a golf course nearby.

The restaurant of the hotel proposes regional cooking that can be served on the terrace facing the garden or the swimming-pool.

name: Thalacap Camargue
description:
Thalacap Camargue faces the beach in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 5 minutes' walk from the city centre. You will enjoy a seasonal outdoor seawater swimming pool as well as an indoor swimming pool, sauna and hammam all year round at no additional cost

All of the rooms at Thalacap Camargue have a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access and air conditioning.

The restaurant serves Mediterranean-style meals. Weather permitting, meals can be enjoyed on the terrace with a panoramic view of the sea.

In addition to the other relaxation facilities, guests have direct access to a Thalassotherapy centre, which provides a number of health and beauty treatments for an additional charge.

Arles is 37 km away. private parking is available on site for 10€/night.

name: Maison Albar Hotels L’Imperator
description:
Maison Albar Hotels L’Imperator is a luxury hotel located in the city of Nimes. Bordering the Jardin de la Fontaine, L'Imperator is less than five minutes’ walk from the Maison Carrée Roman temple and the Carrée d'Art museum. Past guests of this historic hotel include Ava Gardner, Ernest Hemingway, and Torero El Cordobes.

Rooms are in a Mediterranean style with natural stone, marble and wood. Equipped with a walk-in shower, each room also has a Smart TV with ChromeCast so you can view and share your personal content. Some rooms overlook the hotel gardens.

L'Imperator boasts a 24/7 reception desk, and has baby equipment and services for children. The Spa by CODAGE offers an indoor and outdoor pool, a Jacuzzi, a sensory shower and a hammam, as well as a full range of massages.

L’Imperator is the home of Pierre Gagnaire, an award-winning chef elected best chef in the world by his peers, and the two onsite restaurants offer guests 2 different gastronomic experiences. The Duende gourmet restaurant is the place to experience extraordinary flavours. L'Impé brasserie, situated on the Imperator’s inner patio in the shade of a Gingko Biloba tree, serves a generous and refined cuisine highlighting local produce.

The Hemingway Bar offers cocktails in a relaxed setting. A continental breakfast is served daily, or you can enjoy breakfast in your room.

A private, on-site car park is available upon reservation. Nimes TGV Train Station is less than 2 km from L'Imperator.

name: Hôtel Casa Marina
description:
Hôtel Casa Marina is situated on the beachfront in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 400 metres from Arenas Beach and less than 1 km from Crin Blanc Beach. With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set 90 metres from Amphora Beach.

At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. All rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also offer a terrace and others also have sea views. At Hôtel Casa Marina the rooms include bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Arles Amphitheatre is 39 km from Hôtel Casa Marina. The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Novotel Atria Nimes Centre
description:
Located in Nîmes city centre, this hotel is just minutes from the train station, the Arènes Roman amphitheatre, and the town’s main square.

It features 119 air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, a bar, and 9 conference rooms.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, and French cuisine is proposed by the hotel’s restaurant. Guests are invited to relax at the bar, which offers drinks and snacks.

name: Hotel Le Bleu Marine
description:
Bleu Marine is just 150 metres from Mediterranean beaches and 300 metres from the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer village. It features a fenced, outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers and free Wi-Fi.

Several rooms at Hotel Le Bleu Marine have a balcony with pool view. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

The buffet breakfast is served every morning. Many shops and restaurants are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Hot and cold drinks are available upon request.

There is a thalassotherapy centre just 100 metres from the hotel's door.

Hotel Le Bleu Marine is 40 km from Arles and 60 km from Montpellier. Free parking is available on site.

name: Les Rizières
description:
Set by a pond, Les Rizières is a hotel situated 2.8 km from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and 2.4 km from Pont De Gau Ornithological Park with its pink flamingos. All the rooms are situated at ground-level around a patio planted with trees.

Air-conditioning, satellite TV and a minibar feature in the rooms. Free WiFi internet access is available throughout the hotel.

The seasonal outdoor, heated swimming pool is surrounded by a furnished sundeck.

Less than 10 km from Les Rizières is the Camargue National Park and the sea is just 2.8 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Mirage
description:
Hôtel Le Mirage is 100 metres from the beach and 200 metres from Sainte-Marie-de-la-Mer Marina. It offers a garden with lounge chairs. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The heated non-smoking rooms at Le Mirage feature a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a desk. A mosquito net and a private bathroom are also provided.

Guests can have a continental breakfast every morning in the dining room or in the garden at Le Mirage. A range of restaurants and a grocery store can be found within 200 metres of the property.

This hotel is a 30-minute drive from Arles and 4 km from Pont de Gau Ornithological Park. Free public parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Les Palmiers En Camargue
description:
Situated 100 metres from sandy beaches and 200 metres from Eglise des Stes Maries in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, Hotel Les Palmiers En Camargue features free WiFi access.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms.

A buffet breakfast with both sweet and savoury options is served at the property.

You can engage in various activities, such as horse riding, windsurfing and cycling.

Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport is 53 km from the property. Public parking is available 50 metres away at no extra cost while private garage parking is available upon request for an extra charge.

name: Abrivado
description:
Set in the Camargue Regional Park, Abrivado is an air-conditioned hotel located beside the harbour in the town of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. It is 50 metres from the beach and the surrounding shops. Free WiFi access is provided in the guest rooms.

A TV is included in the rooms, which feature a simple décor. 12 of the rooms offer a sea view and 6 of them also feature a private furnished terrace. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is offered every morning at the hotel Abrivado for an extra charge.

Low-cost public parking is available nearby, and you can visit Arles, located 40 km away. Montpellier Airport is 52 km from the hotel. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Le Fangassier
description:
Located in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d’Azur region, Le Fangassier a hotel set in a Camargue-style building 600 metres from the beach in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. It offers free WiFi access.

All the air-conditioned rooms at Le Fangassier feature a telephone and a flat-screen TV. A bathroom with a bath or shower is also provided. Some rooms have a private terrace or balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Le Fangassier.

Shops and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk.

This hotel is a 15-minute drive from Château d’Avignon and Arles is 37 km away.

name: Hotel Le Méditérranée
description:
Situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Region, 100 metres from Eglise des Stes Maries and a 2-minute walk away from the beach and the port, Hotel Le Méditérranée features a sun terrace and views of the garden. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is offered.

The rooms have a flat-screen TV. Breakfast is served every morning on the terrace.

You will find luggage storage space at the property.

Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport is 34 km from the property.

name: Mas de la Fouque - Hôtel & Spa
description:
At the gates of the Mediterranean

A place of relaxation, change of scenery and inspiration, located just two kilometers from wild beaches and surrounded by nature, Le Mas de la Fouque invites you on a journey full of simplicity and discovery. Take advantage of your getaway to recharge your batteries, discover the Camargue lands and appreciate the soothing atmosphere.

The hotel
17 rooms, 7 suites, 3 trailers, with the same promise: that of authenticity and simplicity. Each room is unique and combines contemporary design and antique furniture. All open to the outside, they offer an exceptional view of the Camargue landscape and the marshes.

The rooms at Mas de la Fouque are equipped with all the comforts you need, including a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, air conditioning, and free Wi-Fi. The hotel offers many services, such as room service, concierge and private parking with sockets for your electric vehicles.

The restaurant La Table de Marius
The restaurant La Table de Marius highlights typical cuisine revisiting local and seasonal products, all presented on a menu with the sweet scent of Camargue. The chef surrounds himself with family and sustainable production. Discover our menus here: https://www.masdelafouque.com/restaurant-la-table-de-marius/

La Table de Marius is a member of the Conservatoire Grand Sud des Cuisines de Camargue, an association promoting the products and culinary heritage of the Camargue.

The Nuxe Spa
To relax, the Nuxe Spa at Mas de la Fouque welcomes you in an exceptional wild environment. A parenthesis suspended in a rich and unusual setting, to relax and regenerate.

The key is treatments carried out with products from the Nuxe brand, recognized for its expertise in natural cosmetology, in an isolated space, out of sight, surrounded by nature. Discover them here: https://www.masdelafouque.com/spa-nuxe/

Useful information
- Mas de La Fouque is located in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, just 10 minutes by car from the city center.
- The restaurant is closed Monday and Tuesday evenings; cold trays are offered as replacements, they must be ordered before 3 p.m. the same day.
- Continental breakfast, buffet style, is included in the reservation (soft and semi-salted butters, artisanal jams, Camargue honey, fresh fruit, pastries, hot drinks, fruit juices and artisanal yogurts).
- The spa is open 7 days a week from 10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m., excluding exceptional closures, and is accessible by reservation only.
- Privatized access to the Nuxe Spa facilities excluding treatments (hot tub, whirlpool bath, ice river, sauna, and heated indoor swimming pool)

name: Hôtel Les Arcades
description:
Just 100 metres from the nearest beach and 400 metres from the church in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, this 3-star hotel offers free WiFi access throughout the property. It is 35-minute drive from Arles and a thalassotherapy centre can be found nearby.

The rooms at Hôtel Les Arcades feature an LCD TV. a work desk and a mosquito net. Some rooms are air-conditioned and all have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. You can also enjoy one of the bar’s selection of soft drinks on the terrace.

Le Grau-du-Roi is a 45-minute drive from Les Arcades and Nîmes is 45 km away. Guests can explore the coastline and the Camargue Natural Regional Park. Free public parking is available 50 metres from the property and there is a space in front of the hotel where guests can park to unload their car.

name: Hotel Mas des Lys
description:
Hotel Mas des Lys is situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Camargues region, a 30-minute drive from Arles. It offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned guest rooms with a private terrace.

The guest rooms at Hotel Mas des Lys include a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a wardrobe. They each feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet-style breakfast is served every morning and drinks can be enjoyed in the hotel bar. Restaurants are found within 2 km of the hotel and free Wi-Fi is provided in public areas.

Free private parking is provided and guests can rent bicycles and go horseback riding on site. The property is a 45-minute drive from Nîmes and a 50-minute drive from Montpellier.

name: Mas De Calabrun
description:
Featuring an outdoor pool, boules pitch and table tennis table, Mas de Calabrun is a hotel located on a private estate in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Camargue Regional Park. The beach is 8 minutes' drive away. It offers free WiFi.

The air-conditioned guest rooms feature traditional Camargue décor, a flat-screen TV and a view of the garden or pool. There is a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer.

The Calabrun can also organise horse riding and jeep tours.

Free private parking is available on site and the hotel is an hour’s drive south of Nimes.

name: Clamador
description:
Clamador is a hotel located 2 km from Saintes-Marie-de-la-Mer and just 1 km from the beach. Guests can enjoy mini golf and boles on site.

The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV and telephone.

The hotel is in a quiet natural setting and has an outdoor swimming pool, and you can enjoy a picnic beside the pool or use the barbecue in the garden. There is also a bar.

The hotel is between Rhone and Etangs and is easily accessible from the D38 road. It provides guests with free private parking.

name: Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa
description:
Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer has 4-star accommodation with a garden, a terrace and a bar. Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, this property is located near attractions such as Eglise des Stes Maries. There is a restaurant.

Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. All guest rooms at Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms come with a balcony.

The accommodation offers a buffet breakfast. The restaurant is open every day except on Tuesday and Wednesday.

The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 33 km from Mangio Fango Hotel et Spa.

name: L'auberge Camarguaise
description:
Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace, L'auberge Camarguaise is situated in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. The property was renovated in March 2016 and offers free private parking and free WiFi throughout.

Every room includes A double bed a private terrace, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with a bath.

There is a shared lounge and a bar at the property and bicycle hire is available.

The area is popular for horse riding and cycling.

The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 50 km from L'auberge Camarguaise.

name: Le Mas de Cocagne
description:
Le Mas de Cocagne features a seasonal heated outdoor swimming pool and a garden. It is located at the entrance of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, just 800 metres from the sandy beaches and the town centre.

Le Mas de Cocagne rooms and suites have a blend of contemporary and traditional Camargue region décor. They feature air conditioning and free WiFi access. Each room has a private bathroom and views over the gardens, the marshes or the swimming pool.

A buffet breakfast is served daily beside the pool. Guests can relax in the seasonal hot tub or enjoy various massages on site, upon reservation only.

Guests can explore the historical village of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, with its fortified church. Also take advantage of the outdoor activities on offer in the countryside surrounding Le Mas de Cocagne. These include horse riding, cycling and boat trips.

name: Vila De La Mar & Spa
description:
Vila De La Mar & Spa is a small hotel featuring modern design located in the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 100 metres from the beach. There is a heated outdoor swimming pool, covered during winter, and a spa with hammam and hot tub.

Each air-conditioned room features a private terrace, a minibar and a large flat-screen TV with cable channels.

Guests can enjoy a restaurant with a terrace overlooking the pool. On some weekends a dinner hosted by Gypsy guitarists and singers can be provided for a surcharge. A continental breakfast is also available and in-room breakfast is possible for a surcharge.

Activities in the area include windsurfing, horse riding and boat excursions. Vila De La Mar & Spa is surrounded by the Camargue Regional Nature Park and faces the Mediterranean Sea. Guests can also enjoy four wheel, bicycle or carriage rides during their stay.

The property is within 60 km from both Nîmes and Garons Airports, and 120 km from Marseille Marignane Airport. Arles Train Station is 36 km away.

name: Hôtel du Pont Blanc
description:
Set in Saintes-Marie- de-la-Mer, Hôtel du Pont Blanc sits in a flowery garden with terrace and swimming pool, just an 8-minute walk from the beach. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are provided.

The hotel’s rooms feature a terrace with garden views and a flat-screen TV. They all have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries, hairdryer and bathtub.

Every morning, a continental breakfast is served at the hotel at an extra cost. Throughout the day, you can find your little quiet corner in our garden. A little reading break? A little nap in the shade of our pines? Let yourself be tempted. A range of restaurants are to be found a 5-minute walk away.

Saintes-Marie- de-la-Mer city centre is just a 5-minute walk away. Guests can drive 25 km to Aigues-Mortes or 34 km to Le-Grau-du-Roi. Arles Train Station is 35 km away.

name: Les Bains Gardians
description:
Situated in a quiet natural environment in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, Les Bains Gardians offers comfortable rooms, 1 outdoor swimming pools, and hot tub, a tennis court and an equestrian centre. Guests also have access to free WiFi.

Guest rooms are equipped with a private terrace from which guests can admire the surroundings. They also have a private bathroom, a TV and a minibar. The entire property is non-smoking, and this is strictly enforced.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning, which includes a wide selection of homemade breads and rolls, cake, cheeses, cold meats, eggs, mushrooms, sausages, fruit juices, coffee and tea, yoghurt, salmon and fresh fruits.

Additional facilities include a bar and 1 restaurant, one of which serves traditional Provençal dishes.

At the Les Bains Gardians, it is possible to play tennis or table tennis, go horse riding, mountain biking or enjoy an excursion in a 4x4. There is also a children’s pony club. Free secure parking is available at night.

name: Hotel Lou Marquès
description:
Lou Marquès is located in Les Saintes Maries De La Mer, in Camargue Regional Nature Park. It offers free WiFi and a sunny terrace and it is just 400 metres from the beaches.

All the air-conditioned rooms at Lou Marquès come with an LCD TV and a telephone. They all have a private bathroom with a shower and some of them also include a private terrace.

You may have your breakfast served in the communal lounge or take it on the terrace. You can ask the reception about the nearest restaurants.

Free public parking is available on site and the hotel is a 5-minute drive from Pont de Gau Ornithological Park. Arles is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Mas de la Grenouillère Hôtel et Centre équestre en pleine nature
description:
This hotel and horse riding centre is set in a Provencal farm house in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the Camargue Regional Nature Park. It has a garden and an outdoor pool lined with a sun terrace.

Each air-conditioned room offers free Wi-Fi and opens up to a terrace with views of the garden. All rooms include flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and have facilities for making hot drinks.

Breakfast can be enjoyed every morning on guests’ own private terraces. Mas de la Grenouillère Hôtel et Centre équestre en pleine nature organises horseback riding lessons and tours of the surrounding area.

Free parking for cars and bikes is available on site and the banks of the Petit Rhône River are just 1 km away. The hotel is 36 km from the city of Arles and the Arles Train Station.

name: Les Vagues
description:
Featuring a restaurant, bar and views of sea, Les Vagues is located in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer, 300 metres from Arenas Beach. The property is around 400 metres from Crin Blanc Beach, 500 metres from Amphora Beach and 39 km from Arles Amphitheatre. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and free toiletries, all units at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a terrace. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Activities such as hiking, snorkelling, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront.

The nearest airport is Nimes-Ales-Camargue-Cevennes Airport, 41 km from Les Vagues.

name: Le Dauphin Bleu
description:
Located 50 metres from the beach, Le Dauphin Bleu faces the Mediterranean Sea and is 400 metres from the centre of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer's historic old town. The hotel offers free WiFi in the guest rooms.

All rooms are air-conditioned and have a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and some have sea views.

Situated in the Rhône delta, this hotel is just 700 metres from a fortified church dating from the Middle Ages. The local area also offers water sports such as windsurfing. Le Dauphin Bleu is 56.1km from Montpelier Airport.

name: Matabi Hotel Toulouse Gare by HappyCulture
description:
Well located in Toulouse, Matabi Hotel Toulouse Gare by HappyCulture provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers room service and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 5.5 km from Toulouse Stadium.

At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Matabi Hotel Toulouse Gare by HappyCulture all rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak Arabic, English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near Matabi Hotel Toulouse Gare by HappyCulture include Toulouse-Matabiau Station, Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station and Jean-Jaures Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Ours Blanc - Wilson
description:
Located in the very heart of Toulouse, Hotels Ours Blanc is in a prime position close to the Wilson, Victor Hugo and Capitole squares. Toulouse Stadium is 3.5 km away.

Hotel Ours Blanc - Wilson boasts 32 elegantly decorated rooms in which to enjoy a quiet and relaxing atmosphere. All rooms are soundproofed, air-conditioned and offer wireless internet access.

The hotel enjoys a central location in the heart of Toulouse, near cinemas, department stores, theatres, museums,and restaurants. Make sure you spend some time discovering the famous Canal du Midi, one of Unesco's World Heritage sites.

name: Ibis Styles Toulouse Centre Canal du Midi
description:
The ibis Styles Toulouse Center Canal du Midi is located in the center of Toulouse, on the banks of the Canal du Midi and next to the Halle aux Grains concert hall, just 1 km from Place du Capitole and 3.5 km from of the Toulouse stadium. Wi-Fi is available free of charge.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Ibis Styles Toulouse Center Canal du Midi each have a private bathroom. A flat-screen TV is also present in each room. The rooms are accessible by a lift.

A continental buffet breakfast is served every morning. The Ibis Styles Toulouse Center Canal du Midi offers a 24-hour reception and free newspapers. Private parking is available for an additional charge.

The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Toulouse-Matabiau Train Station and 4 km from the Parc des Expositions. Toulouse-Blagnac airport is 15 minutes away by car. François Verdier metro station is a 5-minute walk away. Secure underground parking is available at an additional cost.

name: Auberge de la Fadaise
description:
Auberge de la Fadaise is located in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer in the heart of the Camargue region, a 5-minute drive from the beach. It boasts an outdoor pool and guests can enjoy horse-riding on-site and around Camargue upon reservation.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some have a view of the pool, and some have a balcony. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

A continental breakfast is available daily for an extra fee. Homemade meals and local specialities can be prepared by the hosts upon reservation. Sandwiches, drinks and ice creams are available for an extra charge throughout the day.

With free private parking on site, the hotel is 5 km from Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer and a 20-minute drive from Aigues-Mortes. The Pont de Gau Ornithological Park is located 200 m from the hotel

name: Hotel Ours Blanc - Centre
description:
The Hotel Ours Blanc is located on the Place Victor Hugo, in central Toulouse. The Hotel Ours Blanc is situated 200 metres from Jeanne d’Arc Metro Station. Toulouse Stadium is 4 km from the property. Free WiFi is available in common areas.

Each guest room is soundproofed, air-conditioned and has a TV and high speed WiFi access.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast. You will find numerous restaurants nearby.

Guests can visit the nearby theatres, Gaumont and UCG cinemas. Hotel Ours Blanc – Centre can also visit the nearby Canal du Midi, the Place du Capitole and the Victor Hugo Market.

name: Hotel Wilson Square
description:
Hotel Wilson Square is located in the heart of Toulouse's historic city centre, just 200 metres from Place du Capitole. Toulouse Stadium is 4 km away. The hotel offers soundproofed accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi internet access.

Each guest room at the Wilson Square has a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They all are serviced by a lift.

The Wilson Square Hotel is just a few minutes’ walk from Capitole Metro station, which provides access to the city’s main attractions. There is also an airport shuttle stop and a public parking nearby.

name: Le Clocher de Rodez Centre Gare
description:
Hôtel Le Clocher de Rodez is located in the heart of Toulouse, 700 metres from the Toulouse-Matabiau Train Station. It offers soundproofed accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi internet access.

Each guest room at Le Clocher de Rodez hotel is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. Rooms are serviced by a lift and have a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Le Clocher de Rodez.

The hotel provides a 24-hour reception, and massages are also available upon request.

Le Clocher de Rodez is close to Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station and 600 metres from the Capitole Square. A public shuttle service to Blagnac Airport runs every 20 minutes. Toulouse Stadium is 4.5 km from the property.

name: The Social Hub Toulouse
description:
Attractively located in Toulouse, The Social Hub Toulouse features air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Boasting a shared lounge, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Guests can have a drink at the bar.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Rooms are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms include a kitchenette fitted with a fridge. At The Social Hub Toulouse every room has bed linen and towels.

You can play billiards and table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling.

The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

Popular points of interest near The Social Hub Toulouse include Pierre Baudis Japanese Garden, Compans Caffarelli Metro Station and Saint-Cyprien Republique Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Arnaud Bernard Hôtel
description:
Located in downtown Toulouse, the Arnaud Bernard Hotel is next to the Metro Compans Cafarelli and Pierre Baudis Congress Centre. The air-conditioned rooms have free Wi-Fi access.

Each guest room at the Arnaud Bernard Hotel also has wooden floors, a view onto the patio or the street, a flat-screen TV and an en suite bathroom with shower or bath, free toiletries, a hairdryer and toilet. The road-side rooms are soundproofed.

Arnaud Bernard Hotel also has a lovely interior patio area. A continental breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room.

The staff at this family-run hotel will be happy to help you organise your stay in Toulouse. Place du Capitol is just 800 metres away.

There is a public car park at an extra cost 100 metres away.

name: Hôtel Le Capitole
description:
Situated in the centre of Toulouse, this hotel is just 180 metres from the Place du Capitole and its Metro station. It offers bright and airy rooms with cable TV and free WiFi. Toulouse Stadium is 4 km away.

The guest rooms at Le Capitole are air-conditioned and come with private bathrooms. Each room is serviced by a lift and breakfast can be taken in the room at surcharge.

Le Capitole’s staff are available to assist 24 hours a day, and the hotel provides room service. It is located next to Jeanne d'Arc Bus Station where you can take a shuttle to Toulouse Blagnac Airport.

The Capitole is just a 5-minute walk from the Theatre du Capitole and 400 metres from the Saint-Sernin Basilica. Public parking is available 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Le Père Léon
description:
Located in the centre of Toulouse, this 3-star hotel is just in front of Esquirol Metro Station and 3 km from Toulouse Stadium. It offers free WiFi access and en suite rooms serviced by an elevator.

All the air-conditioned rooms at Hôtel Le Père Léon are soundproofed and feature a flat-screen TV with Canal+ and BeIn sport channels. They provide a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower. Some are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel Le Père Léon. Restaurants and cafés can be found within 350 metres of the property.

This hotel is 180 metres from the Augustins Museum and a 3-minute walk from the Garonne River. Saint-Sernin Basilica is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Plaza Hotel Capitole Toulouse - Anciennement-formerly CROWNE PLAZA
description:
The 4* Plaza Hotel (formely Crowne Plaza) is ideally located in the heart of the city, 200meters from Capitole underground train network, 10km from Blagnac Airport and 15km from the Exhibition & Convention Center MEETT.
The Capitole Opera House is 200meters from the hotel & Pierre Baudis Convention Center is a 10-minutes walk.

In each of our 162 rooms & suites, a work desk area, TV Plasma screen, a bathroom with bathtub, safe box, Wifi, Tea/Coffe maker, telephones.
Some of our rooms offer a view over the Capitole Square.

The American buffet breakfast is served Monday to Friday from 06h30AM to 10h30AM and Saturday-Sunday till 11h00AM.
The restaurant-Bar “L’Atrium” is open daily for lunch and dinner. The Chef proposes delicious homemade dishes prepared with fresh and local products. The Atrium Bar welcomes you to enjoy a wide range of cocktails and drinks.

Our reception is open 24/7 all year round. And a free WIFI is available throughout the hotel.
The fitness center, reserved only for the hotel’s clients, is open daily from 06h30AM to 10h00PM.

Many tourist attractions are within walking distance from the hotel: Saint Sernin Cathedral, Couvent des Jacobins, Les Augustins Museum, Garonne river.

This is our guests' favorite part of Toulouse, according to independent reviews.

name: Hôtel La Chartreuse
description:
Located in Toulouse, Hôtel La Chartreuse is 140 metres from Matabiau Train Station and a 10-minute walk from Place du Capitole. It offers free Wi-Fi access, a terrace and luggage storage.

All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathroom is complete with a shower and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at Hôtel La Chartreuse. Restaurants and cafés can be found within 150 metres of the property.

This hotel is 650 metres from Jean-Jaurès Metro Station and an 8-minute drive from the A61 motorway. The Henri Gaussen Botanical Gardens are a 16-minute walk away. Guests can park their cars in the nearby streets.

name: Hotel de Bordeaux
description:
Hotel De Bordeaux provides quietness and comfort on the banks of the Canal du Midi. Toulouse Stadium is 5 km from the property.

Stay in one of the hotel's 31 soundproofed and air-conditioned rooms. A bar is also available for those wishing to relax and socialize after a long day spent sightseeing or working.

A continental breakfast is served on weekdays from 6:30 to 10:00 and until 11:30 on weekends

Hôtel de Bordeaux is located opposite Matabiau Train Station and 10 minutes' walk from the Capitole Theatre and the Saint Sernin Basilica. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Blagnac Airport.

name: Résidence Ramblas
description:
Well set in the Toulouse City-Centre district of Toulouse, Résidence Ramblas is located 5.8 km from Zénith de Toulouse, 7.2 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely and 11 km from Diagora Convention Centre. The property is set 800 metres from Toulouse-Matabiau Station, 600 metres from Jeanne d'Arc Metro Station and 700 metres from Place du Capitole. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 4.4 km from Toulouse Stadium.

All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also provide guests with free WiFi, while selected rooms include a city view. The units include a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near Résidence Ramblas include Jean-Jaures Metro Station, Marengo-SNCF Metro Station and Capitole Metro Station. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: ibis budget Toulouse Centre Gare
description:
Set in Toulouse city centre, 8 km from Toulouse Blagnac Airport and 6 km from Toulouse Stadium, ibis budget Toulouse Centre has 24-hour front desk, free Wi-Fi, free on-site parking and soundproofed rooms. Please note that it is a non smoking hotel

All rooms at ibis budget Toulouse Centre have a private bathroom with toilet and shower, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is available and it can be eaten in the breakfast room or on the terrace. It includes fresh croissants, a wide selection of breads, cereals, brioches, chocolate spread, jams, honey, fresh fruit salad, yogurts, cheeses, hot drinks, and fruit juices.

The convention centre and a swimming pool can be found 1.5 km from ibis budget Toulouse Centre. Matabiau Train Station is 1 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Croix Baragnon
description:
Set in the heart of Toulouse, a 20-minute drive from Blagnac Airport and 2 km from Toulouse Stadium, Hôtel Croix Baragnon offers free WiFi throughout and rooms overlooking the street or the flowery courtyard.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is available and there is a gastronomic restaurant down the street. There is also a supermarket 250 metres away.

The bedrooms at Hôtel Croix Baragnon have a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

This property doesn't have an elevator


Matabiau Rail Station can be reached on foot in just over 20 minutes. Augustins Museum, Carmes District, Saint Etienne Cathedral and Capitole Square are all less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: ibis Toulouse Centre
description:
The ibis Toulouse Centre is located a 10 minute-walk from the old town and Matabiau Train Station. It offers 24-hour reception, a lift, free Wi-Fi throughout, and the bar is open 24 hours a day. Toulouse Stadium is 4 km away.

Decorated in a modern style, the rooms at ibis Toulouse Centre feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, parquet floors, and a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. The on-site café-restaurant is open during the evening from Sunday to Thursday, and 1 meeting rooms are at guests’ disposal.

The Jeanne d'Arc Métro Station is 200 metres from ibis Toulouse Centre and the airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Campanile Toulouse Purpan
description:
This Campanile Hotel is located in next to the A620 and 5 km from Toulouse-Blagnac Airport. It provides soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

Each guest room at the Campanile Toulouse Purpan is equipped with a private bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and satellite TV.
Guests can enjoy regional cuisine at the Purpan’s restaurant and there is a bar and a floral terrace. Free newspapers are available at the Campanile Toulouse’s 24-hour reception.

name: Eklo Toulouse
description:
Set in Toulouse, 800 metres from Zénith de Toulouse, Eklo Toulouse offers accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Offering a bar, the property is located within 1.8 km of Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

At the hotel the rooms come with a private bathroom and bed linen.

Eklo Toulouse offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

With staff speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, information is available at the reception.

Toulouse Stadium is 4.8 km from the accommodation, while Diagora Convention Centre is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 3 km from Eklo Toulouse.

name: Hotel Ours Blanc - Place Victor Hugo
description:
Located in the heart of Toulouse, the Ours Blanc is set next to Place Victor Hugo and 4 km from Toulouse Stadium.

Each soundproofed room has free WiFi, air-conditioning and a TV.

Guests of the Hotel Ours Blanc - Place Victor Hugo can enjoy a buffet breakfast and free newspapers in the hotel dining room.

The Hotel Ours Blanc is situated 200 metres from Jeanne d’Arc and Capitole Metro Stations. Guests can visit the nearby Canal du Midi, the Place du Capitole and the Victor Hugo Market.

name: Hotel Mercure Toulouse Centre Compans
description:
This Mercure hotel is located in central Toulouse, a 10 minute walk from Capitole Square and just 200 metres from the Compans Caffarelli Metro. Toulouse Stadium is 4 km away.

The sound-proofed, contemporary guest rooms include air conditioning, Wi-Fi internet access, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities.

Hotel Mercure Toulouse Compans Caffarelli’s restaurant, is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner serving traditional, healthy French dishes. Guests can dine in the restaurant, on the terrace overlooking the garden or in their guest room.

Hotel Mercure Toulouse Compans Cafferelli is next to Pierre Baudis Convention Centre and Toulouse-Matabiau Train Station.

name: Boutique Hôtel des Beaux Arts
description:
Located in the historic centre of Toulouse, Hotel des Beaux Arts is just a 5-minute walk from the Capitole and 3 km from Toulouse Stadium. It offers individually-decorated rooms with free WiFi access and satellite TV. Some rooms have views of Garonne River.

A continental breakfast is available each morning. The Beaux Arts’s restaurant and bar has an elegant Belle-Epoque décor and serves regional cuisine with local specialities.

The Beaux Arts Hotel provides a 24-hour reception and a bicycle rental service. Guests can easily visit the city’s main attractions and public parking is available a 3 minutes' walk from the hotel.

name: Citiz Hotel
description:
The 4-star Citiz Hotel is located on Place Wilson in Toulouse, a 5-minute walk from the Capitole and a 10-minute walk from Matabiau Train Station. The air-conditioned guestrooms have LCD satellite TV and free WiFi.

Guests of the Citiz Hotel can relax with a free newspaper in the hotel’s restaurant and bar.

All guestrooms at the Citiz also have a hairdryer, minibar and a courtesy tray.

Blagnac Toulouse Airport is a 15-minute drive from the Citiz Hotel. Pierre Baudis Centre des Congrès is a 3-minute metro ride away from Capitole Metro Station.

There is a public car park just in front of the hotel and the airport shuttle stops right next to the hotel. Toulouse Stadium is 4 km away.

name: Hotel Gascogne
description:
Hotel Gascogne provides soundproofed, en suite rooms with a TV and is located 1.5 km from Place du Capitole in the centre of Toulouse and 3 km from Toulouse Stadium. There is free WiFi access and paid private parking is available on site.

Hotel Gascogne serves a continental buffet breakfast that guests can have in the breakfast room or in their guest room. Guests are invited to have a drink in the hotel’s bar, which is open day and night.

Hotel Gascogne is conveniently located just a few steps from the Saint-Cyprien-République Line A Metro Station.

name: B&B HOTEL Montauban
description:
Hôtel B&B Montauban is located north of Montauban, a 50-minute drive from the centre of Toulouse, a 65-minute drive from the Aveyron gorges and a 45-minute drive from Cahors. Free WiFi access is available.

The air-conditioned guest rooms have a flat screen TV, All rooms include a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available at the hotel for an additional charge, and children benefit from a reduced rate for breakfast.

The nearest airport is Blagnac Airport, a 40-minute drive from the hotel. The property offers free parking.

name: Premiere Classe Montauban
description:
This Premiere Classe hotel is located a 10-minute drive from the centre of Montauban. It offers a 24-hour reception desk and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Premiere Classe Montauban are equipped with a flat-screen and private bathroom with Kyriadt Restaurant is within walking distance of the hotel.

Premiere Classe Montauban is in the heart of the Albasud3 Zone and near Exit 66 of the A20 motorway. Guests have access to free private parking.

name: Hôtel des Ambassadeurs
description:
The Hôtel Des Ambassadeurs is located opposite the Toulouse-Matabiau SNCF Train Station. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

Guest rooms at the Ambassadeurs have a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

An express breakfast of a hot drink and a croissant is served every morning. Guests are also invited to relax with a drink in the Ambassadeurs Bar.

The Ambassadeurs Hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the Place du Capitole. Guests can easily explore the city and visit the Musée des Augustins. The hotel is located next to a public shuttle stop, providing access to the airport.

name: Abbaye des Capucins Spa & Resort
description:
Abbaye des Capucins Spa & Resort is located in Montauban, a 30-minute drive from Toulouse. It offers free access to the outdoor pool, spa centre and fitness room with cardio gym equipment.

Abbaye des Capucins Spa & Resort offers soundproofed accommodation with air conditioning. Each guest room has a private bathroom and some have a terrace viewing the River Tarn. At an extra cost, guests can have breakfast in the comfort of their rooms.

Guests can also enjoy a meal in the hotel's brasserie called Le Bistro des Capucins.

Massage and beauty treatments are available at the Abbaye des Capucins Spa & Resort . There is a business centre and free private parking.

name: Hôtel du Commerce
description:
Located in the centre of Montauban, Hôtel du Commerce offers soundproofed guest rooms set in a renovated, 18th-century house with a lift. The hotel is 100 metres from the Ingres Museum and 1 km from Montauban Train Station.

With a unique décor, all of the rooms at Hôtel du Commerce have a flat-screen TV. Each room also features a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free toiletries and a bath or a shower. Some of the rooms are equipped with air conditioning.

Each morning you can choose between a continental and an English buffet breakfast, which can be served in the communal lounge or in the comfort of your room. There is a restaurant just 5 metres from the hotel.
