Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Public parking is possible near Hôtel du Commerce, with an extra cost, and A20 Motorway Exit is 2.5 km away.

name: Centre Louis Ormières
description:
Located in a former convent in Montauban next to the River Tarn, Centre Louis Ormières features a restaurant, a garden, function rooms and free WiFi throughout the property. Free private parking is available onsite.

At the hotel each room is fitted with a private bathroom.

Guests at Centre Louis Ormières can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The centre of Montauban is less than a 10-minute drive away. Toulouse is 49 km from the accommodation, while Blagnac is 49 km away. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 51 km from Centre Louis Ormières.

name: Kyriad Montauban Sud - Albasud
description:
Located near the A20 motorway, Kyriad Montauban Sud - Albasud is just 8 kilometres from Montauban's town centre and train station. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi access.

Rooms at Kyriad Montauban Sud - Albasud are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily at the Kyriad Montauban Hotel. The hotel’s air-conditioned restaurant offers traditional cuisine for dinner.

Additional facilities include a garden and terrace with a children’s playground.

Kyriad Montauban Sud - Albasud is 50 kilometres north of Toulouse and 66 km from Cahors. It is near the Pente d’eau de Montech and guests have access to free private parking.

name: Kyriad Direct Montauban Centre
description:
Located in Montauban, Hôtel Villenouvelle is a 12-minute walk from the Ingres Museum. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk.

All the soundproofed rooms are serviced by a lift and feature air conditioning, carpeted floors and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom includes free toiletries and a shower.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at Hôtel Villenouvelle.

This property is a 20-minute walk from Montauban-Ville-Bourbon Train Station and a 13-minute walk from the Cathedral. Free private parking is available on site.

name: hotelF1 Montauban
description:
hotelF1 Montauban is situated in Montauban, 45 km from Toulouse.

Rooms have a TV. Every room is equipped with a shared bathroom. Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

Cahors is 49 km from hotelF1 Montauban, while Blagnac is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 42 km from hotelF1 Montauban.

name: Brit Hotel Confort Montauban
description:
Brit Hotel Confort Montauban is located south of Montauban City, 300 metres from junction 66 of the A20 motorway. It offers air-conditioned guestrooms with LCD cable TV and free Wi-Fi.

The Brit Hotel Confort Montauban serves a continental buffet breakfast and local products.

The Brit Hotel Confort Montauban is 6 kilometres from Montauban’s train station and 7 kilometres from Montauban Cathedral. Free private parking is available.

name: ibis budget Montauban Les Chaumes
description:
ibis budget Montauban Les Chaumes is 4 km from the centre of Montauban and 270 metres from the A20 motorway. It offers free Wi-Fi access and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV and satellite channels.

All rooms feature a desk, air conditioning and a wardrobe. The private bathroom includes a shower and free toiletries. Some rooms are suitable for guests with reduced mobility.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at ibis budget Montauban Les Chaumes. There is a restaurant on site and a grocery store can be found 50 metres away.

This property is 2 km from Montauban Train Station and 10 km from Aiguillons Golf Course. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Les Portes de Montauban
description:
Set in Montauban, 42 km from Amphitheatre Purpan-Ancely, Sure Hotel by Best Western Les Portes de Montauban offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation provides room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests.

The hotel offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Zénith de Toulouse is 44 km from Sure Hotel by Best Western Les Portes de Montauban, while Toulouse Stadium is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

name: ibis Montauban
description:
Located at the exit of the A20 Motorway, a 5-minute drive from Montauban, this ibis hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a meeting room and a bar. Free private parking and free WiFi access are available.

Rooms have a simple decor and include an LCD TV, a telephone and a work desk. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower or a bathtub.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. French specialties are proposed at the restaurant, which is open only for dinner.

The Fobio Stadium is 1.5 km away while the Sapiac Stadium is 4 km from Hôtel ibis Montauban. Montauban-Ville-Bourbon Train Station is a 15-minute drive from the hotel and Toulouse-Blagnac Airport is 35 minutes away by car.

name: ibis Styles Montauban
description:
Situated in Montauban, ibis Styles Montauban offers 3-star accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and a restaurant. The hotel has family rooms.

At the hotel, the rooms have a wardrobe. At ibis Styles Montauban rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Staff at ibis Styles Montauban are available to provide advice at the 24-hour front desk.

The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 52 km from the hotel.

name: Dali Hôtel Montauban
description:
Located in Montauban, Dali Hôtel Montauban features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, terrace, restaurant, and free WiFi throughout the property. Free private parking is available and the hotel also provides bike hire for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Dali Hôtel Montauban each room comes with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Guests at Dali Hôtel Montauban will be able to enjoy activities in and around Montauban, like hiking and cycling.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 52 km from the hotel.

name: Aux Lys d'Or
description:
Aux Lys d'Or features a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Réalville. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 17 km from Montauban Train Station.

At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk. All units in Aux Lys d'Or are equipped with a TV and free toiletries.

Les Aiguillons Golf Course is 17 km from the accommodation, while Roucous Golf Course is 37 km away. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 67 km from Aux Lys d'Or.

name: Château de Loubéjac
description:
A 15th-century castle set 3 km from L'Honor-de-Cos and 8 km from Montauban, Château de Loubéjac offers a seasonal outdoor pool, a tennis court and free Wi-Fi access in the public areas.

Breakfast includes homemade jams, homemade pies, cheese and ham. Guests can enjoy traditional French cuisine and regional dishes.

The rooms are individually decorated and each has a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. Some rooms have a pool view.

There is a golf course 3 km away from Château de Loubéjac and guests can go canoeing in the Gorges de l'Aveyron 40km away. Toulouse is 45km from the castle and Blagnac Airport is 35km away. There is a private car park at the property.

name: WonderBar (Auberge du Trinquet)
description:
WonderBar (Auberge du Trinquet) features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and bar in Corbarieu. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The inn offers garden views and a barbecue.

The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. All units at the inn are equipped with a private bathroom and bed linen.

You can play billiards, table tennis, and darts at WonderBar (Auberge du Trinquet).

The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 56 km from the accommodation.

name: L'Ostalas
description:
Set in Lafrançaise, 10 km from Les Aiguillons Golf Course, L'Ostalas offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Located around 15 km from Montauban Train Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 25 km away from Roucous Golf Course. French, Greek, Indian and Mediterranean dishes are served at the in-house restaurant.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, bed linen and a terrace with a garden view. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You can play table tennis at L'Ostalas, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling.

Espalais Golf Club is 35 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 66 km from L'Ostalas.

name: Logis L'Auberge du Quercy Blanc
description:
This inn is located in Molieres, in the Quercy region. It offers rooms with panoramic views of the Valley de Lac, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi internet access.

The Logis L’auberge Du Quercy Blanc has a restaurant, which serves regional cuisine, along with a buffet breakfast. Meals can be enjoyed in the dining room or on the outdoor shaded terrace.

Guests can relax in the lounge or the library, and there is a play area for children.

L’auberge Du Quercy is 20 km from Montauban, 25 km from Moissac and 30 km from Cahors.

name: Hôtel restaurant l'escale chez mimi
description:
Featuring a terrace, restaurant and views of city, Hôtel restaurant l'escale chez mimi is located in Bioule, 20 km from Montauban Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 22 km from Les Aiguillons Golf Course.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. At Hôtel restaurant l'escale chez mimi each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Guests at Hôtel restaurant l'escale chez mimi will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bioule, like hiking.

Roucous Golf Course is 40 km from the hotel, while Mauriac Castle is 48 km away. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 68 km from Hôtel restaurant l'escale chez mimi.

name: Chez Terrassier - Logis Hôtels - Hotel et Restaurant
description:
Chez Terrassier - Logis Hôtels - Hotel et Restaurant is located in a central square in the village of Vaissac, surrounded by the beautiful countryside of the Midi-Pyrenees region. It boasts a gorgeous outdoor swimming pool.

Chez Terrassier - Logis Hôtels - Hotel et Restaurant offers comfortable rooms in a peaceful environment. The 6 newly opened rooms feature a balcony overlooking the countryside and the pool. Modern amenities including free Wi-Fi internet access are provided.

This warm and friendly hotel makes an excellent base for families. Children will be kept busy in the children's playground and both children and adults will enjoy activities including table tennis.

Savour a refined cuisine mixing tradition and innovation in the relaxed atmosphere of the hotel restaurant.

Free parking is provided at Chez Terrassier - Logis Hôtels - Hotel et Restaurant, making it easy to explore the Midi-Pyrenees region by car. The area offers many points of interest such as the Cepe market and the bird sanctuary.

name: HOTEL MARCEILLAC
description:
Located within 50 km of Agen Exhibition Centre and 21 km of Montauban Train Station, HOTEL MARCEILLAC provides rooms in Castelsarrasin. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a garden and to a terrace. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the hotel, every room has a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. All units at HOTEL MARCEILLAC include air conditioning and a desk.

Les Aiguillons Golf Course is 29 km from the accommodation, while Espalais Golf Club is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 66 km from HOTEL MARCEILLAC.

name: The Originals City, Hôtel des Arts, Montauban (Inter-Hotel)
description:
Located in Négrepelisse, 12 km from Caussade, The Originals City, Hôtel des Arts, Montauban offers a traditional, French restaurant named Aux Gourmandises Quercynoises, a bar and a terrace. The air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

All of the rooms at The Originals City, Hôtel des Arts, Montauban have an electric kettle and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some accommodations have a terrace.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning and you can have it delivered to your room. After breakfast, you can read one of the available newspapers on site or use free WiFi access.

The hotel is situated 30 km from Montauban’s Train Station and 60 km from Blagnac’s Airport. Bruniquel Castle is 10 km away.

name: Brit Hotel Confort Foix
description:
Brit Hotel Confort Foix is ideally located at the foot of the Pyrénées Mountains and offers well-equipped rooms designed for ultimate comfort with en suite facilities and free WiFi access.

The hotel is perfectly located for exploring the Ariège region and makes a peaceful stopover for guests travelling around the Midi-Pyrénées region.

On week days, evening meals are available.

Guests at Brit Hotel Confort Foix benefit from free private parking. The hotel is located 30 km from the ski resorts and 70 km from Andorra.

The reception is closed between 12 o'clock till 4 P.M.

The friendly and attentive staff at the Brit Hotel Confort Foix will be happy to help you organise your stay.

name: Hôtel Absolu
description:
Absolu is in the centre of Castelsarrasin and just a 5-minute walk to Saint Sauveur Church. It offers a sauna, guest library and free bicycle hire.

The soundproofed guest rooms are bright and airy with large windows. A flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access is provided in each. Bathrooms are equipped with amenities and a hairdryer.

Continental breakfasts are available each morning at the hotel and guests can enjoy a range of newspapers while they eat.

Saint-Pierre Abbey in Moissac is only 8 km from the hotel. Montauban SNCF Train Station is 19 km from the hotel. Free public parking is available on site.

name: L'Armateur
description:
This 18th-century house, now a modern and stylish hotel is located in the centre of Moissac, just 50 metres from the Canal des deux Mers and the Vélo Voie Verte.

With views over the garden or the town, the rooms at the Hotel Armateur are en suite with bath and shower. They also have flat-screen TV with cable channels, free Wi-Fi internet access and tea kettle.

The common areas in the hotel are air conditioned and there is a swimming pool in the hotel’s garden. The restaurant serves traditional and regional cuisine. Meals can be enjoyed on the terrace in warmer weather.

For guests travelling by car, free private parking is available onsite. Toulouse Blagnac Airport is a 50 minute drive away and the Agen TGV Train Station is a 45 minute drive from L’Armateur.

name: The Originals Access, Hôtel Foix (P'tit Dej-Hotel)
description:
Set beside the Pyrenees Ariégeoises Regional Park, this. The Originals Access, Hôtel Foix has a 24-hour automatic-reception and you can visit Toulouse, 75 km away.

A TV and telephone are included in the guest rooms, which feature a simple décor with wooden furnishings. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub.

Breakfast is served every morning. There is a restaurant on site with a terrace.

Foix Train Station is a 6-minute drive from The Originals Access, Hôtel Foix and free public parking is available nearby. Andorra and the Spanish border are both 80 km away.

name: Résidence Le Grand Tétras- SPA THERMAL INCLUS
description:
Situated in Ax-les-Thermes, 48 km from Meritxell sanctuary, Résidence Le Grand Tétras- SPA THERMAL INCLUS features views of the mountain. Among the facilities at this property are a shared lounge and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the hammam, or enjoy city views.

The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer, while some rooms at the hotel also boast a seating area. The units will provide guests with a microwave.

A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Résidence Le Grand Tétras- SPA THERMAL INCLUS offers 3-star accommodation with an indoor pool, fitness centre and sauna. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ax-les-Thermes, like hiking, skiing and fishing.

Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always at hand to help.

Talc Career of Trimouns is 23 km from Résidence Le Grand Tétras- SPA THERMAL INCLUS, while Grotte de Lombrives is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Andorra–La Seu d'Urgell Airport, 80 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Terranostra
description:
Offering a restaurant and a bar, Hotel Terranostra is located in Tarascon-sur-Ariège, in the heart of historic sites of Ariège. Free WiFi access is available.

Each room here will provide you with air conditioning, soundproofing, an electric kettle, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Most rooms have a river or mountain view.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is served. The restaurant serves traditional food.

At Hotel Terranostra you will find a terrace and ski storage. There is free public parking nearby and the nearest train station is a 5-minute walk away. 40 minutes by car, guests can find Ax Les 3 Domaines ski resort.

name: Hôtel Restaurant Le Bellevue
description:
Located 48 km from Meritxell sanctuary, Hôtel Restaurant Le Bellevue offers 2-star accommodation in Ax-les-Thermes and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. Located around 25 km from Grotte de Lombrives, the hotel with free WiFi is also 45 km away from Fountain Fontestorbes. The property is non-smoking and is set 24 km from Talc Career of Trimouns.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at Hôtel Restaurant Le Bellevue have a city view. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ax-les-Thermes, like hiking and cycling.

The nearest airport is Andorra–La Seu d'Urgell Airport, 80 km from Hôtel Restaurant Le Bellevue.

name: Hôtel de la Paix
description:
Just 7 km from the ski slopes, 800 metres from Luzenac Train Station, Hôtel de la Paix has a bar, free Wi-Fi, free parking and rooms with a private bathroom.

In the morning, a continental breakfast is served, including pastries, bread and jam. There is a traditional restaurant 800 metres away.

Some double rooms are equipped with a shower and private toilets, while the other rooms have shared bathroom and toilet.

Prehistoric caves can be found 15 km from the hotel and the A66 highway is 17km away. There are walking and cycling paths around the property.

name: Hôtel Confort 09 ou HC-09
description:
The Hotel Confort is located in the heart of the Pyrénées Ariégeoises in the historic city centre of Tarascon-sur-Ariège. The hotel offers free WiFi.

The comfortable guest rooms have HD TV with USB port and cable channels, direct-dial telephone and a private bathroom. Some of the rooms also have a view of the river and mountains.

The Hotel Confort is on the river’s edge and is in close proximity to shops and restaurants. A buffet breakfast is served in the morning and there is also a bar with a terrace.

name: Hôtel Pyrène
description:
Set on a 4300 m² garden, this 3-star hotel is 2 km from Foix Train Station. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace with chairs and free Wi-Fi access in the entire property.

All the rooms at Hôtel Pyrène feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom, free toiletries and hairdryer. Some of them include a balcony and provide direct access to the garden.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room or in the comfort of the guest rooms. Restaurants can be found within 2 km of the property.

Hôtel Pyrène is 5 km from Pyrénées Ariégeoises Regional Park and 3 km from the N20 main road. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hostellerie de La Poste
description:
Situated within the Pyrenees Ariegeoises Natural Regional Park, Hostellerie de la Poste is situated in the village of Oust. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and free Wi-Fi access in public areas.

A balcony with views of the garden or terrace area is provided in the guest rooms at Hostellerie de la Poste. All rooms have their own bathroom with a bath or shower.

You can enjoy traditional French cuisine in the elegant on-site restaurant. A continental breakfast is prepared every morning, and there is also a bar and a large outdoor terrace.

Thermal baths at Aulus-les-Bains are 15 km away. Séquoia Vertigo adventure park is 20 km from Hostellerie de la Poste. Foix Train Station is 34 km away. Public parking is possible on site.

name: Hôtel Le Commerce
description:
This family-run hotel is located in the heart of the medieval town Mirepoix, in Cathar country. It offers affordable rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access.

Le Commerce has its own restaurant, which serves traditional local cuisine. Meals can be eaten in the leafy courtyard in the summer.

Le Commerce is situated at an intersection of roads from 5 directions. It is an ideal stopover on the way to Lourdes, the coast, Andorra, the Cathar castles, or for discovering the Ariége region.

name: Hôtel Premiere Classe Pamiers
description:
Hotel Premiere Classe Pamiers is located in Ariege and is situated in the La Bouriette shopping complex. It offers air-conditioned rooms with private en suite showers and cable TV.

Bunk beds are available in some of the rooms for a third guest at no additional charge. Rooms have direct exterior access.

Breakfast is served every morning in the dining area. There is also free private parking on site.

name: Auberge des Deux Rivières
description:
Auberge Des Deux Rivières is a inn located in the heart of the French Pyrenees department the Ariège at the confluent of the Alet and Salat rivers.

Auberge des Deux Rivières bedrooms are fully equipped and come with a private bathroom offering free toiletries.

In the restaurant, the owners, Robert and Philip prepare traditional, regional cuisine. In July and August, the property serves exclusively Paella on Mondays and Couscous on Tuesdays. Half board dinner features highlights from the à la carte menu selected by the chef.

The little mountain hotel is a convenient starting point for your mountain walking, cycling, or fishing stay.

name: Hotel Logis - Chateau de Beauregard
description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, Chateau de Beauregard is located in Beauregard, just 1 km from Saint-Girons. Sitting in the middle of a 2.5-hectare park it features a rose garden and a spa with a hot tub and steam bath.

All of the rooms at Chateau de Beauregard are elegantly decorated with antique furniture and a parquet floor. Each room features a flat-screen TV, a sofa and an en suite bathroom. Ironing facilities are also provided.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant boasts stone walls and exposed wooden beams. It offers traditional dishes from the region.

Massages can be organised upon prior reservation and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Free private parking is possible on site and many hiking paths start from the property.

name: Auberge du Haut Salat
description:
Small B&B hotel, family business run, ideally located in the center of the town of Seix, in Ariège. We have 10 bedrooms all with shower and wc. We will do our best to welcome you. Our goal is to completely renovate this 19th century's building within 10 years. In the evening and only in the summer season we offer "piq'Apéros" (tapas) from 6 p.m., otherwise there are other restaurant options in the village during the low season. We wish you a pleasant stay in Seix!
The region is popular for skiing, cycling and hiking. Ideal all seasons destination.
We have 10 bedrooms (3 of which are equipped with TV with decoder. 7 out of 10 have a balcony and all are equipped with shower and WC

name: Hôtel Le Chalet
description:
Le Chalet is located in close proximity to the centre of Ax-les-Thermes, facing the Pyrenees. It offers a hot tub with jacuzzi and rooms with internet access.

The hotel’s restaurant has river views and serves regional, gastronomic cuisine. Guests can also enjoy the garden and the terrace.

The rooms all have a private bathroom, free wired internet, a desk and a TV. Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace.

Le Chalet has easy access to the skiing station, the Casino and Andorra.

name: Hôtel Le Lons
description:
Located in the Medieval centre of Foix on the border of the Regional Nature Park of the Pyrenees, Hotel Lons offers rooms with private bathroom and free Wi-Fi access.

With a refined and elegant décor, the rooms include a desk, a telephone and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is served every day on the hotel’s veranda.

Behind the hotel, you will find the Ariège River flowing into the Ariege Valley. Opposite there is Place Dutilh with its old fountain and the sixteenth and seventeenth-century houses.

Foix Castle is only a 5-minute walk and Foix Train Station is 500 metres away. Toulouse city centre is 92 km away.

name: Logis Hôtel restaurant Horizon 117
description:
This family-owned hotel has a peaceful atmosphere and offers complete relaxation in the Pyrénées region.

The hotel is in a great location for visitors to the central Pyrénées area. Explore all of the region’s unspoilt natural beauty, its local traditions and history and return to the hotel for a tranquil rest. The hotel has comfortable affordable accommodation and good amenities, with a swimming pool, sauna, tennis courts and children’s playground all available on site.

The restaurant offers regional specialities made authentically with local produce.

name: Logis Hôtel de France & Restaurant Pamiers
description:
Set in Pamiers, 18 km from Buffalo Farm, Logis Hôtel de France & Restaurant Pamiers offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a terrace. This pet-friendly hotel also has free WiFi.

At the hotel, all rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. All guest rooms feature a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer.

Guests at Logis Hôtel de France & Restaurant Pamiers can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving French cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Guests at Logis Hôtel de France & Restaurant Pamiers will be able to enjoy activities in and around Pamiers, like hiking, horse riding and cycling.

Foix Castle is 20 km from the hotel, while Underground River of Labouiche is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Toulouse-Blagnac Airport, 78 km from Logis Hôtel de France & Restaurant Pamiers.

name: Chambres d'hôtes Relais Mira Peis
description:
Set in Mirepoix and with Buffalo Farm reachable within 18 km, Chambres d'hôtes Relais Mira Peis offers express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. The property is non-smoking and is located 29 km from Fountain Fontestorbes.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room includes a kettle, while selected rooms also offer a patio and others also have mountain views. At Chambres d'hôtes Relais Mira Peis all rooms have bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or gluten-free options.

Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Mirepoix, like hiking, skiing and cycling.

Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar.

Montsegur Castle is 31 km from Chambres d'hôtes Relais Mira Peis, while Museum of Montségur is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Logis Hôtel restaurant Les Minotiers
description:
The Hotel-Restaurant Les Minotiers is situated in walking distance to the mediaeval square of Mirepoix and close to the most prestigious sites of the region of Ariége.

All of the rooms are spacious and are equipped with air-conditioning, TV, broadband internet access and private bathrooms with bath or shower.

The hotel restaurant features traditional and regional cuisine prepared with the finest local ingredients. A fine selection of regional wine is available as well as the advice the hotel’s own wine waiter.

For a relaxing stay in a beautiful region of France, come stay at the Hotel Les Minotiers.

name: Hôtel Le Bellevue
description:
Located in Tarascon-sur-Ariège, Hotel Le Bellevue offers modern accommodation just a 10- minute walk from the train station. Free Wi-Fi and newspapers are available at the hotel.

The rooms at Hotel Le Bellevue are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries and shower. Guests have access to a kitchenette with microwave.

Eevery morning, a continental breakfast is served at the hotel. There is a wine bar and snack bar with terrace. The hotel’s restaurant serves traditional food.

Guests can drive 30 km to Plateau de Beille Ski Resort or 7 minutes to Ussat-les-Bains Thermal Baths. The Cave of Niaux is located 6 km away. Toulouse Blagnac International Aiport is 1-hour drive away.

name: Hôtel Le Roi Gourmand
description:
Ideally located in heart of the Ariege, near the city of Foix, Le Roi Gourmand welcomes you in a modern and warm atmosphere.

All the rooms have an en suite bath and shower, and a TV.

Serving Foie Gras as a speciality, Le Roi Gourmand invites you to taste its regional dishes.

You will also be able to discover the Cathedral Saint Antonin or the Castle of Foix.

name: Hotel du Lac Foix
description:
Built in 1599, Hotel du Lac Foix is a former sheep farm. It offers en suite accommodation with free WiFi and free parking in a country setting.

The air-conditioned guest rooms have individual balconies and some rooms have views of the lake. Each room has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. In addition, the hotel has 10 chalets.

The hotel’s restaurant features a lakeside terrace and serves fresh, regional produce and a range of local wines. Guests can also enjoy a drink by the fireplace.

Hotel du Lac Foix offers the ideal location to enjoy the Ariège area famous for its castles and picturesque countryside. Chateau de Foix and Labouiche cave(Grotte de Labouiche) are both less than 10 km from the hotel.

name: Le Manoir d'Agnès Logis hôtel restaurant
description:
Le Manoir D'agnes is located in the Pyrénées village of Tarascon-sur-Ariège. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms, each with a private bathroom, flat-screen TV, as well as free Wi-Fi access throughout the property.

Guests of the Manoir D'agnes have access to the steam room and there is also a park and a private terrace. The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant Les Saveurs du Manoir serves traditional cuisine.

Guests of the Manoir D'agnes can enjoy hiking in the surrounding mountains and visit the nearby caves of Niaux, Lombrives and Bédeilhac.

Free parking is available on site and the Ax 3 Domaines and le Plateau de Beille ski resorts are a 30-minute drive away. The Tarascon sur Ariege Train Station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Première Classe La Rochelle Centre - Les Minimes
description:
Première Classe La Rochelle Centre - Les Minimes is located 500 metres from the Vieux Port and 2 km from Minimes Beach. It offers free Wi-Fi access, a 24-hour reception and private parking at a fee.

The rooms at Première Classe La Rochelle Centre - Les Minimes are decorated in a contemporary style and include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom is complete with a shower.

After enjoying the buffet breakfast, you can visit La Rochelle’s historical district, which is 2 km away. La Rochelle Airport is 11 km away and both the aquarium and convention centre are 1 km from the property.

name: Logis Hôtel Restaurant de la Poste
description:
This former coaching inn is situated in the centre of the village of Tarascon-sur-Ariège with many shops, just 11.1 km from Beille cross-country ski resort. It offers en suite accommodation with a regional restaurant and bar on the banks of the Arriège River.

Free Wi-Fi access and a TV are provided in all guest rooms at Logis Hôtel Restaurant de la Poste. All rooms have their own bathroom and elevator access. Some rooms have a balcony with views of the garden and Ariège River.

A continental breakfast is prepared daily and can be taken in the living room. Restaurant La Grillerie serves regional specialities, and you can dine on the terrace. Guests can also relax in the lounge bar, which has satellite TV.

Logis Hôtel Restaurant de la Poste has a covered shelter for bikes and public parking is right in front of the hotel. Hot springs can be found 27 km away in Ax-les-Thermes.

name: B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Centre Les Minimes
description:
"NEW ROOMS!!!"

The team of the B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Centre Les Minimes welcomes you 24/7 in our hotel with secure pay parking, a 10-minute walk from the SNCF train station and the city centre.


Many other activities are close to our establishment, including the Aquarium de la Rochelle (800m away), where more than 12,000 marine animals live, and the Maritime Museum (400m away).

name: Hôtel Kyriad La Rochelle Centre Ville
description:
Situated just 1 km from the old harbour and the train station of La Rochelle, Hôtel Kyriad La Rochelle Centre Ville welcomes you in a modern setting.

Hôtel Kyriad La Rochelle Centre Ville offers 45 fully-equipped rooms, including 2 rooms for disabled guests. Each room comes with all the modern comfort and satellite television.

For your convenience, Hôtel Kyriad La Rochelle Centre Ville provides an enclosed car park, our parking is extra and by reservation and WiFi Internet access.

Enjoy the comfort of a 3-star hotel where everything is designed for both a relaxing and satisfying business stay.

name: Central Park Hôtel & Spa
description:
The 4-star Central Park Hôtel & Spa is situated a 10-minute walk from the heart of La Rochelle, within walking distance from the beach, and next to the Old Harbour. Guests can enjoy the wellness centre featuring a gym, hot tubs, sauna, hammam, massages, and beauty treatments at an extra cost.

At this modern, yet eco-friendly hotel, all rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. The suites feature a seating area where you can relax, and some suites have a terrace with a hot tub. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available in each bedroom.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is served. It includes local and organic products. Set in a residential area, the hotel is also a few steps from shops and restaurants.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a shared lounge at the property.

Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 1.7 km from Central Park Hôtel & Spa, while La Rochelle Grosse Horloge is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port
description:
Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is located in La Rochelle on the harbour. It offers free WiFi throughout the entire hotel.

Maisons du Monde Hôtel & Suites - La Rochelle Vieux Port is close to many restaurants and is a short walk to the historic district, the beach and the attractions of La Rochelle. From here it is easy to access the island of Ré and Oléron.

It offers comfortable rooms with air-conditioning, en suite facilities and flat-screen TV with Canal+ and Eurosport.

Breakfast is be served from 07:00 to 11:00 on Saturday and Sunday and from 06:00 until 10:30 from Monday to Friday.

Please note that when booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply .

name: Hôtel Saint Nicolas
description:
Situated in the lively Saint Nicolas district in La Rochelle, this hotel is surrounded by antique dealers, bars and cafés. It offers free Wi-Fi and a conservatory with large sofas and tropical plants.

The air-conditioned guest rooms each have a flat-screen TV with canal+ and satellite channels. Private bathrooms are equipped with a shower or a bathroom and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast featuring hot and fresh items is served daily in the conservatory. A continental breakfast can also be delivered directly to guests’ rooms. Local drinks, tea and coffee can be enjoyed in the bar.

Limited private secured parking can be booked at an extra cost, upon availability. The maximum height is 1m90 and the width of the parking spaces is about 2m.

Saint Nicolas Tower that guards the entrance to the old port is 550 metres from the hotel. La Rochelle Train Station is 700 metres away.

name: B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Centre
description:
Set in the La Rochelle City Centre district in La Rochelle, 500 metres from Parc Expo de La Rochelle, B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Centre boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Private and secure parking is available on site at an extra cost.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

L'Espace Encan is 600 metres from B&B HOTEL La Rochelle Centre, while La Rochelle Grosse Cloche is 800 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Best Western Premier Masqhotel
description:
The Best Western Masqhotel is a design hotel located a 5-minute walk from La Rochelle’s Vieux Port. It offers contemporary rooms, a lounge bar and free WiFi.

Rooms and suites at the Masqhotel are air-conditioned and feature original artwork. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and tea and coffee making facilities.

A buffet breakfast with hot and cold dishes is served each morning at the hotel. Guests are also invited to relax in the hotel’s lounge bar, which offers a large selection of drinks and free newspapers.

The hotel’s reception desk is open 24 hours a day. A laundry service and private parking are available at an additional cost.

An Eco-Label awarded hotel, Best Western Masqhotel is located 150 metres from La Rochelle Train Station and 6 km from La Rochelle Airport.

name: Maison des Ambassadeurs
description:
Nestled in the heart of La Rochelle and set in an 18th-century building, Maison des Ambassadeurs is just a 5-minute walk from the Old Harbour and offers a 24-hour front desk as well as a concierge service.

Featuring a high end décor, each room and suite at Maison des Ambassadeurs has an en-suite bathroom with free toiletries.

In the evening, guests can sip a drink at the piano bar or on the property’s terrace. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s lounges or along its outdoor dipping pool.

La Rochelle Aquarium and the Beach are just 1.5 km from the hotel, while Ile-de-Ré Bridge is a 15-minute drive away. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property.

name: Hôtel Les Brises
description:
Situated on the sea front, just 2 kilometres from La Rochelle’s old port, Hotel Les Brises has a panoramic view of the sea and nearby islands. It offers free Wi-Fi .
The guest rooms at the Brises are equipped with satellite TV. Private bathrooms have luxury toiletries.

Guests can relax on the large sea-side terrace with panoramic views, or enjoy a drink in the bar. Additional facilities include a lift.

Les Brises is 2 km from the centre of La Rochelle, and is next to the Franck Delmas Park.

name: ibis Budget La Rochelle Centre
description:
Ibis Budget La Rochelle Centre features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in La Rochelle. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.1 km from La Rochelle Grosse Horloge, less than 1 km from Saint-Sauveur Church and a 11-minute walk from Bunker La Rochelle. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Concurrence Beach.

Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms come with a balcony.

The hotel offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

You can play billiards and table tennis at the 2-star hotel.

Staff speak English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near ibis Budget La Rochelle Centre include La Rochelle Train Station, L'Espace Encan and Parc Expo de La Rochelle. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

name: Mercure La Rochelle Vieux Port
description:
Entirely renovated, the Mercure La Rochelle Vieux-Port hotel welcomes you for business or leisure stays.
To relax, our hotel in La Rochelle offers a swimming pool with a large terrace, a bar and a panoramic restaurant, the Gaée, with a view of the old port and the towers of La Rochelle.
Here you can enjoy a tasty breakfast and discover an innovative menu that highlights the products of our maritime region, subtly combining fresh and local produce.

Free Wi-Fi and private parking (at an additional cost) are available at the hotel and reception is open 24 hours a day. La Rochelle train station is a 2-minute walk away and the aquarium is just opposite the property.

name: Hôtel François 1er
description:
Located in the heart of historic La Rochelle, this hotel is set in a 16th century building just a 5 minute walk from the Old Port and local market. Hôtel François 1er offers free unlimited WiFi and a 24-hour reception.

All room at Hôtel François 1er are spacious, and feature a design and cosy décor inspired by the themes of rock, movie, painting, graffiti or photography. They are fitted with a TV, and come with a private bathroom.

Various facilities are available at the property such as the room service, a bar lounge, and a chill out area. Upon prior request and at an extra cost, guests can park their car in the property's secure parking located in the city centre.

The hotel is within walking distance from several shops, restaurants and lively bars. Hôtel François 1er is also close to attractions such as the Aquarium, the Natural History Museum, the city's parks and beaches.

La Rochelle Train Station is conveniently located 1.9 km from Hôtel François 1er.

name: Tour de Nesle La Rochelle Vieux Port 3 etoiles
description:
The charming Hotel de la Tour de Nesle is ideally placed at the heart of the old town, in front of the 2 towers at the entrance to the port.

The hotel offers comfortable rooms with simple, functional decor and free Wi-Fi internet access. Some rooms offer a view of the famous medieval towers.

Start the day with a generous breakfast in the breakfast room.

The picturesque area surrounding the Tour de Nesle is full of restaurants, shops and cafes.

name: ibis Styles La Rochelle Centre
description:
The ibis Styles La Rochelle Centre is located in the heart of La Rochelle, 300 metres from the beach Plage de la Concurrence. It offers 24-hour reception, a bar, a lift and free Wi-Fi throughout.

The air-conditioned rooms at ibis Styles La Rochelle Centre feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathrooms are complete with a bath tub or shower and free toiletries.

The buffet breakfast is available daily and includes fresh French pastries, fair trade coffee, fruit juices. Snacks are available 24 hours a day.

Boats to the Ile d’Aix and Ile de Ré are 100 metres from the property, and public parking is available 400 metres away with a supplement.

name: Hôtel La Monnaie Art & Spa
description:
Ideally set in the historic La Rochelle, this 17th-century building overlooks the old harbour. Hôtel De La Monnaie is decorated by artworks and features a terrace and a wellness centre.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hôtel De La Monnaie offer views of the indoor courtyard or the old city encircled with fortifications. Each has a TV and free WiFi, tea/coffee making facilities, and a private bathroom.

Guests can have a drink at the bar and enjoy breakfast in the quaint living room, the sunny courtyard or in the privacy of their room.

The central location of the De La Monnaie hotel allows guests to stroll in the pedestrian streets and discover the many local restaurants, and the nearby market selling regional products. Private parking is available at an additional cost for guests arriving by car.

name: Novotel La Rochelle Centre
description:
This Novotel Hotel is located a 10-minute walk from La Rochelle's Old Town. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and soundproofed accommodation.

Guest rooms at the Novotel La Rochelle Centre are equipped with air conditioning and free WiFi. Each room has a flat-screen TV.

The restaurant at La Rochelle Centre serves regional cuisine and there is a café with a garden terrace. Guests are also invited to relax in the hotel bar.

The Rochelle Centre provides free private parking and is an ideal base for exploring the city. The Old Port is just a 10-minute walk away.

name: greet Hotel La Rochelle Centre
description:
Greet Hotel La Rochelle Centre features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in La Rochelle. Located around less than 1 km from La Rochelle Train Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also a 17-minute walk away from L'Espace Encan. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.8 km from Concurrence Beach.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units feature a wardrobe.

Greet Hotel La Rochelle Centre offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

You can play billiards and table tennis at the 3-star hotel.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Parc Expo de La Rochelle, La Rochelle Grosse Horloge and Saint-Sauveur Church. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 6 km from greet Hotel La Rochelle Centre.

name: ibis La Rochelle Vieux Port
description:
Located in the Vieux Port district, in the city centre, ibis La Rochelle Vieux Port offers free Wi-Fi throughout, a bar, and rooms for people with reduced mobility.

The rooms at ibis La Rochelle Vieux Port feature air conditioning, a TV, and the private bathrooms are complete with a shower and toilet.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

The hotel is located 15 km from the Ile de Ré, La Rochelle Train Station is 500 metres away, and there is a tennis court 5 km from the property.

name: Kyriad La Rochelle Centre - Les Minimes
description:
Located just 1 km from La Rochelle Train Station, Kyriad La Rochelle Centre – Les Minimes offers a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and free Wi-Fi access throughout. The port and old town are only a 15-minute walk away.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a wardrobe, desk and tea and coffee making facilities. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Kyriad La Rochelle Centre. Guests can also find traditional restaurants within walking distance.

The aquarium is an 8-minute walk away and the Ile de Ré is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. Additional features include an elevator, non-smoking rooms and private parking at a fee at a location nearby.

name: Le Champlain
description:
Le Champlain is located opposite Parc Charruyer in the heart of La Rochelle. It offers spacious air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and free WiFi.

Guestrooms at the Hotel Champlain are all serviced by a lift.

The hotel provides an express check in service and a 24-hour reception. Guests can relax in the gardens or in the hotel bar with a selection of international newspapers.

Hotel Champlain is just 5 minutes from the Old Port.

name: Hotel Les Rosiers
description:
Set in La Rochelle and with Concurrence Beach reachable within 2.9 km, Hotel Les Rosiers offers a garden, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV.

Hotel Les Rosiers offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle de La Rochelle, Bunker La Rochelle and Musee du Nouveau Monde. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 6 km from Hotel Les Rosiers.

name: Logis Hôtel Le Rochelois
description:
Logis Hôtel Le Rochelois features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a tennis court. WiFi is free of charge throughout the property. There is also a hot tub with with a massage water jets bath, sauna and hammam, which guests can enjoy at an extra cost.

The rooms feature a flat-screen TV. The private bathrooms include a walk-in shower or bath tub and toilet.

The continental breakfast of French pastries, cheeses, fruit, eggs, cereals, jams, ham, honey and tea is available daily.

Logis Hôtel Le Rochelois is 5 km from La Rochelle Train Station. A limited number of free private parking spaces can be found onsite and private underground parking is available for an extra charge.

name: Hotel Espace Cite
description:
Hotel Espace Cite is just 200 metres from the medieval city centre of Carcassonne, and 500 metres from the Midi canal, both listed sites of UNESCO's world patrimony. This hotel offers free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and has a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel's breakfast room or on the terrace weather permitting, which has views of the medieval city. Please note that Breakfast room is on the 1st floor, no lift available.

According to availability, the hotel provides private parking in an underground garage at an extra cost.

Carcassonne Train Station is 2.5 km away.

We accept your pets, with an additional charge of €12.00 per day

name: GOOD KNIGHT
description:
Located 5 metres rfom the Carcassonne Castle, 2.4 km from Carcassonne Cathedral, GOOD KNIGHT provides accommodation with a garden, private parking and a terrace.

Around 5 km from Pont Rouge Commercial Zone, the property is also 5 km away from Perpignan IUT University - Carcassonne Campus and offers free WiFi. Local points of interest like Cavayere Lake and Grain d’Arts Media Library are reachable within 8 km and 1.8 km, respectively.

Popular points of interest near GOOD KNIGHT include Chipie International, Grain d’Sel Media Library and Tribunal d'Instance - Magistrates Court. The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Le Donjon - Cœur de La Cité Médiévale
description:
Located in the heart of the medieval city of Carcassonne, Hôtel Le Donjon - Cœur de La Cité Médiévale is surrounded by the city’s ancient ramparts. The hotel features a restaurant and bar. It is divided into 2 buildings. Free WiFi is provided throughout.

With views of street or the garden, the rooms are individually decorated and include a flat-screen TV. They overlook either the citadel or the hotel’s garden.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel. Le Donjon’s restaurant serves traditional French cuisine and there is also a cocktail bar where guests are invited to relax in the evening.

The hotel has a 24-hour reception and room service is available upon request. A dry-cleaning and laundry service is also provided at the hotel.

Le Donjon is located 2.4 km from Carcassonne Train Station. The Basilica of Saint-Nazaire is a 2-minute walk from the hotel and the Château Comtal is less than 100 metres away.

name: Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port
description:
Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port is situated in the centre of La Rochelle on the Old Port area in front of the medieval towers. It offers non-smoking rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Some of the guest rooms offer a view of the port and others, a view of the interior, flowered courtyard. All rooms have a TV.

Breakfast is available daily and served to your room.

The area surrounding the Hotel La Marine, Vieux Port has a number of restaurants and bars, as well as the aquarium and La Coursive Theatre. A shuttle to the islands (Oléron, Ré..) and Fort Boyard is available 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. The secure parking is located 500 metres away.

name: Hôtel La Fabrique
description:
Hôtel La Fabrique offers accommodation in La Rochelle. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Hôtel La Fabrique features free WiFi throughout the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Paid public parking is available nearby.

L'Espace Encan is 600 metres from Hôtel La Fabrique, while Parc Expo de La Rochelle is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is La Rochelle - Ile de Re Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: ibis Carcassonne Centre - La Cité
description:
ibis Carcassonne Centre is ideally located 1 km from Carcassonne's Train Station and only 800 metres from the medieval heart of the city. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned guest rooms with free WiFi.

A flat-screen satellite TV and a desk are provided in each guest room. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. A snack bar provides food throughout the day.

Part of the 17th-century Canal du Midi is 500 metres from the hotel and Jean Alary Theatre, the Fine Arts Museum and Comtal Castle are all within a 10-minute walk. Pont-Rouge Industrial Zone is 10 minutes' drive away and Carcassonne Airport is 13 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: SOWELL HOTELS Les Chevaliers
description:
Set a 2-minute walk from the Aude river and featuring views of the Pont Vieux bridge, SOWELL HOTELS Les Chevaliers offers accommodation with free WiFi in Carcassonne. The medieval city is just a 10-minute walk away.

Some units at the property feature a terrace with a garden view or a view of the medieval city.

A buffet breakfast is served in the morning. The restaurant offers traditional cuisine and local specialities. Guests can also enjoy a drink on the terrace, which offers views of the medieval city.

Speaking Spanish and English at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

The nearest airport is Carcassonne Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Montmorency & Spa
description:
Hotel Montmorency is located 30 metres from the entrance to the medieval city of Carcassonne. It offers free WiFi access, an outdoor pool and a hot tub. A Spa with an indoor pool and hammam is also available at an extra cost.

Rooms at Hotel Montmorency are equipped with a telephone, LCD TV and private bathroom with a bath. Some rooms are air-conditioned.

Guests can relax with a drink in Montmorency’s bar and enjoy the view from its panoramic terrace. Snacking options are available.

Montmorency Hotel is 60 km from Narbonne and 70 km from Castres. Private parking is available for a supplement. Carcassonne Train Station is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hotel De La Bastide
description:
Hotel De La Bastide is a family-run hotel located in the centre of Carcassonne, a 5-minute walk from the train station and a 25-minute walk from the medieval city. Free public parking is possible 50 metres away.

The hotel rooms are serviced by a lift and have air-conditioning, LCD-TV and free WiFi access.

All of the rooms and common areas in the hotel are non-smoking.

The airport shuttle stops just 150 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Du Pont Vieux
description:
Ideally located at the foot of the fortified town at Carcassonne, in an 18th-century building, this hotel offers rooms overlooking the castle towers or the hotel’s garden. Free WiFi is provided. Carcassonne city centre is 600 metres away.

Each bedroom features air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries.

On sunny days you can enjoy your continental buffet breakfast amongst the flowers on the outdoor terrace.

A range of convenient services are offered at the Hotel Du Pont Vieux. These include packed lunches, as well as bicycle and car rental. The staff at the Pont Vieux are available 24-hours a day to help you organise your stay in Carcassonne.

Garage parking is available upon prior request and subject to availability. Carcassonne Train Station is 3 km away.

name: ibis budget Carcassonne La Cité
description:
Ibis budget Carcassonne La Cité is located in Carcassonne, a 15-minute walk from the medieval city and 2 km from the city centre.

It features modern, functional decor and free WiFi. All the rooms are fully equipped with en suite facilities and satellite TV.

A continental breakfast buffet is available. Carcassonne offers an array of restaurants, bars and grocery shops.

Carcassonne Airport is just a 15-minute drive from the hotel and the train station is only 10 minutes away. Free private parking is available onsite.

name: Hôtel l'Aragon
description:
Situated just 50 metres from the historic centre of Carcassone in the Aude region, Hôtel l'Aragon features free WiFi throughout the property. Free private parking is available on site, and you will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Guest rooms at Aragon are equipped with air conditioning, satellite flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel l'Aragon. Guests can relax in the lounge or on the terrace, weather permitting.

Basilique Saint-Nazaire is 9 minutes' walk from the hotel, and Château Comtal is 5 minutes' walk away.

name: Hotel Astoria
description:
Hotel Astoria is located in the centre of Carcassonne, 150 metres from the train station and a 20-minute walk from the medieval city. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access.

The guest rooms are located in two buildings, one with 2 floors and one located entirely on the ground floor. They are all equipped with a TV and telephone and each room has a private bathroom.

Astoria Hotel provides private parking and a garage, available with an extra cost and upon reservation. Parking in the garage is free for motorbikes and bicycles.

The courthouse is a 5-minute walk away and the Canal du Midi is 50 metres away.

name: Brit Hotel Bosquet Carcassonne Cité
description:
Brit Hôtel Bosquet Carcassonne is 1.5 km from the medieval city of Carcassonne, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Free WiFi is provided.

Only accessed by stairs, the air-conditioned guestrooms feature satellite TV with Canal + channel, a bathroom with a hairdryer and a telephone.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the hotel.

Restaurants can be found less than 500 metres away.

In the surroundings, you can discover the Canal du Midi located 3.5 km from the property and La Cavayère's Lake, a 10-minute drive away. Carcassonne Train Station is 5 km away.

name: Mercure Carcassonne La Cité
description:
Set just a 4-minute walk from the medieval district of Carcassonne, Mercure Carcassonne La Cité offers an outdoor swimming pool in summer and views of the city walls. Free WiFi is provided.

Mercure Carcassonne Porte De La Cite features air-conditioned rooms with modern en suite facilities. Rooms are decorated in pastel tones and overlook the garden or the Montagne Noire.

The hotel's restaurant, Le Vicomté, serves Mediterranean specialties for lunch and dinner. A selection of wines are available to accompany your meals. Guests can also relax at the bar, next to the fireplace.

Other services include room service, free private parking, a garden and 3 meeting rooms for up to 90 people. Carcassonne Train Station is 2.5 km away.

name: Tribe Carcassonne
description:
In the heart of the historic Bastide Saint-Louis district, at the foot of the Pont Vieux, the TRIBE CARCASSONNE hotel enjoys a privileged location to shine in the lower town and invites you to (re)discover all the secrets of the Medieval City, in a unique and elegant urban universe.
At TRIBE, nothing is left to chance, from the absolute comfort of our rooms to the sophisticated design of our living and coworking spaces.
Push the door of our coffee-shop, let yourself be tempted by one of our signature dishes or by a rooftop cocktail with a breathtaking view of the Medieval City.
Choose for a room with balcony for a fantastic view of the Medieval City, relax in our heated indoor swimming pool…. always with view of course!

name: Hôtel De L'octroi
description:
Hôtel De L'octroi is located 150 metres from the entrance to the medieval city of Carcassonne. It offers modern rooms with free WiFi.

Each guest room at the Hôtel de l’Octroi is soundproofed and air conditioned. They are all equipped with a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a private bathroom.

Facilities at the Hôtel de l’Octroi include a bar and an outdoor terrace. There is also an outdoor swimming pool which is open from Easter until the end of October until 20:30 each evening. The Gemology SPA is 150 metres away and offers a hammam, hot tub and massages, at a surcharge.

Snacking options are available.

L’Octroi is a 10-minute walk from the Basilica of Saint Nazaire and Saint Celse and Carcassonne Cathedral is a 20-minute walk away. Private parking is available with an extra cost. Carcassonne Train Station is an 8-minute drive away.

name: ibis Styles Carcassonne La Cité
description:
ibis Styles Carcassonne La Cité is located just 600 metres from the medieval town of Carcassone. It features a restaurant, an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness room and free private parking. Free WiFi is included.

The rooms and studios at ibis Styles Carcassonne La Cité are all air-conditioned and equipped with a TV and a private bathroom with a shower or a bath. They are all accessible by lift and some are adapted for disabled guests.

A daily breakfast is served in the dining room, which offers views of the swimming pool and the city's roof tops. Tea and coffee can be enjoyed anytime during the day in the hotel hall.

ibis Styles Carcassonne La Cité is a 15-minute walk from the Basilica of Saint-Nazaire and Saint Celse. Carcassonne Train Station is 2.5 km away.

name: Hotel Montsegur
description:
Hotel Montsegur is set in a 19th-century manor house in Carcassone, a 10-minute walk from the city centre and a 5-minute walk from Carcassonne's Cathedral. It offers free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned guest room is decorated with period furniture and has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is served every morning.

Additional facilities at the Montsegur include luggage storage, free newspapers.

The hotel is 4 km from the A61 motorway. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hotel de la Cité & Spa MGallery
description:
Set in Carcassonne's circular walls, Hotel de la Cite Carcassonne - MGallery Collection is set in a Medieval-style chateau. The hotel features gardens and an outdoor pool with views of Saint Nazaire Basilica. Free WiFi and wired internet access is available.

Classic or Provencal-style decoration and an iPod docking station feature in all of the guest rooms at Hotel de la Cite. Some rooms have a balcony with views of the city.

Homemade pastries are served at breakfast and regional dishes are offered in the brasserie and summer restaurant. Guests can also dine at the Michelin-starred Barbacane restaurant or enjoy a cocktail in the bar.

Guests can go wine tasting in the on-site cellar or organise a river cruise at the 24-hour reception. The hotel has a shuttle service and a valet service available for guests using the private car park.

Carcassonne Train Station is 2.4 km from the property. Narbonne is 61 km away. Parking is available on site for an additional charge.

- no ipod docking station in rooms
- no brasserie and summer restaurant but an bar in the garden during summer where we can eat tapas with a view on the remparts
- no wine tasting in the on-site cellar

name: Audotel
description:
Audotel is located in Carcassonne, within 4 km from Carcassonne's Medieval City and The Canal du Midi. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The rooms will provide you with a flat-screen TV and a desk. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a toilet. Rooms with disabled access are available.

Each morning, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast served in the hotel's dining room. with extra fees.

The closest exit to the hotel is exit 24 off of the A61 motorway, which is just a 3-minute drive from the property outside of rush hour. The property offers free parking.

name: Premiere Classe Carcassonne
description:
Premiere Classe Carcassonne is located in La Bouriette, near the Deux-Mers motorway A61 and 3 minutes from the airport. Free WiFi is provided.

All air-conditioned rooms have a work area and a TV. Bunk beds are available in some rooms for a third guest at no extra charge.

Premiere Classe Carcassonne also has a free private car park, 24-hour check-in and check-out and daily breakfast service.

name: Hôtel Le Parc - La Table de Franck Putelat
description:
Located 500 metres away from the medieval city of Carcassonne, Hôtel Le Parc - La Table de Franck Putelat offers free WiFi, rooms serviced by a lift and a 2-Michelin star restaurant with a terrace. Guests can enjoy a swimming pool located 850 metres away in the second hotel of the group, Hotel Pont Levis.

The air-conditioned rooms and suites feature a modern-style décor, a balcony or terrace and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom, separate by a discrete curtain, is complete with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath or shower.

A continental breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant or in the comfort of the guests’ rooms, with a various of products that you can choose to compose your personalized breakfast.
Gastronomic cuisine can be enjoyed in the hotel’s restaurant, which offers a modern-style décor.

Hôtel Le Parc - La Table de Franck Putelat is 8 km from Carcassonne Airport and 3 km from the main train station. The Canal du Midi is 2 km away and free private parking is available on site.

A selection of services can be suggested by our team as massages, wine tasting, romantic welcoming, rental car, ...

name: Adonis Carcassonne
description:
Adonis Carcassonne offers accommodation at the foot of the historic centre, just 350 metres from the medieval town of Carcassonne. It is a 10-minute drive from Carcassonne Airport. Free WiFi access is available.

An LCD TV with satellite channels and a private safe feature in all of the apartments and studios at Adonis Carcassonne. Each is air-conditioned and also has a kitchenette with hot plates.

Guests can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the breakfast room or on the terrace.

Private parking is available on site and guests can also rent bicycles to visit the Cathar Castles. Saint-Nazaire Basilica is a 5-minute drive from the residence.

name: Hotel Pont Levis - Franck Putelat
description:
Just 50 metres from the main entrance of the medieval city of Carcassonne, this modern hotel features a view of the city's ramparts and the surrounding countryside. Guests can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool and a 2-hectare private garden.

Rooms have a combination of classic and contemporary décor and feature a flat screen TV with satellite channels and an iPod docking station. Rooms are equipped with an electric kettle. Each has an en suite bathroom with a bath or shower, a bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries.

A gourmet French buffet breakfast is served daily for a supplement. Several restaurants are located 50 metres away and additional restaurants and grocery shops can be found 2 km away in the centre of Carcassone.

Cathar castles are located as close as 20 km from the property and Toulouse is a 50-minute drive away. Motorway A61 is 5 km away and Carcassonne Train Station is 3 km away. A taxi stand and a bus stop are located in front of the building. Private parking is available.

name: The Originals City, Hôtel Pont Rouge (ex inter-hôtel), Carcassonne
description:
Offering a 24-hour front desk, The Originals City, Hôtel Pont Rouge, Carcassonne is located a 10-minute drive from Carcassonne Airport and 5 km from the medieval part of town. It offers 50 rooms decorated in a modern style, all serviced by a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All the rooms offer air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast every morning.

Hôtel Pont Rouge is 60 km from Narbonne. Free secured parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel La Bastide Saint Martin
description:
La Bastide Saint Martin is set 5 km from the centre and the fortified city of Carcassonne and the Canal du Midi and offers free WiFi access and air-conditioned rooms. Guests are free to relax by the seasonal heated outdoor pool or in the surrounding garden.

Views of the garden or swimming pool are offered in all guest rooms at La Bastide Saint Martin. Each en suite room is air-conditioned and features a flat-screen TV, and some rooms provide direct access to the swimming pool.

Breakfast is served at the property every morning.

Free secure parking is available on site and the Carcassonne Train Station is 3 km away. The hotel is 3 km from the Fresquel Aqueduct and 33 km from the city of Limoux.

name: Hotel Cote Basque
description:
This hotel sits in the heart Bayonne’s historical town, in front of the Saint Esprit bridge. It offers free Wi-Fi and en suite rooms.

Guest rooms at the Hotel Cote Basque are equipped with satellite TV, air conditioning and are accessible by lift. Hairdryers can be requested.

A full buffet breakfast is served every morning.

The hotel is 100 metres from Bayonne train station, 5 km from Biarritz and 30 km from San Sebastien. A public car park is available nearby at an extra cost.

name: Hôtel Les Genêts Bayonne
description:
Located 1.5 km from the A63 motorway outside Bayonne, Hôtel Les Genêts Bayonne features soundproofed rooms and a restaurant serving local specialities.

The restaurant is closed at weekends (from Friday) and on public holidays. Exceptional closure from 23 October to 5 November 2023.

The rooms at the Hôtel Les Genêts Bayonne include an LCD TV, free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. They are decorated in neutral shades and feature stylish wooden furnishings.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room at this hotel.

Free parking is provided on site, and the centre of Anglet is 3 km away. The beaches of Biarritz are only a 15-minute drive away.

name: Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne
description:
Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Bayonne. This property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel all rooms have a wardrobe and a private bathroom.

Buffet and American breakfast options are available every morning at Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne.

The accommodation offers a sauna. Guests at Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bayonne, like hiking and cycling.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Saint Marie Cathedral, Ansot Park and Musee Bonnat-Helleu, Museum of Fine Arts Bayonne. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 7 km from Hôtel Villa KOEGUI Bayonne.

name: Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre
description:
Set in Bayonne, just 700 metres from the city centre and Ste Marie Cathedral, Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site at an extra cost and subject to availability.

All the rooms have a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. A hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in the private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre also has a Club Area set on the top floor with panoramic views of the city, Adour River and Rhune Mountain.

Bayonne Arenes Bullring is 600 metres away and Ansot Park just 1.6 km away. Okko Hotels Bayonne Centre L’Okko is located 5 km from the Ocean beaches. The nearest airport is Biarritz - Anglet - Bayonne Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Villa la Renaissance
description:
Villa la Renaissance offers rooms in Bayonne, 600 metres from Ansot Park and 1.2 km from Saint Marie Cathedral. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a terrace. Guyenne et Gascogne Headquarters is 700 metres from the hotel and Musee Bonnat-Helleu, Museum of Fine Arts Bayonne is 1.1 km away.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Every room has a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Villa la Renaissance have a balcony. All guest rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Bayonne Town Hall, Jardin Botanique and Pyrenees Atlantiques Prefecture. The nearest airport is Biarritz Airport, 5 km from the property.

name: ibis budget Bayonne
description:
Located 2 km from Bayonne historic centre and train station, and 8 km from the beaches, ibis budget Bayonne has a 24-hour front desk, free Wi-Fi and free parking.

The air-conditioned rooms all have a private shower room. Pets are welcomed at the property yet an additional fee of 10 EUR per animal per night will apply.

There is a Courtepaille Restaurant on site offering traditional food and a grill on the terrace. A continental breakfast can be served in the breakfast room or on the terrace and includes pastries, fruit juice, brioche, cake, yogurts, compote, cheese and hot drinks.

Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport is 7 km from ibis budget Bayonne and the A63 highway is 500 metres away. The Basque Museum is 2 km away.

name: ibis Bayonne Centre
description:
Located a 5-minute walk from the centre of Bayonne, this ibis hotel is set on the banks of the Adour River, just 600 metres from the train station. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms and a furnished terrace.

The rooms at ibis Bayonne have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Each room also features a private bathroom with a shower.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

At the ibis Bayonne, you can also relax with a drink from the bar and dine at the on-site restaurant.

Other facilities include a 24-hour reception, 2 meeting rooms and a lift. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout this property. Private parking is possible on site, with an additional cost, and Biarritz Parme Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

Please note that we accept pets except on the restaurant

name: Premiere Classe Bayonne
description:
Premiere Classe Bayonne, easily accessible from the A63 and A64 motorways (exit 6), is situated 5 minutes from the city centre and just 10 minutes from the beach.

All of the air-conditioned guestrooms are modern in both design and comfort to provide you with a functional living space. All of the rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi access and a private bathroom with shower.

Hotel Premiere Classe Bayonne has free private parking. Visit the nearby cities of Biarritz, Bayonne and Anglet and enjoy the Basque and Landes coasts. Ikea in Bayonne is 2 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Bayonne
description:
Set in central Bayonne in the Aquitaine region, Hôtel Le Bayonne offers a seasonal, outdoor swimming pool. Guests are invited to use the hammam.

Free fibre-optic Internet access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels are provided in each of Hôtel Le Bayonne rooms. They are all air-conditioned and include work desks and telephones.

Traditional cuisine is proposed in the restaurant at Hôtel Le Bayonne, and drinks are served in the bar. Breakfast can be enjoyed daily in the breakfast area or in the comfort of guest rooms.

Bayonne Train Station is 3 km away and private parking is available with a supplement. The hotel is 7.6 km from Biarritz and 5.5 km from the Biarritz-Anglet-Bayonne Airport.

name: B&B HOTEL Bayonne
description:
Featuring free WiFi and soundproofed bedrooms, B&B HOTEL Bayonne is situated in Bayonne, just 3 km from Biarritz Airport. Free private parking is available on site.

Each room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels, air conditioning, a desk and a private bathroom.

In the morning, a buffet breakfast is available, including bread, jam, compote, eggs, bacon and hot drinks.

Sainte Marie Cathedral is 3.3 km from B&B HOTEL Bayonne, while Basque Coast Hospital Centre is 2.3 km from the property.

name: Hotel Loreak
description:
Hotel Loreak is located 2 km from Bayonne city centre and offers en-suite accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access and a flat-screen TV.

Renovated in May 2020, rooms at the Hotel Loreak are also air-conditioned and come with a work desk. There is a hairdryer in the private bathroom and all rooms are serviced by a lift.
